57enum shareability {
58 shareable_none,
59 shareable_literal,
60 shareable_copy,
61 shareable_everything,
62};
63
64struct lex_context {
65 unsigned int in_defined: 1;
66 unsigned int in_kwarg: 1;
67 unsigned int in_argdef: 1;
68 unsigned int in_def: 1;
69 unsigned int in_class: 1;
70 BITFIELD(enum shareability, shareable_constant_value, 2);
71};
72
73#include "parse.h"

75#define NO_LEX_CTXT (struct lex_context){0}

77#define AREF(ary, i) RARRAY_AREF(ary, i)

80# define WARN_PAST_SCOPE 0

83#define TAB_WIDTH 8
84
85#define yydebug (p->debug) /* disable the global variable definition */
86
87#define YYMALLOC(size) rb_parser_malloc(p, (size))
88#define YYREALLOC(ptr, size) rb_parser_realloc(p, (ptr), (size))
89#define YYCALLOC(nelem, size) rb_parser_calloc(p, (nelem), (size))
90#define YYFREE(ptr) rb_parser_free(p, (ptr))
91#define YYFPRINTF rb_parser_printf
92#define YY_LOCATION_PRINT(File, loc) \
93 rb_parser_printf(p, "%d.%d-%d.%d", \
94 (loc).beg_pos.lineno, (loc).beg_pos.column,\
95 (loc).end_pos.lineno, (loc).end_pos.column)
96#define YYLLOC_DEFAULT(Current, Rhs, N) \
97 do \
98 if (N) \
99 { \
100 (Current).beg_pos = YYRHSLOC(Rhs, 1).beg_pos; \
101 (Current).end_pos = YYRHSLOC(Rhs, N).end_pos; \
102 } \
103 else \
104 { \
105 (Current).beg_pos = YYRHSLOC(Rhs, 0).end_pos; \
106 (Current).end_pos = YYRHSLOC(Rhs, 0).end_pos; \
107 } \
108 while (0)
109#define YY_(Msgid) \
110 (((Msgid)[0] == 'm') && (strcmp((Msgid), "memory exhausted") == 0) ? \
111 "nesting too deep" : (Msgid))
112
113#define RUBY_SET_YYLLOC_FROM_STRTERM_HEREDOC(Current) \
114 rb_parser_set_location_from_strterm_heredoc(p, &p->lex.strterm->u.heredoc, &(Current))
115#define RUBY_SET_YYLLOC_OF_NONE(Current) \
116 rb_parser_set_location_of_none(p, &(Current))
117#define RUBY_SET_YYLLOC(Current) \
118 rb_parser_set_location(p, &(Current))
119#define RUBY_INIT_YYLLOC() \
120 { \
121 {p->ruby_sourceline, (int)(p->lex.ptok - p->lex.pbeg)}, \
122 {p->ruby_sourceline, (int)(p->lex.pcur - p->lex.pbeg)}, \
123 }
124
125enum lex_state_bits {
126 EXPR_BEG_bit, /* ignore newline, +/- is a sign. */
127 EXPR_END_bit, /* newline significant, +/- is an operator. */
128 EXPR_ENDARG_bit, /* ditto, and unbound braces. */
129 EXPR_ENDFN_bit, /* ditto, and unbound braces. */
130 EXPR_ARG_bit, /* newline significant, +/- is an operator. */
131 EXPR_CMDARG_bit, /* newline significant, +/- is an operator. */
132 EXPR_MID_bit, /* newline significant, +/- is an operator. */
133 EXPR_FNAME_bit, /* ignore newline, no reserved words. */
134 EXPR_DOT_bit, /* right after `.' or `::', no reserved words. */
135 EXPR_CLASS_bit, /* immediate after `class', no here document. */
136 EXPR_LABEL_bit, /* flag bit, label is allowed. */
137 EXPR_LABELED_bit, /* flag bit, just after a label. */
138 EXPR_FITEM_bit, /* symbol literal as FNAME. */
139 EXPR_MAX_STATE
140};
141/* examine combinations */
142enum lex_state_e {
143#define DEF_EXPR(n) EXPR_##n = (1 << EXPR_##n##_bit)
144 DEF_EXPR(BEG),
145 DEF_EXPR(END),
146 DEF_EXPR(ENDARG),
147 DEF_EXPR(ENDFN),
148 DEF_EXPR(ARG),
149 DEF_EXPR(CMDARG),
150 DEF_EXPR(MID),
151 DEF_EXPR(FNAME),
152 DEF_EXPR(DOT),
153 DEF_EXPR(CLASS),
154 DEF_EXPR(LABEL),
155 DEF_EXPR(LABELED),
156 DEF_EXPR(FITEM),
157 EXPR_VALUE = EXPR_BEG,
158 EXPR_BEG_ANY = (EXPR_BEG | EXPR_MID | EXPR_CLASS),
159 EXPR_ARG_ANY = (EXPR_ARG | EXPR_CMDARG),
160 EXPR_END_ANY = (EXPR_END | EXPR_ENDARG | EXPR_ENDFN),
161 EXPR_NONE = 0
162};
163#define IS_lex_state_for(x, ls) ((x) & (ls))
164#define IS_lex_state_all_for(x, ls) (((x) & (ls)) == (ls))
165#define IS_lex_state(ls) IS_lex_state_for(p->lex.state, (ls))
166#define IS_lex_state_all(ls) IS_lex_state_all_for(p->lex.state, (ls))
167
168# define SET_LEX_STATE(ls) \
169 parser_set_lex_state(p, ls, __LINE__)
170static inline enum lex_state_e parser_set_lex_state(struct parser_params *p, enum lex_state_e ls, int line);
171
172typedef VALUE stack_type;
173
174static const rb_code_location_t NULL_LOC = { {0, -1}, {0, -1} };
175
176# define SHOW_BITSTACK(stack, name) (p->debug ? rb_parser_show_bitstack(p, stack, name, __LINE__) : (void)0)
177# define BITSTACK_PUSH(stack, n) (((p->stack) = ((p->stack)<<1)|((n)&1)), SHOW_BITSTACK(p->stack, #stack"(push)"))
178# define BITSTACK_POP(stack) (((p->stack) = (p->stack) >> 1), SHOW_BITSTACK(p->stack, #stack"(pop)"))
179# define BITSTACK_SET_P(stack) (SHOW_BITSTACK(p->stack, #stack), (p->stack)&1)
180# define BITSTACK_SET(stack, n) ((p->stack)=(n), SHOW_BITSTACK(p->stack, #stack"(set)"))
181
182/* A flag to identify keyword_do_cond, "do" keyword after condition expression.
183 Examples: `while ... do`, `until ... do`, and `for ... in ... do` */
184#define COND_PUSH(n) BITSTACK_PUSH(cond_stack, (n))
185#define COND_POP() BITSTACK_POP(cond_stack)
186#define COND_P() BITSTACK_SET_P(cond_stack)
187#define COND_SET(n) BITSTACK_SET(cond_stack, (n))
188
189/* A flag to identify keyword_do_block; "do" keyword after command_call.
190 Example: `foo 1, 2 do`. */
191#define CMDARG_PUSH(n) BITSTACK_PUSH(cmdarg_stack, (n))
192#define CMDARG_POP() BITSTACK_POP(cmdarg_stack)
193#define CMDARG_P() BITSTACK_SET_P(cmdarg_stack)
194#define CMDARG_SET(n) BITSTACK_SET(cmdarg_stack, (n))
195
196struct vtable {
197 ID *tbl;
198 int pos;
199 int capa;
200 struct vtable *prev;
201};
202
203struct local_vars {
204 struct vtable *args;
205 struct vtable *vars;
206 struct vtable *used;
207# if WARN_PAST_SCOPE
208 struct vtable *past;
209# endif
210 struct local_vars *prev;
211# ifndef RIPPER
212 struct {
213 NODE *outer, *inner, *current;
214 } numparam;
215# endif
216};
217
218enum {
219 ORDINAL_PARAM = -1,
220 NO_PARAM = 0,
221 NUMPARAM_MAX = 9,
222};
223
224#define NUMPARAM_ID_P(id) numparam_id_p(id)
225#define NUMPARAM_ID_TO_IDX(id) (unsigned int)(((id) >> ID_SCOPE_SHIFT) - tNUMPARAM_1 + 1)
226#define NUMPARAM_IDX_TO_ID(idx) TOKEN2LOCALID((tNUMPARAM_1 + (idx) - 1))
227static int
228numparam_id_p(ID id)
229{
230 if (!is_local_id(id)) return 0;
231 unsigned int idx = NUMPARAM_ID_TO_IDX(id);
232 return idx > 0 && idx <= NUMPARAM_MAX;
233}
234static void numparam_name(struct parser_params *p, ID id);
235
236#define DVARS_INHERIT ((void*)1)
237#define DVARS_TOPSCOPE NULL
238#define DVARS_TERMINAL_P(tbl) ((tbl) == DVARS_INHERIT || (tbl) == DVARS_TOPSCOPE)
239
240typedef struct token_info {
241 const char *token;
242 rb_code_position_t beg;
243 int indent;
244 int nonspc;
245 struct token_info *next;
246} token_info;
247
248typedef struct rb_strterm_struct rb_strterm_t;
249
250/*
251 Structure of Lexer Buffer:
252
253 lex.pbeg lex.ptok lex.pcur lex.pend
254 | | | |
255 |------------+------------+------------|
256 |<---------->|
257 token
258*/
259struct parser_params {
260 rb_imemo_tmpbuf_t *heap;
261
262 YYSTYPE *lval;
263
264 struct {
265 rb_strterm_t *strterm;
266 VALUE (*gets)(struct parser_params*,VALUE);
267 VALUE input;
268 VALUE prevline;
269 VALUE lastline;
270 VALUE nextline;
271 const char *pbeg;
272 const char *pcur;
273 const char *pend;
274 const char *ptok;
275 union {
276 long ptr;
277 VALUE (*call)(VALUE, int);
278 } gets_;
279 enum lex_state_e state;
280 /* track the nest level of any parens "()[]{}" */
281 int paren_nest;
282 /* keep p->lex.paren_nest at the beginning of lambda "->" to detect tLAMBEG and keyword_do_LAMBDA */
283 int lpar_beg;
284 /* track the nest level of only braces "{}" */
285 int brace_nest;
286 } lex;
287 stack_type cond_stack;
288 stack_type cmdarg_stack;
289 int tokidx;
290 int toksiz;
291 int tokline;
292 int heredoc_end;
293 int heredoc_indent;
294 int heredoc_line_indent;
295 char *tokenbuf;
296 struct local_vars *lvtbl;
297 st_table *pvtbl;
298 st_table *pktbl;
299 int line_count;
300 int ruby_sourceline; /* current line no. */
301 const char *ruby_sourcefile; /* current source file */
302 VALUE ruby_sourcefile_string;
303 rb_encoding *enc;
304 token_info *token_info;
305 VALUE case_labels;
306 VALUE compile_option;
307
308 VALUE debug_buffer;
309 VALUE debug_output;
310
311 ID cur_arg;
312
313 rb_ast_t *ast;
314 int node_id;
315
316 int max_numparam;
317
318 struct lex_context ctxt;
319
320 unsigned int command_start:1;
321 unsigned int eofp: 1;
322 unsigned int ruby__end__seen: 1;
323 unsigned int debug: 1;
324 unsigned int has_shebang: 1;
325 unsigned int token_seen: 1;
326 unsigned int token_info_enabled: 1;
327# if WARN_PAST_SCOPE
328 unsigned int past_scope_enabled: 1;
329# endif
330 unsigned int error_p: 1;
331 unsigned int cr_seen: 1;
332
333#ifndef RIPPER
334 /* Ruby core only */
335
336 unsigned int do_print: 1;
337 unsigned int do_loop: 1;
338 unsigned int do_chomp: 1;
339 unsigned int do_split: 1;
340 unsigned int keep_script_lines: 1;
341
342 NODE *eval_tree_begin;
343 NODE *eval_tree;
344 VALUE error_buffer;
345 VALUE debug_lines;
346 const struct rb_iseq_struct *parent_iseq;
347#else
348 /* Ripper only */
349
350 struct {
351 VALUE token;
352 int line;
353 int col;
354 } delayed;
355
356 VALUE value;
357 VALUE result;
358 VALUE parsing_thread;
359#endif
360};
361
362#define intern_cstr(n,l,en) rb_intern3(n,l,en)
363
364#define STR_NEW(ptr,len) rb_enc_str_new((ptr),(len),p->enc)
365#define STR_NEW0() rb_enc_str_new(0,0,p->enc)
366#define STR_NEW2(ptr) rb_enc_str_new((ptr),strlen(ptr),p->enc)
367#define STR_NEW3(ptr,len,e,func) parser_str_new((ptr),(len),(e),(func),p->enc)
368#define TOK_INTERN() intern_cstr(tok(p), toklen(p), p->enc)
369
370static st_table *
371push_pvtbl(struct parser_params *p)
372{
373 st_table *tbl = p->pvtbl;
374 p->pvtbl = st_init_numtable();
375 return tbl;
376}
377
378static void
379pop_pvtbl(struct parser_params *p, st_table *tbl)
380{
381 st_free_table(p->pvtbl);
382 p->pvtbl = tbl;
383}
384
385static st_table *
386push_pktbl(struct parser_params *p)
387{
388 st_table *tbl = p->pktbl;
389 p->pktbl = 0;
390 return tbl;
391}
392
393static void
394pop_pktbl(struct parser_params *p, st_table *tbl)
395{
396 if (p->pktbl) st_free_table(p->pktbl);
397 p->pktbl = tbl;
398}
399
400RBIMPL_ATTR_NONNULL((1, 2, 3))
401static int parser_yyerror(struct parser_params*, const YYLTYPE *yylloc, const char*);
402RBIMPL_ATTR_NONNULL((1, 2))
403static int parser_yyerror0(struct parser_params*, const char*);
404#define yyerror0(msg) parser_yyerror0(p, (msg))
405#define yyerror1(loc, msg) parser_yyerror(p, (loc), (msg))
406#define yyerror(yylloc, p, msg) parser_yyerror(p, yylloc, msg)
407#define token_flush(ptr) ((ptr)->lex.ptok = (ptr)->lex.pcur)
408
409static void token_info_setup(token_info *ptinfo, const char *ptr, const rb_code_location_t *loc);
410static void token_info_push(struct parser_params*, const char *token, const rb_code_location_t *loc);
411static void token_info_pop(struct parser_params*, const char *token, const rb_code_location_t *loc);
412static void token_info_warn(struct parser_params *p, const char *token, token_info *ptinfo_beg, int same, const rb_code_location_t *loc);
413static void token_info_drop(struct parser_params *p, const char *token, rb_code_position_t beg_pos);

416#define compile_for_eval (0)
417#else
418#define compile_for_eval (p->parent_iseq != 0)
419#endif

421#define token_column ((int)(p->lex.ptok - p->lex.pbeg))
422
423#define CALL_Q_P(q) ((q) == TOKEN2VAL(tANDDOT))
424#define NODE_CALL_Q(q) (CALL_Q_P(q) ? NODE_QCALL : NODE_CALL)
425#define NEW_QCALL(q,r,m,a,loc) NEW_NODE(NODE_CALL_Q(q),r,m,a,loc)
426
427#define lambda_beginning_p() (p->lex.lpar_beg == p->lex.paren_nest)

430#define ANON_REST_ID '*'
431#define ANON_KEYWORD_REST_ID idPow

433static enum yytokentype yylex(YYSTYPE*, YYLTYPE*, struct parser_params*);

435#ifndef RIPPER
436static inline void
437rb_discard_node(struct parser_params *p, NODE *n)
438{
439 rb_ast_delete_node(p->ast, n);
440}
441#endif
442
443#ifdef RIPPER
444static inline VALUE
445add_mark_object(struct parser_params *p, VALUE obj)
446{
447 if (!SPECIAL_CONST_P(obj)
448 && !RB_TYPE_P(obj, T_NODE) /* Ripper jumbles NODE objects and other objects... */
449 ) {
450 rb_ast_add_mark_object(p->ast, obj);
451 }
452 return obj;
453}
454#else
455static NODE* node_newnode_with_locals(struct parser_params *, enum node_type, VALUE, VALUE, const rb_code_location_t*);
456#endif
457
458static NODE* node_newnode(struct parser_params *, enum node_type, VALUE, VALUE, VALUE, const rb_code_location_t*);
459#define rb_node_newnode(type, a1, a2, a3, loc) node_newnode(p, (type), (a1), (a2), (a3), (loc))
460
461static NODE *nd_set_loc(NODE *nd, const YYLTYPE *loc);
462
463static int
464parser_get_node_id(struct parser_params *p)
465{
466 int node_id = p->node_id;
467 p->node_id++;
468 return node_id;
469}
470
471#ifndef RIPPER
472static inline void
473set_line_body(NODE *body, int line)
474{
475 if (!body) return;
476 switch (nd_type(body)) {
477 case NODE_RESCUE:
478 case NODE_ENSURE:
479 nd_set_line(body, line);
480 }
481}

568static NODE *new_regexp(struct parser_params *, NODE *, int, const YYLTYPE *);
569
570#define make_list(list, loc) ((list) ? (nd_set_loc(list, loc), list) : NEW_ZLIST(loc))
571
572static NODE *new_xstring(struct parser_params *, NODE *, const YYLTYPE *loc);
573
574static NODE *symbol_append(struct parser_params *p, NODE *symbols, NODE *symbol);
575
576static NODE *match_op(struct parser_params*,NODE*,NODE*,const YYLTYPE*,const YYLTYPE*);
577
578static rb_ast_id_table_t *local_tbl(struct parser_params*);
579
580static VALUE reg_compile(struct parser_params*, VALUE, int);
581static void reg_fragment_setenc(struct parser_params*, VALUE, int);
582static int reg_fragment_check(struct parser_params*, VALUE, int);
583static NODE *reg_named_capture_assign(struct parser_params* p, VALUE regexp, const YYLTYPE *loc);
584
585static int literal_concat0(struct parser_params *p, VALUE head, VALUE tail);
586static NODE *heredoc_dedent(struct parser_params*,NODE*);
587
588static void check_literal_when(struct parser_params *p, NODE *args, const YYLTYPE *loc);
589
590#define get_id(id) (id)
591#define get_value(val) (val)
592#define get_num(num) (num)
593#else /* RIPPER */
594#define NODE_RIPPER NODE_CDECL
595#define NEW_RIPPER(a,b,c,loc) (VALUE)NEW_CDECL(a,b,c,loc)
596
597static inline int ripper_is_node_yylval(VALUE n);
598
599static inline VALUE
600ripper_new_yylval(struct parser_params *p, ID a, VALUE b, VALUE c)
601{
602 if (ripper_is_node_yylval(c)) c = RNODE(c)->nd_cval;
603 add_mark_object(p, b);
604 add_mark_object(p, c);
605 return NEW_RIPPER(a, b, c, &NULL_LOC);
606}
607
608static inline int
609ripper_is_node_yylval(VALUE n)
610{
611 return RB_TYPE_P(n, T_NODE) && nd_type_p(RNODE(n), NODE_RIPPER);
612}
613
614#define value_expr(node) ((void)(node))
615#define remove_begin(node) (node)
616#define void_stmts(p,x) (x)
617#define rb_dvar_defined(id, base) 0
618#define rb_local_defined(id, base) 0
619static ID ripper_get_id(VALUE);
620#define get_id(id) ripper_get_id(id)
621static VALUE ripper_get_value(VALUE);
622#define get_value(val) ripper_get_value(val)
623#define get_num(num) (int)get_id(num)
624static VALUE assignable(struct parser_params*,VALUE);
625static int id_is_var(struct parser_params *p, ID id);
626
627#define method_cond(p,node,loc) (node)
628#define call_bin_op(p, recv,id,arg1,op_loc,loc) dispatch3(binary, (recv), STATIC_ID2SYM(id), (arg1))
629#define match_op(p,node1,node2,op_loc,loc) call_bin_op(0, (node1), idEqTilde, (node2), op_loc, loc)
630#define call_uni_op(p, recv,id,op_loc,loc) dispatch2(unary, STATIC_ID2SYM(id), (recv))
631#define logop(p,id,node1,node2,op_loc,loc) call_bin_op(0, (node1), (id), (node2), op_loc, loc)
632
633#define new_nil(loc) Qnil
634
635static VALUE new_regexp(struct parser_params *, VALUE, VALUE, const YYLTYPE *);
636
637static VALUE const_decl(struct parser_params *p, VALUE path);

639static VALUE var_field(struct parser_params *p, VALUE a);
640static VALUE assign_error(struct parser_params *p, const char *mesg, VALUE a);
641
642static VALUE parser_reg_compile(struct parser_params*, VALUE, int, VALUE *);
643
644static VALUE backref_error(struct parser_params*, NODE *, VALUE);
645#endif /* !RIPPER */

647/* forward declaration */
648typedef struct rb_strterm_heredoc_struct rb_strterm_heredoc_t;

650RUBY_SYMBOL_EXPORT_BEGIN
651VALUE rb_parser_reg_compile(struct parser_params* p, VALUE str, int options);
652int rb_reg_fragment_setenc(struct parser_params*, VALUE, int);
653enum lex_state_e rb_parser_trace_lex_state(struct parser_params *, enum lex_state_e, enum lex_state_e, int);
654VALUE rb_parser_lex_state_name(enum lex_state_e state);
655void rb_parser_show_bitstack(struct parser_params *, stack_type, const char *, int);
656PRINTF_ARGS(void rb_parser_fatal(struct parser_params *p, const char *fmt, ...), 2, 3);
657YYLTYPE *rb_parser_set_location_from_strterm_heredoc(struct parser_params *p, rb_strterm_heredoc_t *here, YYLTYPE *yylloc);
658YYLTYPE *rb_parser_set_location_of_none(struct parser_params *p, YYLTYPE *yylloc);
659YYLTYPE *rb_parser_set_location(struct parser_params *p, YYLTYPE *yylloc);

683static void add_forwarding_args(struct parser_params *p);

686static void dyna_pop(struct parser_params*, const struct vtable *);
687static int dyna_in_block(struct parser_params*);

698#ifdef RIPPER
699# define METHOD_NOT idNOT
700#else
701# define METHOD_NOT '!'
702#endif
703
704#define idFWD_REST '*'
705#ifdef RUBY3_KEYWORDS
706#define idFWD_KWREST idPow /* Use simple "**", as tDSTAR is "**arg" */
707#else
708#define idFWD_KWREST 0
709#endif
710#define idFWD_BLOCK '&'
711
712#define RE_OPTION_ONCE (1<<16)
713#define RE_OPTION_ENCODING_SHIFT 8
714#define RE_OPTION_ENCODING(e) (((e)&0xff)<<RE_OPTION_ENCODING_SHIFT)
715#define RE_OPTION_ENCODING_IDX(o) (((o)>>RE_OPTION_ENCODING_SHIFT)&0xff)
716#define RE_OPTION_ENCODING_NONE(o) ((o)&RE_OPTION_ARG_ENCODING_NONE)
717#define RE_OPTION_MASK 0xff
718#define RE_OPTION_ARG_ENCODING_NONE 32
719
720/* structs for managing terminator of string literal and heredocment */
721typedef struct rb_strterm_literal_struct {
722 union {
723 VALUE dummy;
724 long nest;
725 } u0;
726 union {
727 VALUE dummy;
728 long func; /* STR_FUNC_* (e.g., STR_FUNC_ESCAPE and STR_FUNC_EXPAND) */
729 } u1;
730 union {
731 VALUE dummy;
732 long paren; /* '(' of `%q(...)` */
733 } u2;
734 union {
735 VALUE dummy;
736 long term; /* ')' of `%q(...)` */
737 } u3;
738} rb_strterm_literal_t;
739
740#define HERETERM_LENGTH_BITS ((SIZEOF_VALUE - 1) * CHAR_BIT - 1)
741
742struct rb_strterm_heredoc_struct {
743 VALUE lastline; /* the string of line that contains `<<"END"` */
744 long offset; /* the column of END in `<<"END"` */
745 int sourceline; /* lineno of the line that contains `<<"END"` */
746 unsigned length /* the length of END in `<<"END"` */
747#if HERETERM_LENGTH_BITS < SIZEOF_INT * CHAR_BIT
748 : HERETERM_LENGTH_BITS
749# define HERETERM_LENGTH_MAX ((1U << HERETERM_LENGTH_BITS) - 1)
750#else
751# define HERETERM_LENGTH_MAX UINT_MAX
752#endif
753 ;
754#if HERETERM_LENGTH_BITS < SIZEOF_INT * CHAR_BIT
755 unsigned quote: 1;
756 unsigned func: 8;
757#else
758 uint8_t quote;
759 uint8_t func;
760#endif
761};
762STATIC_ASSERT(rb_strterm_heredoc_t, sizeof(rb_strterm_heredoc_t) <= 4 * SIZEOF_VALUE);
763
764#define STRTERM_HEREDOC IMEMO_FL_USER0
765
766struct rb_strterm_struct {
767 VALUE flags;
768 union {
769 rb_strterm_literal_t literal;
770 rb_strterm_heredoc_t heredoc;
771 } u;
772};
773
774#ifndef RIPPER
775void
776rb_strterm_mark(VALUE obj)
777{
778 rb_strterm_t *strterm = (rb_strterm_t*)obj;
779 if (RBASIC(obj)->flags & STRTERM_HEREDOC) {
780 rb_strterm_heredoc_t *heredoc = &strterm->u.heredoc;
781 rb_gc_mark(heredoc->lastline);
782 }
783}
784#endif
785
786#define yytnamerr(yyres, yystr) (YYSIZE_T)rb_yytnamerr(p, yyres, yystr)
787size_t rb_yytnamerr(struct parser_params *p, char *yyres, const char *yystr);
788
789#define TOKEN2ID(tok) ( \
790 tTOKEN_LOCAL_BEGIN<(tok)&&(tok)<tTOKEN_LOCAL_END ? TOKEN2LOCALID(tok) : \
791 tTOKEN_INSTANCE_BEGIN<(tok)&&(tok)<tTOKEN_INSTANCE_END ? TOKEN2INSTANCEID(tok) : \
792 tTOKEN_GLOBAL_BEGIN<(tok)&&(tok)<tTOKEN_GLOBAL_END ? TOKEN2GLOBALID(tok) : \
793 tTOKEN_CONST_BEGIN<(tok)&&(tok)<tTOKEN_CONST_END ? TOKEN2CONSTID(tok) : \
794 tTOKEN_CLASS_BEGIN<(tok)&&(tok)<tTOKEN_CLASS_END ? TOKEN2CLASSID(tok) : \
795 tTOKEN_ATTRSET_BEGIN<(tok)&&(tok)<tTOKEN_ATTRSET_END ? TOKEN2ATTRSETID(tok) : \
796 ((tok) / ((tok)<tPRESERVED_ID_END && ((tok)>=128 || rb_ispunct(tok)))))
797
798/****** Ripper *******/
799
800#ifdef RIPPER
801#define RIPPER_VERSION "0.1.0"
802
803static inline VALUE intern_sym(const char *name);
804
805#include "eventids1.c"
806#include "eventids2.c"
807
808static VALUE ripper_dispatch0(struct parser_params*,ID);
809static VALUE ripper_dispatch1(struct parser_params*,ID,VALUE);
810static VALUE ripper_dispatch2(struct parser_params*,ID,VALUE,VALUE);
811static VALUE ripper_dispatch3(struct parser_params*,ID,VALUE,VALUE,VALUE);
812static VALUE ripper_dispatch4(struct parser_params*,ID,VALUE,VALUE,VALUE,VALUE);
813static VALUE ripper_dispatch5(struct parser_params*,ID,VALUE,VALUE,VALUE,VALUE,VALUE);
814static VALUE ripper_dispatch7(struct parser_params*,ID,VALUE,VALUE,VALUE,VALUE,VALUE,VALUE,VALUE);
815static void ripper_error(struct parser_params *p);
816
817#define dispatch0(n) ripper_dispatch0(p, TOKEN_PASTE(ripper_id_, n))
818#define dispatch1(n,a) ripper_dispatch1(p, TOKEN_PASTE(ripper_id_, n), (a))
819#define dispatch2(n,a,b) ripper_dispatch2(p, TOKEN_PASTE(ripper_id_, n), (a), (b))
820#define dispatch3(n,a,b,c) ripper_dispatch3(p, TOKEN_PASTE(ripper_id_, n), (a), (b), (c))
821#define dispatch4(n,a,b,c,d) ripper_dispatch4(p, TOKEN_PASTE(ripper_id_, n), (a), (b), (c), (d))
822#define dispatch5(n,a,b,c,d,e) ripper_dispatch5(p, TOKEN_PASTE(ripper_id_, n), (a), (b), (c), (d), (e))
823#define dispatch7(n,a,b,c,d,e,f,g) ripper_dispatch7(p, TOKEN_PASTE(ripper_id_, n), (a), (b), (c), (d), (e), (f), (g))
824
825#define yyparse ripper_yyparse
826
827#define ID2VAL(id) STATIC_ID2SYM(id)
828#define TOKEN2VAL(t) ID2VAL(TOKEN2ID(t))
829#define KWD2EID(t, v) ripper_new_yylval(p, keyword_##t, get_value(v), 0)
830
831#define params_new(pars, opts, rest, pars2, kws, kwrest, blk) \
832 dispatch7(params, (pars), (opts), (rest), (pars2), (kws), (kwrest), (blk))
833
834#define escape_Qundef(x) ((x)==Qundef ? Qnil : (x))
835
836static inline VALUE
837new_args(struct parser_params *p, VALUE pre_args, VALUE opt_args, VALUE rest_arg, VALUE post_args, VALUE tail, YYLTYPE *loc)
838{
839 NODE *t = (NODE *)tail;
840 VALUE kw_args = t->u1.value, kw_rest_arg = t->u2.value, block = t->u3.value;
841 return params_new(pre_args, opt_args, rest_arg, post_args, kw_args, kw_rest_arg, escape_Qundef(block));
842}
843
844static inline VALUE
845new_args_tail(struct parser_params *p, VALUE kw_args, VALUE kw_rest_arg, VALUE block, YYLTYPE *loc)
846{
847 NODE *t = rb_node_newnode(NODE_ARGS_AUX, kw_args, kw_rest_arg, block, &NULL_LOC);
848 add_mark_object(p, kw_args);
849 add_mark_object(p, kw_rest_arg);
850 add_mark_object(p, block);
851 return (VALUE)t;
852}
853
854static inline VALUE
855args_with_numbered(struct parser_params *p, VALUE args, int max_numparam)
856{
857 return args;
858}
859
860static VALUE
861new_array_pattern(struct parser_params *p, VALUE constant, VALUE pre_arg, VALUE aryptn, const YYLTYPE *loc)
862{
863 NODE *t = (NODE *)aryptn;
864 VALUE pre_args = t->u1.value, rest_arg = t->u2.value, post_args = t->u3.value;
865
866 if (!NIL_P(pre_arg)) {
867 if (!NIL_P(pre_args)) {
868 rb_ary_unshift(pre_args, pre_arg);
869 }
870 else {
871 pre_args = rb_ary_new_from_args(1, pre_arg);
872 }
873 }
874 return dispatch4(aryptn, constant, pre_args, rest_arg, post_args);
875}
876
877static VALUE
878new_array_pattern_tail(struct parser_params *p, VALUE pre_args, VALUE has_rest, VALUE rest_arg, VALUE post_args, const YYLTYPE *loc)
879{
880 NODE *t;
881
882 if (has_rest) {
883 rest_arg = dispatch1(var_field, rest_arg ? rest_arg : Qnil);
884 }
885 else {
886 rest_arg = Qnil;
887 }
888
889 t = rb_node_newnode(NODE_ARYPTN, pre_args, rest_arg, post_args, &NULL_LOC);
890 add_mark_object(p, pre_args);
891 add_mark_object(p, rest_arg);
892 add_mark_object(p, post_args);
893 return (VALUE)t;
894}
895
896static VALUE
897new_find_pattern(struct parser_params *p, VALUE constant, VALUE fndptn, const YYLTYPE *loc)
898{
899 NODE *t = (NODE *)fndptn;
900 VALUE pre_rest_arg = t->u1.value, args = t->u2.value, post_rest_arg = t->u3.value;
901
902 return dispatch4(fndptn, constant, pre_rest_arg, args, post_rest_arg);
903}
904
905static VALUE
906new_find_pattern_tail(struct parser_params *p, VALUE pre_rest_arg, VALUE args, VALUE post_rest_arg, const YYLTYPE *loc)
907{
908 NODE *t;
909
910 pre_rest_arg = dispatch1(var_field, pre_rest_arg ? pre_rest_arg : Qnil);
911 post_rest_arg = dispatch1(var_field, post_rest_arg ? post_rest_arg : Qnil);
912
913 t = rb_node_newnode(NODE_FNDPTN, pre_rest_arg, args, post_rest_arg, &NULL_LOC);
914 add_mark_object(p, pre_rest_arg);
915 add_mark_object(p, args);
916 add_mark_object(p, post_rest_arg);
917 return (VALUE)t;
918}
919
920#define new_hash(p,h,l) rb_ary_new_from_args(0)
921
922static VALUE
923new_unique_key_hash(struct parser_params *p, VALUE ary, const YYLTYPE *loc)
924{
925 return ary;
926}
927
928static VALUE
929new_hash_pattern(struct parser_params *p, VALUE constant, VALUE hshptn, const YYLTYPE *loc)
930{
931 NODE *t = (NODE *)hshptn;
932 VALUE kw_args = t->u1.value, kw_rest_arg = t->u2.value;
933 return dispatch3(hshptn, constant, kw_args, kw_rest_arg);
934}
935
936static VALUE
937new_hash_pattern_tail(struct parser_params *p, VALUE kw_args, VALUE kw_rest_arg, const YYLTYPE *loc)
938{
939 NODE *t;
940 if (kw_rest_arg) {
941 kw_rest_arg = dispatch1(var_field, kw_rest_arg);
942 }
943 else {
944 kw_rest_arg = Qnil;
945 }
946 t = rb_node_newnode(NODE_HSHPTN, kw_args, kw_rest_arg, 0, &NULL_LOC);
947
948 add_mark_object(p, kw_args);
949 add_mark_object(p, kw_rest_arg);
950 return (VALUE)t;
951}
952
953#define new_defined(p,expr,loc) dispatch1(defined, (expr))
954
955static VALUE heredoc_dedent(struct parser_params*,VALUE);
956
957#else
958#define ID2VAL(id) (id)
959#define TOKEN2VAL(t) ID2VAL(t)
960#define KWD2EID(t, v) keyword_##t
961
962static NODE *
963set_defun_body(struct parser_params *p, NODE *n, NODE *args, NODE *body, const YYLTYPE *loc)
964{
965 body = remove_begin(body);
966 reduce_nodes(p, &body);
967 n->nd_defn = NEW_SCOPE(args, body, loc);
968 n->nd_loc = *loc;
969 nd_set_line(n->nd_defn, loc->end_pos.lineno);
970 set_line_body(body, loc->beg_pos.lineno);
971 return n;
972}
973
974static NODE *
975rescued_expr(struct parser_params *p, NODE *arg, NODE *rescue,
976 const YYLTYPE *arg_loc, const YYLTYPE *mod_loc, const YYLTYPE *res_loc)
977{
978 YYLTYPE loc = code_loc_gen(mod_loc, res_loc);
979 rescue = NEW_RESBODY(0, remove_begin(rescue), 0, &loc);
980 loc.beg_pos = arg_loc->beg_pos;
981 return NEW_RESCUE(arg, rescue, 0, &loc);
982}
983
984#endif /* RIPPER */
985
986static void
987restore_defun(struct parser_params *p, NODE *name)
988{
989 YYSTYPE c = {.val = name->nd_cval};
990 p->cur_arg = name->nd_vid;
991 p->ctxt.in_def = c.ctxt.in_def;
992 p->ctxt.shareable_constant_value = c.ctxt.shareable_constant_value;
993}
994
995static void
996endless_method_name(struct parser_params *p, NODE *defn, const YYLTYPE *loc)
997{
998#ifdef RIPPER
999 defn = defn->nd_defn;
1000#endif
1001 ID mid = defn->nd_mid;
1002 if (is_attrset_id(mid)) {
1003 yyerror1(loc, "setter method cannot be defined in an endless method definition");
1004 }
1005 token_info_drop(p, "def", loc->beg_pos);
1006}
1007
1008#ifndef RIPPER
1009# define Qnone 0
1010# define Qnull 0
1011# define ifndef_ripper(x) (x)
1012#else
1013# define Qnone Qnil
1014# define Qnull Qundef
1015# define ifndef_ripper(x)
1016#endif
1017
1018# define rb_warn0(fmt) WARN_CALL(WARN_ARGS(fmt, 1))
1019# define rb_warn1(fmt,a) WARN_CALL(WARN_ARGS(fmt, 2), (a))
1020# define rb_warn2(fmt,a,b) WARN_CALL(WARN_ARGS(fmt, 3), (a), (b))
1021# define rb_warn3(fmt,a,b,c) WARN_CALL(WARN_ARGS(fmt, 4), (a), (b), (c))
1022# define rb_warn4(fmt,a,b,c,d) WARN_CALL(WARN_ARGS(fmt, 5), (a), (b), (c), (d))
1023# define rb_warning0(fmt) WARNING_CALL(WARNING_ARGS(fmt, 1))
1024# define rb_warning1(fmt,a) WARNING_CALL(WARNING_ARGS(fmt, 2), (a))
1025# define rb_warning2(fmt,a,b) WARNING_CALL(WARNING_ARGS(fmt, 3), (a), (b))
1026# define rb_warning3(fmt,a,b,c) WARNING_CALL(WARNING_ARGS(fmt, 4), (a), (b), (c))
1027# define rb_warning4(fmt,a,b,c,d) WARNING_CALL(WARNING_ARGS(fmt, 5), (a), (b), (c), (d))
1028# define rb_warn0L(l,fmt) WARN_CALL(WARN_ARGS_L(l, fmt, 1))
1029# define rb_warn1L(l,fmt,a) WARN_CALL(WARN_ARGS_L(l, fmt, 2), (a))
1030# define rb_warn2L(l,fmt,a,b) WARN_CALL(WARN_ARGS_L(l, fmt, 3), (a), (b))
1031# define rb_warn3L(l,fmt,a,b,c) WARN_CALL(WARN_ARGS_L(l, fmt, 4), (a), (b), (c))
1032# define rb_warn4L(l,fmt,a,b,c,d) WARN_CALL(WARN_ARGS_L(l, fmt, 5), (a), (b), (c), (d))
1033# define rb_warning0L(l,fmt) WARNING_CALL(WARNING_ARGS_L(l, fmt, 1))
1034# define rb_warning1L(l,fmt,a) WARNING_CALL(WARNING_ARGS_L(l, fmt, 2), (a))
1035# define rb_warning2L(l,fmt,a,b) WARNING_CALL(WARNING_ARGS_L(l, fmt, 3), (a), (b))
1036# define rb_warning3L(l,fmt,a,b,c) WARNING_CALL(WARNING_ARGS_L(l, fmt, 4), (a), (b), (c))
1037# define rb_warning4L(l,fmt,a,b,c,d) WARNING_CALL(WARNING_ARGS_L(l, fmt, 5), (a), (b), (c), (d))
1038#ifdef RIPPER
1039static ID id_warn, id_warning, id_gets, id_assoc;
1040# define ERR_MESG() STR_NEW2(mesg) /* to bypass Ripper DSL */
1041# define WARN_S_L(s,l) STR_NEW(s,l)
1042# define WARN_S(s) STR_NEW2(s)
1043# define WARN_I(i) INT2NUM(i)
1044# define WARN_ID(i) rb_id2str(i)
1045# define WARN_IVAL(i) i
1046# define PRIsWARN "s"
1047# define rb_warn0L_experimental(l,fmt) WARN_CALL(WARN_ARGS_L(l, fmt, 1))
1048# define WARN_ARGS(fmt,n) p->value, id_warn, n, rb_usascii_str_new_lit(fmt)
1049# define WARN_ARGS_L(l,fmt,n) WARN_ARGS(fmt,n)
1050# ifdef HAVE_VA_ARGS_MACRO
1051# define WARN_CALL(...) rb_funcall(__VA_ARGS__)
1052# else
1053# define WARN_CALL rb_funcall
1054# endif
1055# define WARNING_ARGS(fmt,n) p->value, id_warning, n, rb_usascii_str_new_lit(fmt)
1056# define WARNING_ARGS_L(l, fmt,n) WARNING_ARGS(fmt,n)
1057# ifdef HAVE_VA_ARGS_MACRO
1058# define WARNING_CALL(...) rb_funcall(__VA_ARGS__)
1059# else
1060# define WARNING_CALL rb_funcall
1061# endif
1062PRINTF_ARGS(static void ripper_compile_error(struct parser_params*, const char *fmt, ...), 2, 3);
1063# define compile_error ripper_compile_error
1064#else
1065# define WARN_S_L(s,l) s
1066# define WARN_S(s) s
1067# define WARN_I(i) i
1068# define WARN_ID(i) rb_id2name(i)
1069# define WARN_IVAL(i) NUM2INT(i)
1070# define PRIsWARN PRIsVALUE
1071# define WARN_ARGS(fmt,n) WARN_ARGS_L(p->ruby_sourceline,fmt,n)
1072# define WARN_ARGS_L(l,fmt,n) p->ruby_sourcefile, (l), (fmt)
1073# define WARN_CALL rb_compile_warn
1074# define rb_warn0L_experimental(l,fmt) rb_category_compile_warn(RB_WARN_CATEGORY_EXPERIMENTAL, WARN_ARGS_L(l, fmt, 1))
1075# define WARNING_ARGS(fmt,n) WARN_ARGS(fmt,n)
1076# define WARNING_ARGS_L(l,fmt,n) WARN_ARGS_L(l,fmt,n)
1077# define WARNING_CALL rb_compile_warning
1078PRINTF_ARGS(static void parser_compile_error(struct parser_params*, const char *fmt, ...), 2, 3);
1079# define compile_error parser_compile_error
1080#endif
1081
1082#define WARN_EOL(tok) \
1083 (looking_at_eol_p(p) ? \
1084 (void)rb_warning0("`" tok "' at the end of line without an expression") : \
1085 (void)0)
1086static int looking_at_eol_p(struct parser_params *p);
1087%}
1088
1089%expect 0
1090%define api.pure
1091%define parse.error verbose
1092%printer {
1093#ifndef RIPPER
1094 rb_parser_printf(p, "%"PRIsVALUE, rb_id2str($$));
1095#else
1096 rb_parser_printf(p, "%"PRIsVALUE, RNODE($$)->nd_rval);
1097#endif
1098} tIDENTIFIER tFID tGVAR tIVAR tCONSTANT tCVAR tLABEL tOP_ASGN
1099%printer {
1100#ifndef RIPPER
1101 rb_parser_printf(p, "%+"PRIsVALUE, $$->nd_lit);
1102#else
1103 rb_parser_printf(p, "%+"PRIsVALUE, get_value($$));
1104#endif
1105} tINTEGER tFLOAT tRATIONAL tIMAGINARY tSTRING_CONTENT tCHAR
1106%printer {
1107#ifndef RIPPER
1108 rb_parser_printf(p, "$%ld", $$->nd_nth);
1109#else
1110 rb_parser_printf(p, "%"PRIsVALUE, $$);
1111#endif
1112} tNTH_REF
1113%printer {
1114#ifndef RIPPER
1115 rb_parser_printf(p, "$%c", (int)$$->nd_nth);
1116#else
1117 rb_parser_printf(p, "%"PRIsVALUE, $$);
1118#endif
1119} tBACK_REF
1120
1121%lex-param {struct parser_params *p}
1122%parse-param {struct parser_params *p}
1123%initial-action
1124{
1125 RUBY_SET_YYLLOC_OF_NONE(@$);
1126};
1127
1128%union {
1129 VALUE val;
1130 NODE *node;
1131 ID id;
1132 int num;
1133 st_table *tbl;
1134 const struct vtable *vars;
1135 struct rb_strterm_struct *strterm;
1136 struct lex_context ctxt;
1137}
1138
1139%token <id>
1140 keyword_class "`class'"
1141 keyword_module "`module'"
1142 keyword_def "`def'"
1143 keyword_undef "`undef'"
1144 keyword_begin "`begin'"
1145 keyword_rescue "`rescue'"
1146 keyword_ensure "`ensure'"
1147 keyword_end "`end'"
1148 keyword_if "`if'"
1149 keyword_unless "`unless'"
1150 keyword_then "`then'"
1151 keyword_elsif "`elsif'"
1152 keyword_else "`else'"
1153 keyword_case "`case'"
1154 keyword_when "`when'"
1155 keyword_while "`while'"
1156 keyword_until "`until'"
1157 keyword_for "`for'"
1158 keyword_break "`break'"
1159 keyword_next "`next'"
1160 keyword_redo "`redo'"
1161 keyword_retry "`retry'"
1162 keyword_in "`in'"
1163 keyword_do "`do'"
1164 keyword_do_cond "`do' for condition"
1165 keyword_do_block "`do' for block"
1166 keyword_do_LAMBDA "`do' for lambda"
1167 keyword_return "`return'"
1168 keyword_yield "`yield'"
1169 keyword_super "`super'"
1170 keyword_self "`self'"
1171 keyword_nil "`nil'"
1172 keyword_true "`true'"
1173 keyword_false "`false'"
1174 keyword_and "`and'"
1175 keyword_or "`or'"
1176 keyword_not "`not'"
1177 modifier_if "`if' modifier"
1178 modifier_unless "`unless' modifier"
1179 modifier_while "`while' modifier"
1180 modifier_until "`until' modifier"
1181 modifier_rescue "`rescue' modifier"
1182 keyword_alias "`alias'"
1183 keyword_defined "`defined?'"
1184 keyword_BEGIN "`BEGIN'"
1185 keyword_END "`END'"
1186 keyword__LINE__ "`__LINE__'"
1187 keyword__FILE__ "`__FILE__'"
1188 keyword__ENCODING__ "`__ENCODING__'"
1189
1190%token <id> tIDENTIFIER "local variable or method"
1191%token <id> tFID "method"
1192%token <id> tGVAR "global variable"
1193%token <id> tIVAR "instance variable"
1194%token <id> tCONSTANT "constant"
1195%token <id> tCVAR "class variable"
1196%token <id> tLABEL "label"
1197%token <node> tINTEGER "integer literal"
1198%token <node> tFLOAT "float literal"
1199%token <node> tRATIONAL "rational literal"
1200%token <node> tIMAGINARY "imaginary literal"
1201%token <node> tCHAR "char literal"
1202%token <node> tNTH_REF "numbered reference"
1203%token <node> tBACK_REF "back reference"
1204%token <node> tSTRING_CONTENT "literal content"
1205%token <num> tREGEXP_END
1206
1207%type <node> singleton strings string string1 xstring regexp
1208%type <node> string_contents xstring_contents regexp_contents string_content
1209%type <node> words symbols symbol_list qwords qsymbols word_list qword_list qsym_list word
1210%type <node> literal numeric simple_numeric ssym dsym symbol cpath def_name defn_head defs_head
1211%type <node> top_compstmt top_stmts top_stmt begin_block
1212%type <node> bodystmt compstmt stmts stmt_or_begin stmt expr arg primary command command_call method_call
1213%type <node> expr_value expr_value_do arg_value primary_value fcall rel_expr
1214%type <node> if_tail opt_else case_body case_args cases opt_rescue exc_list exc_var opt_ensure
1215%type <node> args call_args opt_call_args
1216%type <node> paren_args opt_paren_args args_tail opt_args_tail block_args_tail opt_block_args_tail
1217%type <node> command_args aref_args opt_block_arg block_arg var_ref var_lhs
1218%type <node> command_rhs arg_rhs
1219%type <node> command_asgn mrhs mrhs_arg superclass block_call block_command
1220%type <node> f_block_optarg f_block_opt
1221%type <node> f_arglist f_opt_paren_args f_paren_args f_args f_arg f_arg_item
1222%type <node> f_optarg f_marg f_marg_list f_margs f_rest_marg
1223%type <node> assoc_list assocs assoc undef_list backref string_dvar for_var
1224%type <node> block_param opt_block_param block_param_def f_opt
1225%type <node> f_kwarg f_kw f_block_kwarg f_block_kw
1226%type <node> bv_decls opt_bv_decl bvar
1227%type <node> lambda f_larglist lambda_body brace_body do_body
1228%type <node> brace_block cmd_brace_block do_block lhs none fitem
1229%type <node> mlhs mlhs_head mlhs_basic mlhs_item mlhs_node mlhs_post mlhs_inner
1230%type <node> p_case_body p_cases p_top_expr p_top_expr_body
1231%type <node> p_expr p_as p_alt p_expr_basic p_find
1232%type <node> p_args p_args_head p_args_tail p_args_post p_arg
1233%type <node> p_value p_primitive p_variable p_var_ref p_expr_ref p_const
1234%type <node> p_kwargs p_kwarg p_kw
1235%type <id> keyword_variable user_variable sym operation operation2 operation3
1236%type <id> cname fname op f_rest_arg f_block_arg opt_f_block_arg f_norm_arg f_bad_arg
1237%type <id> f_kwrest f_label f_arg_asgn call_op call_op2 reswords relop dot_or_colon
1238%type <id> p_rest p_kwrest p_kwnorest p_any_kwrest p_kw_label
1239%type <id> f_no_kwarg f_any_kwrest args_forward excessed_comma nonlocal_var
1240 %type <ctxt> lex_ctxt /* keep <ctxt> in ripper */
1241%token END_OF_INPUT 0 "end-of-input"
1242%token <id> '.'
1243/* escaped chars, should be ignored otherwise */
1244%token <id> '\\' "backslash"
1245%token tSP "escaped space"
1246%token <id> '\t' "escaped horizontal tab"
1247%token <id> '\f' "escaped form feed"
1248%token <id> '\r' "escaped carriage return"
1249%token <id> '\13' "escaped vertical tab"
1250%token tUPLUS RUBY_TOKEN(UPLUS) "unary+"
1251%token tUMINUS RUBY_TOKEN(UMINUS) "unary-"
1252%token tPOW RUBY_TOKEN(POW) "**"
1253%token tCMP RUBY_TOKEN(CMP) "<=>"
1254%token tEQ RUBY_TOKEN(EQ) "=="
1255%token tEQQ RUBY_TOKEN(EQQ) "==="
1256%token tNEQ RUBY_TOKEN(NEQ) "!="
1257%token tGEQ RUBY_TOKEN(GEQ) ">="
1258%token tLEQ RUBY_TOKEN(LEQ) "<="
1259%token tANDOP RUBY_TOKEN(ANDOP) "&&"
1260%token tOROP RUBY_TOKEN(OROP) "||"
1261%token tMATCH RUBY_TOKEN(MATCH) "=~"
1262%token tNMATCH RUBY_TOKEN(NMATCH) "!~"
1263%token tDOT2 RUBY_TOKEN(DOT2) ".."
1264%token tDOT3 RUBY_TOKEN(DOT3) "..."
1265%token tBDOT2 RUBY_TOKEN(BDOT2) "(.."
1266%token tBDOT3 RUBY_TOKEN(BDOT3) "(..."
1267%token tAREF RUBY_TOKEN(AREF) "[]"
1268%token tASET RUBY_TOKEN(ASET) "[]="
1269%token tLSHFT RUBY_TOKEN(LSHFT) "<<"
1270%token tRSHFT RUBY_TOKEN(RSHFT) ">>"
1271%token <id> tANDDOT RUBY_TOKEN(ANDDOT) "&."
1272%token <id> tCOLON2 RUBY_TOKEN(COLON2) "::"
1273%token tCOLON3 ":: at EXPR_BEG"
1274%token <id> tOP_ASGN "operator-assignment" /* +=, -= etc. */
1275%token tASSOC "=>"
1276%token tLPAREN "("
1277%token tLPAREN_ARG "( arg"
1278%token tRPAREN ")"
1279%token tLBRACK "["
1280%token tLBRACE "{"
1281%token tLBRACE_ARG "{ arg"
1282%token tSTAR "*"
1283%token tDSTAR "**arg"
1284%token tAMPER "&"
1285%token tLAMBDA "->"
1286%token tSYMBEG "symbol literal"
1287%token tSTRING_BEG "string literal"
1288%token tXSTRING_BEG "backtick literal"
1289%token tREGEXP_BEG "regexp literal"
1290%token tWORDS_BEG "word list"
1291%token tQWORDS_BEG "verbatim word list"
1292%token tSYMBOLS_BEG "symbol list"
1293%token tQSYMBOLS_BEG "verbatim symbol list"
1294%token tSTRING_END "terminator"
1295%token tSTRING_DEND "'}'"
1296%token tSTRING_DBEG tSTRING_DVAR tLAMBEG tLABEL_END
1297
1298/*
1299 * precedence table
1300 */
1301
1302%nonassoc tLOWEST
1303%nonassoc tLBRACE_ARG
1304
1305%nonassoc modifier_if modifier_unless modifier_while modifier_until keyword_in
1306%left keyword_or keyword_and
1307%right keyword_not
1308%nonassoc keyword_defined
1309%right '=' tOP_ASGN
1310%left modifier_rescue
1311%right '?' ':'
1312%nonassoc tDOT2 tDOT3 tBDOT2 tBDOT3
1313%left tOROP
1314%left tANDOP
1315%nonassoc tCMP tEQ tEQQ tNEQ tMATCH tNMATCH
1316%left '>' tGEQ '<' tLEQ
1317%left '|' '^'
1318%left '&'
1319%left tLSHFT tRSHFT
1320%left '+' '-'
1321%left '*' '/' '%'
1322%right tUMINUS_NUM tUMINUS
1323%right tPOW
1324%right '!' '~' tUPLUS
1325
1326%token tLAST_TOKEN
1327
1328%%
1329program : {
1330 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
1331 local_push(p, ifndef_ripper(1)+0);
1332 }
1333 top_compstmt
1334 {
1335 /*%%%*/
1336 if ($2 && !compile_for_eval) {
1337 NODE *node = $2;
1338 /* last expression should not be void */
1339 if (nd_type_p(node, NODE_BLOCK)) {
1340 while (node->nd_next) {
1341 node = node->nd_next;
1342 }
1343 node = node->nd_head;
1344 }
1345 node = remove_begin(node);
1346 void_expr(p, node);
1347 }
1348 p->eval_tree = NEW_SCOPE(0, block_append(p, p->eval_tree, $2), &@$);
1349 /*% %*/
1350 /*% ripper[final]: program!($2) %*/
1351 local_pop(p);
1352 }
1353 ;
1354
1355top_compstmt : top_stmts opt_terms
1356 {
1357 $$ = void_stmts(p, $1);
1358 }
1359 ;
1360
1361top_stmts : none
1362 {
1363 /*%%%*/
1364 $$ = NEW_BEGIN(0, &@$);
1365 /*% %*/
1366 /*% ripper: stmts_add!(stmts_new!, void_stmt!) %*/
1367 }
1368 | top_stmt
1369 {
1370 /*%%%*/
1371 $$ = newline_node($1);
1372 /*% %*/
1373 /*% ripper: stmts_add!(stmts_new!, $1) %*/
1374 }
1375 | top_stmts terms top_stmt
1376 {
1377 /*%%%*/
1378 $$ = block_append(p, $1, newline_node($3));
1379 /*% %*/
1380 /*% ripper: stmts_add!($1, $3) %*/
1381 }
1382 | error top_stmt
1383 {
1384 $$ = remove_begin($2);
1385 }
1386 ;
1387
1388top_stmt : stmt
1389 | keyword_BEGIN begin_block
1390 {
1391 $$ = $2;
1392 }
1393 ;
1394
1395begin_block : '{' top_compstmt '}'
1396 {
1397 /*%%%*/
1398 p->eval_tree_begin = block_append(p, p->eval_tree_begin,
1399 NEW_BEGIN($2, &@$));
1400 $$ = NEW_BEGIN(0, &@$);
1401 /*% %*/
1402 /*% ripper: BEGIN!($2) %*/
1403 }
1404 ;
1405
1406bodystmt : compstmt
1407 opt_rescue
1408 k_else {if (!$2) {yyerror1(&@3, "else without rescue is useless");}}
1409 compstmt
1410 opt_ensure
1411 {
1412 /*%%%*/
1413 $$ = new_bodystmt(p, $1, $2, $5, $6, &@$);
1414 /*% %*/
1415 /*% ripper: bodystmt!(escape_Qundef($1), escape_Qundef($2), escape_Qundef($5), escape_Qundef($6)) %*/
1416 }
1417 | compstmt
1418 opt_rescue
1419 opt_ensure
1420 {
1421 /*%%%*/
1422 $$ = new_bodystmt(p, $1, $2, 0, $3, &@$);
1423 /*% %*/
1424 /*% ripper: bodystmt!(escape_Qundef($1), escape_Qundef($2), Qnil, escape_Qundef($3)) %*/
1425 }
1426 ;
1427
1428compstmt : stmts opt_terms
1429 {
1430 $$ = void_stmts(p, $1);
1431 }
1432 ;
1433
1434stmts : none
1435 {
1436 /*%%%*/
1437 $$ = NEW_BEGIN(0, &@$);
1438 /*% %*/
1439 /*% ripper: stmts_add!(stmts_new!, void_stmt!) %*/
1440 }
1441 | stmt_or_begin
1442 {
1443 /*%%%*/
1444 $$ = newline_node($1);
1445 /*% %*/
1446 /*% ripper: stmts_add!(stmts_new!, $1) %*/
1447 }
1448 | stmts terms stmt_or_begin
1449 {
1450 /*%%%*/
1451 $$ = block_append(p, $1, newline_node($3));
1452 /*% %*/
1453 /*% ripper: stmts_add!($1, $3) %*/
1454 }
1455 | error stmt
1456 {
1457 $$ = remove_begin($2);
1458 }
1459 ;
1460
1461stmt_or_begin : stmt
1462 {
1463 $$ = $1;
1464 }
1465 | keyword_BEGIN
1466 {
1467 yyerror1(&@1, "BEGIN is permitted only at toplevel");
1468 }
1469 begin_block
1470 {
1471 $$ = $3;
1472 }
1473 ;
1474
1475stmt : keyword_alias fitem {SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_FNAME|EXPR_FITEM);} fitem
1476 {
1477 /*%%%*/
1478 $$ = NEW_ALIAS($2, $4, &@$);
1479 /*% %*/
1480 /*% ripper: alias!($2, $4) %*/
1481 }
1482 | keyword_alias tGVAR tGVAR
1483 {
1484 /*%%%*/
1485 $$ = NEW_VALIAS($2, $3, &@$);
1486 /*% %*/
1487 /*% ripper: var_alias!($2, $3) %*/
1488 }
1489 | keyword_alias tGVAR tBACK_REF
1490 {
1491 /*%%%*/
1492 char buf[2];
1493 buf[0] = '$';
1494 buf[1] = (char)$3->nd_nth;
1495 $$ = NEW_VALIAS($2, rb_intern2(buf, 2), &@$);
1496 /*% %*/
1497 /*% ripper: var_alias!($2, $3) %*/
1498 }
1499 | keyword_alias tGVAR tNTH_REF
1500 {
1501 static const char mesg[] = "can't make alias for the number variables";
1502 /*%%%*/
1503 yyerror1(&@3, mesg);
1504 $$ = NEW_BEGIN(0, &@$);
1505 /*% %*/
1506 /*% ripper[error]: alias_error!(ERR_MESG(), $3) %*/
1507 }
1508 | keyword_undef undef_list
1509 {
1510 /*%%%*/
1511 $$ = $2;
1512 /*% %*/
1513 /*% ripper: undef!($2) %*/
1514 }
1515 | stmt modifier_if expr_value
1516 {
1517 /*%%%*/
1518 $$ = new_if(p, $3, remove_begin($1), 0, &@$);
1519 fixpos($$, $3);
1520 /*% %*/
1521 /*% ripper: if_mod!($3, $1) %*/
1522 }
1523 | stmt modifier_unless expr_value
1524 {
1525 /*%%%*/
1526 $$ = new_unless(p, $3, remove_begin($1), 0, &@$);
1527 fixpos($$, $3);
1528 /*% %*/
1529 /*% ripper: unless_mod!($3, $1) %*/
1530 }
1531 | stmt modifier_while expr_value
1532 {
1533 /*%%%*/
1534 if ($1 && nd_type_p($1, NODE_BEGIN)) {
1535 $$ = NEW_WHILE(cond(p, $3, &@3), $1->nd_body, 0, &@$);
1536 }
1537 else {
1538 $$ = NEW_WHILE(cond(p, $3, &@3), $1, 1, &@$);
1539 }
1540 /*% %*/
1541 /*% ripper: while_mod!($3, $1) %*/
1542 }
1543 | stmt modifier_until expr_value
1544 {
1545 /*%%%*/
1546 if ($1 && nd_type_p($1, NODE_BEGIN)) {
1547 $$ = NEW_UNTIL(cond(p, $3, &@3), $1->nd_body, 0, &@$);
1548 }
1549 else {
1550 $$ = NEW_UNTIL(cond(p, $3, &@3), $1, 1, &@$);
1551 }
1552 /*% %*/
1553 /*% ripper: until_mod!($3, $1) %*/
1554 }
1555 | stmt modifier_rescue stmt
1556 {
1557 /*%%%*/
1558 NODE *resq;
1559 YYLTYPE loc = code_loc_gen(&@2, &@3);
1560 resq = NEW_RESBODY(0, remove_begin($3), 0, &loc);
1561 $$ = NEW_RESCUE(remove_begin($1), resq, 0, &@$);
1562 /*% %*/
1563 /*% ripper: rescue_mod!($1, $3) %*/
1564 }
1565 | keyword_END '{' compstmt '}'
1566 {
1567 if (p->ctxt.in_def) {
1568 rb_warn0("END in method; use at_exit");
1569 }
1570 /*%%%*/
1571 {
1572 NODE *scope = NEW_NODE(
1573 NODE_SCOPE, 0 /* tbl */, $3 /* body */, 0 /* args */, &@$);
1574 $$ = NEW_POSTEXE(scope, &@$);
1575 }
1576 /*% %*/
1577 /*% ripper: END!($3) %*/
1578 }
1579 | command_asgn
1580 | mlhs '=' lex_ctxt command_call
1581 {
1582 /*%%%*/
1583 value_expr($4);
1584 $$ = node_assign(p, $1, $4, $3, &@$);
1585 /*% %*/
1586 /*% ripper: massign!($1, $4) %*/
1587 }
1588 | lhs '=' lex_ctxt mrhs
1589 {
1590 /*%%%*/
1591 $$ = node_assign(p, $1, $4, $3, &@$);
1592 /*% %*/
1593 /*% ripper: assign!($1, $4) %*/
1594 }
1595 | mlhs '=' lex_ctxt mrhs_arg modifier_rescue stmt
1596 {
1597 /*%%%*/
1598 YYLTYPE loc = code_loc_gen(&@5, &@6);
1599 $$ = node_assign(p, $1, NEW_RESCUE($4, NEW_RESBODY(0, remove_begin($6), 0, &loc), 0, &@$), $3, &@$);
1600 /*% %*/
1601 /*% ripper: massign!($1, rescue_mod!($4, $6)) %*/
1602 }
1603 | mlhs '=' lex_ctxt mrhs_arg
1604 {
1605 /*%%%*/
1606 $$ = node_assign(p, $1, $4, $3, &@$);
1607 /*% %*/
1608 /*% ripper: massign!($1, $4) %*/
1609 }
1610 | expr
1611 ;
1612
1613command_asgn : lhs '=' lex_ctxt command_rhs
1614 {
1615 /*%%%*/
1616 $$ = node_assign(p, $1, $4, $3, &@$);
1617 /*% %*/
1618 /*% ripper: assign!($1, $4) %*/
1619 }
1620 | var_lhs tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt command_rhs
1621 {
1622 /*%%%*/
1623 $$ = new_op_assign(p, $1, $2, $4, $3, &@$);
1624 /*% %*/
1625 /*% ripper: opassign!($1, $2, $4) %*/
1626 }
1627 | primary_value '[' opt_call_args rbracket tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt command_rhs
1628 {
1629 /*%%%*/
1630 $$ = new_ary_op_assign(p, $1, $3, $5, $7, &@3, &@$);
1631 /*% %*/
1632 /*% ripper: opassign!(aref_field!($1, escape_Qundef($3)), $5, $7) %*/
1633
1634 }
1635 | primary_value call_op tIDENTIFIER tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt command_rhs
1636 {
1637 /*%%%*/
1638 $$ = new_attr_op_assign(p, $1, $2, $3, $4, $6, &@$);
1639 /*% %*/
1640 /*% ripper: opassign!(field!($1, $2, $3), $4, $6) %*/
1641 }
1642 | primary_value call_op tCONSTANT tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt command_rhs
1643 {
1644 /*%%%*/
1645 $$ = new_attr_op_assign(p, $1, $2, $3, $4, $6, &@$);
1646 /*% %*/
1647 /*% ripper: opassign!(field!($1, $2, $3), $4, $6) %*/
1648 }
1649 | primary_value tCOLON2 tCONSTANT tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt command_rhs
1650 {
1651 /*%%%*/
1652 YYLTYPE loc = code_loc_gen(&@1, &@3);
1653 $$ = new_const_op_assign(p, NEW_COLON2($1, $3, &loc), $4, $6, $5, &@$);
1654 /*% %*/
1655 /*% ripper: opassign!(const_path_field!($1, $3), $4, $6) %*/
1656 }
1657 | primary_value tCOLON2 tIDENTIFIER tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt command_rhs
1658 {
1659 /*%%%*/
1660 $$ = new_attr_op_assign(p, $1, ID2VAL(idCOLON2), $3, $4, $6, &@$);
1661 /*% %*/
1662 /*% ripper: opassign!(field!($1, ID2VAL(idCOLON2), $3), $4, $6) %*/
1663 }
1664 | defn_head f_opt_paren_args '=' command
1665 {
1666 endless_method_name(p, $<node>1, &@1);
1667 restore_defun(p, $<node>1->nd_defn);
1668 /*%%%*/
1669 $$ = set_defun_body(p, $1, $2, $4, &@$);
1670 /*% %*/
1671 /*% ripper[$4]: bodystmt!($4, Qnil, Qnil, Qnil) %*/
1672 /*% ripper: def!(get_value($1), $2, $4) %*/
1673 local_pop(p);
1674 }
1675 | defn_head f_opt_paren_args '=' command modifier_rescue arg
1676 {
1677 endless_method_name(p, $<node>1, &@1);
1678 restore_defun(p, $<node>1->nd_defn);
1679 /*%%%*/
1680 $4 = rescued_expr(p, $4, $6, &@4, &@5, &@6);
1681 $$ = set_defun_body(p, $1, $2, $4, &@$);
1682 /*% %*/
1683 /*% ripper[$4]: bodystmt!(rescue_mod!($4, $6), Qnil, Qnil, Qnil) %*/
1684 /*% ripper: def!(get_value($1), $2, $4) %*/
1685 local_pop(p);
1686 }
1687 | defs_head f_opt_paren_args '=' command
1688 {
1689 endless_method_name(p, $<node>1, &@1);
1690 restore_defun(p, $<node>1->nd_defn);
1691 /*%%%*/
1692 $$ = set_defun_body(p, $1, $2, $4, &@$);
1693 /*%
1694 $1 = get_value($1);
1695 %*/
1696 /*% ripper[$4]: bodystmt!($4, Qnil, Qnil, Qnil) %*/
1697 /*% ripper: defs!(AREF($1, 0), AREF($1, 1), AREF($1, 2), $2, $4) %*/
1698 local_pop(p);
1699 }
1700 | defs_head f_opt_paren_args '=' command modifier_rescue arg
1701 {
1702 endless_method_name(p, $<node>1, &@1);
1703 restore_defun(p, $<node>1->nd_defn);
1704 /*%%%*/
1705 $4 = rescued_expr(p, $4, $6, &@4, &@5, &@6);
1706 $$ = set_defun_body(p, $1, $2, $4, &@$);
1707 /*%
1708 $1 = get_value($1);
1709 %*/
1710 /*% ripper[$4]: bodystmt!(rescue_mod!($4, $6), Qnil, Qnil, Qnil) %*/
1711 /*% ripper: defs!(AREF($1, 0), AREF($1, 1), AREF($1, 2), $2, $4) %*/
1712 local_pop(p);
1713 }
1714 | backref tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt command_rhs
1715 {
1716 /*%%%*/
1717 rb_backref_error(p, $1);
1718 $$ = NEW_BEGIN(0, &@$);
1719 /*% %*/
1720 /*% ripper[error]: backref_error(p, RNODE($1), assign!(var_field(p, $1), $4)) %*/
1721 }
1722 ;
1723
1724command_rhs : command_call %prec tOP_ASGN
1725 {
1726 value_expr($1);
1727 $$ = $1;
1728 }
1729 | command_call modifier_rescue stmt
1730 {
1731 /*%%%*/
1732 YYLTYPE loc = code_loc_gen(&@2, &@3);
1733 value_expr($1);
1734 $$ = NEW_RESCUE($1, NEW_RESBODY(0, remove_begin($3), 0, &loc), 0, &@$);
1735 /*% %*/
1736 /*% ripper: rescue_mod!($1, $3) %*/
1737 }
1738 | command_asgn
1739 ;
1740
1741expr : command_call
1742 | expr keyword_and expr
1743 {
1744 $$ = logop(p, idAND, $1, $3, &@2, &@$);
1745 }
1746 | expr keyword_or expr
1747 {
1748 $$ = logop(p, idOR, $1, $3, &@2, &@$);
1749 }
1750 | keyword_not opt_nl expr
1751 {
1752 $$ = call_uni_op(p, method_cond(p, $3, &@3), METHOD_NOT, &@1, &@$);
1753 }
1754 | '!' command_call
1755 {
1756 $$ = call_uni_op(p, method_cond(p, $2, &@2), '!', &@1, &@$);
1757 }
1758 | arg tASSOC
1759 {
1760 value_expr($1);
1761 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG|EXPR_LABEL);
1762 p->command_start = FALSE;
1763 $<ctxt>2 = p->ctxt;
1764 p->ctxt.in_kwarg = 1;
1765 $<tbl>$ = push_pvtbl(p);
1766 }
1767 p_top_expr_body
1768 {
1769 pop_pvtbl(p, $<tbl>3);
1770 p->ctxt.in_kwarg = $<ctxt>2.in_kwarg;
1771 /*%%%*/
1772 $$ = NEW_CASE3($1, NEW_IN($4, 0, 0, &@4), &@$);
1773 /*% %*/
1774 /*% ripper: case!($1, in!($4, Qnil, Qnil)) %*/
1775 }
1776 | arg keyword_in
1777 {
1778 value_expr($1);
1779 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG|EXPR_LABEL);
1780 p->command_start = FALSE;
1781 $<ctxt>2 = p->ctxt;
1782 p->ctxt.in_kwarg = 1;
1783 $<tbl>$ = push_pvtbl(p);
1784 }
1785 p_top_expr_body
1786 {
1787 pop_pvtbl(p, $<tbl>3);
1788 p->ctxt.in_kwarg = $<ctxt>2.in_kwarg;
1789 /*%%%*/
1790 $$ = NEW_CASE3($1, NEW_IN($4, NEW_TRUE(&@4), NEW_FALSE(&@4), &@4), &@$);
1791 /*% %*/
1792 /*% ripper: case!($1, in!($4, Qnil, Qnil)) %*/
1793 }
1794 | arg %prec tLBRACE_ARG
1795 ;
1796
1797def_name : fname
1798 {
1799 ID fname = get_id($1);
1800 ID cur_arg = p->cur_arg;
1801 YYSTYPE c = {.ctxt = p->ctxt};
1802 numparam_name(p, fname);
1803 local_push(p, 0);
1804 p->cur_arg = 0;
1805 p->ctxt.in_def = 1;
1806 $<node>$ = NEW_NODE(NODE_SELF, /*vid*/cur_arg, /*mid*/fname, /*cval*/c.val, &@$);
1807 /*%%%*/
1808 /*%
1809 $$ = NEW_RIPPER(fname, get_value($1), $$, &NULL_LOC);
1810 %*/
1811 }
1812 ;
1813
1814defn_head : k_def def_name
1815 {
1816 $$ = $2;
1817 /*%%%*/
1818 $$ = NEW_NODE(NODE_DEFN, 0, $$->nd_mid, $$, &@$);
1819 /*% %*/
1820 }
1821 ;
1822
1823defs_head : k_def singleton dot_or_colon
1824 {
1825 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_FNAME);
1826 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 1;
1827 }
1828 def_name
1829 {
1830 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ENDFN|EXPR_LABEL); /* force for args */
1831 $$ = $5;
1832 /*%%%*/
1833 $$ = NEW_NODE(NODE_DEFS, $2, $$->nd_mid, $$, &@$);
1834 /*%
1835 VALUE ary = rb_ary_new_from_args(3, $2, $3, get_value($$));
1836 add_mark_object(p, ary);
1837 $<node>$->nd_rval = ary;
1838 %*/
1839 }
1840 ;
1841
1842expr_value : expr
1843 {
1844 value_expr($1);
1845 $$ = $1;
1846 }
1847 ;
1848
1849expr_value_do : {COND_PUSH(1);} expr_value do {COND_POP();}
1850 {
1851 $$ = $2;
1852 }
1853 ;
1854
1855command_call : command
1856 | block_command
1857 ;
1858
1859block_command : block_call
1860 | block_call call_op2 operation2 command_args
1861 {
1862 /*%%%*/
1863 $$ = new_qcall(p, $2, $1, $3, $4, &@3, &@$);
1864 /*% %*/
1865 /*% ripper: method_add_arg!(call!($1, $2, $3), $4) %*/
1866 }
1867 ;
1868
1869cmd_brace_block : tLBRACE_ARG brace_body '}'
1870 {
1871 $$ = $2;
1872 /*%%%*/
1873 $$->nd_body->nd_loc = code_loc_gen(&@1, &@3);
1874 nd_set_line($$, @1.end_pos.lineno);
1875 /*% %*/
1876 }
1877 ;
1878
1879fcall : operation
1880 {
1881 /*%%%*/
1882 $$ = NEW_FCALL($1, 0, &@$);
1883 nd_set_line($$, p->tokline);
1884 /*% %*/
1885 /*% ripper: $1 %*/
1886 }
1887 ;
1888
1889command : fcall command_args %prec tLOWEST
1890 {
1891 /*%%%*/
1892 $1->nd_args = $2;
1893 nd_set_last_loc($1, @2.end_pos);
1894 $$ = $1;
1895 /*% %*/
1896 /*% ripper: command!($1, $2) %*/
1897 }
1898 | fcall command_args cmd_brace_block
1899 {
1900 /*%%%*/
1901 block_dup_check(p, $2, $3);
1902 $1->nd_args = $2;
1903 $$ = method_add_block(p, $1, $3, &@$);
1904 fixpos($$, $1);
1905 nd_set_last_loc($1, @2.end_pos);
1906 /*% %*/
1907 /*% ripper: method_add_block!(command!($1, $2), $3) %*/
1908 }
1909 | primary_value call_op operation2 command_args %prec tLOWEST
1910 {
1911 /*%%%*/
1912 $$ = new_command_qcall(p, $2, $1, $3, $4, Qnull, &@3, &@$);
1913 /*% %*/
1914 /*% ripper: command_call!($1, $2, $3, $4) %*/
1915 }
1916 | primary_value call_op operation2 command_args cmd_brace_block
1917 {
1918 /*%%%*/
1919 $$ = new_command_qcall(p, $2, $1, $3, $4, $5, &@3, &@$);
1920 /*% %*/
1921 /*% ripper: method_add_block!(command_call!($1, $2, $3, $4), $5) %*/
1922 }
1923 | primary_value tCOLON2 operation2 command_args %prec tLOWEST
1924 {
1925 /*%%%*/
1926 $$ = new_command_qcall(p, ID2VAL(idCOLON2), $1, $3, $4, Qnull, &@3, &@$);
1927 /*% %*/
1928 /*% ripper: command_call!($1, ID2VAL(idCOLON2), $3, $4) %*/
1929 }
1930 | primary_value tCOLON2 operation2 command_args cmd_brace_block

1933 $$ = new_command_qcall(p, ID2VAL(idCOLON2), $1, $3, $4, $5, &@3, &@$);
1934 /*% %*/

1936 }
1937 | keyword_super command_args
1938 {
1939 /*%%%*/
1940 $$ = NEW_SUPER($2, &@$);
1941 fixpos($$, $2);
1942 /*% %*/
1943 /*% ripper: super!($2) %*/
1944 }
1945 | keyword_yield command_args

1947 /*%%%*/
1948 $$ = new_yield(p, $2, &@$);
1949 fixpos($$, $2);
1950 /*% %*/
1951 /*% ripper: yield!($2) %*/
1952 }
1953 | k_return call_args
1954 {
1955 /*%%%*/
1956 $$ = NEW_RETURN(ret_args(p, $2), &@$);
1957 /*% %*/
1958 /*% ripper: return!($2) %*/
1959 }
1960 | keyword_break call_args
1961 {
1962 /*%%%*/
1963 $$ = NEW_BREAK(ret_args(p, $2), &@$);
1964 /*% %*/
1965 /*% ripper: break!($2) %*/
1966 }
1967 | keyword_next call_args
1968 {
1969 /*%%%*/
1970 $$ = NEW_NEXT(ret_args(p, $2), &@$);
1971 /*% %*/

1973 }

2303undef_list : fitem
2304 {

2307 /*% %*/
2308 /*% ripper: rb_ary_new3(1, get_value($1)) %*/
2309 }
2310 | undef_list ',' {SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_FNAME|EXPR_FITEM);} fitem
2311 {
2312 /*%%%*/
2313 NODE *undef = NEW_UNDEF($4, &@4);
2314 $$ = block_append(p, $1, undef);
2315 /*% %*/
2316 /*% ripper: rb_ary_push($1, get_value($4)) %*/
2317 }
2318 ;
2319
2320op : '|' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '|'); }
2321 | '^' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '^'); }
2322 | '&' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '&'); }
2323 | tCMP { ifndef_ripper($$ = tCMP); }
2324 | tEQ { ifndef_ripper($$ = tEQ); }
2325 | tEQQ { ifndef_ripper($$ = tEQQ); }
2326 | tMATCH { ifndef_ripper($$ = tMATCH); }
2327 | tNMATCH { ifndef_ripper($$ = tNMATCH); }
2328 | '>' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '>'); }
2329 | tGEQ { ifndef_ripper($$ = tGEQ); }
2330 | '<' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '<'); }
2331 | tLEQ { ifndef_ripper($$ = tLEQ); }
2332 | tNEQ { ifndef_ripper($$ = tNEQ); }
2333 | tLSHFT { ifndef_ripper($$ = tLSHFT); }
2334 | tRSHFT { ifndef_ripper($$ = tRSHFT); }
2335 | '+' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '+'); }
2336 | '-' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '-'); }
2337 | '*' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '*'); }
2338 | tSTAR { ifndef_ripper($$ = '*'); }
2339 | '/' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '/'); }
2340 | '%' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '%'); }
2341 | tPOW { ifndef_ripper($$ = tPOW); }
2342 | tDSTAR { ifndef_ripper($$ = tDSTAR); }
2343 | '!' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '!'); }
2344 | '~' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '~'); }
2345 | tUPLUS { ifndef_ripper($$ = tUPLUS); }
2346 | tUMINUS { ifndef_ripper($$ = tUMINUS); }
2347 | tAREF { ifndef_ripper($$ = tAREF); }
2348 | tASET { ifndef_ripper($$ = tASET); }
2349 | '`' { ifndef_ripper($$ = '`'); }
2350 ;
2351
2352reswords : keyword__LINE__ | keyword__FILE__ | keyword__ENCODING__
2353 | keyword_BEGIN | keyword_END
2354 | keyword_alias | keyword_and | keyword_begin
2355 | keyword_break | keyword_case | keyword_class | keyword_def
2356 | keyword_defined | keyword_do | keyword_else | keyword_elsif
2357 | keyword_end | keyword_ensure | keyword_false
2358 | keyword_for | keyword_in | keyword_module | keyword_next
2359 | keyword_nil | keyword_not | keyword_or | keyword_redo
2360 | keyword_rescue | keyword_retry | keyword_return | keyword_self
2361 | keyword_super | keyword_then | keyword_true | keyword_undef
2362 | keyword_when | keyword_yield | keyword_if | keyword_unless
2363 | keyword_while | keyword_until
2364 ;
2365
2366arg : lhs '=' lex_ctxt arg_rhs
2367 {
2368 /*%%%*/
2369 $$ = node_assign(p, $1, $4, $3, &@$);
2370 /*% %*/
2371 /*% ripper: assign!($1, $4) %*/
2372 }
2373 | var_lhs tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt arg_rhs
2374 {
2375 /*%%%*/
2376 $$ = new_op_assign(p, $1, $2, $4, $3, &@$);
2377 /*% %*/
2378 /*% ripper: opassign!($1, $2, $4) %*/
2379 }
2380 | primary_value '[' opt_call_args rbracket tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt arg_rhs
2381 {
2382 /*%%%*/
2383 $$ = new_ary_op_assign(p, $1, $3, $5, $7, &@3, &@$);
2384 /*% %*/
2385 /*% ripper: opassign!(aref_field!($1, escape_Qundef($3)), $5, $7) %*/
2386 }
2387 | primary_value call_op tIDENTIFIER tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt arg_rhs
2388 {
2389 /*%%%*/
2390 $$ = new_attr_op_assign(p, $1, $2, $3, $4, $6, &@$);
2391 /*% %*/
2392 /*% ripper: opassign!(field!($1, $2, $3), $4, $6) %*/
2393 }
2394 | primary_value call_op tCONSTANT tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt arg_rhs
2395 {
2396 /*%%%*/
2397 $$ = new_attr_op_assign(p, $1, $2, $3, $4, $6, &@$);
2398 /*% %*/
2399 /*% ripper: opassign!(field!($1, $2, $3), $4, $6) %*/
2400 }
2401 | primary_value tCOLON2 tIDENTIFIER tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt arg_rhs
2402 {
2403 /*%%%*/
2404 $$ = new_attr_op_assign(p, $1, ID2VAL(idCOLON2), $3, $4, $6, &@$);
2405 /*% %*/
2406 /*% ripper: opassign!(field!($1, ID2VAL(idCOLON2), $3), $4, $6) %*/
2407 }
2408 | primary_value tCOLON2 tCONSTANT tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt arg_rhs
2409 {
2410 /*%%%*/
2411 YYLTYPE loc = code_loc_gen(&@1, &@3);
2412 $$ = new_const_op_assign(p, NEW_COLON2($1, $3, &loc), $4, $6, $5, &@$);
2413 /*% %*/
2414 /*% ripper: opassign!(const_path_field!($1, $3), $4, $6) %*/
2415 }
2416 | tCOLON3 tCONSTANT tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt arg_rhs
2417 {
2418 /*%%%*/
2419 YYLTYPE loc = code_loc_gen(&@1, &@2);
2420 $$ = new_const_op_assign(p, NEW_COLON3($2, &loc), $3, $5, $4, &@$);
2421 /*% %*/
2422 /*% ripper: opassign!(top_const_field!($2), $3, $5) %*/
2423 }
2424 | backref tOP_ASGN lex_ctxt arg_rhs
2425 {
2426 /*%%%*/
2427 rb_backref_error(p, $1);
2428 $$ = NEW_BEGIN(0, &@$);
2429 /*% %*/
2430 /*% ripper[error]: backref_error(p, RNODE($1), opassign!(var_field(p, $1), $2, $4)) %*/
2431 }
2432 | arg tDOT2 arg
2433 {
2434 /*%%%*/
2435 value_expr($1);
2436 value_expr($3);
2437 $$ = NEW_DOT2($1, $3, &@$);
2438 /*% %*/
2439 /*% ripper: dot2!($1, $3) %*/
2440 }
2441 | arg tDOT3 arg
2442 {
2443 /*%%%*/
2444 value_expr($1);
2445 value_expr($3);
2446 $$ = NEW_DOT3($1, $3, &@$);
2447 /*% %*/
2448 /*% ripper: dot3!($1, $3) %*/
2449 }
2450 | arg tDOT2
2451 {
2452 /*%%%*/
2453 value_expr($1);
2454 $$ = NEW_DOT2($1, new_nil_at(p, &@2.end_pos), &@$);
2455 /*% %*/
2456 /*% ripper: dot2!($1, Qnil) %*/
2457 }
2458 | arg tDOT3
2459 {
2460 /*%%%*/
2461 value_expr($1);
2462 $$ = NEW_DOT3($1, new_nil_at(p, &@2.end_pos), &@$);
2463 /*% %*/
2464 /*% ripper: dot3!($1, Qnil) %*/
2465 }
2466 | tBDOT2 arg
2467 {
2468 /*%%%*/
2469 value_expr($2);
2470 $$ = NEW_DOT2(new_nil_at(p, &@1.beg_pos), $2, &@$);
2471 /*% %*/
2472 /*% ripper: dot2!(Qnil, $2) %*/
2473 }
2474 | tBDOT3 arg
2475 {
2476 /*%%%*/
2477 value_expr($2);
2478 $$ = NEW_DOT3(new_nil_at(p, &@1.beg_pos), $2, &@$);
2479 /*% %*/
2480 /*% ripper: dot3!(Qnil, $2) %*/
2481 }
2482 | arg '+' arg
2483 {
2484 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, '+', $3, &@2, &@$);
2485 }
2486 | arg '-' arg
2487 {
2488 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, '-', $3, &@2, &@$);
2489 }
2490 | arg '*' arg
2491 {
2492 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, '*', $3, &@2, &@$);
2493 }
2494 | arg '/' arg
2495 {
2496 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, '/', $3, &@2, &@$);
2497 }
2498 | arg '%' arg
2499 {
2500 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, '%', $3, &@2, &@$);
2501 }
2502 | arg tPOW arg
2503 {
2504 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, idPow, $3, &@2, &@$);
2505 }
2506 | tUMINUS_NUM simple_numeric tPOW arg
2507 {
2508 $$ = call_uni_op(p, call_bin_op(p, $2, idPow, $4, &@2, &@$), idUMinus, &@1, &@$);
2509 }
2510 | tUPLUS arg
2511 {
2512 $$ = call_uni_op(p, $2, idUPlus, &@1, &@$);
2513 }
2514 | tUMINUS arg
2515 {
2516 $$ = call_uni_op(p, $2, idUMinus, &@1, &@$);
2517 }
2518 | arg '|' arg
2519 {
2520 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, '|', $3, &@2, &@$);
2521 }
2522 | arg '^' arg
2523 {
2524 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, '^', $3, &@2, &@$);
2525 }
2526 | arg '&' arg
2527 {
2528 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, '&', $3, &@2, &@$);
2529 }
2530 | arg tCMP arg
2531 {
2532 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, idCmp, $3, &@2, &@$);
2533 }
2534 | rel_expr %prec tCMP
2535 | arg tEQ arg
2536 {
2537 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, idEq, $3, &@2, &@$);
2538 }
2539 | arg tEQQ arg
2540 {
2541 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, idEqq, $3, &@2, &@$);
2542 }
2543 | arg tNEQ arg
2544 {
2545 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, idNeq, $3, &@2, &@$);
2546 }
2547 | arg tMATCH arg
2548 {
2549 $$ = match_op(p, $1, $3, &@2, &@$);
2550 }
2551 | arg tNMATCH arg
2552 {
2553 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, idNeqTilde, $3, &@2, &@$);
2554 }
2555 | '!' arg
2556 {
2557 $$ = call_uni_op(p, method_cond(p, $2, &@2), '!', &@1, &@$);
2558 }
2559 | '~' arg
2560 {
2561 $$ = call_uni_op(p, $2, '~', &@1, &@$);
2562 }
2563 | arg tLSHFT arg
2564 {
2565 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, idLTLT, $3, &@2, &@$);
2566 }
2567 | arg tRSHFT arg
2568 {
2569 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, idGTGT, $3, &@2, &@$);
2570 }
2571 | arg tANDOP arg
2572 {
2573 $$ = logop(p, idANDOP, $1, $3, &@2, &@$);
2574 }
2575 | arg tOROP arg
2576 {
2577 $$ = logop(p, idOROP, $1, $3, &@2, &@$);
2578 }
2579 | keyword_defined opt_nl {p->ctxt.in_defined = 1;} arg
2580 {
2581 p->ctxt.in_defined = 0;
2582 $$ = new_defined(p, $4, &@$);
2583 }
2584 | arg '?' arg opt_nl ':' arg
2585 {
2586 /*%%%*/
2587 value_expr($1);
2588 $$ = new_if(p, $1, $3, $6, &@$);
2589 fixpos($$, $1);
2590 /*% %*/
2591 /*% ripper: ifop!($1, $3, $6) %*/
2592 }
2593 | defn_head f_opt_paren_args '=' arg
2594 {
2595 endless_method_name(p, $<node>1, &@1);
2596 restore_defun(p, $<node>1->nd_defn);
2597 /*%%%*/
2598 $$ = set_defun_body(p, $1, $2, $4, &@$);
2599 /*% %*/
2600 /*% ripper[$4]: bodystmt!($4, Qnil, Qnil, Qnil) %*/
2601 /*% ripper: def!(get_value($1), $2, $4) %*/
2602 local_pop(p);
2603 }
2604 | defn_head f_opt_paren_args '=' arg modifier_rescue arg
2605 {
2606 endless_method_name(p, $<node>1, &@1);
2607 restore_defun(p, $<node>1->nd_defn);
2608 /*%%%*/
2609 $4 = rescued_expr(p, $4, $6, &@4, &@5, &@6);
2610 $$ = set_defun_body(p, $1, $2, $4, &@$);
2611 /*% %*/
2612 /*% ripper[$4]: bodystmt!(rescue_mod!($4, $6), Qnil, Qnil, Qnil) %*/
2613 /*% ripper: def!(get_value($1), $2, $4) %*/
2614 local_pop(p);
2615 }
2616 | defs_head f_opt_paren_args '=' arg
2617 {
2618 endless_method_name(p, $<node>1, &@1);
2619 restore_defun(p, $<node>1->nd_defn);
2620 /*%%%*/
2621 $$ = set_defun_body(p, $1, $2, $4, &@$);
2622 /*%
2623 $1 = get_value($1);
2624 %*/
2625 /*% ripper[$4]: bodystmt!($4, Qnil, Qnil, Qnil) %*/
2626 /*% ripper: defs!(AREF($1, 0), AREF($1, 1), AREF($1, 2), $2, $4) %*/
2627 local_pop(p);
2628 }
2629 | defs_head f_opt_paren_args '=' arg modifier_rescue arg
2630 {
2631 endless_method_name(p, $<node>1, &@1);
2632 restore_defun(p, $<node>1->nd_defn);
2633 /*%%%*/
2634 $4 = rescued_expr(p, $4, $6, &@4, &@5, &@6);
2635 $$ = set_defun_body(p, $1, $2, $4, &@$);
2636 /*%
2637 $1 = get_value($1);
2638 %*/
2639 /*% ripper[$4]: bodystmt!(rescue_mod!($4, $6), Qnil, Qnil, Qnil) %*/
2640 /*% ripper: defs!(AREF($1, 0), AREF($1, 1), AREF($1, 2), $2, $4) %*/
2641 local_pop(p);
2642 }
2643 | primary
2644 {
2645 $$ = $1;
2646 }
2647 ;
2648
2649relop : '>' {$$ = '>';}
2650 | '<' {$$ = '<';}
2651 | tGEQ {$$ = idGE;}
2652 | tLEQ {$$ = idLE;}
2653 ;
2654
2655rel_expr : arg relop arg %prec '>'
2656 {
2657 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, $2, $3, &@2, &@$);
2658 }
2659 | rel_expr relop arg %prec '>'
2660 {
2661 rb_warning1("comparison '%s' after comparison", WARN_ID($2));
2662 $$ = call_bin_op(p, $1, $2, $3, &@2, &@$);
2663 }
2664 ;
2665
2666lex_ctxt : tSP
2667 {
2668 $$ = p->ctxt;
2669 }
2670 | none
2671 {
2672 $$ = p->ctxt;
2673 }
2674 ;
2675
2676arg_value : arg
2677 {
2678 value_expr($1);
2679 $$ = $1;
2680 }
2681 ;
2682
2683aref_args : none
2684 | args trailer
2685 {
2686 $$ = $1;
2687 }
2688 | args ',' assocs trailer
2689 {
2690 /*%%%*/
2691 $$ = $3 ? arg_append(p, $1, new_hash(p, $3, &@3), &@$) : $1;
2692 /*% %*/
2693 /*% ripper: args_add!($1, bare_assoc_hash!($3)) %*/
2694 }
2695 | assocs trailer
2696 {
2697 /*%%%*/
2698 $$ = $1 ? NEW_LIST(new_hash(p, $1, &@1), &@$) : 0;
2699 /*% %*/
2700 /*% ripper: args_add!(args_new!, bare_assoc_hash!($1)) %*/
2701 }
2702 ;
2703
2704arg_rhs : arg %prec tOP_ASGN
2705 {
2706 value_expr($1);
2707 $$ = $1;
2708 }
2709 | arg modifier_rescue arg
2710 {
2711 /*%%%*/
2712 value_expr($1);
2713 $$ = rescued_expr(p, $1, $3, &@1, &@2, &@3);
2714 /*% %*/
2715 /*% ripper: rescue_mod!($1, $3) %*/
2716 }
2717 ;
2718
2719paren_args : '(' opt_call_args rparen
2720 {
2721 /*%%%*/
2722 $$ = $2;
2723 /*% %*/
2724 /*% ripper: arg_paren!(escape_Qundef($2)) %*/
2725 }
2726 | '(' args ',' args_forward rparen
2727 {
2728 if (!check_forwarding_args(p)) {
2729 $$ = Qnone;
2730 }
2731 else {
2732 /*%%%*/
2733 $$ = new_args_forward_call(p, $2, &@4, &@$);
2734 /*% %*/
2735 /*% ripper: arg_paren!(args_add!($2, $4)) %*/
2736 }
2737 }
2738 | '(' args_forward rparen
2739 {
2740 if (!check_forwarding_args(p)) {
2741 $$ = Qnone;
2742 }
2743 else {
2744 /*%%%*/
2745 $$ = new_args_forward_call(p, 0, &@2, &@$);
2746 /*% %*/
2747 /*% ripper: arg_paren!($2) %*/
2748 }
2749 }
2750 ;
2751
2752opt_paren_args : none
2753 | paren_args
2754 ;
2755
2756opt_call_args : none
2757 | call_args
2758 | args ','
2759 {
2760 $$ = $1;
2761 }
2762 | args ',' assocs ','
2763 {
2764 /*%%%*/
2765 $$ = $3 ? arg_append(p, $1, new_hash(p, $3, &@3), &@$) : $1;
2766 /*% %*/
2767 /*% ripper: args_add!($1, bare_assoc_hash!($3)) %*/
2768 }
2769 | assocs ','
2770 {
2771 /*%%%*/
2772 $$ = $1 ? NEW_LIST(new_hash(p, $1, &@1), &@1) : 0;
2773 /*% %*/
2774 /*% ripper: args_add!(args_new!, bare_assoc_hash!($1)) %*/
2775 }
2776 ;
2777
2778call_args : command
2779 {
2780 /*%%%*/
2781 value_expr($1);
2782 $$ = NEW_LIST($1, &@$);
2783 /*% %*/
2784 /*% ripper: args_add!(args_new!, $1) %*/
2785 }
2786 | args opt_block_arg
2787 {
2788 /*%%%*/
2789 $$ = arg_blk_pass($1, $2);
2790 /*% %*/
2791 /*% ripper: args_add_block!($1, $2) %*/
2792 }
2793 | assocs opt_block_arg
2794 {
2795 /*%%%*/
2796 $$ = $1 ? NEW_LIST(new_hash(p, $1, &@1), &@1) : 0;
2797 $$ = arg_blk_pass($$, $2);
2798 /*% %*/
2799 /*% ripper: args_add_block!(args_add!(args_new!, bare_assoc_hash!($1)), $2) %*/
2800 }
2801 | args ',' assocs opt_block_arg
2802 {
2803 /*%%%*/
2804 $$ = $3 ? arg_append(p, $1, new_hash(p, $3, &@3), &@$) : $1;
2805 $$ = arg_blk_pass($$, $4);
2806 /*% %*/
2807 /*% ripper: args_add_block!(args_add!($1, bare_assoc_hash!($3)), $4) %*/
2808 }
2809 | block_arg
2810 /*% ripper[brace]: args_add_block!(args_new!, $1) %*/
2811 ;
2812
2813command_args : {
2814 /* If call_args starts with a open paren '(' or '[',
2815 * look-ahead reading of the letters calls CMDARG_PUSH(0),
2816 * but the push must be done after CMDARG_PUSH(1).
2817 * So this code makes them consistent by first cancelling
2818 * the premature CMDARG_PUSH(0), doing CMDARG_PUSH(1),
2819 * and finally redoing CMDARG_PUSH(0).
2820 */
2821 int lookahead = 0;
2822 switch (yychar) {
2823 case '(': case tLPAREN: case tLPAREN_ARG: case '[': case tLBRACK:
2824 lookahead = 1;
2825 }
2826 if (lookahead) CMDARG_POP();
2827 CMDARG_PUSH(1);
2828 if (lookahead) CMDARG_PUSH(0);
2829 }
2830 call_args
2831 {
2832 /* call_args can be followed by tLBRACE_ARG (that does CMDARG_PUSH(0) in the lexer)
2833 * but the push must be done after CMDARG_POP() in the parser.
2834 * So this code does CMDARG_POP() to pop 0 pushed by tLBRACE_ARG,
2835 * CMDARG_POP() to pop 1 pushed by command_args,
2836 * and CMDARG_PUSH(0) to restore back the flag set by tLBRACE_ARG.
2837 */
2838 int lookahead = 0;
2839 switch (yychar) {
2840 case tLBRACE_ARG:
2841 lookahead = 1;
2842 }
2843 if (lookahead) CMDARG_POP();
2844 CMDARG_POP();
2845 if (lookahead) CMDARG_PUSH(0);
2846 $$ = $2;
2847 }
2848 ;
2849
2850block_arg : tAMPER arg_value
2851 {
2852 /*%%%*/
2853 $$ = NEW_BLOCK_PASS($2, &@$);
2854 /*% %*/
2855 /*% ripper: $2 %*/
2856 }
2857 | tAMPER
2858 {
2859 /*%%%*/
2860 if (!local_id(p, ANON_BLOCK_ID)) {
2861 compile_error(p, "no anonymous block parameter");
2862 }
2863 $$ = NEW_BLOCK_PASS(NEW_LVAR(ANON_BLOCK_ID, &@1), &@$);
2864 /*%
2865 $$ = Qnil;
2866 %*/
2867 }
2868 ;
2869
2870opt_block_arg : ',' block_arg
2871 {
2872 $$ = $2;
2873 }
2874 | none
2875 {
2876 $$ = 0;
2877 }
2878 ;
2879
2880/* value */
2881args : arg_value
2882 {
2883 /*%%%*/
2884 $$ = NEW_LIST($1, &@$);
2885 /*% %*/
2886 /*% ripper: args_add!(args_new!, $1) %*/
2887 }
2888 | tSTAR arg_value
2889 {
2890 /*%%%*/
2891 $$ = NEW_SPLAT($2, &@$);
2892 /*% %*/
2893 /*% ripper: args_add_star!(args_new!, $2) %*/
2894 }
2895 | tSTAR
2896 {
2897 /*%%%*/
2898 if (!local_id(p, ANON_REST_ID)) {
2899 compile_error(p, "no anonymous rest parameter");
2900 }
2901 $$ = NEW_SPLAT(NEW_LVAR(ANON_REST_ID, &@1), &@$);
2902 /*% %*/
2903 /*% ripper: args_add_star!(args_new!, Qnil) %*/
2904 }
2905 | args ',' arg_value
2906 {
2907 /*%%%*/
2908 $$ = last_arg_append(p, $1, $3, &@$);
2909 /*% %*/
2910 /*% ripper: args_add!($1, $3) %*/
2911 }
2912 | args ',' tSTAR arg_value
2913 {
2914 /*%%%*/
2915 $$ = rest_arg_append(p, $1, $4, &@$);
2916 /*% %*/
2917 /*% ripper: args_add_star!($1, $4) %*/
2918 }
2919 | args ',' tSTAR
2920 {
2921 /*%%%*/
2922 if (!local_id(p, ANON_REST_ID)) {
2923 compile_error(p, "no anonymous rest parameter");
2924 }
2925 $$ = rest_arg_append(p, $1, NEW_LVAR(ANON_REST_ID, &@3), &@$);
2926 /*% %*/
2927 /*% ripper: args_add_star!($1, Qnil) %*/
2928 }
2929 ;
2930
2931/* value */
2932mrhs_arg : mrhs
2933 | arg_value
2934 ;
2935
2936/* value */
2937mrhs : args ',' arg_value
2938 {
2939 /*%%%*/
2940 $$ = last_arg_append(p, $1, $3, &@$);
2941 /*% %*/
2942 /*% ripper: mrhs_add!(mrhs_new_from_args!($1), $3) %*/
2943 }
2944 | args ',' tSTAR arg_value
2945 {
2946 /*%%%*/
2947 $$ = rest_arg_append(p, $1, $4, &@$);
2948 /*% %*/
2949 /*% ripper: mrhs_add_star!(mrhs_new_from_args!($1), $4) %*/
2950 }
2951 | tSTAR arg_value
2952 {
2953 /*%%%*/
2954 $$ = NEW_SPLAT($2, &@$);
2955 /*% %*/
2956 /*% ripper: mrhs_add_star!(mrhs_new!, $2) %*/
2957 }
2958 ;

2974 /*% %*/
2975 /*% ripper: method_add_arg!(fcall!($1), args_new!) %*/
2976 }
2977 | k_begin
2978 {
2979 CMDARG_PUSH(0);
2980 }
2981 bodystmt
2982 k_end
2983 {
2984 CMDARG_POP();
2985 /*%%%*/
2986 set_line_body($3, @1.end_pos.lineno);
2987 $$ = NEW_BEGIN($3, &@$);
2988 nd_set_line($$, @1.end_pos.lineno);
2989 /*% %*/
2990 /*% ripper: begin!($3) %*/
2991 }
2992 | tLPAREN_ARG {SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ENDARG);} rparen
2993 {

2995 $$ = NEW_BEGIN(0, &@$);
2996 /*% %*/
2997 /*% ripper: paren!(0) %*/
2998 }
2999 | tLPAREN_ARG stmt {SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ENDARG);} rparen
3000 {
3001 /*%%%*/
3002 if (nd_type_p($2, NODE_SELF)) $2->nd_state = 0;
3003 $$ = $2;
3004 /*% %*/
3005 /*% ripper: paren!($2) %*/
3006 }

3011 $$ = $2;
3012 /*% %*/
3013 /*% ripper: paren!($2) %*/
3014 }

3076 }

3080 }

3091 }

3096 block_dup_check(p, $1->nd_args, $2);
3097 $$ = method_add_block(p, $1, $2, &@$);
3098 /*% %*/
3099 /*% ripper: method_add_block!($1, $2) %*/
3100 }
3101 | lambda

3103 compstmt

3105 k_end

3123 }

3131 /*% %*/

3133 }

3144 | k_case expr_value opt_terms
3145 {
3146 $<val>$ = p->case_labels;
3147 p->case_labels = Qnil;
3148 }
3149 case_body
3150 k_end
3151 {
3152 if (RTEST(p->case_labels)) rb_hash_clear(p->case_labels);
3153 p->case_labels = $<val>4;
3154 /*%%%*/
3155 $$ = NEW_CASE($2, $5, &@$);
3156 fixpos($$, $2);
3157 /*% %*/
3158 /*% ripper: case!($2, $5) %*/
3159 }

3161 {
3162 $<val>$ = p->case_labels;
3163 p->case_labels = 0;
3164 }
3165 case_body
3166 k_end

3168 if (RTEST(p->case_labels)) rb_hash_clear(p->case_labels);
3169 p->case_labels = $<val>3;
3170 /*%%%*/
3171 $$ = NEW_CASE2($4, &@$);
3172 /*% %*/
3173 /*% ripper: case!(Qnil, $4) %*/
3174 }
3175 | k_case expr_value opt_terms
3176 p_case_body
3177 k_end

3183 }
3184 | k_for for_var keyword_in expr_value_do
3185 compstmt
3186 k_end
3187 {
3188 /*%%%*/
3189 /*
3190 * for a, b, c in e
3191 * #=>
3192 * e.each{|*x| a, b, c = x}
3193 *
3194 * for a in e
3195 * #=>
3196 * e.each{|x| a, = x}
3197 */
3198 ID id = internal_id(p);
3199 NODE *m = NEW_ARGS_AUX(0, 0, &NULL_LOC);
3200 NODE *args, *scope, *internal_var = NEW_DVAR(id, &@2);
3201 rb_ast_id_table_t *tbl = rb_ast_new_local_table(p->ast, 1);
3202 tbl->ids[0] = id; /* internal id */
3203
3204 switch (nd_type($2)) {
3205 case NODE_LASGN:
3206 case NODE_DASGN: /* e.each {|internal_var| a = internal_var; ... } */
3207 $2->nd_value = internal_var;
3208 id = 0;
3209 m->nd_plen = 1;
3210 m->nd_next = $2;
3211 break;
3212 case NODE_MASGN: /* e.each {|*internal_var| a, b, c = (internal_var.length == 1 && Array === (tmp = internal_var[0]) ? tmp : internal_var); ... } */
3213 m->nd_next = node_assign(p, $2, NEW_FOR_MASGN(internal_var, &@2), NO_LEX_CTXT, &@2);
3214 break;
3215 default: /* e.each {|*internal_var| @a, B, c[1], d.attr = internal_val; ... } */
3216 m->nd_next = node_assign(p, NEW_MASGN(NEW_LIST($2, &@2), 0, &@2), internal_var, NO_LEX_CTXT, &@2);
3217 }
3218 /* {|*internal_id| <m> = internal_id; ... } */
3219 args = new_args(p, m, 0, id, 0, new_args_tail(p, 0, 0, 0, &@2), &@2);
3220 scope = NEW_NODE(NODE_SCOPE, tbl, $5, args, &@$);
3221 $$ = NEW_FOR($4, scope, &@$);
3222 fixpos($$, $2);
3223 /*% %*/
3224 /*% ripper: for!($2, $4, $5) %*/
3225 }
3226 | k_class cpath superclass
3227 {
3228 if (p->ctxt.in_def) {
3229 YYLTYPE loc = code_loc_gen(&@1, &@2);
3230 yyerror1(&loc, "class definition in method body");
3231 }
3232 p->ctxt.in_class = 1;
3233 local_push(p, 0);
3234 }
3235 bodystmt
3236 k_end
3237 {
3238 /*%%%*/
3239 $$ = NEW_CLASS($2, $5, $3, &@$);
3240 nd_set_line($$->nd_body, @6.end_pos.lineno);
3241 set_line_body($5, @3.end_pos.lineno);
3242 nd_set_line($$, @3.end_pos.lineno);
3243 /*% %*/
3244 /*% ripper: class!($2, $3, $5) %*/
3245 local_pop(p);
3246 p->ctxt.in_class = $<ctxt>1.in_class;
3247 p->ctxt.shareable_constant_value = $<ctxt>1.shareable_constant_value;
3248 }
3249 | k_class tLSHFT expr
3250 {
3251 p->ctxt.in_def = 0;
3252 p->ctxt.in_class = 0;
3253 local_push(p, 0);
3254 }
3255 term
3256 bodystmt
3257 k_end
3258 {
3259 /*%%%*/
3260 $$ = NEW_SCLASS($3, $6, &@$);
3261 nd_set_line($$->nd_body, @7.end_pos.lineno);
3262 set_line_body($6, nd_line($3));
3263 fixpos($$, $3);
3264 /*% %*/
3265 /*% ripper: sclass!($3, $6) %*/
3266 local_pop(p);
3267 p->ctxt.in_def = $<ctxt>1.in_def;
3268 p->ctxt.in_class = $<ctxt>1.in_class;
3269 p->ctxt.shareable_constant_value = $<ctxt>1.shareable_constant_value;
3270 }
3271 | k_module cpath
3272 {
3273 if (p->ctxt.in_def) {
3274 YYLTYPE loc = code_loc_gen(&@1, &@2);
3275 yyerror1(&loc, "module definition in method body");
3276 }
3277 p->ctxt.in_class = 1;
3278 local_push(p, 0);
3279 }
3280 bodystmt
3281 k_end
3282 {
3283 /*%%%*/
3284 $$ = NEW_MODULE($2, $4, &@$);
3285 nd_set_line($$->nd_body, @5.end_pos.lineno);
3286 set_line_body($4, @2.end_pos.lineno);
3287 nd_set_line($$, @2.end_pos.lineno);
3288 /*% %*/
3289 /*% ripper: module!($2, $4) %*/
3290 local_pop(p);
3291 p->ctxt.in_class = $<ctxt>1.in_class;
3292 p->ctxt.shareable_constant_value = $<ctxt>1.shareable_constant_value;
3293 }
3294 | defn_head
3295 f_arglist
3296 bodystmt
3297 k_end
3298 {
3299 restore_defun(p, $<node>1->nd_defn);
3300 /*%%%*/
3301 $$ = set_defun_body(p, $1, $2, $3, &@$);
3302 /*% %*/
3303 /*% ripper: def!(get_value($1), $2, $3) %*/
3304 local_pop(p);
3305 }
3306 | defs_head
3307 f_arglist
3308 bodystmt
3309 k_end
3310 {
3311 restore_defun(p, $<node>1->nd_defn);
3312 /*%%%*/

3314 /*%
3315 $1 = get_value($1);
3316 %*/
3317 /*% ripper: defs!(AREF($1, 0), AREF($1, 1), AREF($1, 2), $2, $3) %*/
3318 local_pop(p);
3319 }
