3350primary_value : primary
3351 {
3352 value_expr($1);
3353 $$ = $1;
3354 }
3355 ;
3356
3357k_begin : keyword_begin
3358 {
3359 token_info_push(p, "begin", &@$);
3360 }
3361 ;
3362
3363k_if : keyword_if
3364 {
3365 WARN_EOL("if");
3366 token_info_push(p, "if", &@$);
3367 if (p->token_info && p->token_info->nonspc &&
3368 p->token_info->next && !strcmp(p->token_info->next->token, "else")) {
3369 const char *tok = p->lex.ptok;
3370 const char *beg = p->lex.pbeg + p->token_info->next->beg.column;
3371 beg += rb_strlen_lit("else");
3372 while (beg < tok && ISSPACE(*beg)) beg++;
3373 if (beg == tok) {
3374 p->token_info->nonspc = 0;
3375 }
3376 }
3377 }
3378 ;
3379
3380k_unless : keyword_unless
3381 {
3382 token_info_push(p, "unless", &@$);
3383 }
3384 ;
3385
3386k_while : keyword_while
3387 {
3388 token_info_push(p, "while", &@$);
3389 }
3390 ;
3391
3392k_until : keyword_until
3393 {
3394 token_info_push(p, "until", &@$);
3395 }
3396 ;
3397
3398k_case : keyword_case
3399 {
3400 token_info_push(p, "case", &@$);
3401 }
3402 ;
3403
3404k_for : keyword_for
3405 {
3406 token_info_push(p, "for", &@$);
3407 }
3408 ;
3409
3410k_class : keyword_class
3411 {
3412 token_info_push(p, "class", &@$);
3413 $<ctxt>$ = p->ctxt;
3414 }
3415 ;
3416
3417k_module : keyword_module
3418 {
3419 token_info_push(p, "module", &@$);
3420 $<ctxt>$ = p->ctxt;
3421 }
3422 ;
3423
3424k_def : keyword_def
3425 {
3426 token_info_push(p, "def", &@$);
3427 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 1;
3428 }
3429 ;
3430
3431k_do : keyword_do
3432 {
3433 token_info_push(p, "do", &@$);
3434 }
3435 ;
3436
3437k_do_block : keyword_do_block
3438 {
3439 token_info_push(p, "do", &@$);
3440 }
3441 ;
3442
3443k_rescue : keyword_rescue
3444 {
3445 token_info_warn(p, "rescue", p->token_info, 1, &@$);
3446 }
3447 ;
3448
3449k_ensure : keyword_ensure
3450 {
3451 token_info_warn(p, "ensure", p->token_info, 1, &@$);
3452 }
3453 ;
3454
3455k_when : keyword_when
3456 {
3457 token_info_warn(p, "when", p->token_info, 0, &@$);
3458 }
3459 ;
3460
3461k_else : keyword_else
3462 {
3463 token_info *ptinfo_beg = p->token_info;
3464 int same = ptinfo_beg && strcmp(ptinfo_beg->token, "case") != 0;
3465 token_info_warn(p, "else", p->token_info, same, &@$);
3466 if (same) {
3467 token_info e;
3468 e.next = ptinfo_beg->next;
3469 e.token = "else";
3470 token_info_setup(&e, p->lex.pbeg, &@$);
3471 if (!e.nonspc) *ptinfo_beg = e;
3472 }
3473 }
3474 ;
3475
3476k_elsif : keyword_elsif
3477 {
3478 WARN_EOL("elsif");
3479 token_info_warn(p, "elsif", p->token_info, 1, &@$);
3480 }
3481 ;
3482
3483k_end : keyword_end
3484 {
3485 token_info_pop(p, "end", &@$);
3486 }
3487 ;
3488
3489k_return : keyword_return
3490 {
3491 if (p->ctxt.in_class && !p->ctxt.in_def && !dyna_in_block(p))
3492 yyerror1(&@1, "Invalid return in class/module body");
3493 }
3494 ;

3515 }

3609 }

3632 }

3643opt_block_args_tail : ',' block_args_tail

3645 $$ = $2;
3646 }
3647 | /* none */
3648 {
3649 $$ = new_args_tail(p, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, &@0);
3650 }
3651 ;
3652
3653excessed_comma : ','
3654 {
3655 /* magic number for rest_id in iseq_set_arguments() */
3656 /*%%%*/
3657 $$ = NODE_SPECIAL_EXCESSIVE_COMMA;
3658 /*% %*/
3659 /*% ripper: excessed_comma! %*/
3660 }
3661 ;
3662
3663block_param : f_arg ',' f_block_optarg ',' f_rest_arg opt_block_args_tail
3664 {
3665 $$ = new_args(p, $1, $3, $5, Qnone, $6, &@$);
3666 }
3667 | f_arg ',' f_block_optarg ',' f_rest_arg ',' f_arg opt_block_args_tail
3668 {
3669 $$ = new_args(p, $1, $3, $5, $7, $8, &@$);
3670 }
3671 | f_arg ',' f_block_optarg opt_block_args_tail
3672 {
3673 $$ = new_args(p, $1, $3, Qnone, Qnone, $4, &@$);
3674 }
3675 | f_arg ',' f_block_optarg ',' f_arg opt_block_args_tail
3676 {
3677 $$ = new_args(p, $1, $3, Qnone, $5, $6, &@$);
3678 }
3679 | f_arg ',' f_rest_arg opt_block_args_tail
3680 {
3681 $$ = new_args(p, $1, Qnone, $3, Qnone, $4, &@$);
3682 }
3683 | f_arg excessed_comma
3684 {
3685 $$ = new_args_tail(p, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, &@2);
3686 $$ = new_args(p, $1, Qnone, $2, Qnone, $$, &@$);
3687 }
3688 | f_arg ',' f_rest_arg ',' f_arg opt_block_args_tail
3689 {
3690 $$ = new_args(p, $1, Qnone, $3, $5, $6, &@$);
3691 }
3692 | f_arg opt_block_args_tail
3693 {
3694 $$ = new_args(p, $1, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, $2, &@$);
3695 }
3696 | f_block_optarg ',' f_rest_arg opt_block_args_tail
3697 {
3698 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, $1, $3, Qnone, $4, &@$);
3699 }

3701 {
3702 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, $1, $3, $5, $6, &@$);
3703 }
3704 | f_block_optarg opt_block_args_tail

3707 }
3708 | f_block_optarg ',' f_arg opt_block_args_tail

3711 }
3712 | f_rest_arg opt_block_args_tail
3713 {
3714 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, Qnone, $1, Qnone, $2, &@$);
3715 }
3716 | f_rest_arg ',' f_arg opt_block_args_tail
3717 {
3718 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, Qnone, $1, $3, $4, &@$);
3719 }
3720 | block_args_tail
3721 {
3722 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, $1, &@$);
3723 }
3724 ;
3725
3726opt_block_param : none
3727 | block_param_def
3728 {
3729 p->command_start = TRUE;
3730 }
3731 ;
3732
3733block_param_def : '|' opt_bv_decl '|'
3734 {
3735 p->cur_arg = 0;
3736 p->max_numparam = ORDINAL_PARAM;
3737 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 0;
3738 /*%%%*/
3739 $$ = 0;
3740 /*% %*/
3741 /*% ripper: block_var!(params!(Qnil,Qnil,Qnil,Qnil,Qnil,Qnil,Qnil), escape_Qundef($2)) %*/
3742 }
3743 | '|' block_param opt_bv_decl '|'
3744 {
3745 p->cur_arg = 0;
3746 p->max_numparam = ORDINAL_PARAM;
3747 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 0;
3748 /*%%%*/
3749 $$ = $2;
3750 /*% %*/
3751 /*% ripper: block_var!(escape_Qundef($2), escape_Qundef($3)) %*/
3752 }
3753 ;

3759 }

3779 }
3780 | f_bad_arg

3783 }

3785
3786lambda : tLAMBDA
3787 {
3788 token_info_push(p, "->", &@1);
3789 $<vars>1 = dyna_push(p);
3790 $<num>$ = p->lex.lpar_beg;
3791 p->lex.lpar_beg = p->lex.paren_nest;
3792 }
3793 {
3794 $<num>$ = p->max_numparam;
3795 p->max_numparam = 0;
3796 }
3797 {
3798 $<node>$ = numparam_push(p);
3799 }
3800 f_larglist
3801 {
3802 CMDARG_PUSH(0);
3803 }
3804 lambda_body
3805 {
3806 int max_numparam = p->max_numparam;
3807 p->lex.lpar_beg = $<num>2;
3808 p->max_numparam = $<num>3;
3809 CMDARG_POP();
3810 $5 = args_with_numbered(p, $5, max_numparam);
3811 /*%%%*/
3812 {
3813 YYLTYPE loc = code_loc_gen(&@5, &@7);
3814 $$ = NEW_LAMBDA($5, $7, &loc);
3815 nd_set_line($$->nd_body, @7.end_pos.lineno);
3816 nd_set_line($$, @5.end_pos.lineno);
3817 nd_set_first_loc($$, @1.beg_pos);
3818 }
3819 /*% %*/
3820 /*% ripper: lambda!($5, $7) %*/
3821 numparam_pop(p, $<node>4);
3822 dyna_pop(p, $<vars>1);
3823 }
3824 ;
3825
3826f_larglist : '(' f_args opt_bv_decl ')'
3827 {
3828 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 0;
3829 /*%%%*/
3830 $$ = $2;
3831 p->max_numparam = ORDINAL_PARAM;
3832 /*% %*/
3833 /*% ripper: paren!($2) %*/
3834 }
3835 | f_args
3836 {
3837 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 0;
3838 /*%%%*/
3839 if (!args_info_empty_p($1->nd_ainfo))
3840 p->max_numparam = ORDINAL_PARAM;
3841 /*% %*/
3842 $$ = $1;
3843 }
3844 ;

3850 }
3851 | keyword_do_LAMBDA bodystmt k_end
3852 {
3853 $$ = $2;
3854 }
3855 ;
3856
3857do_block : k_do_block do_body k_end
3858 {
3859 $$ = $2;
3860 /*%%%*/
3861 $$->nd_body->nd_loc = code_loc_gen(&@1, &@3);
3862 nd_set_line($$, @1.end_pos.lineno);
3863 /*% %*/
3864 }
3865 ;
3866
3867block_call : command do_block
3868 {
3869 /*%%%*/
3870 if (nd_type_p($1, NODE_YIELD)) {
3871 compile_error(p, "block given to yield");
3872 }
3873 else {
3874 block_dup_check(p, $1->nd_args, $2);
3875 }
3876 $$ = method_add_block(p, $1, $2, &@$);
3877 fixpos($$, $1);
3878 /*% %*/
3879 /*% ripper: method_add_block!($1, $2) %*/
3880 }
3881 | block_call call_op2 operation2 opt_paren_args
3882 {
3883 /*%%%*/
3884 $$ = new_qcall(p, $2, $1, $3, $4, &@3, &@$);
3885 /*% %*/
3886 /*% ripper: opt_event(:method_add_arg!, call!($1, $2, $3), $4) %*/
3887 }
3888 | block_call call_op2 operation2 opt_paren_args brace_block
3889 {
3890 /*%%%*/
3891 $$ = new_command_qcall(p, $2, $1, $3, $4, $5, &@3, &@$);
3892 /*% %*/
3893 /*% ripper: opt_event(:method_add_block!, command_call!($1, $2, $3, $4), $5) %*/
3894 }
3895 | block_call call_op2 operation2 command_args do_block
3896 {
3897 /*%%%*/
3898 $$ = new_command_qcall(p, $2, $1, $3, $4, $5, &@3, &@$);
3899 /*% %*/
3900 /*% ripper: method_add_block!(command_call!($1, $2, $3, $4), $5) %*/
3901 }
3902 ;

3910 /*% %*/
3911 /*% ripper: method_add_arg!(fcall!($1), $2) %*/
3912 }

3914 {
3915 /*%%%*/

3917 nd_set_line($$, @3.end_pos.lineno);
3918 /*% %*/

3920 }

3926 /*% %*/

3928 }

3933 /*% %*/
3934 /*% ripper: call!($1, ID2VAL(idCOLON2), $3) %*/
3935 }
3936 | primary_value call_op paren_args
3937 {
3938 /*%%%*/

3940 nd_set_line($$, @2.end_pos.lineno);
3941 /*% %*/
3942 /*% ripper: method_add_arg!(call!($1, $2, ID2VAL(idCall)), $3) %*/
3943 }
3944 | primary_value tCOLON2 paren_args

3948 nd_set_line($$, @2.end_pos.lineno);
3949 /*% %*/
3950 /*% ripper: method_add_arg!(call!($1, ID2VAL(idCOLON2), ID2VAL(idCall)), $3) %*/
3951 }
3952 | keyword_super paren_args
3953 {
3954 /*%%%*/
3955 $$ = NEW_SUPER($2, &@$);
3956 /*% %*/
3957 /*% ripper: super!($2) %*/
3958 }
3959 | keyword_super
3960 {
3961 /*%%%*/
3962 $$ = NEW_ZSUPER(&@$);
3963 /*% %*/
3964 /*% ripper: zsuper! %*/
3965 }
3966 | primary_value '[' opt_call_args rbracket
3967 {
3968 /*%%%*/
3969 if ($1 && nd_type_p($1, NODE_SELF))
3970 $$ = NEW_FCALL(tAREF, $3, &@$);
3971 else
3972 $$ = NEW_CALL($1, tAREF, $3, &@$);
3973 fixpos($$, $1);
3974 /*% %*/
3975 /*% ripper: aref!($1, escape_Qundef($3)) %*/
3976 }

3985 /*% %*/

3991 $$->nd_body->nd_loc = code_loc_gen(&@1, &@3);
3992 nd_set_line($$, @1.end_pos.lineno);
3993 /*% %*/
3994 }

3996

3998 {
3999 $<num>$ = p->max_numparam;
4000 p->max_numparam = 0;
4001 }
4002 {
4003 $<node>$ = numparam_push(p);
4004 }
4005 opt_block_param compstmt
4006 {
4007 int max_numparam = p->max_numparam;
4008 p->max_numparam = $<num>2;
4009 $4 = args_with_numbered(p, $4, max_numparam);
4010 /*%%%*/
4011 $$ = NEW_ITER($4, $5, &@$);
4012 /*% %*/
4013 /*% ripper: brace_block!(escape_Qundef($4), $5) %*/
4014 numparam_pop(p, $<node>3);

4016 }

4033 /*%%%*/

4035 /*% %*/

4037 CMDARG_POP();
4038 numparam_pop(p, $<node>3);

4040 }

4042
4043case_args : arg_value
4044 {
4045 /*%%%*/
4046 check_literal_when(p, $1, &@1);
4047 $$ = NEW_LIST($1, &@$);
4048 /*% %*/
4049 /*% ripper: args_add!(args_new!, $1) %*/
4050 }
4051 | tSTAR arg_value
4052 {
4053 /*%%%*/
4054 $$ = NEW_SPLAT($2, &@$);
4055 /*% %*/
4056 /*% ripper: args_add_star!(args_new!, $2) %*/
4057 }
4058 | case_args ',' arg_value
4059 {
4060 /*%%%*/
4061 check_literal_when(p, $3, &@3);
4062 $$ = last_arg_append(p, $1, $3, &@$);
4063 /*% %*/
4064 /*% ripper: args_add!($1, $3) %*/
4065 }
4066 | case_args ',' tSTAR arg_value
4067 {
4068 /*%%%*/
4069 $$ = rest_arg_append(p, $1, $4, &@$);
4070 /*% %*/
4071 /*% ripper: args_add_star!($1, $4) %*/
4072 }
4073 ;
4074
4075case_body : k_when case_args then
4076 compstmt
4077 cases
4078 {
4079 /*%%%*/
4080 $$ = NEW_WHEN($2, $4, $5, &@$);
4081 fixpos($$, $2);
4082 /*% %*/
4083 /*% ripper: when!($2, $4, escape_Qundef($5)) %*/
4084 }
4085 ;
4086
4087cases : opt_else
4088 | case_body
4089 ;
4090
4091p_case_body : keyword_in
4092 {
4093 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG|EXPR_LABEL);
4094 p->command_start = FALSE;
4095 $<ctxt>1 = p->ctxt;
4096 p->ctxt.in_kwarg = 1;
4097 $<tbl>$ = push_pvtbl(p);
4098 }
4099 {
4100 $<tbl>$ = push_pktbl(p);
4101 }
4102 p_top_expr then
4103 {
4104 pop_pktbl(p, $<tbl>3);
4105 pop_pvtbl(p, $<tbl>2);
4106 p->ctxt.in_kwarg = $<ctxt>1.in_kwarg;
4107 }
4108 compstmt
4109 p_cases
4110 {
4111 /*%%%*/
4112 $$ = NEW_IN($4, $7, $8, &@$);
4113 /*% %*/
4114 /*% ripper: in!($4, $7, escape_Qundef($8)) %*/
4115 }
4116 ;
4117
4118p_cases : opt_else

4120 ;

4128 /*% %*/
4129 /*% ripper: if_mod!($3, $1) %*/
4130 }

4132 {

4135 fixpos($$, $3);
4136 /*% %*/
4137 /*% ripper: unless_mod!($3, $1) %*/
4138 }

4141p_top_expr_body : p_expr

4146 }

4152 /*%

4154 }

4162 }

4172p_as : p_expr tASSOC p_variable
4173 {

4176 n = list_append(p, n, $3);
4177 $$ = new_hash(p, n, &@$);
4178 /*% %*/
4179 /*% ripper: binary!($1, STATIC_ID2SYM((id_assoc)), $3) %*/
4180 }
4181 | p_alt
4182 ;

4188 /*% %*/
4189 /*% ripper: binary!($1, STATIC_ID2SYM(idOr), $3) %*/
4190 }

4203 /*%%%*/

4205 /*%

4207 }

4209 {

4211 $$ = new_find_pattern(p, $1, $3, &@$);
4212 /*%%%*/

4216 }

4221 /*%%%*/
4222 nd_set_first_loc($$, @1.beg_pos);
4223 /*%
4224 %*/
4225 }
4226 | p_const '(' rparen
4227 {
4228 $$ = new_array_pattern_tail(p, Qnone, 0, 0, Qnone, &@$);
4229 $$ = new_array_pattern(p, $1, Qnone, $$, &@$);
4230 }
4231 | p_const p_lbracket p_args rbracket
4232 {

4246 /*%

4253 /*%%%*/
4254 nd_set_first_loc($$, @1.beg_pos);
4255 /*%

4258 | p_const '[' rbracket
4259 {
4260 $$ = new_array_pattern_tail(p, Qnone, 0, 0, Qnone, &@$);
4261 $$ = new_array_pattern(p, $1, Qnone, $$, &@$);
4262 }
4263 | tLBRACK p_args rbracket
4264 {
4265 $$ = new_array_pattern(p, Qnone, Qnone, $2, &@$);
4266 }
4267 | tLBRACK p_find rbracket
4268 {

4270 }
4271 | tLBRACK rbracket
4272 {

4274 $$ = new_array_pattern(p, Qnone, Qnone, $$, &@$);
4275 }
4276 | tLBRACE

4279 $<ctxt>1 = p->ctxt;
4280 p->ctxt.in_kwarg = 0;
4281 }
4282 p_kwargs rbrace
4283 {
4284 pop_pktbl(p, $<tbl>2);
4285 p->ctxt.in_kwarg = $<ctxt>1.in_kwarg;
4286 $$ = new_hash_pattern(p, Qnone, $3, &@$);
4287 }
4288 | tLBRACE rbrace
4289 {
4290 $$ = new_hash_pattern_tail(p, Qnone, 0, &@$);
4291 $$ = new_hash_pattern(p, Qnone, $$, &@$);
4292 }
4293 | tLPAREN {$<tbl>$ = push_pktbl(p);} p_expr rparen
4294 {
4295 pop_pktbl(p, $<tbl>2);
4296 $$ = $3;
4297 }
4298 ;
4299
4300p_args : p_expr
4301 {
4302 /*%%%*/
4303 NODE *pre_args = NEW_LIST($1, &@$);
4304 $$ = new_array_pattern_tail(p, pre_args, 0, 0, Qnone, &@$);
4305 /*%
4306 $$ = new_array_pattern_tail(p, rb_ary_new_from_args(1, get_value($1)), 0, 0, Qnone, &@$);
4307 %*/
4308 }
4309 | p_args_head
4310 {
4311 $$ = new_array_pattern_tail(p, $1, 1, 0, Qnone, &@$);
4312 }
4313 | p_args_head p_arg
4314 {
4315 /*%%%*/
4316 $$ = new_array_pattern_tail(p, list_concat($1, $2), 0, 0, Qnone, &@$);
4317 /*%
4318 VALUE pre_args = rb_ary_concat($1, get_value($2));
4319 $$ = new_array_pattern_tail(p, pre_args, 0, 0, Qnone, &@$);
4320 %*/
4321 }
4322 | p_args_head p_rest
4323 {
4324 $$ = new_array_pattern_tail(p, $1, 1, $2, Qnone, &@$);
4325 }
4326 | p_args_head p_rest ',' p_args_post
4327 {
4328 $$ = new_array_pattern_tail(p, $1, 1, $2, $4, &@$);
4329 }
4330 | p_args_tail
4331 ;
4332
4333p_args_head : p_arg ','
4334 {
4335 $$ = $1;
4336 }
4337 | p_args_head p_arg ','
4338 {
4339 /*%%%*/
4340 $$ = list_concat($1, $2);
4341 /*% %*/
4342 /*% ripper: rb_ary_concat($1, get_value($2)) %*/
4343 }
4344 ;
4345
4346p_args_tail : p_rest
4347 {
4348 $$ = new_array_pattern_tail(p, Qnone, 1, $1, Qnone, &@$);
4349 }
4350 | p_rest ',' p_args_post
4351 {
4352 $$ = new_array_pattern_tail(p, Qnone, 1, $1, $3, &@$);
4353 }
4354 ;
4355
4356p_find : p_rest ',' p_args_post ',' p_rest
4357 {
4358 $$ = new_find_pattern_tail(p, $1, $3, $5, &@$);
4359 }
4360 ;
4361
4362
4363p_rest : tSTAR tIDENTIFIER
4364 {
4365 $$ = $2;
4366 }
4367 | tSTAR
4368 {
4369 $$ = 0;
4370 }
4371 ;
4372

4374 | p_args_post ',' p_arg
4375 {
4376 /*%%%*/
4377 $$ = list_concat($1, $3);
4378 /*% %*/
4379 /*% ripper: rb_ary_concat($1, get_value($3)) %*/
4380 }

4389 }

4392p_kwargs : p_kwarg ',' p_any_kwrest
4393 {
4394 $$ = new_hash_pattern_tail(p, new_unique_key_hash(p, $1, &@$), $3, &@$);
4395 }
4396 | p_kwarg
4397 {
4398 $$ = new_hash_pattern_tail(p, new_unique_key_hash(p, $1, &@$), 0, &@$);
4399 }
4400 | p_kwarg ','
4401 {
4402 $$ = new_hash_pattern_tail(p, new_unique_key_hash(p, $1, &@$), 0, &@$);
4403 }
4404 | p_any_kwrest
4405 {
4406 $$ = new_hash_pattern_tail(p, new_hash(p, Qnone, &@$), $1, &@$);
4407 }
4408 ;
4409
4410p_kwarg : p_kw
4411 /*% ripper[brace]: rb_ary_new_from_args(1, $1) %*/
4412 | p_kwarg ',' p_kw
4413 {
4414 /*%%%*/
4415 $$ = list_concat($1, $3);
4416 /*% %*/
4417 /*% ripper: rb_ary_push($1, $3) %*/
4418 }
4419 ;
4420
4421p_kw : p_kw_label p_expr
4422 {
4423 error_duplicate_pattern_key(p, get_id($1), &@1);
4424 /*%%%*/
4425 $$ = list_append(p, NEW_LIST(NEW_LIT(ID2SYM($1), &@1), &@$), $2);
4426 /*% %*/
4427 /*% ripper: rb_ary_new_from_args(2, get_value($1), get_value($2)) %*/
4428 }
4429 | p_kw_label
4430 {
4431 error_duplicate_pattern_key(p, get_id($1), &@1);
4432 if ($1 && !is_local_id(get_id($1))) {
4433 yyerror1(&@1, "key must be valid as local variables");
4434 }
4435 error_duplicate_pattern_variable(p, get_id($1), &@1);
4436 /*%%%*/
4437 $$ = list_append(p, NEW_LIST(NEW_LIT(ID2SYM($1), &@$), &@$), assignable(p, $1, 0, &@$));
4438 /*% %*/
4439 /*% ripper: rb_ary_new_from_args(2, get_value($1), Qnil) %*/
4440 }
4441 ;
4442
4443p_kw_label : tLABEL
4444 | tSTRING_BEG string_contents tLABEL_END
4445 {
4446 YYLTYPE loc = code_loc_gen(&@1, &@3);
4447 /*%%%*/
4448 if (!$2 || nd_type_p($2, NODE_STR)) {
4449 NODE *node = dsym_node(p, $2, &loc);
4450 $$ = SYM2ID(node->nd_lit);
4451 }
4452 /*%
4453 if (ripper_is_node_yylval($2) && RNODE($2)->nd_cval) {
4454 VALUE label = RNODE($2)->nd_cval;
4455 VALUE rval = RNODE($2)->nd_rval;
4456 $$ = ripper_new_yylval(p, rb_intern_str(label), rval, label);
4457 RNODE($$)->nd_loc = loc;
4458 }
4459 %*/
4460 else {
4461 yyerror1(&loc, "symbol literal with interpolation is not allowed");
4462 $$ = 0;
4463 }
4464 }
4465 ;
4466
4467p_kwrest : kwrest_mark tIDENTIFIER
4468 {
4469 $$ = $2;
4470 }
4471 | kwrest_mark
4472 {
4473 $$ = 0;
4474 }
4475 ;
4476
4477p_kwnorest : kwrest_mark keyword_nil
4478 {
4479 $$ = 0;
4480 }
4481 ;
4482
4483p_any_kwrest : p_kwrest
4484 | p_kwnorest {$$ = ID2VAL(idNil);}
4485 ;
4486
4487p_value : p_primitive
4488 | p_primitive tDOT2 p_primitive
4489 {
4490 /*%%%*/
4491 value_expr($1);
4492 value_expr($3);
4493 $$ = NEW_DOT2($1, $3, &@$);
4494 /*% %*/
4495 /*% ripper: dot2!($1, $3) %*/
4496 }
4497 | p_primitive tDOT3 p_primitive
4498 {
4499 /*%%%*/
4500 value_expr($1);
4501 value_expr($3);
4502 $$ = NEW_DOT3($1, $3, &@$);
4503 /*% %*/
4504 /*% ripper: dot3!($1, $3) %*/
4505 }
4506 | p_primitive tDOT2
4507 {
4508 /*%%%*/
4509 value_expr($1);
4510 $$ = NEW_DOT2($1, new_nil_at(p, &@2.end_pos), &@$);
4511 /*% %*/
4512 /*% ripper: dot2!($1, Qnil) %*/
4513 }
4514 | p_primitive tDOT3
4515 {
4516 /*%%%*/
4517 value_expr($1);
4518 $$ = NEW_DOT3($1, new_nil_at(p, &@2.end_pos), &@$);
4519 /*% %*/
4520 /*% ripper: dot3!($1, Qnil) %*/
4521 }
4522 | p_var_ref
4523 | p_expr_ref
4524 | p_const
4525 | tBDOT2 p_primitive
4526 {
4527 /*%%%*/
4528 value_expr($2);
4529 $$ = NEW_DOT2(new_nil_at(p, &@1.beg_pos), $2, &@$);
4530 /*% %*/
4531 /*% ripper: dot2!(Qnil, $2) %*/
4532 }
4533 | tBDOT3 p_primitive
4534 {
4535 /*%%%*/
4536 value_expr($2);
4537 $$ = NEW_DOT3(new_nil_at(p, &@1.beg_pos), $2, &@$);
4538 /*% %*/
4539 /*% ripper: dot3!(Qnil, $2) %*/
4540 }
4541 ;
4542
4543p_primitive : literal
4544 | strings
4545 | xstring
4546 | regexp
4547 | words
4548 | qwords
4549 | symbols
4550 | qsymbols
4551 | keyword_variable
4552 {
4553 /*%%%*/
4554 if (!($$ = gettable(p, $1, &@$))) $$ = NEW_BEGIN(0, &@$);
4555 /*% %*/
4556 /*% ripper: var_ref!($1) %*/
4557 }
4558 | lambda
4559 ;
4560
4561p_variable : tIDENTIFIER
4562 {
4563 /*%%%*/
4564 error_duplicate_pattern_variable(p, $1, &@1);
4565 $$ = assignable(p, $1, 0, &@$);
4566 /*% %*/
4567 /*% ripper: assignable(p, var_field(p, $1)) %*/
4568 }
4569 ;
4570
4571p_var_ref : '^' tIDENTIFIER
4572 {
4573 /*%%%*/
4574 NODE *n = gettable(p, $2, &@$);
4575 if (!(nd_type_p(n, NODE_LVAR) || nd_type_p(n, NODE_DVAR))) {
4576 compile_error(p, "%"PRIsVALUE": no such local variable", rb_id2str($2));
4577 }
4578 $$ = n;
4579 /*% %*/
4580 /*% ripper: var_ref!($2) %*/
4581 }
4582 | '^' nonlocal_var
4583 {
4584 /*%%%*/
4585 if (!($$ = gettable(p, $2, &@$))) $$ = NEW_BEGIN(0, &@$);
4586 /*% %*/
4587 /*% ripper: var_ref!($2) %*/
4588 }
4589 ;
4590
4591p_expr_ref : '^' tLPAREN expr_value ')'
4592 {
4593 /*%%%*/
4594 $$ = NEW_BEGIN($3, &@$);
4595 /*% %*/
4596 /*% ripper: begin!($3) %*/
4597 }
4598 ;

4624 compstmt
4625 opt_rescue

4628 $$ = NEW_RESBODY($2,
4629 $3 ? block_append(p, node_assign(p, $3, NEW_ERRINFO(&@3), NO_LEX_CTXT, &@3), $5) : $5,
4630 $6, &@$);
4631 fixpos($$, $2?$2:$5);
4632 /*% %*/
4633 /*% ripper: rescue!(escape_Qundef($2), escape_Qundef($3), escape_Qundef($5), escape_Qundef($6)) %*/
4634 }

4676strings : string
4677 {
4678 /*%%%*/
4679 NODE *node = $1;
4680 if (!node) {
4681 node = NEW_STR(STR_NEW0(), &@$);
4682 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, node->nd_lit);
4683 }
4684 else {
4685 node = evstr2dstr(p, node);
4686 }
4687 $$ = node;
4688 /*% %*/
4689 /*% ripper: $1 %*/
4690 }
4691 ;

4711 }

4857 /*%%%*/
4858 /*%
4859 if (ripper_is_node_yylval($1) && ripper_is_node_yylval($2) &&
4860 !RNODE($1)->nd_cval) {
4861 RNODE($1)->nd_cval = RNODE($2)->nd_cval;
4862 RNODE($1)->nd_rval = add_mark_object(p, $$);
4863 $$ = $1;

4885regexp_contents: /* none */
4886 {
4887 /*%%%*/
4888 $$ = 0;
4889 /*% %*/
4890 /*% ripper: regexp_new! %*/
4891 /*%%%*/
4892 /*%
4893 $$ = ripper_new_yylval(p, 0, $$, 0);
4894 %*/
4895 }
4896 | regexp_contents string_content
4897 {
4898 /*%%%*/
4899 NODE *head = $1, *tail = $2;
4900 if (!head) {
4901 $$ = tail;
4902 }
4903 else if (!tail) {
4904 $$ = head;
4905 }
4906 else {
4907 switch (nd_type(head)) {
4908 case NODE_STR:
4909 nd_set_type(head, NODE_DSTR);
4910 break;
4911 case NODE_DSTR:
4912 break;
4913 default:
4914 head = list_append(p, NEW_DSTR(Qnil, &@$), head);
4915 break;
4916 }
4917 $$ = list_append(p, head, tail);
4918 }
4919 /*%
4920 VALUE s1 = 1, s2 = 0, n1 = $1, n2 = $2;
4921 if (ripper_is_node_yylval(n1)) {
4922 s1 = RNODE(n1)->nd_cval;
4923 n1 = RNODE(n1)->nd_rval;
4924 }
4925 if (ripper_is_node_yylval(n2)) {
4926 s2 = RNODE(n2)->nd_cval;
4927 n2 = RNODE(n2)->nd_rval;
4928 }
4929 $$ = dispatch2(regexp_add, n1, n2);
4930 if (!s1 && s2) {
4931 $$ = ripper_new_yylval(p, 0, $$, s2);
4932 }
4933 %*/
4934 }
4935 ;
4936
4937string_content : tSTRING_CONTENT
4938 /*% ripper[brace]: ripper_new_yylval(p, 0, get_value($1), $1) %*/
4939 | tSTRING_DVAR
4940 {
4941 /* need to backup p->lex.strterm so that a string literal `%&foo,#$&,bar&` can be parsed */
4942 $<strterm>$ = p->lex.strterm;
4943 p->lex.strterm = 0;
4944 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
4945 }
4946 string_dvar
4947 {
4948 p->lex.strterm = $<strterm>2;
4949 /*%%%*/
4950 $$ = NEW_EVSTR($3, &@$);
4951 nd_set_line($$, @3.end_pos.lineno);
4952 /*% %*/
4953 /*% ripper: string_dvar!($3) %*/
4954 }
4955 | tSTRING_DBEG
4956 {
4957 CMDARG_PUSH(0);
4958 COND_PUSH(0);
4959 }
4960 {
4961 /* need to backup p->lex.strterm so that a string literal `%!foo,#{ !0 },bar!` can be parsed */
4962 $<strterm>$ = p->lex.strterm;
4963 p->lex.strterm = 0;
4964 }
4965 {
4966 $<num>$ = p->lex.state;
4967 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
4968 }
4969 {
4970 $<num>$ = p->lex.brace_nest;
4971 p->lex.brace_nest = 0;
4972 }
4973 {
4974 $<num>$ = p->heredoc_indent;
4975 p->heredoc_indent = 0;
4976 }
4977 compstmt tSTRING_DEND
4978 {
4979 COND_POP();
4980 CMDARG_POP();
4981 p->lex.strterm = $<strterm>3;
4982 SET_LEX_STATE($<num>4);
4983 p->lex.brace_nest = $<num>5;
4984 p->heredoc_indent = $<num>6;
4985 p->heredoc_line_indent = -1;
4986 /*%%%*/
4987 if ($7) $7->flags &= ~NODE_FL_NEWLINE;
4988 $$ = new_evstr(p, $7, &@$);
4989 /*% %*/
4990 /*% ripper: string_embexpr!($7) %*/
4991 }
4992 ;

5048numeric : simple_numeric
5049 | tUMINUS_NUM simple_numeric %prec tLOWEST
5050 {
5051 /*%%%*/
5052 $$ = $2;
5053 RB_OBJ_WRITE(p->ast, &$$->nd_lit, negate_lit(p, $$->nd_lit));
5054 /*% %*/
5055 /*% ripper: unary!(ID2VAL(idUMinus), $2) %*/
5056 }
5057 ;
5058
5059simple_numeric : tINTEGER
5060 | tFLOAT
5061 | tRATIONAL
5062 | tIMAGINARY
5063 ;
5064
5065nonlocal_var : tIVAR
5066 | tGVAR
5067 | tCVAR
5068 ;
5069
5070user_variable : tIDENTIFIER
5071 | tIVAR
5072 | tGVAR
5073 | tCONSTANT
5074 | tCVAR
5075 ;
5076
5077keyword_variable: keyword_nil {$$ = KWD2EID(nil, $1);}
5078 | keyword_self {$$ = KWD2EID(self, $1);}
5079 | keyword_true {$$ = KWD2EID(true, $1);}
5080 | keyword_false {$$ = KWD2EID(false, $1);}
5081 | keyword__FILE__ {$$ = KWD2EID(_FILE__, $1);}
5082 | keyword__LINE__ {$$ = KWD2EID(_LINE__, $1);}
5083 | keyword__ENCODING__ {$$ = KWD2EID(_ENCODING__, $1);}
5084 ;
5085
5086var_ref : user_variable
5087 {
5088 /*%%%*/
5089 if (!($$ = gettable(p, $1, &@$))) $$ = NEW_BEGIN(0, &@$);
5090 /*%
5091 if (id_is_var(p, get_id($1))) {
5092 $$ = dispatch1(var_ref, $1);
5093 }
5094 else {
5095 $$ = dispatch1(vcall, $1);
5096 }
5097 %*/
5098 }
5099 | keyword_variable
5100 {
5101 /*%%%*/
5102 if (!($$ = gettable(p, $1, &@$))) $$ = NEW_BEGIN(0, &@$);
5103 /*% %*/
5104 /*% ripper: var_ref!($1) %*/
5105 }
5106 ;
5107
5108var_lhs : user_variable
5109 {
5110 /*%%%*/
5111 $$ = assignable(p, $1, 0, &@$);
5112 /*% %*/
5113 /*% ripper: assignable(p, var_field(p, $1)) %*/
5114 }
5115 | keyword_variable
5116 {
5117 /*%%%*/
5118 $$ = assignable(p, $1, 0, &@$);
5119 /*% %*/
5120 /*% ripper: assignable(p, var_field(p, $1)) %*/
5121 }
5122 ;
5123
5124backref : tNTH_REF
5125 | tBACK_REF
5126 ;
5127
5128superclass : '<'
5129 {
5130 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
5131 p->command_start = TRUE;
5132 }
5133 expr_value term
5134 {
5135 $$ = $3;
5136 }
5137 | /* none */
5138 {
5139 /*%%%*/
5140 $$ = 0;
5141 /*% %*/
5142 /*% ripper: Qnil %*/
5143 }
5144 ;
5145
5146f_opt_paren_args: f_paren_args
5147 | none
5148 {
5149 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 0;
5150 $$ = new_args_tail(p, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, &@0);
5151 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, $$, &@0);
5152 }
5153 ;
5154
5155f_paren_args : '(' f_args rparen
5156 {
5157 /*%%%*/
5158 $$ = $2;
5159 /*% %*/
5160 /*% ripper: paren!($2) %*/
5161 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
5162 p->command_start = TRUE;
5163 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 0;
5164 }
5165 ;
5166
5167f_arglist : f_paren_args
5168 | {
5169 $<ctxt>$ = p->ctxt;
5170 p->ctxt.in_kwarg = 1;
5171 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 1;
5172 SET_LEX_STATE(p->lex.state|EXPR_LABEL); /* force for args */
5173 }
5174 f_args term
5175 {
5176 p->ctxt.in_kwarg = $<ctxt>1.in_kwarg;
5177 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 0;
5178 $$ = $2;
5179 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
5180 p->command_start = TRUE;
5181 }
5182 ;
5183
5184args_tail : f_kwarg ',' f_kwrest opt_f_block_arg
5185 {
5186 $$ = new_args_tail(p, $1, $3, $4, &@3);
5187 }
5188 | f_kwarg opt_f_block_arg
5189 {
5190 $$ = new_args_tail(p, $1, Qnone, $2, &@1);
5191 }
5192 | f_any_kwrest opt_f_block_arg
5193 {
5194 $$ = new_args_tail(p, Qnone, $1, $2, &@1);
5195 }
5196 | f_block_arg
5197 {
5198 $$ = new_args_tail(p, Qnone, Qnone, $1, &@1);
5199 }
5200 | args_forward
5201 {
5202 add_forwarding_args(p);
5203 $$ = new_args_tail(p, Qnone, $1, ID2VAL(idFWD_BLOCK), &@1);
5204 }
5205 ;
5206
5207opt_args_tail : ',' args_tail
5208 {
5209 $$ = $2;
5210 }
5211 | /* none */
5212 {
5213 $$ = new_args_tail(p, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, &@0);
5214 }
5215 ;
5216
5217f_args : f_arg ',' f_optarg ',' f_rest_arg opt_args_tail
5218 {
5219 $$ = new_args(p, $1, $3, $5, Qnone, $6, &@$);
5220 }
5221 | f_arg ',' f_optarg ',' f_rest_arg ',' f_arg opt_args_tail
5222 {
5223 $$ = new_args(p, $1, $3, $5, $7, $8, &@$);
5224 }
5225 | f_arg ',' f_optarg opt_args_tail
5226 {
5227 $$ = new_args(p, $1, $3, Qnone, Qnone, $4, &@$);
5228 }
5229 | f_arg ',' f_optarg ',' f_arg opt_args_tail
5230 {
5231 $$ = new_args(p, $1, $3, Qnone, $5, $6, &@$);
5232 }
5233 | f_arg ',' f_rest_arg opt_args_tail
5234 {
5235 $$ = new_args(p, $1, Qnone, $3, Qnone, $4, &@$);
5236 }
5237 | f_arg ',' f_rest_arg ',' f_arg opt_args_tail
5238 {
5239 $$ = new_args(p, $1, Qnone, $3, $5, $6, &@$);
5240 }
5241 | f_arg opt_args_tail
5242 {
5243 $$ = new_args(p, $1, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, $2, &@$);
5244 }
5245 | f_optarg ',' f_rest_arg opt_args_tail
5246 {
5247 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, $1, $3, Qnone, $4, &@$);
5248 }
5249 | f_optarg ',' f_rest_arg ',' f_arg opt_args_tail
5250 {
5251 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, $1, $3, $5, $6, &@$);
5252 }
5253 | f_optarg opt_args_tail
5254 {
5255 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, $1, Qnone, Qnone, $2, &@$);
5256 }
5257 | f_optarg ',' f_arg opt_args_tail
5258 {
5259 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, $1, Qnone, $3, $4, &@$);
5260 }
5261 | f_rest_arg opt_args_tail
5262 {
5263 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, Qnone, $1, Qnone, $2, &@$);
5264 }
5265 | f_rest_arg ',' f_arg opt_args_tail
5266 {
5267 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, Qnone, $1, $3, $4, &@$);
5268 }
5269 | args_tail
5270 {
5271 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, $1, &@$);
5272 }
5273 | /* none */
5274 {
5275 $$ = new_args_tail(p, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, &@0);
5276 $$ = new_args(p, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, Qnone, $$, &@0);
5277 }
5278 ;

5282 /*%%%*/
5283 $$ = idFWD_KWREST;
5284 /*% %*/
5285 /*% ripper: args_forward! %*/
5286 }

5288
5289f_bad_arg : tCONSTANT
5290 {
5291 static const char mesg[] = "formal argument cannot be a constant";
5292 /*%%%*/
5293 yyerror1(&@1, mesg);
5294 $$ = 0;
5295 /*% %*/
5296 /*% ripper[error]: param_error!(ERR_MESG(), $1) %*/
5297 }
5298 | tIVAR
5299 {
5300 static const char mesg[] = "formal argument cannot be an instance variable";
5301 /*%%%*/
5302 yyerror1(&@1, mesg);
5303 $$ = 0;
5304 /*% %*/
5305 /*% ripper[error]: param_error!(ERR_MESG(), $1) %*/
5306 }
5307 | tGVAR
5308 {
5309 static const char mesg[] = "formal argument cannot be a global variable";
5310 /*%%%*/
5311 yyerror1(&@1, mesg);
5312 $$ = 0;
5313 /*% %*/
5314 /*% ripper[error]: param_error!(ERR_MESG(), $1) %*/
5315 }
5316 | tCVAR
5317 {
5318 static const char mesg[] = "formal argument cannot be a class variable";
5319 /*%%%*/
5320 yyerror1(&@1, mesg);
5321 $$ = 0;
5322 /*% %*/
5323 /*% ripper[error]: param_error!(ERR_MESG(), $1) %*/
5324 }
5325 ;
5326
5327f_norm_arg : f_bad_arg
5328 | tIDENTIFIER
5329 {
5330 formal_argument(p, $1);
5331 p->max_numparam = ORDINAL_PARAM;
5332 $$ = $1;
5333 }
5334 ;
5335
5336f_arg_asgn : f_norm_arg
5337 {
5338 ID id = get_id($1);
5339 arg_var(p, id);
5340 p->cur_arg = id;
5341 $$ = $1;
5342 }
5343 ;
5344
5345f_arg_item : f_arg_asgn
5346 {
5347 p->cur_arg = 0;
5348 /*%%%*/
5349 $$ = NEW_ARGS_AUX($1, 1, &NULL_LOC);
5350 /*% %*/
5351 /*% ripper: get_value($1) %*/
5352 }
5353 | tLPAREN f_margs rparen
5354 {
5355 /*%%%*/
5356 ID tid = internal_id(p);
5357 YYLTYPE loc;
5358 loc.beg_pos = @2.beg_pos;
5359 loc.end_pos = @2.beg_pos;
5360 arg_var(p, tid);
5361 if (dyna_in_block(p)) {
5362 $2->nd_value = NEW_DVAR(tid, &loc);
5363 }
5364 else {
5365 $2->nd_value = NEW_LVAR(tid, &loc);
5366 }
5367 $$ = NEW_ARGS_AUX(tid, 1, &NULL_LOC);
5368 $$->nd_next = $2;
5369 /*% %*/
5370 /*% ripper: mlhs_paren!($2) %*/
5371 }
5372 ;
5373
5374f_arg : f_arg_item
5375 /*% ripper[brace]: rb_ary_new3(1, get_value($1)) %*/
5376 | f_arg ',' f_arg_item
5377 {
5378 /*%%%*/
5379 $$ = $1;
5380 $$->nd_plen++;
5381 $$->nd_next = block_append(p, $$->nd_next, $3->nd_next);
5382 rb_discard_node(p, $3);
5383 /*% %*/
5384 /*% ripper: rb_ary_push($1, get_value($3)) %*/
5385 }
5386 ;
5387
5388
5389f_label : tLABEL
5390 {
5391 arg_var(p, formal_argument(p, $1));
5392 p->cur_arg = get_id($1);
5393 p->max_numparam = ORDINAL_PARAM;
5394 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 0;
5395 $$ = $1;
5396 }
5397 ;
5398
5399f_kw : f_label arg_value
5400 {
5401 p->cur_arg = 0;
5402 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 1;
5403 /*%%%*/
5404 $$ = new_kw_arg(p, assignable(p, $1, $2, &@$), &@$);
5405 /*% %*/
5406 /*% ripper: rb_assoc_new(get_value(assignable(p, $1)), get_value($2)) %*/
5407 }

5409 {
5410 p->cur_arg = 0;
5411 p->ctxt.in_argdef = 1;
5412 /*%%%*/
5413 $$ = new_kw_arg(p, assignable(p, $1, NODE_SPECIAL_REQUIRED_KEYWORD, &@$), &@$);
5414 /*% %*/
5415 /*% ripper: rb_assoc_new(get_value(assignable(p, $1)), 0) %*/
5416 }
5417 ;

5426 }

5489 }

5505 /*% %*/

5507 }

5605
5606singleton : var_ref
5607 {
5608 value_expr($1);
5609 $$ = $1;
5610 }
5611 | '(' {SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);} expr rparen
5612 {
5613 /*%%%*/
5614 switch (nd_type($3)) {
5615 case NODE_STR:
5616 case NODE_DSTR:
5617 case NODE_XSTR:
5618 case NODE_DXSTR:
5619 case NODE_DREGX:
5620 case NODE_LIT:
5621 case NODE_LIST:
5622 case NODE_ZLIST:
5623 yyerror1(&@3, "can't define singleton method for literals");
5624 break;
5625 default:
5626 value_expr($3);
5627 break;
5628 }
5629 $$ = $3;
5630 /*% %*/
5631 /*% ripper: paren!($3) %*/
5632 }
5633 ;
5634
5635assoc_list : none
5636 | assocs trailer
5637 {
5638 /*%%%*/
5639 $$ = $1;
5640 /*% %*/
5641 /*% ripper: assoclist_from_args!($1) %*/
5642 }
5643 ;
5644
5645assocs : assoc
5646 /*% ripper[brace]: rb_ary_new3(1, get_value($1)) %*/
5647 | assocs ',' assoc
5648 {
5649 /*%%%*/
5650 NODE *assocs = $1;
5651 NODE *tail = $3;
5652 if (!assocs) {
5653 assocs = tail;
5654 }
5655 else if (tail) {
5656 if (assocs->nd_head &&
5657 !tail->nd_head && nd_type_p(tail->nd_next, NODE_LIST) &&
5658 nd_type_p(tail->nd_next->nd_head, NODE_HASH)) {
5659 /* DSTAR */
5660 tail = tail->nd_next->nd_head->nd_head;
5661 }
5662 assocs = list_concat(assocs, tail);
5663 }
5664 $$ = assocs;
5665 /*% %*/
5666 /*% ripper: rb_ary_push($1, get_value($3)) %*/
5667 }
5668 ;
5669
5670assoc : arg_value tASSOC arg_value
5671 {
5672 /*%%%*/
5673 if (nd_type_p($1, NODE_STR)) {
5674 nd_set_type($1, NODE_LIT);
5675 RB_OBJ_WRITE(p->ast, &$1->nd_lit, rb_fstring($1->nd_lit));
5676 }
5677 $$ = list_append(p, NEW_LIST($1, &@$), $3);
5678 /*% %*/
5679 /*% ripper: assoc_new!($1, $3) %*/
5680 }
5681 | tLABEL arg_value
5682 {
5683 /*%%%*/
5684 $$ = list_append(p, NEW_LIST(NEW_LIT(ID2SYM($1), &@1), &@$), $2);
5685 /*% %*/
5686 /*% ripper: assoc_new!($1, $2) %*/
5687 }
5688 | tLABEL
5689 {
5690 /*%%%*/
5691 NODE *val = gettable(p, $1, &@$);
5692 if (!val) val = NEW_BEGIN(0, &@$);
5693 $$ = list_append(p, NEW_LIST(NEW_LIT(ID2SYM($1), &@1), &@$), val);
5694 /*% %*/
5695 /*% ripper: assoc_new!($1, Qnil) %*/
5696 }
5697 | tSTRING_BEG string_contents tLABEL_END arg_value
5698 {
5699 /*%%%*/
5700 YYLTYPE loc = code_loc_gen(&@1, &@3);
5701 $$ = list_append(p, NEW_LIST(dsym_node(p, $2, &loc), &loc), $4);
5702 /*% %*/
5703 /*% ripper: assoc_new!(dyna_symbol!($2), $4) %*/
5704 }
5705 | tDSTAR arg_value
5706 {
5707 /*%%%*/
5708 if (nd_type_p($2, NODE_HASH) &&
5709 !($2->nd_head && $2->nd_head->nd_alen)) {
5710 static VALUE empty_hash;
5711 if (!empty_hash) {
5712 empty_hash = rb_obj_freeze(rb_hash_new());
5713 rb_gc_register_mark_object(empty_hash);
5714 }
5715 $$ = list_append(p, NEW_LIST(0, &@$), NEW_LIT(empty_hash, &@$));
5716 }
5717 else
5718 $$ = list_append(p, NEW_LIST(0, &@$), $2);
5719 /*% %*/
5720 /*% ripper: assoc_splat!($2) %*/
5721 }
5722 | tDSTAR
5723 {
5724 /*%%%*/
5725 if (!local_id(p, ANON_KEYWORD_REST_ID)) {
5726 compile_error(p, "no anonymous keyword rest parameter");
5727 }
5728 $$ = list_append(p, NEW_LIST(0, &@$),
5729 NEW_LVAR(ANON_KEYWORD_REST_ID, &@$));
5730 /*% %*/
5731 /*% ripper: assoc_splat!(Qnil) %*/
5732 }
5733 ;
5734

5736 | tCONSTANT

5765opt_nl : /* none */
5766 | '\n'
5767 ;
5768
5769rparen : opt_nl ')'
5770 ;
5771
5772rbracket : opt_nl ']'
5773 ;
5774
5775rbrace : opt_nl '}'
5776 ;
5777
5778trailer : /* none */
5779 | '\n'
5780 | ','
5781 ;
5782
5783term : ';' {yyerrok;token_flush(p);}
5784 | '\n' {token_flush(p);}
5785 ;
5786
5787terms : term
5788 | terms ';' {yyerrok;}
5789 ;
5790
5791none : /* none */
5792 {
5793 $$ = Qnull;
5794 }
5795 ;
5796%%
5797# undef p
5798# undef yylex
5799# undef yylval
5800# define yylval (*p->lval)
5801
5802static int regx_options(struct parser_params*);
5803static int tokadd_string(struct parser_params*,int,int,int,long*,rb_encoding**,rb_encoding**);
5804static void tokaddmbc(struct parser_params *p, int c, rb_encoding *enc);
5805static enum yytokentype parse_string(struct parser_params*,rb_strterm_literal_t*);
5806static enum yytokentype here_document(struct parser_params*,rb_strterm_heredoc_t*);
5807
5808#ifndef RIPPER
5809# define set_yylval_node(x) { \
5810 YYLTYPE _cur_loc; \
5811 rb_parser_set_location(p, &_cur_loc); \
5812 yylval.node = (x); \
5813}
5814# define set_yylval_str(x) \
5815do { \
5816 set_yylval_node(NEW_STR(x, &_cur_loc)); \
5817 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, x); \
5818} while(0)
5819# define set_yylval_literal(x) \
5820do { \
5821 set_yylval_node(NEW_LIT(x, &_cur_loc)); \
5822 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, x); \
5823} while(0)
5824# define set_yylval_num(x) (yylval.num = (x))
5825# define set_yylval_id(x) (yylval.id = (x))
5826# define set_yylval_name(x) (yylval.id = (x))
5827# define yylval_id() (yylval.id)
5828#else
5829static inline VALUE
5830ripper_yylval_id(struct parser_params *p, ID x)
5831{
5832 return ripper_new_yylval(p, x, ID2SYM(x), 0);
5833}
5834# define set_yylval_str(x) (yylval.val = add_mark_object(p, (x)))
5835# define set_yylval_num(x) (yylval.val = ripper_new_yylval(p, (x), 0, 0))
5836# define set_yylval_id(x) (void)(x)
5837# define set_yylval_name(x) (void)(yylval.val = ripper_yylval_id(p, x))
5838# define set_yylval_literal(x) add_mark_object(p, (x))
5839# define set_yylval_node(x) (yylval.val = ripper_new_yylval(p, 0, 0, STR_NEW(p->lex.ptok, p->lex.pcur-p->lex.ptok)))
5840# define yylval_id() yylval.id
5841# define _cur_loc NULL_LOC /* dummy */
5842#endif
5843
5844#define set_yylval_noname() set_yylval_id(keyword_nil)
5845
5846#ifndef RIPPER
5847#define literal_flush(p, ptr) ((p)->lex.ptok = (ptr))
5848#define dispatch_scan_event(p, t) ((void)0)
5849#define dispatch_delayed_token(p, t) ((void)0)
5850#define has_delayed_token(p) (0)
5851#else
5852#define literal_flush(p, ptr) ((void)(ptr))
5853
5854#define yylval_rval (*(RB_TYPE_P(yylval.val, T_NODE) ? &yylval.node->nd_rval : &yylval.val))
5855
5856static inline VALUE
5857intern_sym(const char *name)
5858{
5859 ID id = rb_intern_const(name);
5860 return ID2SYM(id);
5861}
5862
5863static int
5864ripper_has_scan_event(struct parser_params *p)
5865{
5866 if (p->lex.pcur < p->lex.ptok) rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "lex.pcur < lex.ptok");
5867 return p->lex.pcur > p->lex.ptok;
5868}
5869
5870static VALUE
5871ripper_scan_event_val(struct parser_params *p, enum yytokentype t)
5872{
5873 VALUE str = STR_NEW(p->lex.ptok, p->lex.pcur - p->lex.ptok);
5874 VALUE rval = ripper_dispatch1(p, ripper_token2eventid(t), str);
5875 token_flush(p);
5876 return rval;
5877}
5878
5879static void
5880ripper_dispatch_scan_event(struct parser_params *p, enum yytokentype t)
5881{
5882 if (!ripper_has_scan_event(p)) return;
5883 add_mark_object(p, yylval_rval = ripper_scan_event_val(p, t));
5884}
5885#define dispatch_scan_event(p, t) ripper_dispatch_scan_event(p, t)
5886
5887static void
5888ripper_dispatch_delayed_token(struct parser_params *p, enum yytokentype t)
5889{
5890 int saved_line = p->ruby_sourceline;
5891 const char *saved_tokp = p->lex.ptok;
5892
5893 if (NIL_P(p->delayed.token)) return;
5894 p->ruby_sourceline = p->delayed.line;
5895 p->lex.ptok = p->lex.pbeg + p->delayed.col;
5896 add_mark_object(p, yylval_rval = ripper_dispatch1(p, ripper_token2eventid(t), p->delayed.token));
5897 p->delayed.token = Qnil;
5898 p->ruby_sourceline = saved_line;
5899 p->lex.ptok = saved_tokp;
5900}
5901#define dispatch_delayed_token(p, t) ripper_dispatch_delayed_token(p, t)
5902#define has_delayed_token(p) (!NIL_P(p->delayed.token))
5903#endif /* RIPPER */
5904
5905static inline int
5906is_identchar(const char *ptr, const char *MAYBE_UNUSED(ptr_end), rb_encoding *enc)
5907{
5908 return rb_enc_isalnum((unsigned char)*ptr, enc) || *ptr == '_' || !ISASCII(*ptr);
5909}
5910
5911static inline int
5912parser_is_identchar(struct parser_params *p)
5913{
5914 return !(p)->eofp && is_identchar(p->lex.pcur-1, p->lex.pend, p->enc);
5915}
5916
5917static inline int
5918parser_isascii(struct parser_params *p)
5919{
5920 return ISASCII(*(p->lex.pcur-1));
5921}
5922
5923static void
5924token_info_setup(token_info *ptinfo, const char *ptr, const rb_code_location_t *loc)
5925{
5926 int column = 1, nonspc = 0, i;
5927 for (i = 0; i < loc->beg_pos.column; i++, ptr++) {
5928 if (*ptr == '\t') {
5929 column = (((column - 1) / TAB_WIDTH) + 1) * TAB_WIDTH;
5930 }
5931 column++;
5932 if (*ptr != ' ' && *ptr != '\t') {
5933 nonspc = 1;
5934 }
5935 }
5936
5937 ptinfo->beg = loc->beg_pos;
5938 ptinfo->indent = column;
5939 ptinfo->nonspc = nonspc;
5940}
5941
5942static void
5943token_info_push(struct parser_params *p, const char *token, const rb_code_location_t *loc)
5944{
5945 token_info *ptinfo;
5946
5947 if (!p->token_info_enabled) return;
5948 ptinfo = ALLOC(token_info);
5949 ptinfo->token = token;
5950 ptinfo->next = p->token_info;
5951 token_info_setup(ptinfo, p->lex.pbeg, loc);
5952
5953 p->token_info = ptinfo;
5954}
5955
5956static void
5957token_info_pop(struct parser_params *p, const char *token, const rb_code_location_t *loc)
5958{
5959 token_info *ptinfo_beg = p->token_info;
5960
5961 if (!ptinfo_beg) return;
5962 p->token_info = ptinfo_beg->next;
5963
5964 /* indentation check of matched keywords (begin..end, if..end, etc.) */
5965 token_info_warn(p, token, ptinfo_beg, 1, loc);
5966 ruby_sized_xfree(ptinfo_beg, sizeof(*ptinfo_beg));
5967}
5968
5969static void
5970token_info_drop(struct parser_params *p, const char *token, rb_code_position_t beg_pos)
5971{
5972 token_info *ptinfo_beg = p->token_info;
5973
5974 if (!ptinfo_beg) return;
5975 p->token_info = ptinfo_beg->next;
5976
5977 if (ptinfo_beg->beg.lineno != beg_pos.lineno ||
5978 ptinfo_beg->beg.column != beg_pos.column ||
5979 strcmp(ptinfo_beg->token, token)) {
5980 compile_error(p, "token position mismatch: %d:%d:%s expected but %d:%d:%s",
5981 beg_pos.lineno, beg_pos.column, token,
5982 ptinfo_beg->beg.lineno, ptinfo_beg->beg.column,
5983 ptinfo_beg->token);
5984 }
5985
5986 ruby_sized_xfree(ptinfo_beg, sizeof(*ptinfo_beg));
5987}
5988
5989static void
5990token_info_warn(struct parser_params *p, const char *token, token_info *ptinfo_beg, int same, const rb_code_location_t *loc)
5991{
5992 token_info ptinfo_end_body, *ptinfo_end = &ptinfo_end_body;
5993 if (!p->token_info_enabled) return;
5994 if (!ptinfo_beg) return;
5995 token_info_setup(ptinfo_end, p->lex.pbeg, loc);
5996 if (ptinfo_beg->beg.lineno == ptinfo_end->beg.lineno) return; /* ignore one-line block */
5997 if (ptinfo_beg->nonspc || ptinfo_end->nonspc) return; /* ignore keyword in the middle of a line */
5998 if (ptinfo_beg->indent == ptinfo_end->indent) return; /* the indents are matched */
5999 if (!same && ptinfo_beg->indent < ptinfo_end->indent) return;
6000 rb_warn3L(ptinfo_end->beg.lineno,
6001 "mismatched indentations at '%s' with '%s' at %d",
6002 WARN_S(token), WARN_S(ptinfo_beg->token), WARN_I(ptinfo_beg->beg.lineno));
6003}
6004
6005static int
6006parser_precise_mbclen(struct parser_params *p, const char *ptr)
6007{
6008 int len = rb_enc_precise_mbclen(ptr, p->lex.pend, p->enc);
6009 if (!MBCLEN_CHARFOUND_P(len)) {
6010 compile_error(p, "invalid multibyte char (%s)", rb_enc_name(p->enc));
6011 return -1;
6012 }
6013 return len;
6014}
6015
6016#ifndef RIPPER
6017static void ruby_show_error_line(VALUE errbuf, const YYLTYPE *yylloc, int lineno, VALUE str);
6018
6019static inline void
6020parser_show_error_line(struct parser_params *p, const YYLTYPE *yylloc)
6021{
6022 VALUE str;
6023 int lineno = p->ruby_sourceline;
6024 if (!yylloc) {
6025 return;
6026 }
6027 else if (yylloc->beg_pos.lineno == lineno) {
6028 str = p->lex.lastline;
6029 }
6030 else {
6031 return;
6032 }
6033 ruby_show_error_line(p->error_buffer, yylloc, lineno, str);
6034}
6035
6036static int
6037parser_yyerror(struct parser_params *p, const YYLTYPE *yylloc, const char *msg)
6038{
6039#if 0
6040 YYLTYPE current;
6041
6042 if (!yylloc) {
6043 yylloc = RUBY_SET_YYLLOC(current);
6044 }
6045 else if ((p->ruby_sourceline != yylloc->beg_pos.lineno &&
6046 p->ruby_sourceline != yylloc->end_pos.lineno)) {
6047 yylloc = 0;
6048 }
6049#endif
6050 compile_error(p, "%s", msg);
6051 parser_show_error_line(p, yylloc);
6052 return 0;
6053}
6054
6055static int
6056parser_yyerror0(struct parser_params *p, const char *msg)
6057{
6058 YYLTYPE current;
6059 return parser_yyerror(p, RUBY_SET_YYLLOC(current), msg);
6060}
6061
6062static void
6063ruby_show_error_line(VALUE errbuf, const YYLTYPE *yylloc, int lineno, VALUE str)
6064{
6065 VALUE mesg;
6066 const int max_line_margin = 30;
6067 const char *ptr, *ptr_end, *pt, *pb;
6068 const char *pre = "", *post = "", *pend;
6069 const char *code = "", *caret = "";
6070 const char *lim;
6071 const char *const pbeg = RSTRING_PTR(str);
6072 char *buf;
6073 long len;
6074 int i;
6075
6076 if (!yylloc) return;
6077 pend = RSTRING_END(str);
6078 if (pend > pbeg && pend[-1] == '\n') {
6079 if (--pend > pbeg && pend[-1] == '\r') --pend;
6080 }
6081
6082 pt = pend;
6083 if (lineno == yylloc->end_pos.lineno &&
6084 (pend - pbeg) > yylloc->end_pos.column) {
6085 pt = pbeg + yylloc->end_pos.column;
6086 }
6087
6088 ptr = ptr_end = pt;
6089 lim = ptr - pbeg > max_line_margin ? ptr - max_line_margin : pbeg;
6090 while ((lim < ptr) && (*(ptr-1) != '\n')) ptr--;
6091
6092 lim = pend - ptr_end > max_line_margin ? ptr_end + max_line_margin : pend;
6093 while ((ptr_end < lim) && (*ptr_end != '\n') && (*ptr_end != '\r')) ptr_end++;
6094
6095 len = ptr_end - ptr;
6096 if (len > 4) {
6097 if (ptr > pbeg) {
6098 ptr = rb_enc_prev_char(pbeg, ptr, pt, rb_enc_get(str));
6099 if (ptr > pbeg) pre = "...";
6100 }
6101 if (ptr_end < pend) {
6102 ptr_end = rb_enc_prev_char(pt, ptr_end, pend, rb_enc_get(str));
6103 if (ptr_end < pend) post = "...";
6104 }
6105 }
6106 pb = pbeg;
6107 if (lineno == yylloc->beg_pos.lineno) {
6108 pb += yylloc->beg_pos.column;
6109 if (pb > pt) pb = pt;
6110 }
6111 if (pb < ptr) pb = ptr;
6112 if (len <= 4 && yylloc->beg_pos.lineno == yylloc->end_pos.lineno) {
6113 return;
6114 }
6115 if (RTEST(errbuf)) {
6116 mesg = rb_attr_get(errbuf, idMesg);
6117 if (RSTRING_LEN(mesg) > 0 && *(RSTRING_END(mesg)-1) != '\n')
6118 rb_str_cat_cstr(mesg, "\n");
6119 }
6120 else {
6121 mesg = rb_enc_str_new(0, 0, rb_enc_get(str));
6122 }
6123 if (!errbuf && rb_stderr_tty_p()) {
6124#define CSI_BEGIN "\033["
6125#define CSI_SGR "m"
6126 rb_str_catf(mesg,
6127 CSI_BEGIN""CSI_SGR"%s" /* pre */
6128 CSI_BEGIN"1"CSI_SGR"%.*s"
6129 CSI_BEGIN"1;4"CSI_SGR"%.*s"
6130 CSI_BEGIN";1"CSI_SGR"%.*s"
6131 CSI_BEGIN""CSI_SGR"%s" /* post */
6132 "\n",
6133 pre,
6134 (int)(pb - ptr), ptr,
6135 (int)(pt - pb), pb,
6136 (int)(ptr_end - pt), pt,
6137 post);
6138 }
6139 else {
6140 char *p2;
6141
6142 len = ptr_end - ptr;
6143 lim = pt < pend ? pt : pend;
6144 i = (int)(lim - ptr);
6145 buf = ALLOCA_N(char, i+2);
6146 code = ptr;
6147 caret = p2 = buf;
6148 if (ptr <= pb) {
6149 while (ptr < pb) {
6150 *p2++ = *ptr++ == '\t' ? '\t' : ' ';
6151 }
6152 *p2++ = '^';
6153 ptr++;
6154 }
6155 if (lim > ptr) {
6156 memset(p2, '~', (lim - ptr));
6157 p2 += (lim - ptr);
6158 }
6159 *p2 = '\0';
6160 rb_str_catf(mesg, "%s%.*s%s\n""%s%s\n",
6161 pre, (int)len, code, post,
6162 pre, caret);
6163 }
6164 if (!errbuf) rb_write_error_str(mesg);
6165}
6166#else
6167static int
6168parser_yyerror(struct parser_params *p, const YYLTYPE *yylloc, const char *msg)
6169{
6170 const char *pcur = 0, *ptok = 0;
6171 if (p->ruby_sourceline == yylloc->beg_pos.lineno &&
6172 p->ruby_sourceline == yylloc->end_pos.lineno) {
6173 pcur = p->lex.pcur;
6174 ptok = p->lex.ptok;
6175 p->lex.ptok = p->lex.pbeg + yylloc->beg_pos.column;
6176 p->lex.pcur = p->lex.pbeg + yylloc->end_pos.column;
6177 }
6178 parser_yyerror0(p, msg);
6179 if (pcur) {
6180 p->lex.ptok = ptok;
6181 p->lex.pcur = pcur;
6182 }
6183 return 0;
6184}
6185
6186static int
6187parser_yyerror0(struct parser_params *p, const char *msg)
6188{
6189 dispatch1(parse_error, STR_NEW2(msg));
6190 ripper_error(p);
6191 return 0;
6192}
6193
6194static inline void
6195parser_show_error_line(struct parser_params *p, const YYLTYPE *yylloc)
6196{
6197}
6198#endif /* !RIPPER */
6199
6200#ifndef RIPPER
6201static int
6202vtable_size(const struct vtable *tbl)
6203{
6204 if (!DVARS_TERMINAL_P(tbl)) {
6205 return tbl->pos;
6206 }
6207 else {
6208 return 0;
6209 }
6210}
6211#endif
6212
6213static struct vtable *
6214vtable_alloc_gen(struct parser_params *p, int line, struct vtable *prev)
6215{
6216 struct vtable *tbl = ALLOC(struct vtable);
6217 tbl->pos = 0;
6218 tbl->capa = 8;
6219 tbl->tbl = ALLOC_N(ID, tbl->capa);
6220 tbl->prev = prev;
6221#ifndef RIPPER
6222 if (p->debug) {
6223 rb_parser_printf(p, "vtable_alloc:%d: %p\n", line, (void *)tbl);
6224 }
6225#endif
6226 return tbl;
6227}
6228#define vtable_alloc(prev) vtable_alloc_gen(p, __LINE__, prev)
6229
6230static void
6231vtable_free_gen(struct parser_params *p, int line, const char *name,
6232 struct vtable *tbl)
6233{
6234#ifndef RIPPER
6235 if (p->debug) {
6236 rb_parser_printf(p, "vtable_free:%d: %s(%p)\n", line, name, (void *)tbl);
6237 }
6238#endif
6239 if (!DVARS_TERMINAL_P(tbl)) {
6240 if (tbl->tbl) {
6241 ruby_sized_xfree(tbl->tbl, tbl->capa * sizeof(ID));
6242 }
6243 ruby_sized_xfree(tbl, sizeof(*tbl));
6244 }
6245}
6246#define vtable_free(tbl) vtable_free_gen(p, __LINE__, #tbl, tbl)
6247
6248static void
6249vtable_add_gen(struct parser_params *p, int line, const char *name,
6250 struct vtable *tbl, ID id)
6251{
6252#ifndef RIPPER
6253 if (p->debug) {
6254 rb_parser_printf(p, "vtable_add:%d: %s(%p), %s\n",
6255 line, name, (void *)tbl, rb_id2name(id));
6256 }
6257#endif
6258 if (DVARS_TERMINAL_P(tbl)) {
6259 rb_parser_fatal(p, "vtable_add: vtable is not allocated (%p)", (void *)tbl);
6260 return;
6261 }
6262 if (tbl->pos == tbl->capa) {
6263 tbl->capa = tbl->capa * 2;
6264 SIZED_REALLOC_N(tbl->tbl, ID, tbl->capa, tbl->pos);
6265 }
6266 tbl->tbl[tbl->pos++] = id;
6267}
6268#define vtable_add(tbl, id) vtable_add_gen(p, __LINE__, #tbl, tbl, id)
6269
6270#ifndef RIPPER
6271static void
6272vtable_pop_gen(struct parser_params *p, int line, const char *name,
6273 struct vtable *tbl, int n)
6274{
6275 if (p->debug) {
6276 rb_parser_printf(p, "vtable_pop:%d: %s(%p), %d\n",
6277 line, name, (void *)tbl, n);
6278 }
6279 if (tbl->pos < n) {
6280 rb_parser_fatal(p, "vtable_pop: unreachable (%d < %d)", tbl->pos, n);
6281 return;
6282 }
6283 tbl->pos -= n;
6284}
6285#define vtable_pop(tbl, n) vtable_pop_gen(p, __LINE__, #tbl, tbl, n)
6286#endif
6287
6288static int
6289vtable_included(const struct vtable * tbl, ID id)
6290{
6291 int i;
6292
6293 if (!DVARS_TERMINAL_P(tbl)) {
6294 for (i = 0; i < tbl->pos; i++) {
6295 if (tbl->tbl[i] == id) {
6296 return i+1;
6297 }
6298 }
6299 }
6300 return 0;
6301}
6302
6303static void parser_prepare(struct parser_params *p);
6304
6305#ifndef RIPPER
6306static NODE *parser_append_options(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node);
6307
6308static VALUE
6309debug_lines(VALUE fname)
6310{
6311 ID script_lines;
6312 CONST_ID(script_lines, "SCRIPT_LINES__");
6313 if (rb_const_defined_at(rb_cObject, script_lines)) {
6314 VALUE hash = rb_const_get_at(rb_cObject, script_lines);
6315 if (RB_TYPE_P(hash, T_HASH)) {
6316 VALUE lines = rb_ary_new();
6317 rb_hash_aset(hash, fname, lines);
6318 return lines;
6319 }
6320 }
6321 return 0;
6322}
6323
6324static int
6325e_option_supplied(struct parser_params *p)
6326{
6327 return strcmp(p->ruby_sourcefile, "-e") == 0;
6328}
6329
6330static VALUE
6331yycompile0(VALUE arg)
6332{
6333 int n;
6334 NODE *tree;
6335 struct parser_params *p = (struct parser_params *)arg;
6336 VALUE cov = Qfalse;
6337
6338 if (!compile_for_eval && !NIL_P(p->ruby_sourcefile_string)) {
6339 p->debug_lines = debug_lines(p->ruby_sourcefile_string);
6340 if (p->debug_lines && p->ruby_sourceline > 0) {
6341 VALUE str = rb_default_rs;
6342 n = p->ruby_sourceline;
6343 do {
6344 rb_ary_push(p->debug_lines, str);
6345 } while (--n);
6346 }
6347
6348 if (!e_option_supplied(p)) {
6349 cov = Qtrue;
6350 }
6351 }
6352
6353 if (p->keep_script_lines || ruby_vm_keep_script_lines) {
6354 if (!p->debug_lines) {
6355 p->debug_lines = rb_ary_new();
6356 }
6357
6358 RB_OBJ_WRITE(p->ast, &p->ast->body.script_lines, p->debug_lines);
6359 }
6360
6361 parser_prepare(p);
6362#define RUBY_DTRACE_PARSE_HOOK(name) \
6363 if (RUBY_DTRACE_PARSE_##name##_ENABLED()) { \
6364 RUBY_DTRACE_PARSE_##name(p->ruby_sourcefile, p->ruby_sourceline); \
6365 }
6366 RUBY_DTRACE_PARSE_HOOK(BEGIN);
6367 n = yyparse(p);
6368 RUBY_DTRACE_PARSE_HOOK(END);
6369 p->debug_lines = 0;
6370
6371 p->lex.strterm = 0;
6372 p->lex.pcur = p->lex.pbeg = p->lex.pend = 0;
6373 p->lex.prevline = p->lex.lastline = p->lex.nextline = 0;
6374 if (n || p->error_p) {
6375 VALUE mesg = p->error_buffer;
6376 if (!mesg) {
6377 mesg = rb_class_new_instance(0, 0, rb_eSyntaxError);
6378 }
6379 rb_set_errinfo(mesg);
6380 return FALSE;
6381 }
6382 tree = p->eval_tree;
6383 if (!tree) {
6384 tree = NEW_NIL(&NULL_LOC);
6385 }
6386 else {
6387 VALUE opt = p->compile_option;
6388 NODE *prelude;
6389 NODE *body = parser_append_options(p, tree->nd_body);
6390 if (!opt) opt = rb_obj_hide(rb_ident_hash_new());
6391 rb_hash_aset(opt, rb_sym_intern_ascii_cstr("coverage_enabled"), cov);
6392 prelude = block_append(p, p->eval_tree_begin, body);
6393 tree->nd_body = prelude;
6394 RB_OBJ_WRITE(p->ast, &p->ast->body.compile_option, opt);
6395 }
6396 p->ast->body.root = tree;
6397 if (!p->ast->body.script_lines) p->ast->body.script_lines = INT2FIX(p->line_count);
6398 return TRUE;
6399}
6400
6401static rb_ast_t *
6402yycompile(VALUE vparser, struct parser_params *p, VALUE fname, int line)
6403{
6404 rb_ast_t *ast;
6405 if (NIL_P(fname)) {
6406 p->ruby_sourcefile_string = Qnil;
6407 p->ruby_sourcefile = "(none)";
6408 }
6409 else {
6410 p->ruby_sourcefile_string = rb_fstring(fname);
6411 p->ruby_sourcefile = StringValueCStr(fname);
6412 }
6413 p->ruby_sourceline = line - 1;
6414
6415 p->lvtbl = NULL;
6416
6417 p->ast = ast = rb_ast_new();
6418 rb_suppress_tracing(yycompile0, (VALUE)p);
6419 p->ast = 0;
6420 RB_GC_GUARD(vparser); /* prohibit tail call optimization */
6421
6422 while (p->lvtbl) {
6423 local_pop(p);
6424 }
6425
6426 return ast;
6427}
6428#endif /* !RIPPER */
6429
6430static rb_encoding *
6431must_be_ascii_compatible(VALUE s)
6432{
6433 rb_encoding *enc = rb_enc_get(s);
6434 if (!rb_enc_asciicompat(enc)) {
6435 rb_raise(rb_eArgError, "invalid source encoding");
6436 }
6437 return enc;
6438}
6439
6440static VALUE
6441lex_get_str(struct parser_params *p, VALUE s)
6442{
6443 char *beg, *end, *start;
6444 long len;
6445
6446 beg = RSTRING_PTR(s);
6447 len = RSTRING_LEN(s);
6448 start = beg;
6449 if (p->lex.gets_.ptr) {
6450 if (len == p->lex.gets_.ptr) return Qnil;
6451 beg += p->lex.gets_.ptr;
6452 len -= p->lex.gets_.ptr;
6453 }
6454 end = memchr(beg, '\n', len);
6455 if (end) len = ++end - beg;
6456 p->lex.gets_.ptr += len;
6457 return rb_str_subseq(s, beg - start, len);
6458}
6459
6460static VALUE
6461lex_getline(struct parser_params *p)
6462{
6463 VALUE line = (*p->lex.gets)(p, p->lex.input);
6464 if (NIL_P(line)) return line;
6465 must_be_ascii_compatible(line);
6466 if (RB_OBJ_FROZEN(line)) line = rb_str_dup(line); // needed for RubyVM::AST.of because script_lines in iseq is deep-frozen
6467#ifndef RIPPER
6468 if (p->debug_lines) {
6469 rb_enc_associate(line, p->enc);
6470 rb_ary_push(p->debug_lines, line);
6471 }
6472#endif
6473 p->line_count++;
6474 return line;
6475}
6476
6477static const rb_data_type_t parser_data_type;
6478
6479#ifndef RIPPER
6480static rb_ast_t*
6481parser_compile_string(VALUE vparser, VALUE fname, VALUE s, int line)
6482{
6483 struct parser_params *p;
6484
6485 TypedData_Get_Struct(vparser, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
6486
6487 p->lex.gets = lex_get_str;
6488 p->lex.gets_.ptr = 0;
6489 p->lex.input = rb_str_new_frozen(s);
6490 p->lex.pbeg = p->lex.pcur = p->lex.pend = 0;
6491
6492 return yycompile(vparser, p, fname, line);
6493}
6494
6495rb_ast_t*
6496rb_parser_compile_string(VALUE vparser, const char *f, VALUE s, int line)
6497{
6498 return rb_parser_compile_string_path(vparser, rb_filesystem_str_new_cstr(f), s, line);
6499}
6500
6501rb_ast_t*
6502rb_parser_compile_string_path(VALUE vparser, VALUE f, VALUE s, int line)
6503{
6504 must_be_ascii_compatible(s);
6505 return parser_compile_string(vparser, f, s, line);
6506}
6507
6508VALUE rb_io_gets_internal(VALUE io);
6509
6510static VALUE
6511lex_io_gets(struct parser_params *p, VALUE io)
6512{
6513 return rb_io_gets_internal(io);
6514}
6515
6516rb_ast_t*
6517rb_parser_compile_file_path(VALUE vparser, VALUE fname, VALUE file, int start)
6518{
6519 struct parser_params *p;
6520
6521 TypedData_Get_Struct(vparser, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
6522
6523 p->lex.gets = lex_io_gets;
6524 p->lex.input = file;
6525 p->lex.pbeg = p->lex.pcur = p->lex.pend = 0;
6526
6527 return yycompile(vparser, p, fname, start);
6528}
6529
6530static VALUE
6531lex_generic_gets(struct parser_params *p, VALUE input)
6532{
6533 return (*p->lex.gets_.call)(input, p->line_count);
6534}
6535
6536rb_ast_t*
6537rb_parser_compile_generic(VALUE vparser, VALUE (*lex_gets)(VALUE, int), VALUE fname, VALUE input, int start)
6538{
6539 struct parser_params *p;
6540
6541 TypedData_Get_Struct(vparser, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
6542
6543 p->lex.gets = lex_generic_gets;
6544 p->lex.gets_.call = lex_gets;
6545 p->lex.input = input;
6546 p->lex.pbeg = p->lex.pcur = p->lex.pend = 0;
6547
6548 return yycompile(vparser, p, fname, start);
6549}
6550#endif /* !RIPPER */
6551
6552#define STR_FUNC_ESCAPE 0x01
6553#define STR_FUNC_EXPAND 0x02
6554#define STR_FUNC_REGEXP 0x04
6555#define STR_FUNC_QWORDS 0x08
6556#define STR_FUNC_SYMBOL 0x10
6557#define STR_FUNC_INDENT 0x20
6558#define STR_FUNC_LABEL 0x40
6559#define STR_FUNC_LIST 0x4000
6560#define STR_FUNC_TERM 0x8000
6561
6562enum string_type {
6563 str_label = STR_FUNC_LABEL,
6564 str_squote = (0),
6565 str_dquote = (STR_FUNC_EXPAND),
6566 str_xquote = (STR_FUNC_EXPAND),
6567 str_regexp = (STR_FUNC_REGEXP|STR_FUNC_ESCAPE|STR_FUNC_EXPAND),
6568 str_sword = (STR_FUNC_QWORDS|STR_FUNC_LIST),
6569 str_dword = (STR_FUNC_QWORDS|STR_FUNC_EXPAND|STR_FUNC_LIST),
6570 str_ssym = (STR_FUNC_SYMBOL),
6571 str_dsym = (STR_FUNC_SYMBOL|STR_FUNC_EXPAND)
6572};
6573
6574static VALUE
6575parser_str_new(const char *ptr, long len, rb_encoding *enc, int func, rb_encoding *enc0)
6576{
6577 VALUE str;
6578
6579 str = rb_enc_str_new(ptr, len, enc);
6580 if (!(func & STR_FUNC_REGEXP) && rb_enc_asciicompat(enc)) {
6581 if (rb_enc_str_coderange(str) == ENC_CODERANGE_7BIT) {
6582 }
6583 else if (enc0 == rb_usascii_encoding() && enc != rb_utf8_encoding()) {
6584 rb_enc_associate(str, rb_ascii8bit_encoding());
6585 }
6586 }
6587
6588 return str;
6589}
6590
6591#define lex_goto_eol(p) ((p)->lex.pcur = (p)->lex.pend)
6592#define lex_eol_p(p) ((p)->lex.pcur >= (p)->lex.pend)
6593#define lex_eol_n_p(p,n) ((p)->lex.pcur+(n) >= (p)->lex.pend)
6594#define peek(p,c) peek_n(p, (c), 0)
6595#define peek_n(p,c,n) (!lex_eol_n_p(p, n) && (c) == (unsigned char)(p)->lex.pcur[n])
6596#define peekc(p) peekc_n(p, 0)
6597#define peekc_n(p,n) (lex_eol_n_p(p, n) ? -1 : (unsigned char)(p)->lex.pcur[n])
6598
6599#ifdef RIPPER
6600static void
6601add_delayed_token(struct parser_params *p, const char *tok, const char *end)
6602{
6603 if (tok < end) {
6604 if (!has_delayed_token(p)) {
6605 p->delayed.token = rb_str_buf_new(end - tok);
6606 rb_enc_associate(p->delayed.token, p->enc);
6607 p->delayed.line = p->ruby_sourceline;
6608 p->delayed.col = rb_long2int(tok - p->lex.pbeg);
6609 }
6610 rb_str_buf_cat(p->delayed.token, tok, end - tok);
6611 p->lex.ptok = end;
6612 }
6613}
6614#else
6615#define add_delayed_token(p, tok, end) ((void)(tok), (void)(end))
6616#endif
6617
6618static int
6619nextline(struct parser_params *p)
6620{
6621 VALUE v = p->lex.nextline;
6622 p->lex.nextline = 0;
6623 if (!v) {
6624 if (p->eofp)
6625 return -1;
6626
6627 if (p->lex.pend > p->lex.pbeg && *(p->lex.pend-1) != '\n') {
6628 goto end_of_input;
6629 }
6630
6631 if (!p->lex.input || NIL_P(v = lex_getline(p))) {
6632 end_of_input:
6633 p->eofp = 1;
6634 lex_goto_eol(p);
6635 return -1;
6636 }
6637 p->cr_seen = FALSE;
6638 }
6639 else if (NIL_P(v)) {
6640 /* after here-document without terminator */
6641 goto end_of_input;
6642 }
6643 add_delayed_token(p, p->lex.ptok, p->lex.pend);
6644 if (p->heredoc_end > 0) {
6645 p->ruby_sourceline = p->heredoc_end;
6646 p->heredoc_end = 0;
6647 }
6648 p->ruby_sourceline++;
6649 p->lex.pbeg = p->lex.pcur = RSTRING_PTR(v);
6650 p->lex.pend = p->lex.pcur + RSTRING_LEN(v);
6651 token_flush(p);
6652 p->lex.prevline = p->lex.lastline;
6653 p->lex.lastline = v;
6654 return 0;
6655}
6656
6657static int
6658parser_cr(struct parser_params *p, int c)
6659{
6660 if (peek(p, '\n')) {
6661 p->lex.pcur++;
6662 c = '\n';
6663 }
6664 return c;
6665}
6666
6667static inline int
6668nextc(struct parser_params *p)
6669{
6670 int c;
6671
6672 if (UNLIKELY((p->lex.pcur == p->lex.pend) || p->eofp || RTEST(p->lex.nextline))) {
6673 if (nextline(p)) return -1;
6674 }
6675 c = (unsigned char)*p->lex.pcur++;
6676 if (UNLIKELY(c == '\r')) {
6677 c = parser_cr(p, c);
6678 }
6679
6680 return c;
6681}
6682
6683static void
6684pushback(struct parser_params *p, int c)
6685{
6686 if (c == -1) return;
6687 p->lex.pcur--;
6688 if (p->lex.pcur > p->lex.pbeg && p->lex.pcur[0] == '\n' && p->lex.pcur[-1] == '\r') {
6689 p->lex.pcur--;
6690 }
6691}
6692
6693#define was_bol(p) ((p)->lex.pcur == (p)->lex.pbeg + 1)
6694
6695#define tokfix(p) ((p)->tokenbuf[(p)->tokidx]='\0')
6696#define tok(p) (p)->tokenbuf
6697#define toklen(p) (p)->tokidx
6698
6699static int
6700looking_at_eol_p(struct parser_params *p)
6701{
6702 const char *ptr = p->lex.pcur;
6703 while (ptr < p->lex.pend) {
6704 int c = (unsigned char)*ptr++;
6705 int eol = (c == '\n' || c == '#');
6706 if (eol || !ISSPACE(c)) {
6707 return eol;
6708 }
6709 }
6710 return TRUE;
6711}
6712
6713static char*
6714newtok(struct parser_params *p)
6715{
6716 p->tokidx = 0;
6717 p->tokline = p->ruby_sourceline;
6718 if (!p->tokenbuf) {
6719 p->toksiz = 60;
6720 p->tokenbuf = ALLOC_N(char, 60);
6721 }
6722 if (p->toksiz > 4096) {
6723 p->toksiz = 60;
6724 REALLOC_N(p->tokenbuf, char, 60);
6725 }
6726 return p->tokenbuf;
6727}
6728
6729static char *
6730tokspace(struct parser_params *p, int n)
6731{
6732 p->tokidx += n;
6733
6734 if (p->tokidx >= p->toksiz) {
6735 do {p->toksiz *= 2;} while (p->toksiz < p->tokidx);
6736 REALLOC_N(p->tokenbuf, char, p->toksiz);
6737 }
6738 return &p->tokenbuf[p->tokidx-n];
6739}
6740
6741static void
6742tokadd(struct parser_params *p, int c)
6743{
6744 p->tokenbuf[p->tokidx++] = (char)c;
6745 if (p->tokidx >= p->toksiz) {
6746 p->toksiz *= 2;
6747 REALLOC_N(p->tokenbuf, char, p->toksiz);
6748 }
6749}
6750
6751static int
6752tok_hex(struct parser_params *p, size_t *numlen)
6753{
6754 int c;
6755
6756 c = scan_hex(p->lex.pcur, 2, numlen);
6757 if (!*numlen) {
6758 yyerror0("invalid hex escape");
6759 token_flush(p);
6760 return 0;
6761 }
6762 p->lex.pcur += *numlen;
6763 return c;
6764}
6765
6766#define tokcopy(p, n) memcpy(tokspace(p, n), (p)->lex.pcur - (n), (n))
6767
6768static int
6769escaped_control_code(int c)
6770{
6771 int c2 = 0;
6772 switch (c) {
6773 case ' ':
6774 c2 = 's';
6775 break;
6776 case '\n':
6777 c2 = 'n';
6778 break;
6779 case '\t':
6780 c2 = 't';
6781 break;
6782 case '\v':
6783 c2 = 'v';
6784 break;
6785 case '\r':
6786 c2 = 'r';
6787 break;
6788 case '\f':
6789 c2 = 'f';
6790 break;
6791 }
6792 return c2;
6793}
6794
6795#define WARN_SPACE_CHAR(c, prefix) \
6796 rb_warn1("invalid character syntax; use "prefix"\\%c", WARN_I(c2))
6797
6798static int
6799tokadd_codepoint(struct parser_params *p, rb_encoding **encp,
6800 int regexp_literal, int wide)
6801{
6802 size_t numlen;
6803 int codepoint = scan_hex(p->lex.pcur, wide ? p->lex.pend - p->lex.pcur : 4, &numlen);
6804 literal_flush(p, p->lex.pcur);
6805 p->lex.pcur += numlen;
6806 if (p->lex.strterm == NULL ||
6807 (p->lex.strterm->flags & STRTERM_HEREDOC) ||
6808 (p->lex.strterm->u.literal.u1.func != str_regexp)) {
6809 if (wide ? (numlen == 0 || numlen > 6) : (numlen < 4)) {
6810 yyerror0("invalid Unicode escape");
6811 return wide && numlen > 0;
6812 }
6813 if (codepoint > 0x10ffff) {
6814 yyerror0("invalid Unicode codepoint (too large)");
6815 return wide;
6816 }
6817 if ((codepoint & 0xfffff800) == 0xd800) {
6818 yyerror0("invalid Unicode codepoint");
6819 return wide;
6820 }
6821 }
6822 if (regexp_literal) {
6823 tokcopy(p, (int)numlen);
6824 }
6825 else if (codepoint >= 0x80) {
6826 rb_encoding *utf8 = rb_utf8_encoding();
6827 if (*encp && utf8 != *encp) {
6828 YYLTYPE loc = RUBY_INIT_YYLLOC();
6829 compile_error(p, "UTF-8 mixed within %s source", rb_enc_name(*encp));
6830 parser_show_error_line(p, &loc);
6831 return wide;
6832 }
6833 *encp = utf8;
6834 tokaddmbc(p, codepoint, *encp);
6835 }
6836 else {
6837 tokadd(p, codepoint);
6838 }
6839 return TRUE;
6840}
6841
6842/* return value is for ?\u3042 */
6843static void
6844tokadd_utf8(struct parser_params *p, rb_encoding **encp,
6845 int term, int symbol_literal, int regexp_literal)
6846{
6847 /*
6848 * If `term` is not -1, then we allow multiple codepoints in \u{}
6849 * upto `term` byte, otherwise we're parsing a character literal.
6850 * And then add the codepoints to the current token.
6851 */
6852 static const char multiple_codepoints[] = "Multiple codepoints at single character literal";
6853
6854 const int open_brace = '{', close_brace = '}';
6855
6856 if (regexp_literal) { tokadd(p, '\\'); tokadd(p, 'u'); }
6857
6858 if (peek(p, open_brace)) { /* handle \u{...} form */
6859 const char *second = NULL;
6860 int c, last = nextc(p);
6861 if (p->lex.pcur >= p->lex.pend) goto unterminated;
6862 while (ISSPACE(c = *p->lex.pcur) && ++p->lex.pcur < p->lex.pend);
6863 while (c != close_brace) {
6864 if (c == term) goto unterminated;
6865 if (second == multiple_codepoints)
6866 second = p->lex.pcur;
6867 if (regexp_literal) tokadd(p, last);
6868 if (!tokadd_codepoint(p, encp, regexp_literal, TRUE)) {
6869 break;
6870 }
6871 while (ISSPACE(c = *p->lex.pcur)) {
6872 if (++p->lex.pcur >= p->lex.pend) goto unterminated;
6873 last = c;
6874 }
6875 if (term == -1 && !second)
6876 second = multiple_codepoints;
6877 }
6878
6879 if (c != close_brace) {
6880 unterminated:
6881 token_flush(p);
6882 yyerror0("unterminated Unicode escape");
6883 return;
6884 }
6885 if (second && second != multiple_codepoints) {
6886 const char *pcur = p->lex.pcur;
6887 p->lex.pcur = second;
6888 dispatch_scan_event(p, tSTRING_CONTENT);
6889 token_flush(p);
6890 p->lex.pcur = pcur;
6891 yyerror0(multiple_codepoints);
6892 token_flush(p);
6893 }
6894
6895 if (regexp_literal) tokadd(p, close_brace);
6896 nextc(p);
6897 }
6898 else { /* handle \uxxxx form */
6899 if (!tokadd_codepoint(p, encp, regexp_literal, FALSE)) {
6900 token_flush(p);
6901 return;
6902 }
6903 }
6904}
6905
6906#define ESCAPE_CONTROL 1
6907#define ESCAPE_META 2
6908
6909static int
6910read_escape(struct parser_params *p, int flags, rb_encoding **encp)
6911{
6912 int c;
6913 size_t numlen;
6914
6915 switch (c = nextc(p)) {
6916 case '\\': /* Backslash */
6917 return c;
6918
6919 case 'n': /* newline */
6920 return '\n';
6921
6922 case 't': /* horizontal tab */
6923 return '\t';
6924
6925 case 'r': /* carriage-return */
6926 return '\r';
6927
6928 case 'f': /* form-feed */
6929 return '\f';
6930
6931 case 'v': /* vertical tab */
6932 return '\13';
6933
6934 case 'a': /* alarm(bell) */
6935 return '\007';
6936
6937 case 'e': /* escape */
6938 return 033;
6939
6940 case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': /* octal constant */
6941 case '4': case '5': case '6': case '7':
6942 pushback(p, c);
6943 c = scan_oct(p->lex.pcur, 3, &numlen);
6944 p->lex.pcur += numlen;
6945 return c;
6946
6947 case 'x': /* hex constant */
6948 c = tok_hex(p, &numlen);
6949 if (numlen == 0) return 0;
6950 return c;
6951
6952 case 'b': /* backspace */
6953 return '\010';
6954
6955 case 's': /* space */
6956 return ' ';
6957
6958 case 'M':
6959 if (flags & ESCAPE_META) goto eof;
6960 if ((c = nextc(p)) != '-') {
6961 goto eof;
6962 }
6963 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '\\') {
6964 switch (peekc(p)) {
6965 case 'u': case 'U':
6966 nextc(p);
6967 goto eof;
6968 }
6969 return read_escape(p, flags|ESCAPE_META, encp) | 0x80;
6970 }
6971 else if (c == -1 || !ISASCII(c)) goto eof;
6972 else {
6973 int c2 = escaped_control_code(c);
6974 if (c2) {
6975 if (ISCNTRL(c) || !(flags & ESCAPE_CONTROL)) {
6976 WARN_SPACE_CHAR(c2, "\\M-");
6977 }
6978 else {
6979 WARN_SPACE_CHAR(c2, "\\C-\\M-");
6980 }
6981 }
6982 else if (ISCNTRL(c)) goto eof;
6983 return ((c & 0xff) | 0x80);
6984 }
6985
6986 case 'C':
6987 if ((c = nextc(p)) != '-') {
6988 goto eof;
6989 }
6990 case 'c':
6991 if (flags & ESCAPE_CONTROL) goto eof;
6992 if ((c = nextc(p))== '\\') {
6993 switch (peekc(p)) {
6994 case 'u': case 'U':
6995 nextc(p);
6996 goto eof;
6997 }
6998 c = read_escape(p, flags|ESCAPE_CONTROL, encp);
6999 }
7000 else if (c == '?')
7001 return 0177;
7002 else if (c == -1 || !ISASCII(c)) goto eof;
7003 else {
7004 int c2 = escaped_control_code(c);
7005 if (c2) {
7006 if (ISCNTRL(c)) {
7007 if (flags & ESCAPE_META) {
7008 WARN_SPACE_CHAR(c2, "\\M-");
7009 }
7010 else {
7011 WARN_SPACE_CHAR(c2, "");
7012 }
7013 }
7014 else {
7015 if (flags & ESCAPE_META) {
7016 WARN_SPACE_CHAR(c2, "\\M-\\C-");
7017 }
7018 else {
7019 WARN_SPACE_CHAR(c2, "\\C-");
7020 }
7021 }
7022 }
7023 else if (ISCNTRL(c)) goto eof;
7024 }
7025 return c & 0x9f;
7026
7027 eof:
7028 case -1:
7029 yyerror0("Invalid escape character syntax");
7030 token_flush(p);
7031 return '\0';
7032
7033 default:
7034 return c;
7035 }
7036}
7037
7038static void
7039tokaddmbc(struct parser_params *p, int c, rb_encoding *enc)
7040{
7041 int len = rb_enc_codelen(c, enc);
7042 rb_enc_mbcput(c, tokspace(p, len), enc);
7043}
7044
7045static int
7046tokadd_escape(struct parser_params *p, rb_encoding **encp)
7047{
7048 int c;
7049 size_t numlen;
7050
7051 switch (c = nextc(p)) {
7052 case '\n':
7053 return 0; /* just ignore */
7054
7055 case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': /* octal constant */
7056 case '4': case '5': case '6': case '7':
7057 {
7058 ruby_scan_oct(--p->lex.pcur, 3, &numlen);
7059 if (numlen == 0) goto eof;
7060 p->lex.pcur += numlen;
7061 tokcopy(p, (int)numlen + 1);
7062 }
7063 return 0;
7064
7065 case 'x': /* hex constant */
7066 {
7067 tok_hex(p, &numlen);
7068 if (numlen == 0) return -1;
7069 tokcopy(p, (int)numlen + 2);
7070 }
7071 return 0;
7072
7073 eof:
7074 case -1:
7075 yyerror0("Invalid escape character syntax");
7076 token_flush(p);
7077 return -1;
7078
7079 default:
7080 tokadd(p, '\\');
7081 tokadd(p, c);
7082 }
7083 return 0;
7084}
7085
7086static int
7087regx_options(struct parser_params *p)
7088{
7089 int kcode = 0;
7090 int kopt = 0;
7091 int options = 0;
7092 int c, opt, kc;
7093
7094 newtok(p);
7095 while (c = nextc(p), ISALPHA(c)) {
7096 if (c == 'o') {
7097 options |= RE_OPTION_ONCE;
7098 }
7099 else if (rb_char_to_option_kcode(c, &opt, &kc)) {
7100 if (kc >= 0) {
7101 if (kc != rb_ascii8bit_encindex()) kcode = c;
7102 kopt = opt;
7103 }
7104 else {
7105 options |= opt;
7106 }
7107 }
7108 else {
7109 tokadd(p, c);
7110 }
7111 }
7112 options |= kopt;
7113 pushback(p, c);
7114 if (toklen(p)) {
7115 YYLTYPE loc = RUBY_INIT_YYLLOC();
7116 tokfix(p);
7117 compile_error(p, "unknown regexp option%s - %*s",
7118 toklen(p) > 1 ? "s" : "", toklen(p), tok(p));
7119 parser_show_error_line(p, &loc);
7120 }
7121 return options | RE_OPTION_ENCODING(kcode);
7122}
7123
7124static int
7125tokadd_mbchar(struct parser_params *p, int c)
7126{
7127 int len = parser_precise_mbclen(p, p->lex.pcur-1);
7128 if (len < 0) return -1;
7129 tokadd(p, c);
7130 p->lex.pcur += --len;
7131 if (len > 0) tokcopy(p, len);
7132 return c;
7133}
7134
7135static inline int
7136simple_re_meta(int c)
7137{
7138 switch (c) {
7139 case '$': case '*': case '+': case '.':
7140 case '?': case '^': case '|':
7141 case ')': case ']': case '}': case '>':
7142 return TRUE;
7143 default:
7144 return FALSE;
7145 }
7146}
7147
7148static int
7149parser_update_heredoc_indent(struct parser_params *p, int c)
7150{
7151 if (p->heredoc_line_indent == -1) {
7152 if (c == '\n') p->heredoc_line_indent = 0;
7153 }
7154 else {
7155 if (c == ' ') {
7156 p->heredoc_line_indent++;
7157 return TRUE;
7158 }
7159 else if (c == '\t') {
7160 int w = (p->heredoc_line_indent / TAB_WIDTH) + 1;
7161 p->heredoc_line_indent = w * TAB_WIDTH;
7162 return TRUE;
7163 }
7164 else if (c != '\n') {
7165 if (p->heredoc_indent > p->heredoc_line_indent) {
7166 p->heredoc_indent = p->heredoc_line_indent;
7167 }
7168 p->heredoc_line_indent = -1;
7169 }
7170 }
7171 return FALSE;
7172}
7173
7174static void
7175parser_mixed_error(struct parser_params *p, rb_encoding *enc1, rb_encoding *enc2)
7176{
7177 YYLTYPE loc = RUBY_INIT_YYLLOC();
7178 const char *n1 = rb_enc_name(enc1), *n2 = rb_enc_name(enc2);
7179 compile_error(p, "%s mixed within %s source", n1, n2);
7180 parser_show_error_line(p, &loc);
7181}
7182
7183static void
7184parser_mixed_escape(struct parser_params *p, const char *beg, rb_encoding *enc1, rb_encoding *enc2)
7185{
7186 const char *pos = p->lex.pcur;
7187 p->lex.pcur = beg;
7188 parser_mixed_error(p, enc1, enc2);
7189 p->lex.pcur = pos;
7190}
7191
7192static int
7193tokadd_string(struct parser_params *p,
7194 int func, int term, int paren, long *nest,
7195 rb_encoding **encp, rb_encoding **enc)
7196{
7197 int c;
7198 bool erred = false;
7199
7200#define mixed_error(enc1, enc2) \
7201 (void)(erred || (parser_mixed_error(p, enc1, enc2), erred = true))
7202#define mixed_escape(beg, enc1, enc2) \
7203 (void)(erred || (parser_mixed_escape(p, beg, enc1, enc2), erred = true))
7204
7205 while ((c = nextc(p)) != -1) {
7206 if (p->heredoc_indent > 0) {
7207 parser_update_heredoc_indent(p, c);
7208 }
7209
7210 if (paren && c == paren) {
7211 ++*nest;
7212 }
7213 else if (c == term) {
7214 if (!nest || !*nest) {
7215 pushback(p, c);
7216 break;
7217 }
7218 --*nest;
7219 }
7220 else if ((func & STR_FUNC_EXPAND) && c == '#' && p->lex.pcur < p->lex.pend) {
7221 int c2 = *p->lex.pcur;
7222 if (c2 == '$' || c2 == '@' || c2 == '{') {
7223 pushback(p, c);
7224 break;
7225 }
7226 }
7227 else if (c == '\\') {
7228 literal_flush(p, p->lex.pcur - 1);
7229 c = nextc(p);
7230 switch (c) {
7231 case '\n':
7232 if (func & STR_FUNC_QWORDS) break;
7233 if (func & STR_FUNC_EXPAND) {
7234 if (!(func & STR_FUNC_INDENT) || (p->heredoc_indent < 0))
7235 continue;
7236 if (c == term) {
7237 c = '\\';
7238 goto terminate;
7239 }
7240 }
7241 tokadd(p, '\\');
7242 break;
7243
7244 case '\\':
7245 if (func & STR_FUNC_ESCAPE) tokadd(p, c);
7246 break;
7247
7248 case 'u':
7249 if ((func & STR_FUNC_EXPAND) == 0) {
7250 tokadd(p, '\\');
7251 break;
7252 }
7253 tokadd_utf8(p, enc, term,
7254 func & STR_FUNC_SYMBOL,
7255 func & STR_FUNC_REGEXP);
7256 continue;
7257
7258 default:
7259 if (c == -1) return -1;
7260 if (!ISASCII(c)) {
7261 if ((func & STR_FUNC_EXPAND) == 0) tokadd(p, '\\');
7262 goto non_ascii;
7263 }
7264 if (func & STR_FUNC_REGEXP) {
7265 switch (c) {
7266 case 'c':
7267 case 'C':
7268 case 'M': {
7269 pushback(p, c);
7270 c = read_escape(p, 0, enc);
7271
7272 int i;
7273 char escbuf[5];
7274 snprintf(escbuf, sizeof(escbuf), "\\x%02X", c);
7275 for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
7276 tokadd(p, escbuf[i]);
7277 }
7278 continue;
7279 }
7280 }
7281
7282 if (c == term && !simple_re_meta(c)) {
7283 tokadd(p, c);
7284 continue;
7285 }
7286 pushback(p, c);
7287 if ((c = tokadd_escape(p, enc)) < 0)
7288 return -1;
7289 if (*enc && *enc != *encp) {
7290 mixed_escape(p->lex.ptok+2, *enc, *encp);
7291 }
7292 continue;
7293 }
7294 else if (func & STR_FUNC_EXPAND) {
7295 pushback(p, c);
7296 if (func & STR_FUNC_ESCAPE) tokadd(p, '\\');
7297 c = read_escape(p, 0, enc);
7298 }
7299 else if ((func & STR_FUNC_QWORDS) && ISSPACE(c)) {
7300 /* ignore backslashed spaces in %w */
7301 }
7302 else if (c != term && !(paren && c == paren)) {
7303 tokadd(p, '\\');
7304 pushback(p, c);
7305 continue;
7306 }
7307 }
7308 }
7309 else if (!parser_isascii(p)) {
7310 non_ascii:
7311 if (!*enc) {
7312 *enc = *encp;
7313 }
7314 else if (*enc != *encp) {
7315 mixed_error(*enc, *encp);
7316 continue;
7317 }
7318 if (tokadd_mbchar(p, c) == -1) return -1;
7319 continue;
7320 }
7321 else if ((func & STR_FUNC_QWORDS) && ISSPACE(c)) {
7322 pushback(p, c);
7323 break;
7324 }
7325 if (c & 0x80) {
7326 if (!*enc) {
7327 *enc = *encp;
7328 }
7329 else if (*enc != *encp) {
7330 mixed_error(*enc, *encp);
7331 continue;
7332 }
7333 }
7334 tokadd(p, c);
7335 }
7336 terminate:
7337 if (*enc) *encp = *enc;
7338 return c;
7339}
7340
7341static inline rb_strterm_t *
7342new_strterm(VALUE v1, VALUE v2, VALUE v3, VALUE v0)
7343{
7344 return (rb_strterm_t*)rb_imemo_new(imemo_parser_strterm, v1, v2, v3, v0);
7345}
7346
7347/* imemo_parser_strterm for literal */
7348#define NEW_STRTERM(func, term, paren) \
7349 new_strterm((VALUE)(func), (VALUE)(paren), (VALUE)(term), 0)
7350
7351#ifdef RIPPER
7352static void
7353flush_string_content(struct parser_params *p, rb_encoding *enc)
7354{
7355 VALUE content = yylval.val;
7356 if (!ripper_is_node_yylval(content))
7357 content = ripper_new_yylval(p, 0, 0, content);
7358 if (has_delayed_token(p)) {
7359 ptrdiff_t len = p->lex.pcur - p->lex.ptok;
7360 if (len > 0) {
7361 rb_enc_str_buf_cat(p->delayed.token, p->lex.ptok, len, enc);
7362 }
7363 dispatch_delayed_token(p, tSTRING_CONTENT);
7364 p->lex.ptok = p->lex.pcur;
7365 RNODE(content)->nd_rval = yylval.val;
7366 }
7367 dispatch_scan_event(p, tSTRING_CONTENT);
7368 if (yylval.val != content)
7369 RNODE(content)->nd_rval = yylval.val;
7370 yylval.val = content;
7371}
7372#else
7373#define flush_string_content(p, enc) ((void)(enc))
7374#endif
7375
7376RUBY_FUNC_EXPORTED const unsigned int ruby_global_name_punct_bits[(0x7e - 0x20 + 31) / 32];
7377/* this can be shared with ripper, since it's independent from struct
7378 * parser_params. */
7379#ifndef RIPPER
7380#define BIT(c, idx) (((c) / 32 - 1 == idx) ? (1U << ((c) % 32)) : 0)
7381#define SPECIAL_PUNCT(idx) ( \
7382 BIT('~', idx) | BIT('*', idx) | BIT('$', idx) | BIT('?', idx) | \
7383 BIT('!', idx) | BIT('@', idx) | BIT('/', idx) | BIT('\\', idx) | \
7384 BIT(';', idx) | BIT(',', idx) | BIT('.', idx) | BIT('=', idx) | \
7385 BIT(':', idx) | BIT('<', idx) | BIT('>', idx) | BIT('\"', idx) | \
7386 BIT('&', idx) | BIT('`', idx) | BIT('\'', idx) | BIT('+', idx) | \
7387 BIT('0', idx))
7388const unsigned int ruby_global_name_punct_bits[] = {
7389 SPECIAL_PUNCT(0),
7390 SPECIAL_PUNCT(1),
7391 SPECIAL_PUNCT(2),
7392};
7393#undef BIT
7394#undef SPECIAL_PUNCT
7395#endif
7396
7397static enum yytokentype
7398parser_peek_variable_name(struct parser_params *p)
7399{
7400 int c;
7401 const char *ptr = p->lex.pcur;
7402
7403 if (ptr + 1 >= p->lex.pend) return 0;
7404 c = *ptr++;
7405 switch (c) {
7406 case '$':
7407 if ((c = *ptr) == '-') {
7408 if (++ptr >= p->lex.pend) return 0;
7409 c = *ptr;
7410 }
7411 else if (is_global_name_punct(c) || ISDIGIT(c)) {
7412 return tSTRING_DVAR;
7413 }
7414 break;
7415 case '@':
7416 if ((c = *ptr) == '@') {
7417 if (++ptr >= p->lex.pend) return 0;
7418 c = *ptr;
7419 }
7420 break;
7421 case '{':
7422 p->lex.pcur = ptr;
7423 p->command_start = TRUE;
7424 return tSTRING_DBEG;
7425 default:
7426 return 0;
7427 }
7428 if (!ISASCII(c) || c == '_' || ISALPHA(c))
7429 return tSTRING_DVAR;
7430 return 0;
7431}
7432
7433#define IS_ARG() IS_lex_state(EXPR_ARG_ANY)
7434#define IS_END() IS_lex_state(EXPR_END_ANY)
7435#define IS_BEG() (IS_lex_state(EXPR_BEG_ANY) || IS_lex_state_all(EXPR_ARG|EXPR_LABELED))
7436#define IS_SPCARG(c) (IS_ARG() && space_seen && !ISSPACE(c))
7437#define IS_LABEL_POSSIBLE() (\
7438 (IS_lex_state(EXPR_LABEL|EXPR_ENDFN) && !cmd_state) || \
7439 IS_ARG())
7440#define IS_LABEL_SUFFIX(n) (peek_n(p, ':',(n)) && !peek_n(p, ':', (n)+1))
7441#define IS_AFTER_OPERATOR() IS_lex_state(EXPR_FNAME | EXPR_DOT)
7442
7443static inline enum yytokentype
7444parser_string_term(struct parser_params *p, int func)
7445{
7446 p->lex.strterm = 0;
7447 if (func & STR_FUNC_REGEXP) {
7448 set_yylval_num(regx_options(p));
7449 dispatch_scan_event(p, tREGEXP_END);
7450 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
7451 return tREGEXP_END;
7452 }
7453 if ((func & STR_FUNC_LABEL) && IS_LABEL_SUFFIX(0)) {
7454 nextc(p);
7455 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG|EXPR_LABEL);
7456 return tLABEL_END;
7457 }
7458 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
7459 return tSTRING_END;
7460}
7461
7462static enum yytokentype
7463parse_string(struct parser_params *p, rb_strterm_literal_t *quote)
7464{
7465 int func = (int)quote->u1.func;
7466 int term = (int)quote->u3.term;
7467 int paren = (int)quote->u2.paren;
7468 int c, space = 0;
7469 rb_encoding *enc = p->enc;
7470 rb_encoding *base_enc = 0;
7471 VALUE lit;
7472
7473 if (func & STR_FUNC_TERM) {
