7474 if (func & STR_FUNC_QWORDS) nextc(p); /* delayed term */
7475 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
7476 p->lex.strterm = 0;
7477 return func & STR_FUNC_REGEXP ? tREGEXP_END : tSTRING_END;
7478 }
7479 c = nextc(p);
7480 if ((func & STR_FUNC_QWORDS) && ISSPACE(c)) {
7481 do {c = nextc(p);} while (ISSPACE(c));
7482 space = 1;
7483 }
7484 if (func & STR_FUNC_LIST) {
7485 quote->u1.func &= ~STR_FUNC_LIST;
7486 space = 1;
7487 }
7488 if (c == term && !quote->u0.nest) {
7489 if (func & STR_FUNC_QWORDS) {
7490 quote->u1.func |= STR_FUNC_TERM;
7491 pushback(p, c); /* dispatch the term at tSTRING_END */
7492 add_delayed_token(p, p->lex.ptok, p->lex.pcur);
7493 return ' ';
7494 }
7495 return parser_string_term(p, func);
7496 }
7497 if (space) {
7498 pushback(p, c);
7499 add_delayed_token(p, p->lex.ptok, p->lex.pcur);
7500 return ' ';
7501 }
7502 newtok(p);
7503 if ((func & STR_FUNC_EXPAND) && c == '#') {
7504 int t = parser_peek_variable_name(p);
7505 if (t) return t;
7506 tokadd(p, '#');
7507 c = nextc(p);
7508 }
7509 pushback(p, c);
7510 if (tokadd_string(p, func, term, paren, &quote->u0.nest,
7511 &enc, &base_enc) == -1) {
7512 if (p->eofp) {
7513#ifndef RIPPER
7514# define unterminated_literal(mesg) yyerror0(mesg)
7515#else
7516# define unterminated_literal(mesg) compile_error(p, mesg)
7517#endif
7518 literal_flush(p, p->lex.pcur);
7519 if (func & STR_FUNC_QWORDS) {
7520 /* no content to add, bailing out here */
7521 unterminated_literal("unterminated list meets end of file");
7522 p->lex.strterm = 0;
7523 return tSTRING_END;
7524 }
7525 if (func & STR_FUNC_REGEXP) {
7526 unterminated_literal("unterminated regexp meets end of file");
7527 }
7528 else {
7529 unterminated_literal("unterminated string meets end of file");
7530 }
7531 quote->u1.func |= STR_FUNC_TERM;
7532 }
7533 }
7534
7535 tokfix(p);
7536 lit = STR_NEW3(tok(p), toklen(p), enc, func);
7537 set_yylval_str(lit);
7538 flush_string_content(p, enc);
7539
7540 return tSTRING_CONTENT;
7541}
7542
7543static enum yytokentype
7544heredoc_identifier(struct parser_params *p)
7545{
7546 /*
7547 * term_len is length of `<<"END"` except `END`,
7548 * in this case term_len is 4 (<, <, " and ").
7549 */
7550 long len, offset = p->lex.pcur - p->lex.pbeg;
7551 int c = nextc(p), term, func = 0, quote = 0;
7552 enum yytokentype token = tSTRING_BEG;
7553 int indent = 0;
7554
7555 if (c == '-') {
7556 c = nextc(p);
7557 func = STR_FUNC_INDENT;
7558 offset++;
7559 }
7560 else if (c == '~') {
7561 c = nextc(p);
7562 func = STR_FUNC_INDENT;
7563 offset++;
7564 indent = INT_MAX;
7565 }
7566 switch (c) {
7567 case '\'':
7568 func |= str_squote; goto quoted;
7569 case '"':
7570 func |= str_dquote; goto quoted;
7571 case '`':
7572 token = tXSTRING_BEG;
7573 func |= str_xquote; goto quoted;
7574
7575 quoted:
7576 quote++;
7577 offset++;
7578 term = c;
7579 len = 0;
7580 while ((c = nextc(p)) != term) {
7581 if (c == -1 || c == '\r' || c == '\n') {
7582 yyerror0("unterminated here document identifier");
7583 return -1;
7584 }
7585 }
7586 break;
7587
7588 default:
7589 if (!parser_is_identchar(p)) {
7590 pushback(p, c);
7591 if (func & STR_FUNC_INDENT) {
7592 pushback(p, indent > 0 ? '~' : '-');
7593 }
7594 return 0;
7595 }
7596 func |= str_dquote;
7597 do {
7598 int n = parser_precise_mbclen(p, p->lex.pcur-1);
7599 if (n < 0) return 0;
7600 p->lex.pcur += --n;
7601 } while ((c = nextc(p)) != -1 && parser_is_identchar(p));
7602 pushback(p, c);
7603 break;
7604 }
7605
7606 len = p->lex.pcur - (p->lex.pbeg + offset) - quote;
7607 if ((unsigned long)len >= HERETERM_LENGTH_MAX)
7608 yyerror0("too long here document identifier");
7609 dispatch_scan_event(p, tHEREDOC_BEG);
7610 lex_goto_eol(p);
7611
7612 p->lex.strterm = new_strterm(0, 0, 0, p->lex.lastline);
7613 p->lex.strterm->flags |= STRTERM_HEREDOC;
7614 rb_strterm_heredoc_t *here = &p->lex.strterm->u.heredoc;
7615 here->offset = offset;
7616 here->sourceline = p->ruby_sourceline;
7617 here->length = (int)len;
7618 here->quote = quote;
7619 here->func = func;
7620
7621 token_flush(p);
7622 p->heredoc_indent = indent;
7623 p->heredoc_line_indent = 0;
7624 return token;
7625}
7626
7627static void
7628heredoc_restore(struct parser_params *p, rb_strterm_heredoc_t *here)
7629{
7630 VALUE line;
7631
7632 p->lex.strterm = 0;
7633 line = here->lastline;
7634 p->lex.lastline = line;
7635 p->lex.pbeg = RSTRING_PTR(line);
7636 p->lex.pend = p->lex.pbeg + RSTRING_LEN(line);
7637 p->lex.pcur = p->lex.pbeg + here->offset + here->length + here->quote;
7638 p->lex.ptok = p->lex.pbeg + here->offset - here->quote;
7639 p->heredoc_end = p->ruby_sourceline;
7640 p->ruby_sourceline = (int)here->sourceline;
7641 if (p->eofp) p->lex.nextline = Qnil;
7642 p->eofp = 0;
7643}
7644
7645static int
7646dedent_string(VALUE string, int width)
7647{
7648 char *str;
7649 long len;
7650 int i, col = 0;
7651
7652 RSTRING_GETMEM(string, str, len);
7653 for (i = 0; i < len && col < width; i++) {
7654 if (str[i] == ' ') {
7655 col++;
7656 }
7657 else if (str[i] == '\t') {
7658 int n = TAB_WIDTH * (col / TAB_WIDTH + 1);
7659 if (n > width) break;
7660 col = n;
7661 }
7662 else {
7663 break;
7664 }
7665 }
7666 if (!i) return 0;
7667 rb_str_modify(string);
7668 str = RSTRING_PTR(string);
7669 if (RSTRING_LEN(string) != len)
7670 rb_fatal("literal string changed: %+"PRIsVALUE, string);
7671 MEMMOVE(str, str + i, char, len - i);
7672 rb_str_set_len(string, len - i);
7673 return i;
7674}
7675
7676#ifndef RIPPER
7677static NODE *
7678heredoc_dedent(struct parser_params *p, NODE *root)
7679{
7680 NODE *node, *str_node, *prev_node;
7681 int indent = p->heredoc_indent;
7682 VALUE prev_lit = 0;
7683
7684 if (indent <= 0) return root;
7685 p->heredoc_indent = 0;
7686 if (!root) return root;
7687
7688 prev_node = node = str_node = root;
7689 if (nd_type_p(root, NODE_LIST)) str_node = root->nd_head;
7690
7691 while (str_node) {
7692 VALUE lit = str_node->nd_lit;
7693 if (str_node->flags & NODE_FL_NEWLINE) {
7694 dedent_string(lit, indent);
7695 }
7696 if (!prev_lit) {
7697 prev_lit = lit;
7698 }
7699 else if (!literal_concat0(p, prev_lit, lit)) {
7700 return 0;
7701 }
7702 else {
7703 NODE *end = node->nd_end;
7704 node = prev_node->nd_next = node->nd_next;
7705 if (!node) {
7706 if (nd_type_p(prev_node, NODE_DSTR))
7707 nd_set_type(prev_node, NODE_STR);
7708 break;
7709 }
7710 node->nd_end = end;
7711 goto next_str;
7712 }
7713
7714 str_node = 0;
7715 while ((node = (prev_node = node)->nd_next) != 0) {
7716 next_str:
7717 if (!nd_type_p(node, NODE_LIST)) break;
7718 if ((str_node = node->nd_head) != 0) {
7719 enum node_type type = nd_type(str_node);
7720 if (type == NODE_STR || type == NODE_DSTR) break;
7721 prev_lit = 0;
7722 str_node = 0;
7723 }
7724 }
7725 }
7726 return root;
7727}
7728#else /* RIPPER */
7729static VALUE
7730heredoc_dedent(struct parser_params *p, VALUE array)
7731{
7732 int indent = p->heredoc_indent;
7733
7734 if (indent <= 0) return array;
7735 p->heredoc_indent = 0;
7736 dispatch2(heredoc_dedent, array, INT2NUM(indent));
7737 return array;
7738}
7739
7740/*
7741 * call-seq:
7742 * Ripper.dedent_string(input, width) -> Integer
7743 *
7744 * USE OF RIPPER LIBRARY ONLY.
7745 *
7746 * Strips up to +width+ leading whitespaces from +input+,
7747 * and returns the stripped column width.
7748 */
7749static VALUE
7750parser_dedent_string(VALUE self, VALUE input, VALUE width)
7751{
7752 int wid, col;
7753
7754 StringValue(input);
7755 wid = NUM2UINT(width);
7756 col = dedent_string(input, wid);
7757 return INT2NUM(col);
7758}
7759#endif
7760
7761static int
7762whole_match_p(struct parser_params *p, const char *eos, long len, int indent)
7763{
7764 const char *ptr = p->lex.pbeg;
7765 long n;
7766
7767 if (indent) {
7768 while (*ptr && ISSPACE(*ptr)) ptr++;
7769 }
7770 n = p->lex.pend - (ptr + len);
7771 if (n < 0) return FALSE;
7772 if (n > 0 && ptr[len] != '\n') {
7773 if (ptr[len] != '\r') return FALSE;
7774 if (n <= 1 || ptr[len+1] != '\n') return FALSE;
7775 }
7776 return strncmp(eos, ptr, len) == 0;
7777}
7778
7779static int
7780word_match_p(struct parser_params *p, const char *word, long len)
7781{
7782 if (strncmp(p->lex.pcur, word, len)) return 0;
7783 if (p->lex.pcur + len == p->lex.pend) return 1;
7784 int c = (unsigned char)p->lex.pcur[len];
7785 if (ISSPACE(c)) return 1;
7786 switch (c) {
7787 case '\0': case '\004': case '\032': return 1;
7788 }
7789 return 0;
7790}
7791
7792#define NUM_SUFFIX_R (1<<0)
7793#define NUM_SUFFIX_I (1<<1)
7794#define NUM_SUFFIX_ALL 3
7795
7796static int
7797number_literal_suffix(struct parser_params *p, int mask)
7798{
7799 int c, result = 0;
7800 const char *lastp = p->lex.pcur;
7801
7802 while ((c = nextc(p)) != -1) {
7803 if ((mask & NUM_SUFFIX_I) && c == 'i') {
7804 result |= (mask & NUM_SUFFIX_I);
7805 mask &= ~NUM_SUFFIX_I;
7806 /* r after i, rational of complex is disallowed */
7807 mask &= ~NUM_SUFFIX_R;
7808 continue;
7809 }
7810 if ((mask & NUM_SUFFIX_R) && c == 'r') {
7811 result |= (mask & NUM_SUFFIX_R);
7812 mask &= ~NUM_SUFFIX_R;
7813 continue;
7814 }
7815 if (!ISASCII(c) || ISALPHA(c) || c == '_') {
7816 p->lex.pcur = lastp;
7817 literal_flush(p, p->lex.pcur);
7818 return 0;
7819 }
7820 pushback(p, c);
7821 break;
7822 }
7823 return result;
7824}
7825
7826static enum yytokentype
7827set_number_literal(struct parser_params *p, VALUE v,
7828 enum yytokentype type, int suffix)
7829{
7830 if (suffix & NUM_SUFFIX_I) {
7831 v = rb_complex_raw(INT2FIX(0), v);
7832 type = tIMAGINARY;
7833 }
7834 set_yylval_literal(v);
7835 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
7836 return type;
7837}
7838
7839static enum yytokentype
7840set_integer_literal(struct parser_params *p, VALUE v, int suffix)
7841{
7842 enum yytokentype type = tINTEGER;
7843 if (suffix & NUM_SUFFIX_R) {
7844 v = rb_rational_raw1(v);
7845 type = tRATIONAL;
7846 }
7847 return set_number_literal(p, v, type, suffix);
7848}
7849
7850#ifdef RIPPER
7851static void
7852dispatch_heredoc_end(struct parser_params *p)
7853{
7854 VALUE str;
7855 if (has_delayed_token(p))
7856 dispatch_delayed_token(p, tSTRING_CONTENT);
7857 str = STR_NEW(p->lex.ptok, p->lex.pend - p->lex.ptok);
7858 ripper_dispatch1(p, ripper_token2eventid(tHEREDOC_END), str);
7859 lex_goto_eol(p);
7860 token_flush(p);
7861}
7862
7863#else
7864#define dispatch_heredoc_end(p) ((void)0)
7865#endif
7866
7867static enum yytokentype
7868here_document(struct parser_params *p, rb_strterm_heredoc_t *here)
7869{
7870 int c, func, indent = 0;
7871 const char *eos, *ptr, *ptr_end;
7872 long len;
7873 VALUE str = 0;
7874 rb_encoding *enc = p->enc;
7875 rb_encoding *base_enc = 0;
7876 int bol;
7877
7878 eos = RSTRING_PTR(here->lastline) + here->offset;
7879 len = here->length;
7880 indent = (func = here->func) & STR_FUNC_INDENT;
7881
7882 if ((c = nextc(p)) == -1) {
7883 error:
7884#ifdef RIPPER
7885 if (!has_delayed_token(p)) {
7886 dispatch_scan_event(p, tSTRING_CONTENT);
7887 }
7888 else {
7889 if ((len = p->lex.pcur - p->lex.ptok) > 0) {
7890 if (!(func & STR_FUNC_REGEXP) && rb_enc_asciicompat(enc)) {
7891 int cr = ENC_CODERANGE_UNKNOWN;
7892 rb_str_coderange_scan_restartable(p->lex.ptok, p->lex.pcur, enc, &cr);
7893 if (cr != ENC_CODERANGE_7BIT &&
7894 p->enc == rb_usascii_encoding() &&
7895 enc != rb_utf8_encoding()) {
7896 enc = rb_ascii8bit_encoding();
7897 }
7898 }
7899 rb_enc_str_buf_cat(p->delayed.token, p->lex.ptok, len, enc);
7900 }
7901 dispatch_delayed_token(p, tSTRING_CONTENT);
7902 }
7903 lex_goto_eol(p);
7904#endif
7905 heredoc_restore(p, &p->lex.strterm->u.heredoc);
7906 compile_error(p, "can't find string \"%.*s\" anywhere before EOF",
7907 (int)len, eos);
7908 token_flush(p);
7909 p->lex.strterm = 0;
7910 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
7911 return tSTRING_END;
7912 }
7913 bol = was_bol(p);
7914 if (!bol) {
7915 /* not beginning of line, cannot be the terminator */
7916 }
7917 else if (p->heredoc_line_indent == -1) {
7918 /* `heredoc_line_indent == -1` means
7919 * - "after an interpolation in the same line", or
7920 * - "in a continuing line"
7921 */
7922 p->heredoc_line_indent = 0;
7923 }
7924 else if (whole_match_p(p, eos, len, indent)) {
7925 dispatch_heredoc_end(p);
7926 restore:
7927 heredoc_restore(p, &p->lex.strterm->u.heredoc);
7928 token_flush(p);
7929 p->lex.strterm = 0;
7930 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
7931 return tSTRING_END;
7932 }
7933
7934 if (!(func & STR_FUNC_EXPAND)) {
7935 do {
7936 ptr = RSTRING_PTR(p->lex.lastline);
7937 ptr_end = p->lex.pend;
7938 if (ptr_end > ptr) {
7939 switch (ptr_end[-1]) {
7940 case '\n':
7941 if (--ptr_end == ptr || ptr_end[-1] != '\r') {
7942 ptr_end++;
7943 break;
7944 }
7945 case '\r':
7946 --ptr_end;
7947 }
7948 }
7949
7950 if (p->heredoc_indent > 0) {
7951 long i = 0;
7952 while (ptr + i < ptr_end && parser_update_heredoc_indent(p, ptr[i]))
7953 i++;
7954 p->heredoc_line_indent = 0;
7955 }
7956
7957 if (str)
7958 rb_str_cat(str, ptr, ptr_end - ptr);
7959 else
7960 str = STR_NEW(ptr, ptr_end - ptr);
7961 if (ptr_end < p->lex.pend) rb_str_cat(str, "\n", 1);
7962 lex_goto_eol(p);
7963 if (p->heredoc_indent > 0) {
7964 goto flush_str;
7965 }
7966 if (nextc(p) == -1) {
7967 if (str) {
7968 str = 0;
7969 }
7970 goto error;
7971 }
7972 } while (!whole_match_p(p, eos, len, indent));
7973 }
7974 else {
7975 /* int mb = ENC_CODERANGE_7BIT, *mbp = &mb;*/
7976 newtok(p);
7977 if (c == '#') {
7978 int t = parser_peek_variable_name(p);
7979 if (p->heredoc_line_indent != -1) {
7980 if (p->heredoc_indent > p->heredoc_line_indent) {
7981 p->heredoc_indent = p->heredoc_line_indent;
7982 }
7983 p->heredoc_line_indent = -1;
7984 }
7985 if (t) return t;
7986 tokadd(p, '#');
7987 c = nextc(p);
7988 }
7989 do {
7990 pushback(p, c);
7991 enc = p->enc;
7992 if ((c = tokadd_string(p, func, '\n', 0, NULL, &enc, &base_enc)) == -1) {
7993 if (p->eofp) goto error;
7994 goto restore;
7995 }
7996 if (c != '\n') {
7997 if (c == '\\') p->heredoc_line_indent = -1;
7998 flush:
7999 str = STR_NEW3(tok(p), toklen(p), enc, func);
8000 flush_str:
8001 set_yylval_str(str);
8002#ifndef RIPPER
8003 if (bol) yylval.node->flags |= NODE_FL_NEWLINE;
8004#endif
8005 flush_string_content(p, enc);
8006 return tSTRING_CONTENT;
8007 }
8008 tokadd(p, nextc(p));
8009 if (p->heredoc_indent > 0) {
8010 lex_goto_eol(p);
8011 goto flush;
8012 }
8013 /* if (mbp && mb == ENC_CODERANGE_UNKNOWN) mbp = 0;*/
8014 if ((c = nextc(p)) == -1) goto error;
8015 } while (!whole_match_p(p, eos, len, indent));
8016 str = STR_NEW3(tok(p), toklen(p), enc, func);
8017 }
8018 dispatch_heredoc_end(p);
8019#ifdef RIPPER
8020 str = ripper_new_yylval(p, ripper_token2eventid(tSTRING_CONTENT),
8021 yylval.val, str);
8022#endif
8023 heredoc_restore(p, &p->lex.strterm->u.heredoc);
8024 token_flush(p);
8025 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(func | STR_FUNC_TERM, 0, 0);
8026 set_yylval_str(str);
8027#ifndef RIPPER
8028 if (bol) yylval.node->flags |= NODE_FL_NEWLINE;
8029#endif
8030 return tSTRING_CONTENT;
8031}
8032
8033#include "lex.c"
8034
8035static int
8036arg_ambiguous(struct parser_params *p, char c)
8037{
8038#ifndef RIPPER
8039 if (c == '/') {
8040 rb_warning1("ambiguity between regexp and two divisions: wrap regexp in parentheses or add a space after `%c' operator", WARN_I(c));
8041 }
8042 else {
8043 rb_warning1("ambiguous first argument; put parentheses or a space even after `%c' operator", WARN_I(c));
8044 }
8045#else
8046 dispatch1(arg_ambiguous, rb_usascii_str_new(&c, 1));
8047#endif
8048 return TRUE;
8049}
8050
8051static ID
8052#ifndef RIPPER
8053formal_argument(struct parser_params *p, ID lhs)
8054#else
8055formal_argument(struct parser_params *p, VALUE lhs)
8056#endif
8057{
8058 ID id = get_id(lhs);
8059
8060 switch (id_type(id)) {
8061 case ID_LOCAL:
8062 break;
8063#ifndef RIPPER
8064# define ERR(mesg) yyerror0(mesg)
8065#else
8066# define ERR(mesg) (dispatch2(param_error, WARN_S(mesg), lhs), ripper_error(p))
8067#endif
8068 case ID_CONST:
8069 ERR("formal argument cannot be a constant");
8070 return 0;
8071 case ID_INSTANCE:
8072 ERR("formal argument cannot be an instance variable");
8073 return 0;
8074 case ID_GLOBAL:
8075 ERR("formal argument cannot be a global variable");
8076 return 0;
8077 case ID_CLASS:
8078 ERR("formal argument cannot be a class variable");
8079 return 0;
8080 default:
8081 ERR("formal argument must be local variable");
8082 return 0;
8083#undef ERR
8084 }
8085 shadowing_lvar(p, id);
8086 return lhs;
8087}
8088
8089static int
8090lvar_defined(struct parser_params *p, ID id)
8091{
8092 return (dyna_in_block(p) && dvar_defined(p, id)) || local_id(p, id);
8093}
8094
8095/* emacsen -*- hack */
8096static long
8097parser_encode_length(struct parser_params *p, const char *name, long len)
8098{
8099 long nlen;
8100
8101 if (len > 5 && name[nlen = len - 5] == '-') {
8102 if (rb_memcicmp(name + nlen + 1, "unix", 4) == 0)
8103 return nlen;
8104 }
8105 if (len > 4 && name[nlen = len - 4] == '-') {
8106 if (rb_memcicmp(name + nlen + 1, "dos", 3) == 0)
8107 return nlen;
8108 if (rb_memcicmp(name + nlen + 1, "mac", 3) == 0 &&
8109 !(len == 8 && rb_memcicmp(name, "utf8-mac", len) == 0))
8110 /* exclude UTF8-MAC because the encoding named "UTF8" doesn't exist in Ruby */
8111 return nlen;
8112 }
8113 return len;
8114}
8115
8116static void
8117parser_set_encode(struct parser_params *p, const char *name)
8118{
8119 int idx = rb_enc_find_index(name);
8120 rb_encoding *enc;
8121 VALUE excargs[3];
8122
8123 if (idx < 0) {
8124 excargs[1] = rb_sprintf("unknown encoding name: %s", name);
8125 error:
8126 excargs[0] = rb_eArgError;
8127 excargs[2] = rb_make_backtrace();
8128 rb_ary_unshift(excargs[2], rb_sprintf("%"PRIsVALUE":%d", p->ruby_sourcefile_string, p->ruby_sourceline));
8129 rb_exc_raise(rb_make_exception(3, excargs));
8130 }
8131 enc = rb_enc_from_index(idx);
8132 if (!rb_enc_asciicompat(enc)) {
8133 excargs[1] = rb_sprintf("%s is not ASCII compatible", rb_enc_name(enc));
8134 goto error;
8135 }
8136 p->enc = enc;
8137#ifndef RIPPER
8138 if (p->debug_lines) {
8139 VALUE lines = p->debug_lines;
8140 long i, n = RARRAY_LEN(lines);
8141 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
8142 rb_enc_associate_index(RARRAY_AREF(lines, i), idx);
8143 }
8144 }
8145#endif
8146}
8147
8148static int
8149comment_at_top(struct parser_params *p)
8150{
8151 const char *ptr = p->lex.pbeg, *ptr_end = p->lex.pcur - 1;
8152 if (p->line_count != (p->has_shebang ? 2 : 1)) return 0;
8153 while (ptr < ptr_end) {
8154 if (!ISSPACE(*ptr)) return 0;
8155 ptr++;
8156 }
8157 return 1;
8158}
8159
8160typedef long (*rb_magic_comment_length_t)(struct parser_params *p, const char *name, long len);
8161typedef void (*rb_magic_comment_setter_t)(struct parser_params *p, const char *name, const char *val);
8162
8163static int parser_invalid_pragma_value(struct parser_params *p, const char *name, const char *val);
8164
8165static void
8166magic_comment_encoding(struct parser_params *p, const char *name, const char *val)
8167{
8168 if (!comment_at_top(p)) {
8169 return;
8170 }
8171 parser_set_encode(p, val);
8172}
8173
8174static int
8175parser_get_bool(struct parser_params *p, const char *name, const char *val)
8176{
8177 switch (*val) {
8178 case 't': case 'T':
8179 if (STRCASECMP(val, "true") == 0) {
8180 return TRUE;
8181 }
8182 break;
8183 case 'f': case 'F':
8184 if (STRCASECMP(val, "false") == 0) {
8185 return FALSE;
8186 }
8187 break;
8188 }
8189 return parser_invalid_pragma_value(p, name, val);
8190}
8191
8192static int
8193parser_invalid_pragma_value(struct parser_params *p, const char *name, const char *val)
8194{
8195 rb_warning2("invalid value for %s: %s", WARN_S(name), WARN_S(val));
8196 return -1;
8197}
8198
8199static void
8200parser_set_token_info(struct parser_params *p, const char *name, const char *val)
8201{
8202 int b = parser_get_bool(p, name, val);
8203 if (b >= 0) p->token_info_enabled = b;
8204}
8205
8206static void
8207parser_set_compile_option_flag(struct parser_params *p, const char *name, const char *val)
8208{
8209 int b;
8210
8211 if (p->token_seen) {
8212 rb_warning1("`%s' is ignored after any tokens", WARN_S(name));
8213 return;
8214 }
8215
8216 b = parser_get_bool(p, name, val);
8217 if (b < 0) return;
8218
8219 if (!p->compile_option)
8220 p->compile_option = rb_obj_hide(rb_ident_hash_new());
8221 rb_hash_aset(p->compile_option, ID2SYM(rb_intern(name)),
8222 RBOOL(b));
8223}
8224
8225static void
8226parser_set_shareable_constant_value(struct parser_params *p, const char *name, const char *val)
8227{
8228 for (const char *s = p->lex.pbeg, *e = p->lex.pcur; s < e; ++s) {
8229 if (*s == ' ' || *s == '\t') continue;
8230 if (*s == '#') break;
8231 rb_warning1("`%s' is ignored unless in comment-only line", WARN_S(name));
8232 return;
8233 }
8234
8235 switch (*val) {
8236 case 'n': case 'N':
8237 if (STRCASECMP(val, "none") == 0) {
8238 p->ctxt.shareable_constant_value = shareable_none;
8239 return;
8240 }
8241 break;
8242 case 'l': case 'L':
8243 if (STRCASECMP(val, "literal") == 0) {
8244 p->ctxt.shareable_constant_value = shareable_literal;
8245 return;
8246 }
8247 break;
8248 case 'e': case 'E':
8249 if (STRCASECMP(val, "experimental_copy") == 0) {
8250 p->ctxt.shareable_constant_value = shareable_copy;
8251 return;
8252 }
8253 if (STRCASECMP(val, "experimental_everything") == 0) {
8254 p->ctxt.shareable_constant_value = shareable_everything;
8255 return;
8256 }
8257 break;
8258 }
8259 parser_invalid_pragma_value(p, name, val);
8260}
8261
8262# if WARN_PAST_SCOPE
8263static void
8264parser_set_past_scope(struct parser_params *p, const char *name, const char *val)
8265{
8266 int b = parser_get_bool(p, name, val);
8267 if (b >= 0) p->past_scope_enabled = b;
8268}
8269# endif
8270
8271struct magic_comment {
8272 const char *name;
8273 rb_magic_comment_setter_t func;
8274 rb_magic_comment_length_t length;
8275};
8276
8277static const struct magic_comment magic_comments[] = {
8278 {"coding", magic_comment_encoding, parser_encode_length},
8279 {"encoding", magic_comment_encoding, parser_encode_length},
8280 {"frozen_string_literal", parser_set_compile_option_flag},
8281 {"shareable_constant_value", parser_set_shareable_constant_value},
8282 {"warn_indent", parser_set_token_info},
8283# if WARN_PAST_SCOPE
8284 {"warn_past_scope", parser_set_past_scope},
8285# endif
8286};
8287
8288static const char *
8289magic_comment_marker(const char *str, long len)
8290{
8291 long i = 2;
8292
8293 while (i < len) {
8294 switch (str[i]) {
8295 case '-':
8296 if (str[i-1] == '*' && str[i-2] == '-') {
8297 return str + i + 1;
8298 }
8299 i += 2;
8300 break;
8301 case '*':
8302 if (i + 1 >= len) return 0;
8303 if (str[i+1] != '-') {
8304 i += 4;
8305 }
8306 else if (str[i-1] != '-') {
8307 i += 2;
8308 }
8309 else {
8310 return str + i + 2;
8311 }
8312 break;
8313 default:
8314 i += 3;
8315 break;
8316 }
8317 }
8318 return 0;
8319}
8320
8321static int
8322parser_magic_comment(struct parser_params *p, const char *str, long len)
8323{
8324 int indicator = 0;
8325 VALUE name = 0, val = 0;
8326 const char *beg, *end, *vbeg, *vend;
8327#define str_copy(_s, _p, _n) ((_s) \
8328 ? (void)(rb_str_resize((_s), (_n)), \
8329 MEMCPY(RSTRING_PTR(_s), (_p), char, (_n)), (_s)) \
8330 : (void)((_s) = STR_NEW((_p), (_n))))
8331
8332 if (len <= 7) return FALSE;
8333 if (!!(beg = magic_comment_marker(str, len))) {
8334 if (!(end = magic_comment_marker(beg, str + len - beg)))
8335 return FALSE;
8336 indicator = TRUE;
8337 str = beg;
8338 len = end - beg - 3;
8339 }
8340
8341 /* %r"([^\\s\'\":;]+)\\s*:\\s*(\"(?:\\\\.|[^\"])*\"|[^\"\\s;]+)[\\s;]*" */
8342 while (len > 0) {
8343 const struct magic_comment *mc = magic_comments;
8344 char *s;
8345 int i;
8346 long n = 0;
8347
8348 for (; len > 0 && *str; str++, --len) {
8349 switch (*str) {
8350 case '\'': case '"': case ':': case ';':
8351 continue;
8352 }
8353 if (!ISSPACE(*str)) break;
8354 }
8355 for (beg = str; len > 0; str++, --len) {
8356 switch (*str) {
8357 case '\'': case '"': case ':': case ';':
8358 break;
8359 default:
8360 if (ISSPACE(*str)) break;
8361 continue;
8362 }
8363 break;
8364 }
8365 for (end = str; len > 0 && ISSPACE(*str); str++, --len);
8366 if (!len) break;
8367 if (*str != ':') {
8368 if (!indicator) return FALSE;
8369 continue;
8370 }
8371
8372 do str++; while (--len > 0 && ISSPACE(*str));
8373 if (!len) break;
8374 if (*str == '"') {
8375 for (vbeg = ++str; --len > 0 && *str != '"'; str++) {
8376 if (*str == '\\') {
8377 --len;
8378 ++str;
8379 }
8380 }
8381 vend = str;
8382 if (len) {
8383 --len;
8384 ++str;
8385 }
8386 }
8387 else {
8388 for (vbeg = str; len > 0 && *str != '"' && *str != ';' && !ISSPACE(*str); --len, str++);
8389 vend = str;
8390 }
8391 if (indicator) {
8392 while (len > 0 && (*str == ';' || ISSPACE(*str))) --len, str++;
8393 }
8394 else {
8395 while (len > 0 && (ISSPACE(*str))) --len, str++;
8396 if (len) return FALSE;
8397 }
8398
8399 n = end - beg;
8400 str_copy(name, beg, n);
8401 s = RSTRING_PTR(name);
8402 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
8403 if (s[i] == '-') s[i] = '_';
8404 }
8405 do {
8406 if (STRNCASECMP(mc->name, s, n) == 0 && !mc->name[n]) {
8407 n = vend - vbeg;
8408 if (mc->length) {
8409 n = (*mc->length)(p, vbeg, n);
8410 }
8411 str_copy(val, vbeg, n);
8412 (*mc->func)(p, mc->name, RSTRING_PTR(val));
8413 break;
8414 }
8415 } while (++mc < magic_comments + numberof(magic_comments));
8416#ifdef RIPPER
8417 str_copy(val, vbeg, vend - vbeg);
8418 dispatch2(magic_comment, name, val);
8419#endif
8420 }
8421
8422 return TRUE;
8423}
8424
8425static void
8426set_file_encoding(struct parser_params *p, const char *str, const char *send)
8427{
8428 int sep = 0;
8429 const char *beg = str;
8430 VALUE s;
8431
8432 for (;;) {
8433 if (send - str <= 6) return;
8434 switch (str[6]) {
8435 case 'C': case 'c': str += 6; continue;
8436 case 'O': case 'o': str += 5; continue;
8437 case 'D': case 'd': str += 4; continue;
8438 case 'I': case 'i': str += 3; continue;
8439 case 'N': case 'n': str += 2; continue;
8440 case 'G': case 'g': str += 1; continue;
8441 case '=': case ':':
8442 sep = 1;
8443 str += 6;
8444 break;
8445 default:
8446 str += 6;
8447 if (ISSPACE(*str)) break;
8448 continue;
8449 }
8450 if (STRNCASECMP(str-6, "coding", 6) == 0) break;
8451 sep = 0;
8452 }
8453 for (;;) {
8454 do {
8455 if (++str >= send) return;
8456 } while (ISSPACE(*str));
8457 if (sep) break;
8458 if (*str != '=' && *str != ':') return;
8459 sep = 1;
8460 str++;
8461 }
8462 beg = str;
8463 while ((*str == '-' || *str == '_' || ISALNUM(*str)) && ++str < send);
8464 s = rb_str_new(beg, parser_encode_length(p, beg, str - beg));
8465 parser_set_encode(p, RSTRING_PTR(s));
8466 rb_str_resize(s, 0);
8467}
8468
8469static void
8470parser_prepare(struct parser_params *p)
8471{
8472 int c = nextc(p);
8473 p->token_info_enabled = !compile_for_eval && RTEST(ruby_verbose);
8474 switch (c) {
8475 case '#':
8476 if (peek(p, '!')) p->has_shebang = 1;
8477 break;
8478 case 0xef: /* UTF-8 BOM marker */
8479 if (p->lex.pend - p->lex.pcur >= 2 &&
8480 (unsigned char)p->lex.pcur[0] == 0xbb &&
8481 (unsigned char)p->lex.pcur[1] == 0xbf) {
8482 p->enc = rb_utf8_encoding();
8483 p->lex.pcur += 2;
8484 p->lex.pbeg = p->lex.pcur;
8485 return;
8486 }
8487 break;
8488 case EOF:
8489 return;
8490 }
8491 pushback(p, c);
8492 p->enc = rb_enc_get(p->lex.lastline);
8493}
8494
8495#ifndef RIPPER
8496#define ambiguous_operator(tok, op, syn) ( \
8497 rb_warning0("`"op"' after local variable or literal is interpreted as binary operator"), \
8498 rb_warning0("even though it seems like "syn""))
8499#else
8500#define ambiguous_operator(tok, op, syn) \
8501 dispatch2(operator_ambiguous, TOKEN2VAL(tok), rb_str_new_cstr(syn))
8502#endif
8503#define warn_balanced(tok, op, syn) ((void) \
8504 (!IS_lex_state_for(last_state, EXPR_CLASS|EXPR_DOT|EXPR_FNAME|EXPR_ENDFN) && \
8505 space_seen && !ISSPACE(c) && \
8506 (ambiguous_operator(tok, op, syn), 0)), \
8507 (enum yytokentype)(tok))
8508
8509static VALUE
8510parse_rational(struct parser_params *p, char *str, int len, int seen_point)
8511{
8512 VALUE v;
8513 char *point = &str[seen_point];
8514 size_t fraclen = len-seen_point-1;
8515 memmove(point, point+1, fraclen+1);
8516 v = rb_cstr_to_inum(str, 10, FALSE);
8517 return rb_rational_new(v, rb_int_positive_pow(10, fraclen));
8518}
8519
8520static enum yytokentype
8521no_digits(struct parser_params *p)
8522{
8523 yyerror0("numeric literal without digits");
8524 if (peek(p, '_')) nextc(p);
8525 /* dummy 0, for tUMINUS_NUM at numeric */
8526 return set_integer_literal(p, INT2FIX(0), 0);
8527}
8528
8529static enum yytokentype
8530parse_numeric(struct parser_params *p, int c)
8531{
8532 int is_float, seen_point, seen_e, nondigit;
8533 int suffix;
8534
8535 is_float = seen_point = seen_e = nondigit = 0;
8536 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
8537 newtok(p);
8538 if (c == '-' || c == '+') {
8539 tokadd(p, c);
8540 c = nextc(p);
8541 }
8542 if (c == '0') {
8543 int start = toklen(p);
8544 c = nextc(p);
8545 if (c == 'x' || c == 'X') {
8546 /* hexadecimal */
8547 c = nextc(p);
8548 if (c != -1 && ISXDIGIT(c)) {
8549 do {
8550 if (c == '_') {
8551 if (nondigit) break;
8552 nondigit = c;
8553 continue;
8554 }
8555 if (!ISXDIGIT(c)) break;
8556 nondigit = 0;
8557 tokadd(p, c);
8558 } while ((c = nextc(p)) != -1);
8559 }
8560 pushback(p, c);
8561 tokfix(p);
8562 if (toklen(p) == start) {
8563 return no_digits(p);
8564 }
8565 else if (nondigit) goto trailing_uc;
8566 suffix = number_literal_suffix(p, NUM_SUFFIX_ALL);
8567 return set_integer_literal(p, rb_cstr_to_inum(tok(p), 16, FALSE), suffix);
8568 }
8569 if (c == 'b' || c == 'B') {
8570 /* binary */
8571 c = nextc(p);
8572 if (c == '0' || c == '1') {
8573 do {
8574 if (c == '_') {
8575 if (nondigit) break;
8576 nondigit = c;
8577 continue;
8578 }
8579 if (c != '0' && c != '1') break;
8580 nondigit = 0;
8581 tokadd(p, c);
8582 } while ((c = nextc(p)) != -1);
8583 }
8584 pushback(p, c);
8585 tokfix(p);
8586 if (toklen(p) == start) {
8587 return no_digits(p);
8588 }
8589 else if (nondigit) goto trailing_uc;
8590 suffix = number_literal_suffix(p, NUM_SUFFIX_ALL);
8591 return set_integer_literal(p, rb_cstr_to_inum(tok(p), 2, FALSE), suffix);
8592 }
8593 if (c == 'd' || c == 'D') {
8594 /* decimal */
8595 c = nextc(p);
8596 if (c != -1 && ISDIGIT(c)) {
8597 do {
8598 if (c == '_') {
8599 if (nondigit) break;
8600 nondigit = c;
8601 continue;
8602 }
8603 if (!ISDIGIT(c)) break;
8604 nondigit = 0;
8605 tokadd(p, c);
8606 } while ((c = nextc(p)) != -1);
8607 }
8608 pushback(p, c);
8609 tokfix(p);
8610 if (toklen(p) == start) {
8611 return no_digits(p);
8612 }
8613 else if (nondigit) goto trailing_uc;
8614 suffix = number_literal_suffix(p, NUM_SUFFIX_ALL);
8615 return set_integer_literal(p, rb_cstr_to_inum(tok(p), 10, FALSE), suffix);
8616 }
8617 if (c == '_') {
8618 /* 0_0 */
8619 goto octal_number;
8620 }
8621 if (c == 'o' || c == 'O') {
8622 /* prefixed octal */
8623 c = nextc(p);
8624 if (c == -1 || c == '_' || !ISDIGIT(c)) {
8625 return no_digits(p);
8626 }
8627 }
8628 if (c >= '0' && c <= '7') {
8629 /* octal */
8630 octal_number:
8631 do {
8632 if (c == '_') {
8633 if (nondigit) break;
8634 nondigit = c;
8635 continue;
8636 }
8637 if (c < '0' || c > '9') break;
8638 if (c > '7') goto invalid_octal;
8639 nondigit = 0;
8640 tokadd(p, c);
8641 } while ((c = nextc(p)) != -1);
8642 if (toklen(p) > start) {
8643 pushback(p, c);
8644 tokfix(p);
8645 if (nondigit) goto trailing_uc;
8646 suffix = number_literal_suffix(p, NUM_SUFFIX_ALL);
8647 return set_integer_literal(p, rb_cstr_to_inum(tok(p), 8, FALSE), suffix);
8648 }
8649 if (nondigit) {
8650 pushback(p, c);
8651 goto trailing_uc;
8652 }
8653 }
8654 if (c > '7' && c <= '9') {
8655 invalid_octal:
8656 yyerror0("Invalid octal digit");
8657 }
8658 else if (c == '.' || c == 'e' || c == 'E') {
8659 tokadd(p, '0');
8660 }
8661 else {
8662 pushback(p, c);
8663 suffix = number_literal_suffix(p, NUM_SUFFIX_ALL);
8664 return set_integer_literal(p, INT2FIX(0), suffix);
8665 }
8666 }
8667
8668 for (;;) {
8669 switch (c) {
8670 case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': case '4':
8671 case '5': case '6': case '7': case '8': case '9':
8672 nondigit = 0;
8673 tokadd(p, c);
8674 break;
8675
8676 case '.':
8677 if (nondigit) goto trailing_uc;
8678 if (seen_point || seen_e) {
8679 goto decode_num;
8680 }
8681 else {
8682 int c0 = nextc(p);
8683 if (c0 == -1 || !ISDIGIT(c0)) {
8684 pushback(p, c0);
8685 goto decode_num;
8686 }
8687 c = c0;
8688 }
8689 seen_point = toklen(p);
8690 tokadd(p, '.');
8691 tokadd(p, c);
8692 is_float++;
8693 nondigit = 0;
8694 break;
8695
8696 case 'e':
8697 case 'E':
8698 if (nondigit) {
8699 pushback(p, c);
8700 c = nondigit;
8701 goto decode_num;
8702 }
8703 if (seen_e) {
8704 goto decode_num;
8705 }
8706 nondigit = c;
8707 c = nextc(p);
8708 if (c != '-' && c != '+' && !ISDIGIT(c)) {
8709 pushback(p, c);
8710 nondigit = 0;
8711 goto decode_num;
8712 }
8713 tokadd(p, nondigit);
8714 seen_e++;
8715 is_float++;
8716 tokadd(p, c);
8717 nondigit = (c == '-' || c == '+') ? c : 0;
8718 break;
8719
8720 case '_': /* `_' in number just ignored */
8721 if (nondigit) goto decode_num;
8722 nondigit = c;
8723 break;
8724
8725 default:
8726 goto decode_num;
8727 }
8728 c = nextc(p);
8729 }
8730
8731 decode_num:
8732 pushback(p, c);
8733 if (nondigit) {
8734 trailing_uc:
8735 literal_flush(p, p->lex.pcur - 1);
8736 YYLTYPE loc = RUBY_INIT_YYLLOC();
8737 compile_error(p, "trailing `%c' in number", nondigit);
8738 parser_show_error_line(p, &loc);
8739 }
8740 tokfix(p);
8741 if (is_float) {
8742 enum yytokentype type = tFLOAT;
8743 VALUE v;
8744
8745 suffix = number_literal_suffix(p, seen_e ? NUM_SUFFIX_I : NUM_SUFFIX_ALL);
8746 if (suffix & NUM_SUFFIX_R) {
8747 type = tRATIONAL;
8748 v = parse_rational(p, tok(p), toklen(p), seen_point);
8749 }
8750 else {
8751 double d = strtod(tok(p), 0);
8752 if (errno == ERANGE) {
8753 rb_warning1("Float %s out of range", WARN_S(tok(p)));
8754 errno = 0;
8755 }
8756 v = DBL2NUM(d);
8757 }
8758 return set_number_literal(p, v, type, suffix);
8759 }
8760 suffix = number_literal_suffix(p, NUM_SUFFIX_ALL);
8761 return set_integer_literal(p, rb_cstr_to_inum(tok(p), 10, FALSE), suffix);
8762}
8763
8764static enum yytokentype
8765parse_qmark(struct parser_params *p, int space_seen)
8766{
8767 rb_encoding *enc;
8768 register int c;
8769 VALUE lit;
8770
8771 if (IS_END()) {
8772 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_VALUE);
8773 return '?';
8774 }
8775 c = nextc(p);
8776 if (c == -1) {
8777 compile_error(p, "incomplete character syntax");
8778 return 0;
8779 }
8780 if (rb_enc_isspace(c, p->enc)) {
8781 if (!IS_ARG()) {
8782 int c2 = escaped_control_code(c);
8783 if (c2) {
8784 WARN_SPACE_CHAR(c2, "?");
8785 }
8786 }
8787 ternary:
8788 pushback(p, c);
8789 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_VALUE);
8790 return '?';
8791 }
8792 newtok(p);
8793 enc = p->enc;
8794 if (!parser_isascii(p)) {
8795 if (tokadd_mbchar(p, c) == -1) return 0;
8796 }
8797 else if ((rb_enc_isalnum(c, p->enc) || c == '_') &&
8798 p->lex.pcur < p->lex.pend && is_identchar(p->lex.pcur, p->lex.pend, p->enc)) {
8799 if (space_seen) {
8800 const char *start = p->lex.pcur - 1, *ptr = start;
8801 do {
8802 int n = parser_precise_mbclen(p, ptr);
8803 if (n < 0) return -1;
8804 ptr += n;
8805 } while (ptr < p->lex.pend && is_identchar(ptr, p->lex.pend, p->enc));
8806 rb_warn2("`?' just followed by `%.*s' is interpreted as" \
8807 " a conditional operator, put a space after `?'",
8808 WARN_I((int)(ptr - start)), WARN_S_L(start, (ptr - start)));
8809 }
8810 goto ternary;
8811 }
8812 else if (c == '\\') {
8813 if (peek(p, 'u')) {
8814 nextc(p);
8815 enc = rb_utf8_encoding();
8816 tokadd_utf8(p, &enc, -1, 0, 0);
8817 }
8818 else if (!lex_eol_p(p) && !(c = *p->lex.pcur, ISASCII(c))) {
8819 nextc(p);
8820 if (tokadd_mbchar(p, c) == -1) return 0;
8821 }
8822 else {
8823 c = read_escape(p, 0, &enc);
8824 tokadd(p, c);
8825 }
8826 }
8827 else {
8828 tokadd(p, c);
8829 }
8830 tokfix(p);
8831 lit = STR_NEW3(tok(p), toklen(p), enc, 0);
8832 set_yylval_str(lit);
8833 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
8834 return tCHAR;
8835}
8836
8837static enum yytokentype
8838parse_percent(struct parser_params *p, const int space_seen, const enum lex_state_e last_state)
8839{
8840 register int c;
8841 const char *ptok = p->lex.pcur;
8842
8843 if (IS_BEG()) {
8844 int term;
8845 int paren;
8846
8847 c = nextc(p);
8848 quotation:
8849 if (c == -1) goto unterminated;
8850 if (!ISALNUM(c)) {
8851 term = c;
8852 if (!ISASCII(c)) goto unknown;
8853 c = 'Q';
8854 }
8855 else {
8856 term = nextc(p);
8857 if (rb_enc_isalnum(term, p->enc) || !parser_isascii(p)) {
8858 unknown:
8859 pushback(p, term);
8860 c = parser_precise_mbclen(p, p->lex.pcur);
8861 if (c < 0) return 0;
8862 p->lex.pcur += c;
8863 yyerror0("unknown type of %string");
8864 return 0;
8865 }
8866 }
8867 if (term == -1) {
8868 unterminated:
8869 compile_error(p, "unterminated quoted string meets end of file");
8870 return 0;
8871 }
8872 paren = term;
8873 if (term == '(') term = ')';
8874 else if (term == '[') term = ']';
8875 else if (term == '{') term = '}';
8876 else if (term == '<') term = '>';
8877 else paren = 0;
8878
8879 p->lex.ptok = ptok-1;
8880 switch (c) {
8881 case 'Q':
8882 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_dquote, term, paren);
8883 return tSTRING_BEG;
8884
8885 case 'q':
8886 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_squote, term, paren);
8887 return tSTRING_BEG;
8888
8889 case 'W':
8890 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_dword, term, paren);
8891 return tWORDS_BEG;
8892
8893 case 'w':
8894 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_sword, term, paren);
8895 return tQWORDS_BEG;
8896
8897 case 'I':
8898 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_dword, term, paren);
8899 return tSYMBOLS_BEG;
8900
8901 case 'i':
8902 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_sword, term, paren);
8903 return tQSYMBOLS_BEG;
8904
8905 case 'x':
8906 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_xquote, term, paren);
8907 return tXSTRING_BEG;
8908
8909 case 'r':
8910 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_regexp, term, paren);
8911 return tREGEXP_BEG;
8912
8913 case 's':
8914 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_ssym, term, paren);
8915 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_FNAME|EXPR_FITEM);
8916 return tSYMBEG;
8917
8918 default:
8919 yyerror0("unknown type of %string");
8920 return 0;
8921 }
8922 }
8923 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '=') {
8924 set_yylval_id('%');
8925 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
8926 return tOP_ASGN;
8927 }
8928 if (IS_SPCARG(c) || (IS_lex_state(EXPR_FITEM) && c == 's')) {
8929 goto quotation;
8930 }
8931 SET_LEX_STATE(IS_AFTER_OPERATOR() ? EXPR_ARG : EXPR_BEG);
8932 pushback(p, c);
8933 return warn_balanced('%', "%%", "string literal");
8934}
8935
8936static int
8937tokadd_ident(struct parser_params *p, int c)
8938{
8939 do {
8940 if (tokadd_mbchar(p, c) == -1) return -1;
8941 c = nextc(p);
8942 } while (parser_is_identchar(p));
8943 pushback(p, c);
8944 return 0;
8945}
8946
8947static ID
8948tokenize_ident(struct parser_params *p, const enum lex_state_e last_state)
8949{
8950 ID ident = TOK_INTERN();
8951
8952 set_yylval_name(ident);
8953
8954 return ident;
8955}
8956
8957static int
8958parse_numvar(struct parser_params *p)
8959{
8960 size_t len;
8961 int overflow;
8962 unsigned long n = ruby_scan_digits(tok(p)+1, toklen(p)-1, 10, &len, &overflow);
8963 const unsigned long nth_ref_max =
8964 ((FIXNUM_MAX < INT_MAX) ? FIXNUM_MAX : INT_MAX) >> 1;
8965 /* NTH_REF is left-shifted to be ORed with back-ref flag and
8966 * turned into a Fixnum, in compile.c */
8967
8968 if (overflow || n > nth_ref_max) {
8969 /* compile_error()? */
8970 rb_warn1("`%s' is too big for a number variable, always nil", WARN_S(tok(p)));
8971 return 0; /* $0 is $PROGRAM_NAME, not NTH_REF */
8972 }
8973 else {
8974 return (int)n;
8975 }
8976}
8977
8978static enum yytokentype
8979parse_gvar(struct parser_params *p, const enum lex_state_e last_state)
8980{
8981 const char *ptr = p->lex.pcur;
8982 register int c;
8983
8984 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
8985 p->lex.ptok = ptr - 1; /* from '$' */
8986 newtok(p);
8987 c = nextc(p);
8988 switch (c) {
8989 case '_': /* $_: last read line string */
8990 c = nextc(p);
8991 if (parser_is_identchar(p)) {
8992 tokadd(p, '$');
8993 tokadd(p, '_');
8994 break;
8995 }
8996 pushback(p, c);
8997 c = '_';
8998 /* fall through */
8999 case '~': /* $~: match-data */
9000 case '*': /* $*: argv */
9001 case '$': /* $$: pid */
9002 case '?': /* $?: last status */
9003 case '!': /* $!: error string */
9004 case '@': /* $@: error position */
9005 case '/': /* $/: input record separator */
9006 case '\\': /* $\: output record separator */
9007 case ';': /* $;: field separator */
9008 case ',': /* $,: output field separator */
9009 case '.': /* $.: last read line number */
9010 case '=': /* $=: ignorecase */
9011 case ':': /* $:: load path */
9012 case '<': /* $<: reading filename */
9013 case '>': /* $>: default output handle */
9014 case '\"': /* $": already loaded files */
9015 tokadd(p, '$');
9016 tokadd(p, c);
9017 goto gvar;
9018
9019 case '-':
9020 tokadd(p, '$');
9021 tokadd(p, c);
9022 c = nextc(p);
9023 if (parser_is_identchar(p)) {
9024 if (tokadd_mbchar(p, c) == -1) return 0;
9025 }
9026 else {
9027 pushback(p, c);
9028 pushback(p, '-');
9029 return '$';
9030 }
9031 gvar:
9032 set_yylval_name(TOK_INTERN());
9033 return tGVAR;
9034
9035 case '&': /* $&: last match */
9036 case '`': /* $`: string before last match */
9037 case '\'': /* $': string after last match */
9038 case '+': /* $+: string matches last paren. */
9039 if (IS_lex_state_for(last_state, EXPR_FNAME)) {
9040 tokadd(p, '$');
9041 tokadd(p, c);
9042 goto gvar;
9043 }
9044 set_yylval_node(NEW_BACK_REF(c, &_cur_loc));
9045 return tBACK_REF;
9046
9047 case '1': case '2': case '3':
9048 case '4': case '5': case '6':
9049 case '7': case '8': case '9':
9050 tokadd(p, '$');
9051 do {
9052 tokadd(p, c);
9053 c = nextc(p);
9054 } while (c != -1 && ISDIGIT(c));
9055 pushback(p, c);
9056 if (IS_lex_state_for(last_state, EXPR_FNAME)) goto gvar;
9057 tokfix(p);
9058 c = parse_numvar(p);
9059 set_yylval_node(NEW_NTH_REF(c, &_cur_loc));
9060 return tNTH_REF;
9061
9062 default:
9063 if (!parser_is_identchar(p)) {
9064 YYLTYPE loc = RUBY_INIT_YYLLOC();
9065 if (c == -1 || ISSPACE(c)) {
9066 compile_error(p, "`$' without identifiers is not allowed as a global variable name");
9067 }
9068 else {
9069 pushback(p, c);
9070 compile_error(p, "`$%c' is not allowed as a global variable name", c);
9071 }
9072 parser_show_error_line(p, &loc);
9073 set_yylval_noname();
9074 return tGVAR;
9075 }
9076 /* fall through */
9077 case '0':
9078 tokadd(p, '$');
9079 }
9080
9081 if (tokadd_ident(p, c)) return 0;
9082 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
9083 tokenize_ident(p, last_state);
9084 return tGVAR;
9085}
9086
9087#ifndef RIPPER
9088static bool
9089parser_numbered_param(struct parser_params *p, int n)
9090{
9091 if (n < 0) return false;
9092
9093 if (DVARS_TERMINAL_P(p->lvtbl->args) || DVARS_TERMINAL_P(p->lvtbl->args->prev)) {
9094 return false;
9095 }
9096 if (p->max_numparam == ORDINAL_PARAM) {
9097 compile_error(p, "ordinary parameter is defined");
9098 return false;
9099 }
9100 struct vtable *args = p->lvtbl->args;
9101 if (p->max_numparam < n) {
9102 p->max_numparam = n;
9103 }
9104 while (n > args->pos) {
9105 vtable_add(args, NUMPARAM_IDX_TO_ID(args->pos+1));
9106 }
9107 return true;
9108}
9109#endif
9110
9111static enum yytokentype
9112parse_atmark(struct parser_params *p, const enum lex_state_e last_state)
9113{
9114 const char *ptr = p->lex.pcur;
9115 enum yytokentype result = tIVAR;
9116 register int c = nextc(p);
9117 YYLTYPE loc;
9118
9119 p->lex.ptok = ptr - 1; /* from '@' */
9120 newtok(p);
9121 tokadd(p, '@');
9122 if (c == '@') {
9123 result = tCVAR;
9124 tokadd(p, '@');
9125 c = nextc(p);
9126 }
9127 SET_LEX_STATE(IS_lex_state_for(last_state, EXPR_FNAME) ? EXPR_ENDFN : EXPR_END);
9128 if (c == -1 || !parser_is_identchar(p)) {
9129 pushback(p, c);
9130 RUBY_SET_YYLLOC(loc);
9131 if (result == tIVAR) {
9132 compile_error(p, "`@' without identifiers is not allowed as an instance variable name");
9133 }
9134 else {
9135 compile_error(p, "`@@' without identifiers is not allowed as a class variable name");
9136 }
9137 parser_show_error_line(p, &loc);
9138 set_yylval_noname();
9139 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
9140 return result;
9141 }
9142 else if (ISDIGIT(c)) {
9143 pushback(p, c);
9144 RUBY_SET_YYLLOC(loc);
9145 if (result == tIVAR) {
9146 compile_error(p, "`@%c' is not allowed as an instance variable name", c);
9147 }
9148 else {
9149 compile_error(p, "`@@%c' is not allowed as a class variable name", c);
9150 }
9151 parser_show_error_line(p, &loc);
9152 set_yylval_noname();
9153 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
9154 return result;
9155 }
9156
9157 if (tokadd_ident(p, c)) return 0;
9158 tokenize_ident(p, last_state);
9159 return result;
9160}
9161
9162static enum yytokentype
9163parse_ident(struct parser_params *p, int c, int cmd_state)
9164{
9165 enum yytokentype result;
9166 int mb = ENC_CODERANGE_7BIT;
9167 const enum lex_state_e last_state = p->lex.state;
9168 ID ident;
9169
9170 do {
9171 if (!ISASCII(c)) mb = ENC_CODERANGE_UNKNOWN;
9172 if (tokadd_mbchar(p, c) == -1) return 0;
9173 c = nextc(p);
9174 } while (parser_is_identchar(p));
9175 if ((c == '!' || c == '?') && !peek(p, '=')) {
9176 result = tFID;
9177 tokadd(p, c);
9178 }
9179 else if (c == '=' && IS_lex_state(EXPR_FNAME) &&
9180 (!peek(p, '~') && !peek(p, '>') && (!peek(p, '=') || (peek_n(p, '>', 1))))) {
9181 result = tIDENTIFIER;
9182 tokadd(p, c);
9183 }
9184 else {
9185 result = tCONSTANT; /* assume provisionally */
9186 pushback(p, c);
9187 }
9188 tokfix(p);
9189
9190 if (IS_LABEL_POSSIBLE()) {
9191 if (IS_LABEL_SUFFIX(0)) {
9192 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ARG|EXPR_LABELED);
9193 nextc(p);
9194 set_yylval_name(TOK_INTERN());
9195 return tLABEL;
9196 }
9197 }
9198 if (mb == ENC_CODERANGE_7BIT && !IS_lex_state(EXPR_DOT)) {
9199 const struct kwtable *kw;
9200
9201 /* See if it is a reserved word. */
9202 kw = rb_reserved_word(tok(p), toklen(p));
9203 if (kw) {
9204 enum lex_state_e state = p->lex.state;
9205 if (IS_lex_state_for(state, EXPR_FNAME)) {
9206 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ENDFN);
9207 set_yylval_name(rb_intern2(tok(p), toklen(p)));
9208 return kw->id[0];
9209 }
9210 SET_LEX_STATE(kw->state);
9211 if (IS_lex_state(EXPR_BEG)) {
9212 p->command_start = TRUE;
9213 }
9214 if (kw->id[0] == keyword_do) {
9215 if (lambda_beginning_p()) {
9216 p->lex.lpar_beg = -1; /* make lambda_beginning_p() == FALSE in the body of "-> do ... end" */
9217 return keyword_do_LAMBDA;
9218 }
9219 if (COND_P()) return keyword_do_cond;
9220 if (CMDARG_P() && !IS_lex_state_for(state, EXPR_CMDARG))
9221 return keyword_do_block;
9222 return keyword_do;
9223 }
9224 if (IS_lex_state_for(state, (EXPR_BEG | EXPR_LABELED)))
9225 return kw->id[0];
9226 else {
9227 if (kw->id[0] != kw->id[1])
9228 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG | EXPR_LABEL);
9229 return kw->id[1];
9230 }
9231 }
9232 }
9233
9234 if (IS_lex_state(EXPR_BEG_ANY | EXPR_ARG_ANY | EXPR_DOT)) {
9235 if (cmd_state) {
9236 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_CMDARG);
9237 }
9238 else {
9239 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ARG);
9240 }
9241 }
9242 else if (p->lex.state == EXPR_FNAME) {
9243 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ENDFN);
9244 }
9245 else {
9246 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
9247 }
9248
9249 ident = tokenize_ident(p, last_state);
9250 if (result == tCONSTANT && is_local_id(ident)) result = tIDENTIFIER;
9251 if (!IS_lex_state_for(last_state, EXPR_DOT|EXPR_FNAME) &&
9252 (result == tIDENTIFIER) && /* not EXPR_FNAME, not attrasgn */
9253 lvar_defined(p, ident)) {
9254 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END|EXPR_LABEL);
9255 }
9256 return result;
9257}
9258
9259static enum yytokentype
9260parser_yylex(struct parser_params *p)
9261{
9262 register int c;
9263 int space_seen = 0;
9264 int cmd_state;
9265 int label;
9266 enum lex_state_e last_state;
9267 int fallthru = FALSE;
9268 int token_seen = p->token_seen;
9269
9270 if (p->lex.strterm) {
9271 if (p->lex.strterm->flags & STRTERM_HEREDOC) {
9272 return here_document(p, &p->lex.strterm->u.heredoc);
9273 }
9274 else {
9275 token_flush(p);
9276 return parse_string(p, &p->lex.strterm->u.literal);
9277 }
9278 }
9279 cmd_state = p->command_start;
9280 p->command_start = FALSE;
9281 p->token_seen = TRUE;
9282 retry:
9283 last_state = p->lex.state;
9284#ifndef RIPPER
9285 token_flush(p);
9286#endif
9287 switch (c = nextc(p)) {
9288 case '\0': /* NUL */
9289 case '\004': /* ^D */
9290 case '\032': /* ^Z */
9291 case -1: /* end of script. */
9292 return 0;
9293
9294 /* white spaces */
9295 case '\r':
9296 if (!p->cr_seen) {
9297 p->cr_seen = TRUE;
9298 /* carried over with p->lex.nextline for nextc() */
9299 rb_warn0("encountered \\r in middle of line, treated as a mere space");
9300 }
9301 /* fall through */
9302 case ' ': case '\t': case '\f':
9303 case '\13': /* '\v' */
9304 space_seen = 1;
9305#ifdef RIPPER
9306 while ((c = nextc(p))) {
9307 switch (c) {
9308 case ' ': case '\t': case '\f': case '\r':
9309 case '\13': /* '\v' */
9310 break;
9311 default:
9312 goto outofloop;
9313 }
9314 }
9315 outofloop:
9316 pushback(p, c);
9317 dispatch_scan_event(p, tSP);
9318#endif
9319 goto retry;
9320
9321 case '#': /* it's a comment */
9322 p->token_seen = token_seen;
9323 /* no magic_comment in shebang line */
9324 if (!parser_magic_comment(p, p->lex.pcur, p->lex.pend - p->lex.pcur)) {
9325 if (comment_at_top(p)) {
9326 set_file_encoding(p, p->lex.pcur, p->lex.pend);
9327 }
9328 }
9329 lex_goto_eol(p);
9330 dispatch_scan_event(p, tCOMMENT);
9331 fallthru = TRUE;
9332 /* fall through */
9333 case '\n':
9334 p->token_seen = token_seen;
9335 c = (IS_lex_state(EXPR_BEG|EXPR_CLASS|EXPR_FNAME|EXPR_DOT) &&
9336 !IS_lex_state(EXPR_LABELED));
9337 if (c || IS_lex_state_all(EXPR_ARG|EXPR_LABELED)) {
9338 if (!fallthru) {
9339 dispatch_scan_event(p, tIGNORED_NL);
9340 }
9341 fallthru = FALSE;
9342 if (!c && p->ctxt.in_kwarg) {
9343 goto normal_newline;
9344 }
9345 goto retry;
9346 }
9347 while (1) {
9348 switch (c = nextc(p)) {
9349 case ' ': case '\t': case '\f': case '\r':
9350 case '\13': /* '\v' */
9351 space_seen = 1;
9352 break;
9353 case '#':
9354 pushback(p, c);
9355 if (space_seen) dispatch_scan_event(p, tSP);
9356 goto retry;
9357 case '&':
9358 case '.': {
9359 dispatch_delayed_token(p, tIGNORED_NL);
9360 if (peek(p, '.') == (c == '&')) {
9361 pushback(p, c);
9362 dispatch_scan_event(p, tSP);
9363 goto retry;
9364 }
9365 }
9366 default:
9367 p->ruby_sourceline--;
9368 p->lex.nextline = p->lex.lastline;
9369 case -1: /* EOF no decrement*/
9370#ifndef RIPPER
9371 if (p->lex.prevline && !p->eofp) p->lex.lastline = p->lex.prevline;
9372 p->lex.pbeg = RSTRING_PTR(p->lex.lastline);
9373 p->lex.pend = p->lex.pcur = p->lex.pbeg + RSTRING_LEN(p->lex.lastline);
9374 pushback(p, 1); /* always pushback */
9375 p->lex.ptok = p->lex.pcur;
9376#else
9377 lex_goto_eol(p);
9378 if (c != -1) {
9379 p->lex.ptok = p->lex.pcur;
9380 }
9381#endif
9382 goto normal_newline;
9383 }
9384 }
9385 normal_newline:
9386 p->command_start = TRUE;
9387 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9388 return '\n';
9389
9390 case '*':
9391 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '*') {
9392 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '=') {
9393 set_yylval_id(idPow);
9394 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9395 return tOP_ASGN;
9396 }
9397 pushback(p, c);
9398 if (IS_SPCARG(c)) {
9399 rb_warning0("`**' interpreted as argument prefix");
9400 c = tDSTAR;
9401 }
9402 else if (IS_BEG()) {
9403 c = tDSTAR;
9404 }
9405 else {
9406 c = warn_balanced((enum ruby_method_ids)tPOW, "**", "argument prefix");
9407 }
9408 }
9409 else {
9410 if (c == '=') {
9411 set_yylval_id('*');
9412 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9413 return tOP_ASGN;
9414 }
9415 pushback(p, c);
9416 if (IS_SPCARG(c)) {
9417 rb_warning0("`*' interpreted as argument prefix");
9418 c = tSTAR;
9419 }
9420 else if (IS_BEG()) {
9421 c = tSTAR;
9422 }
9423 else {
9424 c = warn_balanced('*', "*", "argument prefix");
9425 }
9426 }
9427 SET_LEX_STATE(IS_AFTER_OPERATOR() ? EXPR_ARG : EXPR_BEG);
9428 return c;
9429
9430 case '!':
9431 c = nextc(p);
9432 if (IS_AFTER_OPERATOR()) {
9433 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ARG);
9434 if (c == '@') {
9435 return '!';
9436 }
9437 }
9438 else {
9439 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9440 }
9441 if (c == '=') {
9442 return tNEQ;
9443 }
9444 if (c == '~') {
9445 return tNMATCH;
9446 }
9447 pushback(p, c);
9448 return '!';
9449
9450 case '=':
9451 if (was_bol(p)) {
9452 /* skip embedded rd document */
9453 if (word_match_p(p, "begin", 5)) {
9454 int first_p = TRUE;
9455
9456 lex_goto_eol(p);
9457 dispatch_scan_event(p, tEMBDOC_BEG);
9458 for (;;) {
9459 lex_goto_eol(p);
9460 if (!first_p) {
9461 dispatch_scan_event(p, tEMBDOC);
9462 }
9463 first_p = FALSE;
9464 c = nextc(p);
9465 if (c == -1) {
9466 compile_error(p, "embedded document meets end of file");
9467 return 0;
9468 }
9469 if (c == '=' && word_match_p(p, "end", 3)) {
9470 break;
9471 }
9472 pushback(p, c);
9473 }
9474 lex_goto_eol(p);
9475 dispatch_scan_event(p, tEMBDOC_END);
9476 goto retry;
9477 }
9478 }
9479
9480 SET_LEX_STATE(IS_AFTER_OPERATOR() ? EXPR_ARG : EXPR_BEG);
9481 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '=') {
9482 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '=') {
9483 return tEQQ;
9484 }
9485 pushback(p, c);
9486 return tEQ;
9487 }
9488 if (c == '~') {
9489 return tMATCH;
9490 }
9491 else if (c == '>') {
9492 return tASSOC;
9493 }
9494 pushback(p, c);
9495 return '=';
9496
9497 case '<':
9498 c = nextc(p);
9499 if (c == '<' &&
9500 !IS_lex_state(EXPR_DOT | EXPR_CLASS) &&
9501 !IS_END() &&
9502 (!IS_ARG() || IS_lex_state(EXPR_LABELED) || space_seen)) {
9503 int token = heredoc_identifier(p);
9504 if (token) return token < 0 ? 0 : token;
9505 }
9506 if (IS_AFTER_OPERATOR()) {
9507 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ARG);
9508 }
9509 else {
9510 if (IS_lex_state(EXPR_CLASS))
9511 p->command_start = TRUE;
9512 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9513 }
9514 if (c == '=') {
9515 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '>') {
9516 return tCMP;
9517 }
9518 pushback(p, c);
9519 return tLEQ;
9520 }
9521 if (c == '<') {
9522 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '=') {
9523 set_yylval_id(idLTLT);
9524 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9525 return tOP_ASGN;
9526 }
9527 pushback(p, c);
9528 return warn_balanced((enum ruby_method_ids)tLSHFT, "<<", "here document");
9529 }
9530 pushback(p, c);
9531 return '<';
9532
9533 case '>':
9534 SET_LEX_STATE(IS_AFTER_OPERATOR() ? EXPR_ARG : EXPR_BEG);
9535 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '=') {
9536 return tGEQ;
9537 }
9538 if (c == '>') {
9539 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '=') {
9540 set_yylval_id(idGTGT);
9541 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9542 return tOP_ASGN;
9543 }
9544 pushback(p, c);
9545 return tRSHFT;
9546 }
9547 pushback(p, c);
9548 return '>';
9549
9550 case '"':
9551 label = (IS_LABEL_POSSIBLE() ? str_label : 0);
9552 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_dquote | label, '"', 0);
9553 p->lex.ptok = p->lex.pcur-1;
9554 return tSTRING_BEG;
9555
9556 case '`':
9557 if (IS_lex_state(EXPR_FNAME)) {
9558 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ENDFN);
9559 return c;
9560 }
9561 if (IS_lex_state(EXPR_DOT)) {
9562 if (cmd_state)
9563 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_CMDARG);
9564 else
9565 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ARG);
9566 return c;
9567 }
9568 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_xquote, '`', 0);
9569 return tXSTRING_BEG;
9570
9571 case '\'':
9572 label = (IS_LABEL_POSSIBLE() ? str_label : 0);
9573 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_squote | label, '\'', 0);
9574 p->lex.ptok = p->lex.pcur-1;
9575 return tSTRING_BEG;
9576
9577 case '?':
9578 return parse_qmark(p, space_seen);
9579
9580 case '&':
9581 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '&') {
9582 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9583 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '=') {
9584 set_yylval_id(idANDOP);
9585 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9586 return tOP_ASGN;
9587 }
9588 pushback(p, c);
9589 return tANDOP;
9590 }
9591 else if (c == '=') {
9592 set_yylval_id('&');
9593 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9594 return tOP_ASGN;
9595 }
9596 else if (c == '.') {
9597 set_yylval_id(idANDDOT);
9598 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_DOT);
9599 return tANDDOT;
9600 }
9601 pushback(p, c);
9602 if (IS_SPCARG(c)) {
9603 if ((c != ':') ||
9604 (c = peekc_n(p, 1)) == -1 ||
9605 !(c == '\'' || c == '"' ||
9606 is_identchar((p->lex.pcur+1), p->lex.pend, p->enc))) {
9607 rb_warning0("`&' interpreted as argument prefix");
9608 }
9609 c = tAMPER;
9610 }
9611 else if (IS_BEG()) {
9612 c = tAMPER;
9613 }
9614 else {
9615 c = warn_balanced('&', "&", "argument prefix");
9616 }
9617 SET_LEX_STATE(IS_AFTER_OPERATOR() ? EXPR_ARG : EXPR_BEG);
9618 return c;
9619
9620 case '|':
9621 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '|') {
9622 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9623 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '=') {
9624 set_yylval_id(idOROP);
9625 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9626 return tOP_ASGN;
9627 }
9628 pushback(p, c);
9629 if (IS_lex_state_for(last_state, EXPR_BEG)) {
9630 c = '|';
9631 pushback(p, '|');
9632 return c;
9633 }
9634 return tOROP;
9635 }
9636 if (c == '=') {
9637 set_yylval_id('|');
9638 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9639 return tOP_ASGN;
9640 }
9641 SET_LEX_STATE(IS_AFTER_OPERATOR() ? EXPR_ARG : EXPR_BEG|EXPR_LABEL);
9642 pushback(p, c);
9643 return '|';
9644
9645 case '+':
9646 c = nextc(p);
9647 if (IS_AFTER_OPERATOR()) {
9648 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ARG);
9649 if (c == '@') {
9650 return tUPLUS;
9651 }
9652 pushback(p, c);
9653 return '+';
9654 }
9655 if (c == '=') {
9656 set_yylval_id('+');
9657 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9658 return tOP_ASGN;
9659 }
9660 if (IS_BEG() || (IS_SPCARG(c) && arg_ambiguous(p, '+'))) {
9661 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9662 pushback(p, c);
9663 if (c != -1 && ISDIGIT(c)) {
9664 return parse_numeric(p, '+');
9665 }
9666 return tUPLUS;
9667 }
9668 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9669 pushback(p, c);
9670 return warn_balanced('+', "+", "unary operator");
9671
9672 case '-':
9673 c = nextc(p);
9674 if (IS_AFTER_OPERATOR()) {
9675 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ARG);
9676 if (c == '@') {
9677 return tUMINUS;
9678 }
9679 pushback(p, c);
9680 return '-';
9681 }
9682 if (c == '=') {
9683 set_yylval_id('-');
9684 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9685 return tOP_ASGN;
9686 }
9687 if (c == '>') {
9688 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ENDFN);
9689 return tLAMBDA;
9690 }
9691 if (IS_BEG() || (IS_SPCARG(c) && arg_ambiguous(p, '-'))) {
9692 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9693 pushback(p, c);
9694 if (c != -1 && ISDIGIT(c)) {
9695 return tUMINUS_NUM;
9696 }
9697 return tUMINUS;
9698 }
9699 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9700 pushback(p, c);
9701 return warn_balanced('-', "-", "unary operator");
9702
9703 case '.': {
9704 int is_beg = IS_BEG();
9705 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9706 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '.') {
9707 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '.') {
9708 if (p->ctxt.in_argdef) {
9709 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ENDARG);
9710 return tBDOT3;
9711 }
9712 if (p->lex.paren_nest == 0 && looking_at_eol_p(p)) {
9713 rb_warn0("... at EOL, should be parenthesized?");
9714 }
9715 else if (p->lex.lpar_beg >= 0 && p->lex.lpar_beg+1 == p->lex.paren_nest) {
9716 if (IS_lex_state_for(last_state, EXPR_LABEL))
9717 return tDOT3;
9718 }
9719 return is_beg ? tBDOT3 : tDOT3;
9720 }
9721 pushback(p, c);
9722 return is_beg ? tBDOT2 : tDOT2;
9723 }
9724 pushback(p, c);
9725 if (c != -1 && ISDIGIT(c)) {
9726 char prev = p->lex.pcur-1 > p->lex.pbeg ? *(p->lex.pcur-2) : 0;
9727 parse_numeric(p, '.');
9728 if (ISDIGIT(prev)) {
9729 yyerror0("unexpected fraction part after numeric literal");
9730 }
9731 else {
9732 yyerror0("no .<digit> floating literal anymore; put 0 before dot");
9733 }
9734 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
9735 p->lex.ptok = p->lex.pcur;
9736 goto retry;
9737 }
9738 set_yylval_id('.');
9739 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_DOT);
9740 return '.';
9741 }
9742
9743 case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': case '4':
9744 case '5': case '6': case '7': case '8': case '9':
9745 return parse_numeric(p, c);
9746
9747 case ')':
9748 COND_POP();
9749 CMDARG_POP();
9750 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ENDFN);
9751 p->lex.paren_nest--;
9752 return c;
9753
9754 case ']':
9755 COND_POP();
9756 CMDARG_POP();
9757 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
9758 p->lex.paren_nest--;
9759 return c;
9760
9761 case '}':
9762 /* tSTRING_DEND does COND_POP and CMDARG_POP in the yacc's rule */
9763 if (!p->lex.brace_nest--) return tSTRING_DEND;
9764 COND_POP();
9765 CMDARG_POP();
9766 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_END);
9767 p->lex.paren_nest--;
9768 return c;
9769
9770 case ':':
9771 c = nextc(p);
9772 if (c == ':') {
9773 if (IS_BEG() || IS_lex_state(EXPR_CLASS) || IS_SPCARG(-1)) {
9774 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9775 return tCOLON3;
9776 }
9777 set_yylval_id(idCOLON2);
9778 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_DOT);
9779 return tCOLON2;
9780 }
9781 if (IS_END() || ISSPACE(c) || c == '#') {
9782 pushback(p, c);
9783 c = warn_balanced(':', ":", "symbol literal");
9784 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9785 return c;
9786 }
9787 switch (c) {
9788 case '\'':
9789 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_ssym, c, 0);
9790 break;
9791 case '"':
9792 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_dsym, c, 0);
9793 break;
9794 default:
9795 pushback(p, c);
9796 break;
9797 }
9798 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_FNAME);
9799 return tSYMBEG;
9800
9801 case '/':
9802 if (IS_BEG()) {
9803 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_regexp, '/', 0);
9804 return tREGEXP_BEG;
9805 }
9806 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '=') {
9807 set_yylval_id('/');
9808 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9809 return tOP_ASGN;
9810 }
9811 pushback(p, c);
9812 if (IS_SPCARG(c)) {
9813 arg_ambiguous(p, '/');
9814 p->lex.strterm = NEW_STRTERM(str_regexp, '/', 0);
9815 return tREGEXP_BEG;
9816 }
9817 SET_LEX_STATE(IS_AFTER_OPERATOR() ? EXPR_ARG : EXPR_BEG);
9818 return warn_balanced('/', "/", "regexp literal");
9819
9820 case '^':
9821 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '=') {
9822 set_yylval_id('^');
9823 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9824 return tOP_ASGN;
9825 }
9826 SET_LEX_STATE(IS_AFTER_OPERATOR() ? EXPR_ARG : EXPR_BEG);
9827 pushback(p, c);
9828 return '^';
9829
9830 case ';':
9831 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9832 p->command_start = TRUE;
9833 return ';';
9834
9835 case ',':
9836 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG|EXPR_LABEL);
9837 return ',';
9838
9839 case '~':
9840 if (IS_AFTER_OPERATOR()) {
9841 if ((c = nextc(p)) != '@') {
9842 pushback(p, c);
9843 }
9844 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ARG);
9845 }
9846 else {
9847 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9848 }
9849 return '~';
9850
9851 case '(':
9852 if (IS_BEG()) {
9853 c = tLPAREN;
9854 }
9855 else if (!space_seen) {
9856 /* foo( ... ) => method call, no ambiguity */
9857 }
9858 else if (IS_ARG() || IS_lex_state_all(EXPR_END|EXPR_LABEL)) {
9859 c = tLPAREN_ARG;
9860 }
9861 else if (IS_lex_state(EXPR_ENDFN) && !lambda_beginning_p()) {
9862 rb_warning0("parentheses after method name is interpreted as "
9863 "an argument list, not a decomposed argument");
9864 }
9865 p->lex.paren_nest++;
9866 COND_PUSH(0);
9867 CMDARG_PUSH(0);
9868 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG|EXPR_LABEL);
9869 return c;
9870
9871 case '[':
9872 p->lex.paren_nest++;
9873 if (IS_AFTER_OPERATOR()) {
9874 if ((c = nextc(p)) == ']') {
9875 p->lex.paren_nest--;
9876 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ARG);
9877 if ((c = nextc(p)) == '=') {
9878 return tASET;
9879 }
9880 pushback(p, c);
9881 return tAREF;
9882 }
9883 pushback(p, c);
9884 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_ARG|EXPR_LABEL);
9885 return '[';
9886 }
9887 else if (IS_BEG()) {
9888 c = tLBRACK;
9889 }
9890 else if (IS_ARG() && (space_seen || IS_lex_state(EXPR_LABELED))) {
9891 c = tLBRACK;
9892 }
9893 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG|EXPR_LABEL);
9894 COND_PUSH(0);
9895 CMDARG_PUSH(0);
9896 return c;
9897
9898 case '{':
9899 ++p->lex.brace_nest;
9900 if (lambda_beginning_p())
9901 c = tLAMBEG;
9902 else if (IS_lex_state(EXPR_LABELED))
9903 c = tLBRACE; /* hash */
9904 else if (IS_lex_state(EXPR_ARG_ANY | EXPR_END | EXPR_ENDFN))
9905 c = '{'; /* block (primary) */
9906 else if (IS_lex_state(EXPR_ENDARG))
9907 c = tLBRACE_ARG; /* block (expr) */
9908 else
9909 c = tLBRACE; /* hash */
9910 if (c != tLBRACE) {
9911 p->command_start = TRUE;
9912 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG);
9913 }
9914 else {
9915 SET_LEX_STATE(EXPR_BEG|EXPR_LABEL);
9916 }
9917 ++p->lex.paren_nest; /* after lambda_beginning_p() */
9918 COND_PUSH(0);
9919 CMDARG_PUSH(0);
9920 return c;
9921
9922 case '\\':
9923 c = nextc(p);
9924 if (c == '\n') {
9925 space_seen = 1;
9926 dispatch_scan_event(p, tSP);
9927 goto retry; /* skip \\n */
9928 }
9929 if (c == ' ') return tSP;
9930 if (ISSPACE(c)) return c;
9931 pushback(p, c);
9932 return '\\';
9933
9934 case '%':
9935 return parse_percent(p, space_seen, last_state);
9936
9937 case '$':
9938 return parse_gvar(p, last_state);
9939
9940 case '@':
9941 return parse_atmark(p, last_state);
9942
9943 case '_':
9944 if (was_bol(p) && whole_match_p(p, "__END__", 7, 0)) {
9945 p->ruby__end__seen = 1;
9946 p->eofp = 1;
9947#ifndef RIPPER
9948 return -1;
9949#else
9950 lex_goto_eol(p);
9951 dispatch_scan_event(p, k__END__);
9952 return 0;
9953#endif
9954 }
9955 newtok(p);
9956 break;
9957
9958 default:
9959 if (!parser_is_identchar(p)) {
9960 compile_error(p, "Invalid char `\\x%02X' in expression", c);
9961 token_flush(p);
9962 goto retry;
9963 }
9964
9965 newtok(p);
9966 break;
9967 }
9968
9969 return parse_ident(p, c, cmd_state);
9970}
9971
9972static enum yytokentype
9973yylex(YYSTYPE *lval, YYLTYPE *yylloc, struct parser_params *p)
9974{
9975 enum yytokentype t;
9976
9977 p->lval = lval;
9978 lval->val = Qundef;
9979 t = parser_yylex(p);
9980
9981 if (p->lex.strterm && (p->lex.strterm->flags & STRTERM_HEREDOC))
9982 RUBY_SET_YYLLOC_FROM_STRTERM_HEREDOC(*yylloc);
9983 else
9984 RUBY_SET_YYLLOC(*yylloc);
9985
9986 if (has_delayed_token(p))
9987 dispatch_delayed_token(p, t);
9988 else if (t != 0)
9989 dispatch_scan_event(p, t);
9990
9991 return t;
9992}
9993
9994#define LVAR_USED ((ID)1 << (sizeof(ID) * CHAR_BIT - 1))
9995
9996static NODE*
9997node_newnode(struct parser_params *p, enum node_type type, VALUE a0, VALUE a1, VALUE a2, const rb_code_location_t *loc)
9998{
9999 NODE *n = rb_ast_newnode(p->ast, type);
10000
10001 rb_node_init(n, type, a0, a1, a2);
10002
10003 nd_set_loc(n, loc);
10004 nd_set_node_id(n, parser_get_node_id(p));
10005 return n;
10006}
10007
10008static NODE *
10009nd_set_loc(NODE *nd, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10010{
10011 nd->nd_loc = *loc;
10012 nd_set_line(nd, loc->beg_pos.lineno);
10013 return nd;
10014}
10015
10016#ifndef RIPPER
10017static enum node_type
10018nodetype(NODE *node) /* for debug */
10019{
10020 return (enum node_type)nd_type(node);
10021}
10022
10023static int
10024nodeline(NODE *node)
10025{
10026 return nd_line(node);
10027}
10028
10029static NODE*
10030newline_node(NODE *node)
10031{
10032 if (node) {
10033 node = remove_begin(node);
10034 node->flags |= NODE_FL_NEWLINE;
10035 }
10036 return node;
10037}
10038
10039static void
10040fixpos(NODE *node, NODE *orig)
10041{
10042 if (!node) return;
10043 if (!orig) return;
10044 nd_set_line(node, nd_line(orig));
10045}
10046
10047static void
10048parser_warning(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node, const char *mesg)
10049{
10050 rb_compile_warning(p->ruby_sourcefile, nd_line(node), "%s", mesg);
10051}
10052
10053static void
10054parser_warn(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node, const char *mesg)
10055{
10056 rb_compile_warn(p->ruby_sourcefile, nd_line(node), "%s", mesg);
10057}
10058
10059static NODE*
10060block_append(struct parser_params *p, NODE *head, NODE *tail)
10061{
10062 NODE *end, *h = head, *nd;
10063
10064 if (tail == 0) return head;
10065
10066 if (h == 0) return tail;
10067 switch (nd_type(h)) {
10068 case NODE_LIT:
10069 case NODE_STR:
10070 case NODE_SELF:
10071 case NODE_TRUE:
10072 case NODE_FALSE:
10073 case NODE_NIL:
10074 parser_warning(p, h, "unused literal ignored");
10075 return tail;
10076 default:
10077 h = end = NEW_BLOCK(head, &head->nd_loc);
10078 end->nd_end = end;
10079 head = end;
10080 break;
10081 case NODE_BLOCK:
10082 end = h->nd_end;
10083 break;
10084 }
10085
10086 nd = end->nd_head;
10087 switch (nd_type(nd)) {
10088 case NODE_RETURN:
10089 case NODE_BREAK:
10090 case NODE_NEXT:
10091 case NODE_REDO:
10092 case NODE_RETRY:
10093 if (RTEST(ruby_verbose)) {
10094 parser_warning(p, tail, "statement not reached");
10095 }
10096 break;
10097
10098 default:
10099 break;
10100 }
10101
10102 if (!nd_type_p(tail, NODE_BLOCK)) {
10103 tail = NEW_BLOCK(tail, &tail->nd_loc);
10104 tail->nd_end = tail;
10105 }
10106 end->nd_next = tail;
10107 h->nd_end = tail->nd_end;
10108 nd_set_last_loc(head, nd_last_loc(tail));
10109 return head;
10110}
10111
10112/* append item to the list */
10113static NODE*
10114list_append(struct parser_params *p, NODE *list, NODE *item)
10115{
10116 NODE *last;
10117
10118 if (list == 0) return NEW_LIST(item, &item->nd_loc);
10119 if (list->nd_next) {
10120 last = list->nd_next->nd_end;
10121 }
10122 else {
10123 last = list;
10124 }
10125
10126 list->nd_alen += 1;
10127 last->nd_next = NEW_LIST(item, &item->nd_loc);
10128 list->nd_next->nd_end = last->nd_next;
10129
10130 nd_set_last_loc(list, nd_last_loc(item));
10131
10132 return list;
10133}
10134
10135/* concat two lists */
10136static NODE*
10137list_concat(NODE *head, NODE *tail)
10138{
10139 NODE *last;
10140
10141 if (head->nd_next) {
10142 last = head->nd_next->nd_end;
10143 }
10144 else {
10145 last = head;
10146 }
10147
10148 head->nd_alen += tail->nd_alen;
10149 last->nd_next = tail;
10150 if (tail->nd_next) {
10151 head->nd_next->nd_end = tail->nd_next->nd_end;
10152 }
10153 else {
10154 head->nd_next->nd_end = tail;
10155 }
10156
10157 nd_set_last_loc(head, nd_last_loc(tail));
10158
10159 return head;
10160}
10161
10162static int
10163literal_concat0(struct parser_params *p, VALUE head, VALUE tail)
10164{
10165 if (NIL_P(tail)) return 1;
10166 if (!rb_enc_compatible(head, tail)) {
10167 compile_error(p, "string literal encodings differ (%s / %s)",
10168 rb_enc_name(rb_enc_get(head)),
10169 rb_enc_name(rb_enc_get(tail)));
10170 rb_str_resize(head, 0);
10171 rb_str_resize(tail, 0);
10172 return 0;
10173 }
10174 rb_str_buf_append(head, tail);
10175 return 1;
10176}
10177
10178static VALUE
10179string_literal_head(enum node_type htype, NODE *head)
10180{
10181 if (htype != NODE_DSTR) return Qfalse;
10182 if (head->nd_next) {
10183 head = head->nd_next->nd_end->nd_head;
10184 if (!head || !nd_type_p(head, NODE_STR)) return Qfalse;
10185 }
10186 const VALUE lit = head->nd_lit;
10187 ASSUME(lit != Qfalse);
10188 return lit;
10189}
10190
10191/* concat two string literals */
10192static NODE *
10193literal_concat(struct parser_params *p, NODE *head, NODE *tail, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10194{
10195 enum node_type htype;
10196 VALUE lit;
10197
10198 if (!head) return tail;
10199 if (!tail) return head;
10200
10201 htype = nd_type(head);
10202 if (htype == NODE_EVSTR) {
10203 head = new_dstr(p, head, loc);
10204 htype = NODE_DSTR;
10205 }
10206 if (p->heredoc_indent > 0) {
10207 switch (htype) {
10208 case NODE_STR:
10209 nd_set_type(head, NODE_DSTR);
10210 case NODE_DSTR:
10211 return list_append(p, head, tail);
10212 default:
10213 break;
10214 }
10215 }
10216 switch (nd_type(tail)) {
10217 case NODE_STR:
10218 if ((lit = string_literal_head(htype, head)) != Qfalse) {
10219 htype = NODE_STR;
10220 }
10221 else {
10222 lit = head->nd_lit;
10223 }
10224 if (htype == NODE_STR) {
10225 if (!literal_concat0(p, lit, tail->nd_lit)) {
10226 error:
10227 rb_discard_node(p, head);
10228 rb_discard_node(p, tail);
10229 return 0;
10230 }
10231 rb_discard_node(p, tail);
10232 }
10233 else {
10234 list_append(p, head, tail);
10235 }
10236 break;
10237
10238 case NODE_DSTR:
10239 if (htype == NODE_STR) {
10240 if (!literal_concat0(p, head->nd_lit, tail->nd_lit))
10241 goto error;
10242 tail->nd_lit = head->nd_lit;
10243 rb_discard_node(p, head);
10244 head = tail;
10245 }
10246 else if (NIL_P(tail->nd_lit)) {
10247 append:
10248 head->nd_alen += tail->nd_alen - 1;
10249 if (!head->nd_next) {
10250 head->nd_next = tail->nd_next;
10251 }
10252 else if (tail->nd_next) {
10253 head->nd_next->nd_end->nd_next = tail->nd_next;
10254 head->nd_next->nd_end = tail->nd_next->nd_end;
10255 }
10256 rb_discard_node(p, tail);
10257 }
10258 else if ((lit = string_literal_head(htype, head)) != Qfalse) {
10259 if (!literal_concat0(p, lit, tail->nd_lit))
10260 goto error;
10261 tail->nd_lit = Qnil;
10262 goto append;
10263 }
10264 else {
10265 list_concat(head, NEW_NODE(NODE_LIST, NEW_STR(tail->nd_lit, loc), tail->nd_alen, tail->nd_next, loc));
10266 }
10267 break;
10268
10269 case NODE_EVSTR:
10270 if (htype == NODE_STR) {
10271 nd_set_type(head, NODE_DSTR);
10272 head->nd_alen = 1;
10273 }
10274 list_append(p, head, tail);
10275 break;
10276 }
10277 return head;
10278}
10279
10280static NODE *
10281evstr2dstr(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node)
10282{
10283 if (nd_type_p(node, NODE_EVSTR)) {
10284 node = new_dstr(p, node, &node->nd_loc);
10285 }
10286 return node;
10287}
10288
10289static NODE *
10290new_evstr(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10291{
10292 NODE *head = node;
10293
10294 if (node) {
10295 switch (nd_type(node)) {
10296 case NODE_STR:
10297 nd_set_type(node, NODE_DSTR);
10298 return node;
10299 case NODE_DSTR:
10300 break;
10301 case NODE_EVSTR:
10302 return node;
10303 }
10304 }
10305 return NEW_EVSTR(head, loc);
10306}
10307
10308static NODE *
10309new_dstr(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10310{
10311 VALUE lit = STR_NEW0();
10312 NODE *dstr = NEW_DSTR(lit, loc);
10313 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, lit);
10314 return list_append(p, dstr, node);
10315}
10316
10317static NODE *
10318call_bin_op(struct parser_params *p, NODE *recv, ID id, NODE *arg1,
10319 const YYLTYPE *op_loc, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10320{
10321 NODE *expr;
10322 value_expr(recv);
10323 value_expr(arg1);
10324 expr = NEW_OPCALL(recv, id, NEW_LIST(arg1, &arg1->nd_loc), loc);
10325 nd_set_line(expr, op_loc->beg_pos.lineno);
10326 return expr;
10327}
10328
10329static NODE *
10330call_uni_op(struct parser_params *p, NODE *recv, ID id, const YYLTYPE *op_loc, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10331{
10332 NODE *opcall;
10333 value_expr(recv);
10334 opcall = NEW_OPCALL(recv, id, 0, loc);
10335 nd_set_line(opcall, op_loc->beg_pos.lineno);
10336 return opcall;
10337}
10338
10339static NODE *
10340new_qcall(struct parser_params* p, ID atype, NODE *recv, ID mid, NODE *args, const YYLTYPE *op_loc, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10341{
10342 NODE *qcall = NEW_QCALL(atype, recv, mid, args, loc);
10343 nd_set_line(qcall, op_loc->beg_pos.lineno);
10344 return qcall;
10345}
10346
10347static NODE*
10348new_command_qcall(struct parser_params* p, ID atype, NODE *recv, ID mid, NODE *args, NODE *block, const YYLTYPE *op_loc, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10349{
10350 NODE *ret;
10351 if (block) block_dup_check(p, args, block);
10352 ret = new_qcall(p, atype, recv, mid, args, op_loc, loc);
10353 if (block) ret = method_add_block(p, ret, block, loc);
10354 fixpos(ret, recv);
10355 return ret;
10356}
10357
10358#define nd_once_body(node) (nd_type_p((node), NODE_ONCE) ? (node)->nd_body : node)
10359static NODE*
10360match_op(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node1, NODE *node2, const YYLTYPE *op_loc, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10361{
10362 NODE *n;
10363 int line = op_loc->beg_pos.lineno;
10364
10365 value_expr(node1);
10366 value_expr(node2);
10367 if (node1 && (n = nd_once_body(node1)) != 0) {
10368 switch (nd_type(n)) {
10369 case NODE_DREGX:
10370 {
10371 NODE *match = NEW_MATCH2(node1, node2, loc);
10372 nd_set_line(match, line);
10373 return match;
10374 }
10375
10376 case NODE_LIT:
10377 if (RB_TYPE_P(n->nd_lit, T_REGEXP)) {
10378 const VALUE lit = n->nd_lit;
10379 NODE *match = NEW_MATCH2(node1, node2, loc);
10380 match->nd_args = reg_named_capture_assign(p, lit, loc);
10381 nd_set_line(match, line);
10382 return match;
10383 }
10384 }
10385 }
10386
10387 if (node2 && (n = nd_once_body(node2)) != 0) {
10388 NODE *match3;
10389
10390 switch (nd_type(n)) {
10391 case NODE_LIT:
10392 if (!RB_TYPE_P(n->nd_lit, T_REGEXP)) break;
10393 /* fallthru */
10394 case NODE_DREGX:
10395 match3 = NEW_MATCH3(node2, node1, loc);
10396 return match3;
10397 }
10398 }
10399
10400 n = NEW_CALL(node1, tMATCH, NEW_LIST(node2, &node2->nd_loc), loc);
10401 nd_set_line(n, line);
10402 return n;
10403}
10404
10405# if WARN_PAST_SCOPE
10406static int
10407past_dvar_p(struct parser_params *p, ID id)
10408{
10409 struct vtable *past = p->lvtbl->past;
10410 while (past) {
10411 if (vtable_included(past, id)) return 1;
10412 past = past->prev;
10413 }
10414 return 0;
10415}
10416# endif
10417
10418static int
10419numparam_nested_p(struct parser_params *p)
10420{
10421 struct local_vars *local = p->lvtbl;
10422 NODE *outer = local->numparam.outer;
10423 NODE *inner = local->numparam.inner;
10424 if (outer || inner) {
10425 NODE *used = outer ? outer : inner;
10426 compile_error(p, "numbered parameter is already used in\n"
10427 "%s:%d: %s block here",
10428 p->ruby_sourcefile, nd_line(used),
10429 outer ? "outer" : "inner");
10430 parser_show_error_line(p, &used->nd_loc);
10431 return 1;
10432 }
10433 return 0;
10434}
10435
10436static NODE*
10437gettable(struct parser_params *p, ID id, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10438{
10439 ID *vidp = NULL;
10440 NODE *node;
10441 switch (id) {
10442 case keyword_self:
10443 return NEW_SELF(loc);
10444 case keyword_nil:
10445 return NEW_NIL(loc);
10446 case keyword_true:
10447 return NEW_TRUE(loc);
10448 case keyword_false:
10449 return NEW_FALSE(loc);
10450 case keyword__FILE__:
10451 {
10452 VALUE file = p->ruby_sourcefile_string;
10453 if (NIL_P(file))
10454 file = rb_str_new(0, 0);
10455 else
10456 file = rb_str_dup(file);
10457 node = NEW_STR(file, loc);
10458 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, file);
10459 }
10460 return node;
10461 case keyword__LINE__:
10462 return NEW_LIT(INT2FIX(p->tokline), loc);
10463 case keyword__ENCODING__:
10464 node = NEW_LIT(rb_enc_from_encoding(p->enc), loc);
10465 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, node->nd_lit);
10466 return node;
10467
10468 }
10469 switch (id_type(id)) {
10470 case ID_LOCAL:
10471 if (dyna_in_block(p) && dvar_defined_ref(p, id, &vidp)) {
10472 if (NUMPARAM_ID_P(id) && numparam_nested_p(p)) return 0;
10473 if (id == p->cur_arg) {
10474 compile_error(p, "circular argument reference - %"PRIsWARN, rb_id2str(id));
10475 return 0;
10476 }
10477 if (vidp) *vidp |= LVAR_USED;
10478 node = NEW_DVAR(id, loc);
10479 return node;
10480 }
10481 if (local_id_ref(p, id, &vidp)) {
10482 if (id == p->cur_arg) {
10483 compile_error(p, "circular argument reference - %"PRIsWARN, rb_id2str(id));
10484 return 0;
10485 }
10486 if (vidp) *vidp |= LVAR_USED;
10487 node = NEW_LVAR(id, loc);
10488 return node;
10489 }
10490 if (dyna_in_block(p) && NUMPARAM_ID_P(id) &&
10491 parser_numbered_param(p, NUMPARAM_ID_TO_IDX(id))) {
10492 if (numparam_nested_p(p)) return 0;
10493 node = NEW_DVAR(id, loc);
10494 struct local_vars *local = p->lvtbl;
10495 if (!local->numparam.current) local->numparam.current = node;
10496 return node;
10497 }
10498# if WARN_PAST_SCOPE
10499 if (!p->ctxt.in_defined && RTEST(ruby_verbose) && past_dvar_p(p, id)) {
10500 rb_warning1("possible reference to past scope - %"PRIsWARN, rb_id2str(id));
10501 }
10502# endif
10503 /* method call without arguments */
10504 return NEW_VCALL(id, loc);
10505 case ID_GLOBAL:
10506 return NEW_GVAR(id, loc);
10507 case ID_INSTANCE:
10508 return NEW_IVAR(id, loc);
10509 case ID_CONST:
10510 return NEW_CONST(id, loc);
10511 case ID_CLASS:
10512 return NEW_CVAR(id, loc);
10513 }
10514 compile_error(p, "identifier %"PRIsVALUE" is not valid to get", rb_id2str(id));
10515 return 0;
10516}
10517
10518static NODE *
10519opt_arg_append(NODE *opt_list, NODE *opt)
10520{
10521 NODE *opts = opt_list;
10522 opts->nd_loc.end_pos = opt->nd_loc.end_pos;
10523
10524 while (opts->nd_next) {
10525 opts = opts->nd_next;
10526 opts->nd_loc.end_pos = opt->nd_loc.end_pos;
10527 }
10528 opts->nd_next = opt;
10529
10530 return opt_list;
10531}
10532
10533static NODE *
10534kwd_append(NODE *kwlist, NODE *kw)
10535{
10536 if (kwlist) {
10537 NODE *kws = kwlist;
10538 kws->nd_loc.end_pos = kw->nd_loc.end_pos;
10539 while (kws->nd_next) {
10540 kws = kws->nd_next;
10541 kws->nd_loc.end_pos = kw->nd_loc.end_pos;
10542 }
10543 kws->nd_next = kw;
10544 }
10545 return kwlist;
10546}
10547
10548static NODE *
10549new_defined(struct parser_params *p, NODE *expr, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10550{
10551 return NEW_DEFINED(remove_begin_all(expr), loc);
10552}
10553
10554static NODE*
10555symbol_append(struct parser_params *p, NODE *symbols, NODE *symbol)
10556{
10557 enum node_type type = nd_type(symbol);
10558 switch (type) {
10559 case NODE_DSTR:
10560 nd_set_type(symbol, NODE_DSYM);
10561 break;
10562 case NODE_STR:
10563 nd_set_type(symbol, NODE_LIT);
10564 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, symbol->nd_lit = rb_str_intern(symbol->nd_lit));
10565 break;
10566 default:
10567 compile_error(p, "unexpected node as symbol: %s", ruby_node_name(type));
10568 }
