10569 return list_append(p, symbols, symbol);
10570}
10571
10572static NODE *
10573new_regexp(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node, int options, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10574{
10575 NODE *list, *prev;
10576 VALUE lit;
10577
10578 if (!node) {
10579 node = NEW_LIT(reg_compile(p, STR_NEW0(), options), loc);
10580 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, node->nd_lit);
10581 return node;
10582 }
10583 switch (nd_type(node)) {
10584 case NODE_STR:
10585 {
10586 VALUE src = node->nd_lit;
10587 nd_set_type(node, NODE_LIT);
10588 nd_set_loc(node, loc);
10589 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, node->nd_lit = reg_compile(p, src, options));
10590 }
10591 break;
10592 default:
10593 lit = STR_NEW0();
10594 node = NEW_NODE(NODE_DSTR, lit, 1, NEW_LIST(node, loc), loc);
10595 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, lit);
10596 /* fall through */
10597 case NODE_DSTR:
10598 nd_set_type(node, NODE_DREGX);
10599 nd_set_loc(node, loc);
10600 node->nd_cflag = options & RE_OPTION_MASK;
10601 if (!NIL_P(node->nd_lit)) reg_fragment_check(p, node->nd_lit, options);
10602 for (list = (prev = node)->nd_next; list; list = list->nd_next) {
10603 NODE *frag = list->nd_head;
10604 enum node_type type = nd_type(frag);
10605 if (type == NODE_STR || (type == NODE_DSTR && !frag->nd_next)) {
10606 VALUE tail = frag->nd_lit;
10607 if (reg_fragment_check(p, tail, options) && prev && !NIL_P(prev->nd_lit)) {
10608 VALUE lit = prev == node ? prev->nd_lit : prev->nd_head->nd_lit;
10609 if (!literal_concat0(p, lit, tail)) {
10610 return NEW_NIL(loc); /* dummy node on error */
10611 }
10612 rb_str_resize(tail, 0);
10613 prev->nd_next = list->nd_next;
10614 rb_discard_node(p, list->nd_head);
10615 rb_discard_node(p, list);
10616 list = prev;
10617 }
10618 else {
10619 prev = list;
10620 }
10621 }
10622 else {
10623 prev = 0;
10624 }
10625 }
10626 if (!node->nd_next) {
10627 VALUE src = node->nd_lit;
10628 nd_set_type(node, NODE_LIT);
10629 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, node->nd_lit = reg_compile(p, src, options));
10630 }
10631 if (options & RE_OPTION_ONCE) {
10632 node = NEW_NODE(NODE_ONCE, 0, node, 0, loc);
10633 }
10634 break;
10635 }
10636 return node;
10637}
10638
10639static NODE *
10640new_kw_arg(struct parser_params *p, NODE *k, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10641{
10642 if (!k) return 0;
10643 return NEW_KW_ARG(0, (k), loc);
10644}
10645
10646static NODE *
10647new_xstring(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10648{
10649 if (!node) {
10650 VALUE lit = STR_NEW0();
10651 NODE *xstr = NEW_XSTR(lit, loc);
10652 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, lit);
10653 return xstr;
10654 }
10655 switch (nd_type(node)) {
10656 case NODE_STR:
10657 nd_set_type(node, NODE_XSTR);
10658 nd_set_loc(node, loc);
10659 break;
10660 case NODE_DSTR:
10661 nd_set_type(node, NODE_DXSTR);
10662 nd_set_loc(node, loc);
10663 break;
10664 default:
10665 node = NEW_NODE(NODE_DXSTR, Qnil, 1, NEW_LIST(node, loc), loc);
10666 break;
10667 }
10668 return node;
10669}
10670
10671static void
10672check_literal_when(struct parser_params *p, NODE *arg, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10673{
10674 VALUE lit;
10675
10676 if (!arg || !p->case_labels) return;
10677
10678 lit = rb_node_case_when_optimizable_literal(arg);
10679 if (lit == Qundef) return;
10680 if (nd_type_p(arg, NODE_STR)) {
10681 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, arg->nd_lit = lit);
10682 }
10683
10684 if (NIL_P(p->case_labels)) {
10685 p->case_labels = rb_obj_hide(rb_hash_new());
10686 }
10687 else {
10688 VALUE line = rb_hash_lookup(p->case_labels, lit);
10689 if (!NIL_P(line)) {
10690 rb_warning1("duplicated `when' clause with line %d is ignored",
10691 WARN_IVAL(line));
10692 return;
10693 }
10694 }
10695 rb_hash_aset(p->case_labels, lit, INT2NUM(p->ruby_sourceline));
10696}
10697
10698#else /* !RIPPER */
10699static int
10700id_is_var(struct parser_params *p, ID id)
10701{
10702 if (is_notop_id(id)) {
10703 switch (id & ID_SCOPE_MASK) {
10704 case ID_GLOBAL: case ID_INSTANCE: case ID_CONST: case ID_CLASS:
10705 return 1;
10706 case ID_LOCAL:
10707 if (dyna_in_block(p)) {
10708 if (NUMPARAM_ID_P(id) || dvar_defined(p, id)) return 1;
10709 }
10710 if (local_id(p, id)) return 1;
10711 /* method call without arguments */
10712 return 0;
10713 }
10714 }
10715 compile_error(p, "identifier %"PRIsVALUE" is not valid to get", rb_id2str(id));
10716 return 0;
10717}
10718
10719static VALUE
10720new_regexp(struct parser_params *p, VALUE re, VALUE opt, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10721{
10722 VALUE src = 0, err;
10723 int options = 0;
10724 if (ripper_is_node_yylval(re)) {
10725 src = RNODE(re)->nd_cval;
10726 re = RNODE(re)->nd_rval;
10727 }
10728 if (ripper_is_node_yylval(opt)) {
10729 options = (int)RNODE(opt)->nd_tag;
10730 opt = RNODE(opt)->nd_rval;
10731 }
10732 if (src && NIL_P(parser_reg_compile(p, src, options, &err))) {
10733 compile_error(p, "%"PRIsVALUE, err);
10734 }
10735 return dispatch2(regexp_literal, re, opt);
10736}
10737#endif /* !RIPPER */
10738
10739static inline enum lex_state_e
10740parser_set_lex_state(struct parser_params *p, enum lex_state_e ls, int line)
10741{
10742 if (p->debug) {
10743 ls = rb_parser_trace_lex_state(p, p->lex.state, ls, line);
10744 }
10745 return p->lex.state = ls;
10746}
10747
10748#ifndef RIPPER
10749static const char rb_parser_lex_state_names[][8] = {
10750 "BEG", "END", "ENDARG", "ENDFN", "ARG",
10751 "CMDARG", "MID", "FNAME", "DOT", "CLASS",
10752 "LABEL", "LABELED","FITEM",
10753};
10754
10755static VALUE
10756append_lex_state_name(enum lex_state_e state, VALUE buf)
10757{
10758 int i, sep = 0;
10759 unsigned int mask = 1;
10760 static const char none[] = "NONE";
10761
10762 for (i = 0; i < EXPR_MAX_STATE; ++i, mask <<= 1) {
10763 if ((unsigned)state & mask) {
10764 if (sep) {
10765 rb_str_cat(buf, "|", 1);
10766 }
10767 sep = 1;
10768 rb_str_cat_cstr(buf, rb_parser_lex_state_names[i]);
10769 }
10770 }
10771 if (!sep) {
10772 rb_str_cat(buf, none, sizeof(none)-1);
10773 }
10774 return buf;
10775}
10776
10777static void
10778flush_debug_buffer(struct parser_params *p, VALUE out, VALUE str)
10779{
10780 VALUE mesg = p->debug_buffer;
10781
10782 if (!NIL_P(mesg) && RSTRING_LEN(mesg)) {
10783 p->debug_buffer = Qnil;
10784 rb_io_puts(1, &mesg, out);
10785 }
10786 if (!NIL_P(str) && RSTRING_LEN(str)) {
10787 rb_io_write(p->debug_output, str);
10788 }
10789}
10790
10791enum lex_state_e
10792rb_parser_trace_lex_state(struct parser_params *p, enum lex_state_e from,
10793 enum lex_state_e to, int line)
10794{
10795 VALUE mesg;
10796 mesg = rb_str_new_cstr("lex_state: ");
10797 append_lex_state_name(from, mesg);
10798 rb_str_cat_cstr(mesg, " -> ");
10799 append_lex_state_name(to, mesg);
10800 rb_str_catf(mesg, " at line %d\n", line);
10801 flush_debug_buffer(p, p->debug_output, mesg);
10802 return to;
10803}
10804
10805VALUE
10806rb_parser_lex_state_name(enum lex_state_e state)
10807{
10808 return rb_fstring(append_lex_state_name(state, rb_str_new(0, 0)));
10809}
10810
10811static void
10812append_bitstack_value(stack_type stack, VALUE mesg)
10813{
10814 if (stack == 0) {
10815 rb_str_cat_cstr(mesg, "0");
10816 }
10817 else {
10818 stack_type mask = (stack_type)1U << (CHAR_BIT * sizeof(stack_type) - 1);
10819 for (; mask && !(stack & mask); mask >>= 1) continue;
10820 for (; mask; mask >>= 1) rb_str_cat(mesg, stack & mask ? "1" : "0", 1);
10821 }
10822}
10823
10824void
10825rb_parser_show_bitstack(struct parser_params *p, stack_type stack,
10826 const char *name, int line)
10827{
10828 VALUE mesg = rb_sprintf("%s: ", name);
10829 append_bitstack_value(stack, mesg);
10830 rb_str_catf(mesg, " at line %d\n", line);
10831 flush_debug_buffer(p, p->debug_output, mesg);
10832}
10833
10834void
10835rb_parser_fatal(struct parser_params *p, const char *fmt, ...)
10836{
10837 va_list ap;
10838 VALUE mesg = rb_str_new_cstr("internal parser error: ");
10839
10840 va_start(ap, fmt);
10841 rb_str_vcatf(mesg, fmt, ap);
10842 va_end(ap);
10843 yyerror0(RSTRING_PTR(mesg));
10844 RB_GC_GUARD(mesg);
10845
10846 mesg = rb_str_new(0, 0);
10847 append_lex_state_name(p->lex.state, mesg);
10848 compile_error(p, "lex.state: %"PRIsVALUE, mesg);
10849 rb_str_resize(mesg, 0);
10850 append_bitstack_value(p->cond_stack, mesg);
10851 compile_error(p, "cond_stack: %"PRIsVALUE, mesg);
10852 rb_str_resize(mesg, 0);
10853 append_bitstack_value(p->cmdarg_stack, mesg);
10854 compile_error(p, "cmdarg_stack: %"PRIsVALUE, mesg);
10855 if (p->debug_output == rb_ractor_stdout())
10856 p->debug_output = rb_ractor_stderr();
10857 p->debug = TRUE;
10858}
10859
10860static YYLTYPE *
10861rb_parser_set_pos(YYLTYPE *yylloc, int sourceline, int beg_pos, int end_pos)
10862{
10863 yylloc->beg_pos.lineno = sourceline;
10864 yylloc->beg_pos.column = beg_pos;
10865 yylloc->end_pos.lineno = sourceline;
10866 yylloc->end_pos.column = end_pos;
10867 return yylloc;
10868}
10869
10870YYLTYPE *
10871rb_parser_set_location_from_strterm_heredoc(struct parser_params *p, rb_strterm_heredoc_t *here, YYLTYPE *yylloc)
10872{
10873 int sourceline = here->sourceline;
10874 int beg_pos = (int)here->offset - here->quote
10875 - (rb_strlen_lit("<<-") - !(here->func & STR_FUNC_INDENT));
10876 int end_pos = (int)here->offset + here->length + here->quote;
10877
10878 return rb_parser_set_pos(yylloc, sourceline, beg_pos, end_pos);
10879}
10880
10881YYLTYPE *
10882rb_parser_set_location_of_none(struct parser_params *p, YYLTYPE *yylloc)
10883{
10884 int sourceline = p->ruby_sourceline;
10885 int beg_pos = (int)(p->lex.ptok - p->lex.pbeg);
10886 int end_pos = (int)(p->lex.ptok - p->lex.pbeg);
10887 return rb_parser_set_pos(yylloc, sourceline, beg_pos, end_pos);
10888}
10889
10890YYLTYPE *
10891rb_parser_set_location(struct parser_params *p, YYLTYPE *yylloc)
10892{
10893 int sourceline = p->ruby_sourceline;
10894 int beg_pos = (int)(p->lex.ptok - p->lex.pbeg);
10895 int end_pos = (int)(p->lex.pcur - p->lex.pbeg);
10896 return rb_parser_set_pos(yylloc, sourceline, beg_pos, end_pos);
10897}
10898#endif /* !RIPPER */
10899
10900static int
10901assignable0(struct parser_params *p, ID id, const char **err)
10902{
10903 if (!id) return -1;
10904 switch (id) {
10905 case keyword_self:
10906 *err = "Can't change the value of self";
10907 return -1;
10908 case keyword_nil:
10909 *err = "Can't assign to nil";
10910 return -1;
10911 case keyword_true:
10912 *err = "Can't assign to true";
10913 return -1;
10914 case keyword_false:
10915 *err = "Can't assign to false";
10916 return -1;
10917 case keyword__FILE__:
10918 *err = "Can't assign to __FILE__";
10919 return -1;
10920 case keyword__LINE__:
10921 *err = "Can't assign to __LINE__";
10922 return -1;
10923 case keyword__ENCODING__:
10924 *err = "Can't assign to __ENCODING__";
10925 return -1;
10926 }
10927 switch (id_type(id)) {
10928 case ID_LOCAL:
10929 if (dyna_in_block(p)) {
10930 if (p->max_numparam > NO_PARAM && NUMPARAM_ID_P(id)) {
10931 compile_error(p, "Can't assign to numbered parameter _%d",
10932 NUMPARAM_ID_TO_IDX(id));
10933 return -1;
10934 }
10935 if (dvar_curr(p, id)) return NODE_DASGN;
10936 if (dvar_defined(p, id)) return NODE_DASGN;
10937 if (local_id(p, id)) return NODE_LASGN;
10938 dyna_var(p, id);
10939 return NODE_DASGN;
10940 }
10941 else {
10942 if (!local_id(p, id)) local_var(p, id);
10943 return NODE_LASGN;
10944 }
10945 break;
10946 case ID_GLOBAL: return NODE_GASGN;
10947 case ID_INSTANCE: return NODE_IASGN;
10948 case ID_CONST:
10949 if (!p->ctxt.in_def) return NODE_CDECL;
10950 *err = "dynamic constant assignment";
10951 return -1;
10952 case ID_CLASS: return NODE_CVASGN;
10953 default:
10954 compile_error(p, "identifier %"PRIsVALUE" is not valid to set", rb_id2str(id));
10955 }
10956 return -1;
10957}
10958
10959#ifndef RIPPER
10960static NODE*
10961assignable(struct parser_params *p, ID id, NODE *val, const YYLTYPE *loc)
10962{
10963 const char *err = 0;
10964 int node_type = assignable0(p, id, &err);
10965 switch (node_type) {
10966 case NODE_DASGN: return NEW_DASGN(id, val, loc);
10967 case NODE_LASGN: return NEW_LASGN(id, val, loc);
10968 case NODE_GASGN: return NEW_GASGN(id, val, loc);
10969 case NODE_IASGN: return NEW_IASGN(id, val, loc);
10970 case NODE_CDECL: return NEW_CDECL(id, val, 0, loc);
10971 case NODE_CVASGN: return NEW_CVASGN(id, val, loc);
10972 }
10973 if (err) yyerror1(loc, err);
10974 return NEW_BEGIN(0, loc);
10975}
10976#else
10977static VALUE
10978assignable(struct parser_params *p, VALUE lhs)
10979{
10980 const char *err = 0;
10981 assignable0(p, get_id(lhs), &err);
10982 if (err) lhs = assign_error(p, err, lhs);
10983 return lhs;
10984}
10985#endif
10986
10987static int
10988is_private_local_id(ID name)
10989{
10990 VALUE s;
10991 if (name == idUScore) return 1;
10992 if (!is_local_id(name)) return 0;
10993 s = rb_id2str(name);
10994 if (!s) return 0;
10995 return RSTRING_PTR(s)[0] == '_';
10996}
10997
10998static int
10999shadowing_lvar_0(struct parser_params *p, ID name)
11000{
11001 if (dyna_in_block(p)) {
11002 if (dvar_curr(p, name)) {
11003 if (is_private_local_id(name)) return 1;
11004 yyerror0("duplicated argument name");
11005 }
11006 else if (dvar_defined(p, name) || local_id(p, name)) {
11007 vtable_add(p->lvtbl->vars, name);
11008 if (p->lvtbl->used) {
11009 vtable_add(p->lvtbl->used, (ID)p->ruby_sourceline | LVAR_USED);
11010 }
11011 return 0;
11012 }
11013 }
11014 else {
11015 if (local_id(p, name)) {
11016 if (is_private_local_id(name)) return 1;
11017 yyerror0("duplicated argument name");
11018 }
11019 }
11020 return 1;
11021}
11022
11023static ID
11024shadowing_lvar(struct parser_params *p, ID name)
11025{
11026 shadowing_lvar_0(p, name);
11027 return name;
11028}
11029
11030static void
11031new_bv(struct parser_params *p, ID name)
11032{
11033 if (!name) return;
11034 if (!is_local_id(name)) {
11035 compile_error(p, "invalid local variable - %"PRIsVALUE,
11036 rb_id2str(name));
11037 return;
11038 }
11039 if (!shadowing_lvar_0(p, name)) return;
11040 dyna_var(p, name);
11041}
11042
11043#ifndef RIPPER
11044static NODE *
11045aryset(struct parser_params *p, NODE *recv, NODE *idx, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11046{
11047 return NEW_ATTRASGN(recv, tASET, idx, loc);
11048}
11049
11050static void
11051block_dup_check(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node1, NODE *node2)
11052{
11053 if (node2 && node1 && nd_type_p(node1, NODE_BLOCK_PASS)) {
11054 compile_error(p, "both block arg and actual block given");
11055 }
11056}
11057
11058static NODE *
11059attrset(struct parser_params *p, NODE *recv, ID atype, ID id, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11060{
11061 if (!CALL_Q_P(atype)) id = rb_id_attrset(id);
11062 return NEW_ATTRASGN(recv, id, 0, loc);
11063}
11064
11065static void
11066rb_backref_error(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node)
11067{
11068 switch (nd_type(node)) {
11069 case NODE_NTH_REF:
11070 compile_error(p, "Can't set variable $%ld", node->nd_nth);
11071 break;
11072 case NODE_BACK_REF:
11073 compile_error(p, "Can't set variable $%c", (int)node->nd_nth);
11074 break;
11075 }
11076}
11077#else
11078static VALUE
11079backref_error(struct parser_params *p, NODE *ref, VALUE expr)
11080{
11081 VALUE mesg = rb_str_new_cstr("Can't set variable ");
11082 rb_str_append(mesg, ref->nd_cval);
11083 return dispatch2(assign_error, mesg, expr);
11084}
11085#endif
11086
11087#ifndef RIPPER
11088static NODE *
11089arg_append(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node1, NODE *node2, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11090{
11091 if (!node1) return NEW_LIST(node2, &node2->nd_loc);
11092 switch (nd_type(node1)) {
11093 case NODE_LIST:
11094 return list_append(p, node1, node2);
11095 case NODE_BLOCK_PASS:
11096 node1->nd_head = arg_append(p, node1->nd_head, node2, loc);
11097 node1->nd_loc.end_pos = node1->nd_head->nd_loc.end_pos;
11098 return node1;
11099 case NODE_ARGSPUSH:
11100 node1->nd_body = list_append(p, NEW_LIST(node1->nd_body, &node1->nd_body->nd_loc), node2);
11101 node1->nd_loc.end_pos = node1->nd_body->nd_loc.end_pos;
11102 nd_set_type(node1, NODE_ARGSCAT);
11103 return node1;
11104 case NODE_ARGSCAT:
11105 if (!nd_type_p(node1->nd_body, NODE_LIST)) break;
11106 node1->nd_body = list_append(p, node1->nd_body, node2);
11107 node1->nd_loc.end_pos = node1->nd_body->nd_loc.end_pos;
11108 return node1;
11109 }
11110 return NEW_ARGSPUSH(node1, node2, loc);
11111}
11112
11113static NODE *
11114arg_concat(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node1, NODE *node2, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11115{
11116 if (!node2) return node1;
11117 switch (nd_type(node1)) {
11118 case NODE_BLOCK_PASS:
11119 if (node1->nd_head)
11120 node1->nd_head = arg_concat(p, node1->nd_head, node2, loc);
11121 else
11122 node1->nd_head = NEW_LIST(node2, loc);
11123 return node1;
11124 case NODE_ARGSPUSH:
11125 if (!nd_type_p(node2, NODE_LIST)) break;
11126 node1->nd_body = list_concat(NEW_LIST(node1->nd_body, loc), node2);
11127 nd_set_type(node1, NODE_ARGSCAT);
11128 return node1;
11129 case NODE_ARGSCAT:
11130 if (!nd_type_p(node2, NODE_LIST) ||
11131 !nd_type_p(node1->nd_body, NODE_LIST)) break;
11132 node1->nd_body = list_concat(node1->nd_body, node2);
11133 return node1;
11134 }
11135 return NEW_ARGSCAT(node1, node2, loc);
11136}
11137
11138static NODE *
11139last_arg_append(struct parser_params *p, NODE *args, NODE *last_arg, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11140{
11141 NODE *n1;
11142 if ((n1 = splat_array(args)) != 0) {
11143 return list_append(p, n1, last_arg);
11144 }
11145 return arg_append(p, args, last_arg, loc);
11146}
11147
11148static NODE *
11149rest_arg_append(struct parser_params *p, NODE *args, NODE *rest_arg, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11150{
11151 NODE *n1;
11152 if ((nd_type_p(rest_arg, NODE_LIST)) && (n1 = splat_array(args)) != 0) {
11153 return list_concat(n1, rest_arg);
11154 }
11155 return arg_concat(p, args, rest_arg, loc);
11156}
11157
11158static NODE *
11159splat_array(NODE* node)
11160{
11161 if (nd_type_p(node, NODE_SPLAT)) node = node->nd_head;
11162 if (nd_type_p(node, NODE_LIST)) return node;
11163 return 0;
11164}
11165
11166static void
11167mark_lvar_used(struct parser_params *p, NODE *rhs)
11168{
11169 ID *vidp = NULL;
11170 if (!rhs) return;
11171 switch (nd_type(rhs)) {
11172 case NODE_LASGN:
11173 if (local_id_ref(p, rhs->nd_vid, &vidp)) {
11174 if (vidp) *vidp |= LVAR_USED;
11175 }
11176 break;
11177 case NODE_DASGN:
11178 if (dvar_defined_ref(p, rhs->nd_vid, &vidp)) {
11179 if (vidp) *vidp |= LVAR_USED;
11180 }
11181 break;
11182#if 0
11183 case NODE_MASGN:
11184 for (rhs = rhs->nd_head; rhs; rhs = rhs->nd_next) {
11185 mark_lvar_used(p, rhs->nd_head);
11186 }
11187 break;
11188#endif
11189 }
11190}
11191
11192static NODE *
11193const_decl_path(struct parser_params *p, NODE **dest)
11194{
11195 NODE *n = *dest;
11196 if (!nd_type_p(n, NODE_CALL)) {
11197 const YYLTYPE *loc = &n->nd_loc;
11198 VALUE path;
11199 if (n->nd_vid) {
11200 path = rb_id2str(n->nd_vid);
11201 }
11202 else {
11203 n = n->nd_else;
11204 path = rb_ary_new();
11205 for (; n && nd_type_p(n, NODE_COLON2); n = n->nd_head) {
11206 rb_ary_push(path, rb_id2str(n->nd_mid));
11207 }
11208 if (n && nd_type_p(n, NODE_CONST)) {
11209 // Const::Name
11210 rb_ary_push(path, rb_id2str(n->nd_vid));
11211 }
11212 else if (n && nd_type_p(n, NODE_COLON3)) {
11213 // ::Const::Name
11214 rb_ary_push(path, rb_str_new(0, 0));
11215 }
11216 else {
11217 // expression::Name
11218 rb_ary_push(path, rb_str_new_cstr("..."));
11219 }
11220 path = rb_ary_join(rb_ary_reverse(path), rb_str_new_cstr("::"));
11221 path = rb_fstring(path);
11222 }
11223 *dest = n = NEW_LIT(path, loc);
11224 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, n->nd_lit);
11225 }
11226 return n;
11227}
11228
11229extern VALUE rb_mRubyVMFrozenCore;
11230
11231static NODE *
11232make_shareable_node(struct parser_params *p, NODE *value, bool copy, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11233{
11234 NODE *fcore = NEW_LIT(rb_mRubyVMFrozenCore, loc);
11235
11236 if (copy) {
11237 return NEW_CALL(fcore, rb_intern("make_shareable_copy"),
11238 NEW_LIST(value, loc), loc);
11239 }
11240 else {
11241 return NEW_CALL(fcore, rb_intern("make_shareable"),
11242 NEW_LIST(value, loc), loc);
11243 }
11244}
11245
11246static NODE *
11247ensure_shareable_node(struct parser_params *p, NODE **dest, NODE *value, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11248{
11249 NODE *fcore = NEW_LIT(rb_mRubyVMFrozenCore, loc);
11250 NODE *args = NEW_LIST(value, loc);
11251 args = list_append(p, args, const_decl_path(p, dest));
11252 return NEW_CALL(fcore, rb_intern("ensure_shareable"), args, loc);
11253}
11254
11255static int is_static_content(NODE *node);
11256
11257static VALUE
11258shareable_literal_value(NODE *node)
11259{
11260 if (!node) return Qnil;
11261 enum node_type type = nd_type(node);
11262 switch (type) {
11263 case NODE_TRUE:
11264 return Qtrue;
11265 case NODE_FALSE:
11266 return Qfalse;
11267 case NODE_NIL:
11268 return Qnil;
11269 case NODE_LIT:
11270 return node->nd_lit;
11271 default:
11272 return Qundef;
11273 }
11274}
11275
11276#ifndef SHAREABLE_BARE_EXPRESSION
11277#define SHAREABLE_BARE_EXPRESSION 1
11278#endif
11279
11280static NODE *
11281shareable_literal_constant(struct parser_params *p, enum shareability shareable,
11282 NODE **dest, NODE *value, const YYLTYPE *loc, size_t level)
11283{
11284# define shareable_literal_constant_next(n) \
11285 shareable_literal_constant(p, shareable, dest, (n), &(n)->nd_loc, level+1)
11286 VALUE lit = Qnil;
11287
11288 if (!value) return 0;
11289 enum node_type type = nd_type(value);
11290 switch (type) {
11291 case NODE_TRUE:
11292 case NODE_FALSE:
11293 case NODE_NIL:
11294 case NODE_LIT:
11295 return value;
11296
11297 case NODE_DSTR:
11298 if (shareable == shareable_literal) {
11299 value = NEW_CALL(value, idUMinus, 0, loc);
11300 }
11301 return value;
11302
11303 case NODE_STR:
11304 lit = rb_fstring(value->nd_lit);
11305 nd_set_type(value, NODE_LIT);
11306 RB_OBJ_WRITE(p->ast, &value->nd_lit, lit);
11307 return value;
11308
11309 case NODE_ZLIST:
11310 lit = rb_ary_new();
11311 OBJ_FREEZE_RAW(lit);
11312 NODE *n = NEW_LIT(lit, loc);
11313 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, n->nd_lit);
11314 return n;
11315
11316 case NODE_LIST:
11317 lit = rb_ary_new();
11318 for (NODE *n = value; n; n = n->nd_next) {
11319 NODE *elt = n->nd_head;
11320 if (elt) {
11321 elt = shareable_literal_constant_next(elt);
11322 if (elt) {
11323 n->nd_head = elt;
11324 }
11325 else if (RTEST(lit)) {
11326 rb_ary_clear(lit);
11327 lit = Qfalse;
11328 }
11329 }
11330 if (RTEST(lit)) {
11331 VALUE e = shareable_literal_value(elt);
11332 if (e != Qundef) {
11333 rb_ary_push(lit, e);
11334 }
11335 else {
11336 rb_ary_clear(lit);
11337 lit = Qnil; /* make shareable at runtime */
11338 }
11339 }
11340 }
11341 break;
11342
11343 case NODE_HASH:
11344 if (!value->nd_brace) return 0;
11345 lit = rb_hash_new();
11346 for (NODE *n = value->nd_head; n; n = n->nd_next->nd_next) {
11347 NODE *key = n->nd_head;
11348 NODE *val = n->nd_next->nd_head;
11349 if (key) {
11350 key = shareable_literal_constant_next(key);
11351 if (key) {
11352 n->nd_head = key;
11353 }
11354 else if (RTEST(lit)) {
11355 rb_hash_clear(lit);
11356 lit = Qfalse;
11357 }
11358 }
11359 if (val) {
11360 val = shareable_literal_constant_next(val);
11361 if (val) {
11362 n->nd_next->nd_head = val;
11363 }
11364 else if (RTEST(lit)) {
11365 rb_hash_clear(lit);
11366 lit = Qfalse;
11367 }
11368 }
11369 if (RTEST(lit)) {
11370 VALUE k = shareable_literal_value(key);
11371 VALUE v = shareable_literal_value(val);
11372 if (k != Qundef && v != Qundef) {
11373 rb_hash_aset(lit, k, v);
11374 }
11375 else {
11376 rb_hash_clear(lit);
11377 lit = Qnil; /* make shareable at runtime */
11378 }
11379 }
11380 }
11381 break;
11382
11383 default:
11384 if (shareable == shareable_literal &&
11385 (SHAREABLE_BARE_EXPRESSION || level > 0)) {
11386 return ensure_shareable_node(p, dest, value, loc);
11387 }
11388 return 0;
11389 }
11390
11391 /* Array or Hash */
11392 if (!lit) return 0;
11393 if (NIL_P(lit)) {
11394 // if shareable_literal, all elements should have been ensured
11395 // as shareable
11396 value = make_shareable_node(p, value, false, loc);
11397 }
11398 else {
11399 value = NEW_LIT(rb_ractor_make_shareable(lit), loc);
11400 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, value->nd_lit);
11401 }
11402
11403 return value;
11404# undef shareable_literal_constant_next
11405}
11406
11407static NODE *
11408shareable_constant_value(struct parser_params *p, enum shareability shareable,
11409 NODE *lhs, NODE *value, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11410{
11411 if (!value) return 0;
11412 switch (shareable) {
11413 case shareable_none:
11414 return value;
11415
11416 case shareable_literal:
11417 {
11418 NODE *lit = shareable_literal_constant(p, shareable, &lhs, value, loc, 0);
11419 if (lit) return lit;
11420 return value;
11421 }
11422 break;
11423
11424 case shareable_copy:
11425 case shareable_everything:
11426 {
11427 NODE *lit = shareable_literal_constant(p, shareable, &lhs, value, loc, 0);
11428 if (lit) return lit;
11429 return make_shareable_node(p, value, shareable == shareable_copy, loc);
11430 }
11431 break;
11432
11433 default:
11434 UNREACHABLE_RETURN(0);
11435 }
11436}
11437
11438static NODE *
11439node_assign(struct parser_params *p, NODE *lhs, NODE *rhs, struct lex_context ctxt, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11440{
11441 if (!lhs) return 0;
11442
11443 switch (nd_type(lhs)) {
11444 case NODE_CDECL:
11445 rhs = shareable_constant_value(p, ctxt.shareable_constant_value, lhs, rhs, loc);
11446 /* fallthru */
11447
11448 case NODE_GASGN:
11449 case NODE_IASGN:
11450 case NODE_LASGN:
11451 case NODE_DASGN:
11452 case NODE_MASGN:
11453 case NODE_CVASGN:
11454 lhs->nd_value = rhs;
11455 nd_set_loc(lhs, loc);
11456 break;
11457
11458 case NODE_ATTRASGN:
11459 lhs->nd_args = arg_append(p, lhs->nd_args, rhs, loc);
11460 nd_set_loc(lhs, loc);
11461 break;
11462
11463 default:
11464 /* should not happen */
11465 break;
11466 }
11467
11468 return lhs;
11469}
11470
11471static NODE *
11472value_expr_check(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node)
11473{
11474 NODE *void_node = 0, *vn;
11475
11476 if (!node) {
11477 rb_warning0("empty expression");
11478 }
11479 while (node) {
11480 switch (nd_type(node)) {
11481 case NODE_RETURN:
11482 case NODE_BREAK:
11483 case NODE_NEXT:
11484 case NODE_REDO:
11485 case NODE_RETRY:
11486 return void_node ? void_node : node;
11487
11488 case NODE_CASE3:
11489 if (!node->nd_body || !nd_type_p(node->nd_body, NODE_IN)) {
11490 compile_error(p, "unexpected node");
11491 return NULL;
11492 }
11493 if (node->nd_body->nd_body) {
11494 return NULL;
11495 }
11496 /* single line pattern matching */
11497 return void_node ? void_node : node;
11498
11499 case NODE_BLOCK:
11500 while (node->nd_next) {
11501 node = node->nd_next;
11502 }
11503 node = node->nd_head;
11504 break;
11505
11506 case NODE_BEGIN:
11507 node = node->nd_body;
11508 break;
11509
11510 case NODE_IF:
11511 case NODE_UNLESS:
11512 if (!node->nd_body) {
11513 return NULL;
11514 }
11515 else if (!node->nd_else) {
11516 return NULL;
11517 }
11518 vn = value_expr_check(p, node->nd_body);
11519 if (!vn) return NULL;
11520 if (!void_node) void_node = vn;
11521 node = node->nd_else;
11522 break;
11523
11524 case NODE_AND:
11525 case NODE_OR:
11526 node = node->nd_1st;
11527 break;
11528
11529 case NODE_LASGN:
11530 case NODE_DASGN:
11531 case NODE_MASGN:
11532 mark_lvar_used(p, node);
11533 return NULL;
11534
11535 default:
11536 return NULL;
11537 }
11538 }
11539
11540 return NULL;
11541}
11542
11543static int
11544value_expr_gen(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node)
11545{
11546 NODE *void_node = value_expr_check(p, node);
11547 if (void_node) {
11548 yyerror1(&void_node->nd_loc, "void value expression");
11549 /* or "control never reach"? */
11550 return FALSE;
11551 }
11552 return TRUE;
11553}
11554static void
11555void_expr(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node)
11556{
11557 const char *useless = 0;
11558
11559 if (!RTEST(ruby_verbose)) return;
11560
11561 if (!node || !(node = nd_once_body(node))) return;
11562 switch (nd_type(node)) {
11563 case NODE_OPCALL:
11564 switch (node->nd_mid) {
11565 case '+':
11566 case '-':
11567 case '*':
11568 case '/':
11569 case '%':
11570 case tPOW:
11571 case tUPLUS:
11572 case tUMINUS:
11573 case '|':
11574 case '^':
11575 case '&':
11576 case tCMP:
11577 case '>':
11578 case tGEQ:
11579 case '<':
11580 case tLEQ:
11581 case tEQ:
11582 case tNEQ:
11583 useless = rb_id2name(node->nd_mid);
11584 break;
11585 }
11586 break;
11587
11588 case NODE_LVAR:
11589 case NODE_DVAR:
11590 case NODE_GVAR:
11591 case NODE_IVAR:
11592 case NODE_CVAR:
11593 case NODE_NTH_REF:
11594 case NODE_BACK_REF:
11595 useless = "a variable";
11596 break;
11597 case NODE_CONST:
11598 useless = "a constant";
11599 break;
11600 case NODE_LIT:
11601 case NODE_STR:
11602 case NODE_DSTR:
11603 case NODE_DREGX:
11604 useless = "a literal";
11605 break;
11606 case NODE_COLON2:
11607 case NODE_COLON3:
11608 useless = "::";
11609 break;
11610 case NODE_DOT2:
11611 useless = "..";
11612 break;
11613 case NODE_DOT3:
11614 useless = "...";
11615 break;
11616 case NODE_SELF:
11617 useless = "self";
11618 break;
11619 case NODE_NIL:
11620 useless = "nil";
11621 break;
11622 case NODE_TRUE:
11623 useless = "true";
11624 break;
11625 case NODE_FALSE:
11626 useless = "false";
11627 break;
11628 case NODE_DEFINED:
11629 useless = "defined?";
11630 break;
11631 }
11632
11633 if (useless) {
11634 rb_warn1L(nd_line(node), "possibly useless use of %s in void context", WARN_S(useless));
11635 }
11636}
11637
11638static NODE *
11639void_stmts(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node)
11640{
11641 NODE *const n = node;
11642 if (!RTEST(ruby_verbose)) return n;
11643 if (!node) return n;
11644 if (!nd_type_p(node, NODE_BLOCK)) return n;
11645
11646 while (node->nd_next) {
11647 void_expr(p, node->nd_head);
11648 node = node->nd_next;
11649 }
11650 return n;
11651}
11652
11653static NODE *
11654remove_begin(NODE *node)
11655{
11656 NODE **n = &node, *n1 = node;
11657 while (n1 && nd_type_p(n1, NODE_BEGIN) && n1->nd_body) {
11658 *n = n1 = n1->nd_body;
11659 }
11660 return node;
11661}
11662
11663static NODE *
11664remove_begin_all(NODE *node)
11665{
11666 NODE **n = &node, *n1 = node;
11667 while (n1 && nd_type_p(n1, NODE_BEGIN)) {
11668 *n = n1 = n1->nd_body;
11669 }
11670 return node;
11671}
11672
11673static void
11674reduce_nodes(struct parser_params *p, NODE **body)
11675{
11676 NODE *node = *body;
11677
11678 if (!node) {
11679 *body = NEW_NIL(&NULL_LOC);
11680 return;
11681 }
11682#define subnodes(n1, n2) \
11683 ((!node->n1) ? (node->n2 ? (body = &node->n2, 1) : 0) : \
11684 (!node->n2) ? (body = &node->n1, 1) : \
11685 (reduce_nodes(p, &node->n1), body = &node->n2, 1))
11686
11687 while (node) {
11688 int newline = (int)(node->flags & NODE_FL_NEWLINE);
11689 switch (nd_type(node)) {
11690 end:
11691 case NODE_NIL:
11692 *body = 0;
11693 return;
11694 case NODE_RETURN:
11695 *body = node = node->nd_stts;
11696 if (newline && node) node->flags |= NODE_FL_NEWLINE;
11697 continue;
11698 case NODE_BEGIN:
11699 *body = node = node->nd_body;
11700 if (newline && node) node->flags |= NODE_FL_NEWLINE;
11701 continue;
11702 case NODE_BLOCK:
11703 body = &node->nd_end->nd_head;
11704 break;
11705 case NODE_IF:
11706 case NODE_UNLESS:
11707 if (subnodes(nd_body, nd_else)) break;
11708 return;
11709 case NODE_CASE:
11710 body = &node->nd_body;
11711 break;
11712 case NODE_WHEN:
11713 if (!subnodes(nd_body, nd_next)) goto end;
11714 break;
11715 case NODE_ENSURE:
11716 if (!subnodes(nd_head, nd_resq)) goto end;
11717 break;
11718 case NODE_RESCUE:
11719 if (node->nd_else) {
11720 body = &node->nd_resq;
11721 break;
11722 }
11723 if (!subnodes(nd_head, nd_resq)) goto end;
11724 break;
11725 default:
11726 return;
11727 }
11728 node = *body;
11729 if (newline && node) node->flags |= NODE_FL_NEWLINE;
11730 }
11731
11732#undef subnodes
11733}
11734
11735static int
11736is_static_content(NODE *node)
11737{
11738 if (!node) return 1;
11739 switch (nd_type(node)) {
11740 case NODE_HASH:
11741 if (!(node = node->nd_head)) break;
11742 case NODE_LIST:
11743 do {
11744 if (!is_static_content(node->nd_head)) return 0;
11745 } while ((node = node->nd_next) != 0);
11746 case NODE_LIT:
11747 case NODE_STR:
11748 case NODE_NIL:
11749 case NODE_TRUE:
11750 case NODE_FALSE:
11751 case NODE_ZLIST:
11752 break;
11753 default:
11754 return 0;
11755 }
11756 return 1;
11757}
11758
11759static int
11760assign_in_cond(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node)
11761{
11762 switch (nd_type(node)) {
11763 case NODE_MASGN:
11764 case NODE_LASGN:
11765 case NODE_DASGN:
11766 case NODE_GASGN:
11767 case NODE_IASGN:
11768 break;
11769
11770 default:
11771 return 0;
11772 }
11773
11774 if (!node->nd_value) return 1;
11775 if (is_static_content(node->nd_value)) {
11776 /* reports always */
11777 parser_warn(p, node->nd_value, "found `= literal' in conditional, should be ==");
11778 }
11779 return 1;
11780}
11781
11782enum cond_type {
11783 COND_IN_OP,
11784 COND_IN_COND,
11785 COND_IN_FF
11786};
11787
11788#define SWITCH_BY_COND_TYPE(t, w, arg) \
11789 switch (t) { \
11790 case COND_IN_OP: break; \
11791 case COND_IN_COND: rb_##w##0(arg "literal in condition"); break; \
11792 case COND_IN_FF: rb_##w##0(arg "literal in flip-flop"); break; \
11793 }
11794
11795static NODE *cond0(struct parser_params*,NODE*,enum cond_type,const YYLTYPE*);
11796
11797static NODE*
11798range_op(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11799{
11800 enum node_type type;
11801
11802 if (node == 0) return 0;
11803
11804 type = nd_type(node);
11805 value_expr(node);
11806 if (type == NODE_LIT && FIXNUM_P(node->nd_lit)) {
11807 if (!e_option_supplied(p)) parser_warn(p, node, "integer literal in flip-flop");
11808 ID lineno = rb_intern("$.");
11809 return NEW_CALL(node, tEQ, NEW_LIST(NEW_GVAR(lineno, loc), loc), loc);
11810 }
11811 return cond0(p, node, COND_IN_FF, loc);
11812}
11813
11814static NODE*
11815cond0(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node, enum cond_type type, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11816{
11817 if (node == 0) return 0;
11818 if (!(node = nd_once_body(node))) return 0;
11819 assign_in_cond(p, node);
11820
11821 switch (nd_type(node)) {
11822 case NODE_DSTR:
11823 case NODE_EVSTR:
11824 case NODE_STR:
11825 SWITCH_BY_COND_TYPE(type, warn, "string ")
11826 break;
11827
11828 case NODE_DREGX:
11829 if (!e_option_supplied(p)) SWITCH_BY_COND_TYPE(type, warning, "regex ")
11830
11831 return NEW_MATCH2(node, NEW_GVAR(idLASTLINE, loc), loc);
11832
11833 case NODE_AND:
11834 case NODE_OR:
11835 node->nd_1st = cond0(p, node->nd_1st, COND_IN_COND, loc);
11836 node->nd_2nd = cond0(p, node->nd_2nd, COND_IN_COND, loc);
11837 break;
11838
11839 case NODE_DOT2:
11840 case NODE_DOT3:
11841 node->nd_beg = range_op(p, node->nd_beg, loc);
11842 node->nd_end = range_op(p, node->nd_end, loc);
11843 if (nd_type_p(node, NODE_DOT2)) nd_set_type(node,NODE_FLIP2);
11844 else if (nd_type_p(node, NODE_DOT3)) nd_set_type(node, NODE_FLIP3);
11845 break;
11846
11847 case NODE_DSYM:
11848 warn_symbol:
11849 SWITCH_BY_COND_TYPE(type, warning, "symbol ")
11850 break;
11851
11852 case NODE_LIT:
11853 if (RB_TYPE_P(node->nd_lit, T_REGEXP)) {
11854 if (!e_option_supplied(p)) SWITCH_BY_COND_TYPE(type, warn, "regex ")
11855 nd_set_type(node, NODE_MATCH);
11856 }
11857 else if (node->nd_lit == Qtrue ||
11858 node->nd_lit == Qfalse) {
11859 /* booleans are OK, e.g., while true */
11860 }
11861 else if (SYMBOL_P(node->nd_lit)) {
11862 goto warn_symbol;
11863 }
11864 else {
11865 SWITCH_BY_COND_TYPE(type, warning, "")
11866 }
11867 default:
11868 break;
11869 }
11870 return node;
11871}
11872
11873static NODE*
11874cond(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11875{
11876 if (node == 0) return 0;
11877 return cond0(p, node, COND_IN_COND, loc);
11878}
11879
11880static NODE*
11881method_cond(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11882{
11883 if (node == 0) return 0;
11884 return cond0(p, node, COND_IN_OP, loc);
11885}
11886
11887static NODE*
11888new_nil_at(struct parser_params *p, const rb_code_position_t *pos)
11889{
11890 YYLTYPE loc = {*pos, *pos};
11891 return NEW_NIL(&loc);
11892}
11893
11894static NODE*
11895new_if(struct parser_params *p, NODE *cc, NODE *left, NODE *right, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11896{
11897 if (!cc) return right;
11898 cc = cond0(p, cc, COND_IN_COND, loc);
11899 return newline_node(NEW_IF(cc, left, right, loc));
11900}
11901
11902static NODE*
11903new_unless(struct parser_params *p, NODE *cc, NODE *left, NODE *right, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11904{
11905 if (!cc) return right;
11906 cc = cond0(p, cc, COND_IN_COND, loc);
11907 return newline_node(NEW_UNLESS(cc, left, right, loc));
11908}
11909
11910static NODE*
11911logop(struct parser_params *p, ID id, NODE *left, NODE *right,
11912 const YYLTYPE *op_loc, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11913{
11914 enum node_type type = id == idAND || id == idANDOP ? NODE_AND : NODE_OR;
11915 NODE *op;
11916 value_expr(left);
11917 if (left && nd_type_p(left, type)) {
11918 NODE *node = left, *second;
11919 while ((second = node->nd_2nd) != 0 && nd_type_p(second, type)) {
11920 node = second;
11921 }
11922 node->nd_2nd = NEW_NODE(type, second, right, 0, loc);
11923 nd_set_line(node->nd_2nd, op_loc->beg_pos.lineno);
11924 left->nd_loc.end_pos = loc->end_pos;
11925 return left;
11926 }
11927 op = NEW_NODE(type, left, right, 0, loc);
11928 nd_set_line(op, op_loc->beg_pos.lineno);
11929 return op;
11930}
11931
11932static void
11933no_blockarg(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node)
11934{
11935 if (node && nd_type_p(node, NODE_BLOCK_PASS)) {
11936 compile_error(p, "block argument should not be given");
11937 }
11938}
11939
11940static NODE *
11941ret_args(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node)
11942{
11943 if (node) {
11944 no_blockarg(p, node);
11945 if (nd_type_p(node, NODE_LIST)) {
11946 if (node->nd_next == 0) {
11947 node = node->nd_head;
11948 }
11949 else {
11950 nd_set_type(node, NODE_VALUES);
11951 }
11952 }
11953 }
11954 return node;
11955}
11956
11957static NODE *
11958new_yield(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node, const YYLTYPE *loc)
11959{
11960 if (node) no_blockarg(p, node);
11961
11962 return NEW_YIELD(node, loc);
11963}
11964
11965static VALUE
11966negate_lit(struct parser_params *p, VALUE lit)
11967{
11968 if (FIXNUM_P(lit)) {
11969 return LONG2FIX(-FIX2LONG(lit));
11970 }
11971 if (SPECIAL_CONST_P(lit)) {
11972#if USE_FLONUM
11973 if (FLONUM_P(lit)) {
11974 return DBL2NUM(-RFLOAT_VALUE(lit));
11975 }
11976#endif
11977 goto unknown;
11978 }
11979 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(lit)) {
11980 case T_BIGNUM:
11981 BIGNUM_NEGATE(lit);
11982 lit = rb_big_norm(lit);
11983 break;
11984 case T_RATIONAL:
11985 RATIONAL_SET_NUM(lit, negate_lit(p, RRATIONAL(lit)->num));
11986 break;
11987 case T_COMPLEX:
11988 RCOMPLEX_SET_REAL(lit, negate_lit(p, RCOMPLEX(lit)->real));
11989 RCOMPLEX_SET_IMAG(lit, negate_lit(p, RCOMPLEX(lit)->imag));
11990 break;
11991 case T_FLOAT:
11992 lit = DBL2NUM(-RFLOAT_VALUE(lit));
11993 break;
11994 unknown:
11995 default:
11996 rb_parser_fatal(p, "unknown literal type (%s) passed to negate_lit",
11997 rb_builtin_class_name(lit));
11998 break;
11999 }
12000 return lit;
12001}
12002
12003static NODE *
12004arg_blk_pass(NODE *node1, NODE *node2)
12005{
12006 if (node2) {
12007 if (!node1) return node2;
12008 node2->nd_head = node1;
12009 nd_set_first_lineno(node2, nd_first_lineno(node1));
12010 nd_set_first_column(node2, nd_first_column(node1));
12011 return node2;
12012 }
12013 return node1;
12014}
12015
12016static bool
12017args_info_empty_p(struct rb_args_info *args)
12018{
12019 if (args->pre_args_num) return false;
12020 if (args->post_args_num) return false;
12021 if (args->rest_arg) return false;
12022 if (args->opt_args) return false;
12023 if (args->block_arg) return false;
12024 if (args->kw_args) return false;
12025 if (args->kw_rest_arg) return false;
12026 return true;
12027}
12028
12029static NODE*
12030new_args(struct parser_params *p, NODE *pre_args, NODE *opt_args, ID rest_arg, NODE *post_args, NODE *tail, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12031{
12032 int saved_line = p->ruby_sourceline;
12033 struct rb_args_info *args = tail->nd_ainfo;
12034
12035 if (args->block_arg == idFWD_BLOCK) {
12036 if (rest_arg) {
12037 yyerror1(&tail->nd_loc, "... after rest argument");
12038 return tail;
12039 }
12040 rest_arg = idFWD_REST;
12041 }
12042
12043 args->pre_args_num = pre_args ? rb_long2int(pre_args->nd_plen) : 0;
12044 args->pre_init = pre_args ? pre_args->nd_next : 0;
12045
12046 args->post_args_num = post_args ? rb_long2int(post_args->nd_plen) : 0;
12047 args->post_init = post_args ? post_args->nd_next : 0;
12048 args->first_post_arg = post_args ? post_args->nd_pid : 0;
12049
12050 args->rest_arg = rest_arg;
12051
12052 args->opt_args = opt_args;
12053
12054 args->ruby2_keywords = rest_arg == idFWD_REST;
12055
12056 p->ruby_sourceline = saved_line;
12057 nd_set_loc(tail, loc);
12058
12059 return tail;
12060}
12061
12062static NODE*
12063new_args_tail(struct parser_params *p, NODE *kw_args, ID kw_rest_arg, ID block, const YYLTYPE *kw_rest_loc)
12064{
12065 int saved_line = p->ruby_sourceline;
12066 NODE *node;
12067 VALUE tmpbuf = rb_imemo_tmpbuf_auto_free_pointer();
12068 struct rb_args_info *args = ZALLOC(struct rb_args_info);
12069 rb_imemo_tmpbuf_set_ptr(tmpbuf, args);
12070 args->imemo = tmpbuf;
12071 node = NEW_NODE(NODE_ARGS, 0, 0, args, &NULL_LOC);
12072 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, tmpbuf);
12073 if (p->error_p) return node;
12074
12075 args->block_arg = block;
12076 args->kw_args = kw_args;
12077
12078 if (kw_args) {
12079 /*
12080 * def foo(k1: 1, kr1:, k2: 2, **krest, &b)
12081 * variable order: k1, kr1, k2, &b, internal_id, krest
12082 * #=> <reorder>
12083 * variable order: kr1, k1, k2, internal_id, krest, &b
12084 */
12085 ID kw_bits = internal_id(p), *required_kw_vars, *kw_vars;
12086 struct vtable *vtargs = p->lvtbl->args;
12087 NODE *kwn = kw_args;
12088
12089 if (block) block = vtargs->tbl[vtargs->pos-1];
12090 vtable_pop(vtargs, !!block + !!kw_rest_arg);
12091 required_kw_vars = kw_vars = &vtargs->tbl[vtargs->pos];
12092 while (kwn) {
12093 if (!NODE_REQUIRED_KEYWORD_P(kwn->nd_body))
12094 --kw_vars;
12095 --required_kw_vars;
12096 kwn = kwn->nd_next;
12097 }
12098
12099 for (kwn = kw_args; kwn; kwn = kwn->nd_next) {
12100 ID vid = kwn->nd_body->nd_vid;
12101 if (NODE_REQUIRED_KEYWORD_P(kwn->nd_body)) {
12102 *required_kw_vars++ = vid;
12103 }
12104 else {
12105 *kw_vars++ = vid;
12106 }
12107 }
12108
12109 arg_var(p, kw_bits);
12110 if (kw_rest_arg) arg_var(p, kw_rest_arg);
12111 if (block) arg_var(p, block);
12112
12113 args->kw_rest_arg = NEW_DVAR(kw_rest_arg, kw_rest_loc);
12114 args->kw_rest_arg->nd_cflag = kw_bits;
12115 }
12116 else if (kw_rest_arg == idNil) {
12117 args->no_kwarg = 1;
12118 }
12119 else if (kw_rest_arg) {
12120 args->kw_rest_arg = NEW_DVAR(kw_rest_arg, kw_rest_loc);
12121 }
12122
12123 p->ruby_sourceline = saved_line;
12124 return node;
12125}
12126
12127static NODE *
12128args_with_numbered(struct parser_params *p, NODE *args, int max_numparam)
12129{
12130 if (max_numparam > NO_PARAM) {
12131 if (!args) {
12132 YYLTYPE loc = RUBY_INIT_YYLLOC();
12133 args = new_args_tail(p, 0, 0, 0, 0);
12134 nd_set_loc(args, &loc);
12135 }
12136 args->nd_ainfo->pre_args_num = max_numparam;
12137 }
12138 return args;
12139}
12140
12141static NODE*
12142new_array_pattern(struct parser_params *p, NODE *constant, NODE *pre_arg, NODE *aryptn, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12143{
12144 struct rb_ary_pattern_info *apinfo = aryptn->nd_apinfo;
12145
12146 aryptn->nd_pconst = constant;
12147
12148 if (pre_arg) {
12149 NODE *pre_args = NEW_LIST(pre_arg, loc);
12150 if (apinfo->pre_args) {
12151 apinfo->pre_args = list_concat(pre_args, apinfo->pre_args);
12152 }
12153 else {
12154 apinfo->pre_args = pre_args;
12155 }
12156 }
12157 return aryptn;
12158}
12159
12160static NODE*
12161new_array_pattern_tail(struct parser_params *p, NODE *pre_args, int has_rest, ID rest_arg, NODE *post_args, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12162{
12163 int saved_line = p->ruby_sourceline;
12164 NODE *node;
12165 VALUE tmpbuf = rb_imemo_tmpbuf_auto_free_pointer();
12166 struct rb_ary_pattern_info *apinfo = ZALLOC(struct rb_ary_pattern_info);
12167 rb_imemo_tmpbuf_set_ptr(tmpbuf, apinfo);
12168 node = NEW_NODE(NODE_ARYPTN, 0, tmpbuf, apinfo, loc);
12169 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, tmpbuf);
12170
12171 apinfo->pre_args = pre_args;
12172
12173 if (has_rest) {
12174 if (rest_arg) {
12175 apinfo->rest_arg = assignable(p, rest_arg, 0, loc);
12176 }
12177 else {
12178 apinfo->rest_arg = NODE_SPECIAL_NO_NAME_REST;
12179 }
12180 }
12181 else {
12182 apinfo->rest_arg = NULL;
12183 }
12184
12185 apinfo->post_args = post_args;
12186
12187 p->ruby_sourceline = saved_line;
12188 return node;
12189}
12190
12191static NODE*
12192new_find_pattern(struct parser_params *p, NODE *constant, NODE *fndptn, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12193{
12194 fndptn->nd_pconst = constant;
12195
12196 return fndptn;
12197}
12198
12199static NODE*
12200new_find_pattern_tail(struct parser_params *p, ID pre_rest_arg, NODE *args, ID post_rest_arg, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12201{
12202 int saved_line = p->ruby_sourceline;
12203 NODE *node;
12204 VALUE tmpbuf = rb_imemo_tmpbuf_auto_free_pointer();
12205 struct rb_fnd_pattern_info *fpinfo = ZALLOC(struct rb_fnd_pattern_info);
12206 rb_imemo_tmpbuf_set_ptr(tmpbuf, fpinfo);
12207 node = NEW_NODE(NODE_FNDPTN, 0, tmpbuf, fpinfo, loc);
12208 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, tmpbuf);
12209
12210 fpinfo->pre_rest_arg = pre_rest_arg ? assignable(p, pre_rest_arg, 0, loc) : NODE_SPECIAL_NO_NAME_REST;
12211 fpinfo->args = args;
12212 fpinfo->post_rest_arg = post_rest_arg ? assignable(p, post_rest_arg, 0, loc) : NODE_SPECIAL_NO_NAME_REST;
12213
12214 p->ruby_sourceline = saved_line;
12215 return node;
12216}
12217
12218static NODE*
12219new_hash_pattern(struct parser_params *p, NODE *constant, NODE *hshptn, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12220{
12221 hshptn->nd_pconst = constant;
12222 return hshptn;
12223}
12224
12225static NODE*
12226new_hash_pattern_tail(struct parser_params *p, NODE *kw_args, ID kw_rest_arg, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12227{
12228 int saved_line = p->ruby_sourceline;
12229 NODE *node, *kw_rest_arg_node;
12230
12231 if (kw_rest_arg == idNil) {
12232 kw_rest_arg_node = NODE_SPECIAL_NO_REST_KEYWORD;
12233 }
12234 else if (kw_rest_arg) {
12235 kw_rest_arg_node = assignable(p, kw_rest_arg, 0, loc);
12236 }
12237 else {
12238 kw_rest_arg_node = NULL;
12239 }
12240
12241 node = NEW_NODE(NODE_HSHPTN, 0, kw_args, kw_rest_arg_node, loc);
12242
12243 p->ruby_sourceline = saved_line;
12244 return node;
12245}
12246
12247static NODE*
12248dsym_node(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12249{
12250 VALUE lit;
12251
12252 if (!node) {
12253 return NEW_LIT(ID2SYM(idNULL), loc);
12254 }
12255
12256 switch (nd_type(node)) {
12257 case NODE_DSTR:
12258 nd_set_type(node, NODE_DSYM);
12259 nd_set_loc(node, loc);
12260 break;
12261 case NODE_STR:
12262 lit = node->nd_lit;
12263 RB_OBJ_WRITTEN(p->ast, Qnil, node->nd_lit = ID2SYM(rb_intern_str(lit)));
12264 nd_set_type(node, NODE_LIT);
12265 nd_set_loc(node, loc);
12266 break;
12267 default:
12268 node = NEW_NODE(NODE_DSYM, Qnil, 1, NEW_LIST(node, loc), loc);
12269 break;
12270 }
12271 return node;
12272}
12273
12274static int
12275append_literal_keys(st_data_t k, st_data_t v, st_data_t h)
12276{
12277 NODE *node = (NODE *)v;
12278 NODE **result = (NODE **)h;
12279 node->nd_alen = 2;
12280 node->nd_next->nd_end = node->nd_next;
12281 node->nd_next->nd_next = 0;
12282 if (*result)
12283 list_concat(*result, node);
12284 else
12285 *result = node;
12286 return ST_CONTINUE;
12287}
12288
12289static bool
12290hash_literal_key_p(VALUE k)
12291{
12292 switch (OBJ_BUILTIN_TYPE(k)) {
12293 case T_NODE:
12294 return false;
12295 default:
12296 return true;
12297 }
12298}
12299
12300static int
12301literal_cmp(VALUE val, VALUE lit)
12302{
12303 if (val == lit) return 0;
12304 if (!hash_literal_key_p(val) || !hash_literal_key_p(lit)) return -1;
12305 return rb_iseq_cdhash_cmp(val, lit);
12306}
12307
12308static st_index_t
12309literal_hash(VALUE a)
12310{
12311 if (!hash_literal_key_p(a)) return (st_index_t)a;
12312 return rb_iseq_cdhash_hash(a);
12313}
12314
12315static const struct st_hash_type literal_type = {
12316 literal_cmp,
12317 literal_hash,
12318};
12319
12320static NODE *
12321remove_duplicate_keys(struct parser_params *p, NODE *hash)
12322{
12323 st_table *literal_keys = st_init_table_with_size(&literal_type, hash->nd_alen / 2);
12324 NODE *result = 0;
12325 NODE *last_expr = 0;
12326 rb_code_location_t loc = hash->nd_loc;
12327 while (hash && hash->nd_head && hash->nd_next) {
12328 NODE *head = hash->nd_head;
12329 NODE *value = hash->nd_next;
12330 NODE *next = value->nd_next;
12331 st_data_t key = (st_data_t)head;
12332 st_data_t data;
12333 value->nd_next = 0;
12334 if (nd_type_p(head, NODE_LIT) &&
12335 st_delete(literal_keys, (key = (st_data_t)head->nd_lit, &key), &data)) {
12336 NODE *dup_value = ((NODE *)data)->nd_next;
12337 rb_compile_warn(p->ruby_sourcefile, nd_line((NODE *)data),
12338 "key %+"PRIsVALUE" is duplicated and overwritten on line %d",
12339 head->nd_lit, nd_line(head));
12340 if (dup_value == last_expr) {
12341 value->nd_head = block_append(p, dup_value->nd_head, value->nd_head);
12342 }
12343 else {
12344 last_expr->nd_head = block_append(p, dup_value->nd_head, last_expr->nd_head);
12345 }
12346 }
12347 st_insert(literal_keys, (st_data_t)key, (st_data_t)hash);
12348 last_expr = nd_type_p(head, NODE_LIT) ? value : head;
12349 hash = next;
12350 }
12351 st_foreach(literal_keys, append_literal_keys, (st_data_t)&result);
12352 st_free_table(literal_keys);
12353 if (hash) {
12354 if (!result) result = hash;
12355 else list_concat(result, hash);
12356 }
12357 result->nd_loc = loc;
12358 return result;
12359}
12360
12361static NODE *
12362new_hash(struct parser_params *p, NODE *hash, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12363{
12364 if (hash) hash = remove_duplicate_keys(p, hash);
12365 return NEW_HASH(hash, loc);
12366}
12367#endif
12368
12369static void
12370error_duplicate_pattern_variable(struct parser_params *p, ID id, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12371{
12372 if (is_private_local_id(id)) {
12373 return;
12374 }
12375 if (st_is_member(p->pvtbl, id)) {
12376 yyerror1(loc, "duplicated variable name");
12377 }
12378 else {
12379 st_insert(p->pvtbl, (st_data_t)id, 0);
12380 }
12381}
12382
12383static void
12384error_duplicate_pattern_key(struct parser_params *p, VALUE key, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12385{
12386 if (!p->pktbl) {
12387 p->pktbl = st_init_numtable();
12388 }
12389 else if (st_is_member(p->pktbl, key)) {
12390 yyerror1(loc, "duplicated key name");
12391 return;
12392 }
12393 st_insert(p->pktbl, (st_data_t)key, 0);
12394}
12395
12396#ifndef RIPPER
12397static NODE *
12398new_unique_key_hash(struct parser_params *p, NODE *hash, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12399{
12400 return NEW_HASH(hash, loc);
12401}
12402#endif /* !RIPPER */
12403
12404#ifndef RIPPER
12405static NODE *
12406new_op_assign(struct parser_params *p, NODE *lhs, ID op, NODE *rhs, struct lex_context ctxt, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12407{
12408 NODE *asgn;
12409
12410 if (lhs) {
12411 ID vid = lhs->nd_vid;
12412 YYLTYPE lhs_loc = lhs->nd_loc;
12413 int shareable = ctxt.shareable_constant_value;
12414 if (shareable) {
12415 switch (nd_type(lhs)) {
12416 case NODE_CDECL:
12417 case NODE_COLON2:
12418 case NODE_COLON3:
12419 break;
12420 default:
12421 shareable = 0;
12422 break;
12423 }
12424 }
12425 if (op == tOROP) {
12426 rhs = shareable_constant_value(p, shareable, lhs, rhs, &rhs->nd_loc);
12427 lhs->nd_value = rhs;
12428 nd_set_loc(lhs, loc);
12429 asgn = NEW_OP_ASGN_OR(gettable(p, vid, &lhs_loc), lhs, loc);
12430 if (is_notop_id(vid)) {
12431 switch (id_type(vid)) {
12432 case ID_GLOBAL:
12433 case ID_INSTANCE:
12434 case ID_CLASS:
12435 asgn->nd_aid = vid;
12436 }
12437 }
12438 }
12439 else if (op == tANDOP) {
12440 if (shareable) {
12441 rhs = shareable_constant_value(p, shareable, lhs, rhs, &rhs->nd_loc);
12442 }
12443 lhs->nd_value = rhs;
12444 nd_set_loc(lhs, loc);
12445 asgn = NEW_OP_ASGN_AND(gettable(p, vid, &lhs_loc), lhs, loc);
12446 }
12447 else {
12448 asgn = lhs;
12449 rhs = NEW_CALL(gettable(p, vid, &lhs_loc), op, NEW_LIST(rhs, &rhs->nd_loc), loc);
12450 if (shareable) {
12451 rhs = shareable_constant_value(p, shareable, lhs, rhs, &rhs->nd_loc);
12452 }
12453 asgn->nd_value = rhs;
12454 nd_set_loc(asgn, loc);
12455 }
12456 }
12457 else {
12458 asgn = NEW_BEGIN(0, loc);
12459 }
12460 return asgn;
12461}
12462
12463static NODE *
12464new_ary_op_assign(struct parser_params *p, NODE *ary,
12465 NODE *args, ID op, NODE *rhs, const YYLTYPE *args_loc, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12466{
12467 NODE *asgn;
12468
12469 args = make_list(args, args_loc);
12470 if (nd_type_p(args, NODE_BLOCK_PASS)) {
12471 args = NEW_ARGSCAT(args, rhs, loc);
12472 }
12473 else {
12474 args = arg_concat(p, args, rhs, loc);
12475 }
12476 asgn = NEW_OP_ASGN1(ary, op, args, loc);
12477 fixpos(asgn, ary);
12478 return asgn;
12479}
12480
12481static NODE *
12482new_attr_op_assign(struct parser_params *p, NODE *lhs,
12483 ID atype, ID attr, ID op, NODE *rhs, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12484{
12485 NODE *asgn;
12486
12487 asgn = NEW_OP_ASGN2(lhs, CALL_Q_P(atype), attr, op, rhs, loc);
12488 fixpos(asgn, lhs);
12489 return asgn;
12490}
12491
12492static NODE *
12493new_const_op_assign(struct parser_params *p, NODE *lhs, ID op, NODE *rhs, struct lex_context ctxt, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12494{
12495 NODE *asgn;
12496
12497 if (lhs) {
12498 rhs = shareable_constant_value(p, ctxt.shareable_constant_value, lhs, rhs, loc);
12499 asgn = NEW_OP_CDECL(lhs, op, rhs, loc);
12500 }
12501 else {
12502 asgn = NEW_BEGIN(0, loc);
12503 }
12504 fixpos(asgn, lhs);
12505 return asgn;
12506}
12507
12508static NODE *
12509const_decl(struct parser_params *p, NODE *path, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12510{
12511 if (p->ctxt.in_def) {
12512 yyerror1(loc, "dynamic constant assignment");
12513 }
12514 return NEW_CDECL(0, 0, (path), loc);
12515}
12516#else
12517static VALUE
12518const_decl(struct parser_params *p, VALUE path)
12519{
12520 if (p->ctxt.in_def) {
12521 path = assign_error(p, "dynamic constant assignment", path);
12522 }
12523 return path;
12524}
12525
12526static VALUE
12527assign_error(struct parser_params *p, const char *mesg, VALUE a)
12528{
12529 a = dispatch2(assign_error, ERR_MESG(), a);
12530 ripper_error(p);
12531 return a;
12532}
12533
12534static VALUE
12535var_field(struct parser_params *p, VALUE a)
12536{
12537 return ripper_new_yylval(p, get_id(a), dispatch1(var_field, a), 0);
12538}
12539#endif
12540
12541#ifndef RIPPER
12542static NODE *
12543new_bodystmt(struct parser_params *p, NODE *head, NODE *rescue, NODE *rescue_else, NODE *ensure, const YYLTYPE *loc)
12544{
12545 NODE *result = head;
12546 if (rescue) {
12547 NODE *tmp = rescue_else ? rescue_else : rescue;
12548 YYLTYPE rescue_loc = code_loc_gen(&head->nd_loc, &tmp->nd_loc);
12549
12550 result = NEW_RESCUE(head, rescue, rescue_else, &rescue_loc);
12551 nd_set_line(result, rescue->nd_loc.beg_pos.lineno);
12552 }
12553 else if (rescue_else) {
12554 result = block_append(p, result, rescue_else);
12555 }
12556 if (ensure) {
12557 result = NEW_ENSURE(result, ensure, loc);
12558 }
12559 fixpos(result, head);
12560 return result;
12561}
12562#endif
12563
12564static void
12565warn_unused_var(struct parser_params *p, struct local_vars *local)
12566{
12567 int cnt;
12568
12569 if (!local->used) return;
12570 cnt = local->used->pos;
12571 if (cnt != local->vars->pos) {
12572 rb_parser_fatal(p, "local->used->pos != local->vars->pos");
12573 }
12574#ifndef RIPPER
12575 ID *v = local->vars->tbl;
12576 ID *u = local->used->tbl;
12577 for (int i = 0; i < cnt; ++i) {
12578 if (!v[i] || (u[i] & LVAR_USED)) continue;
12579 if (is_private_local_id(v[i])) continue;
12580 rb_warn1L((int)u[i], "assigned but unused variable - %"PRIsWARN, rb_id2str(v[i]));
12581 }
12582#endif
12583}
12584
12585static void
12586local_push(struct parser_params *p, int toplevel_scope)
12587{
12588 struct local_vars *local;
12589 int inherits_dvars = toplevel_scope && compile_for_eval;
12590 int warn_unused_vars = RTEST(ruby_verbose);
12591
12592 local = ALLOC(struct local_vars);
12593 local->prev = p->lvtbl;
12594 local->args = vtable_alloc(0);
12595 local->vars = vtable_alloc(inherits_dvars ? DVARS_INHERIT : DVARS_TOPSCOPE);
12596#ifndef RIPPER
12597 if (toplevel_scope && compile_for_eval) warn_unused_vars = 0;
12598 if (toplevel_scope && e_option_supplied(p)) warn_unused_vars = 0;
12599 local->numparam.outer = 0;
12600 local->numparam.inner = 0;
12601 local->numparam.current = 0;
12602#endif
12603 local->used = warn_unused_vars ? vtable_alloc(0) : 0;
12604
12605# if WARN_PAST_SCOPE
12606 local->past = 0;
12607# endif
12608 CMDARG_PUSH(0);
12609 COND_PUSH(0);
12610 p->lvtbl = local;
12611}
12612
12613static void
12614local_pop(struct parser_params *p)
12615{
12616 struct local_vars *local = p->lvtbl->prev;
12617 if (p->lvtbl->used) {
12618 warn_unused_var(p, p->lvtbl);
12619 vtable_free(p->lvtbl->used);
12620 }
12621# if WARN_PAST_SCOPE
12622 while (p->lvtbl->past) {
12623 struct vtable *past = p->lvtbl->past;
12624 p->lvtbl->past = past->prev;
12625 vtable_free(past);
12626 }
12627# endif
12628 vtable_free(p->lvtbl->args);
12629 vtable_free(p->lvtbl->vars);
12630 CMDARG_POP();
12631 COND_POP();
12632 ruby_sized_xfree(p->lvtbl, sizeof(*p->lvtbl));
12633 p->lvtbl = local;
12634}
12635
12636#ifndef RIPPER
12637static rb_ast_id_table_t *
12638local_tbl(struct parser_params *p)
12639{
12640 int cnt_args = vtable_size(p->lvtbl->args);
12641 int cnt_vars = vtable_size(p->lvtbl->vars);
12642 int cnt = cnt_args + cnt_vars;
12643 int i, j;
12644 rb_ast_id_table_t *tbl;
12645
12646 if (cnt <= 0) return 0;
12647 tbl = rb_ast_new_local_table(p->ast, cnt);
12648 MEMCPY(tbl->ids, p->lvtbl->args->tbl, ID, cnt_args);
12649 /* remove IDs duplicated to warn shadowing */
12650 for (i = 0, j = cnt_args; i < cnt_vars; ++i) {
12651 ID id = p->lvtbl->vars->tbl[i];
12652 if (!vtable_included(p->lvtbl->args, id)) {
12653 tbl->ids[j++] = id;
12654 }
12655 }
12656 if (j < cnt) {
12657 tbl = rb_ast_resize_latest_local_table(p->ast, j);
12658 }
12659
12660 return tbl;
12661}
12662
12663static NODE*
12664node_newnode_with_locals(struct parser_params *p, enum node_type type, VALUE a1, VALUE a2, const rb_code_location_t *loc)
12665{
12666 rb_ast_id_table_t *a0;
12667 NODE *n;
12668
12669 a0 = local_tbl(p);
12670 n = NEW_NODE(type, a0, a1, a2, loc);
12671 return n;
12672}
12673
12674#endif
12675
12676static void
12677numparam_name(struct parser_params *p, ID id)
12678{
12679 if (!NUMPARAM_ID_P(id)) return;
12680 compile_error(p, "_%d is reserved for numbered parameter",
12681 NUMPARAM_ID_TO_IDX(id));
12682}
12683
12684static void
12685arg_var(struct parser_params *p, ID id)
12686{
12687 numparam_name(p, id);
12688 vtable_add(p->lvtbl->args, id);
12689}
12690
12691static void
12692local_var(struct parser_params *p, ID id)
12693{
12694 numparam_name(p, id);
12695 vtable_add(p->lvtbl->vars, id);
12696 if (p->lvtbl->used) {
12697 vtable_add(p->lvtbl->used, (ID)p->ruby_sourceline);
12698 }
12699}
12700
12701static int
12702local_id_ref(struct parser_params *p, ID id, ID **vidrefp)
12703{
12704 struct vtable *vars, *args, *used;
12705
12706 vars = p->lvtbl->vars;
12707 args = p->lvtbl->args;
12708 used = p->lvtbl->used;
12709
12710 while (vars && !DVARS_TERMINAL_P(vars->prev)) {
12711 vars = vars->prev;
12712 args = args->prev;
12713 if (used) used = used->prev;
12714 }
12715
12716 if (vars && vars->prev == DVARS_INHERIT) {
12717 return rb_local_defined(id, p->parent_iseq);
12718 }
12719 else if (vtable_included(args, id)) {
12720 return 1;
12721 }
12722 else {
12723 int i = vtable_included(vars, id);
12724 if (i && used && vidrefp) *vidrefp = &used->tbl[i-1];
12725 return i != 0;
12726 }
12727}
12728
12729static int
12730local_id(struct parser_params *p, ID id)
12731{
12732 return local_id_ref(p, id, NULL);
12733}
12734
12735static int
12736check_forwarding_args(struct parser_params *p)
12737{
12738 if (local_id(p, idFWD_REST) &&
12739#if idFWD_KWREST
12740 local_id(p, idFWD_KWREST) &&
12741#endif
12742 local_id(p, idFWD_BLOCK)) return TRUE;
12743 compile_error(p, "unexpected ...");
12744 return FALSE;
12745}
12746
12747static void
12748add_forwarding_args(struct parser_params *p)
12749{
12750 arg_var(p, idFWD_REST);
12751#if idFWD_KWREST
12752 arg_var(p, idFWD_KWREST);
12753#endif
12754 arg_var(p, idFWD_BLOCK);
12755}
12756
12757#ifndef RIPPER
12758static NODE *
12759new_args_forward_call(struct parser_params *p, NODE *leading, const YYLTYPE *loc, const YYLTYPE *argsloc)
12760{
12761 NODE *splat = NEW_SPLAT(NEW_LVAR(idFWD_REST, loc), loc);
12762#if idFWD_KWREST
12763 NODE *kwrest = list_append(p, NEW_LIST(0, loc), NEW_LVAR(idFWD_KWREST, loc));
12764#endif
12765 NODE *block = NEW_BLOCK_PASS(NEW_LVAR(idFWD_BLOCK, loc), loc);
12766 NODE *args = leading ? rest_arg_append(p, leading, splat, argsloc) : splat;
12767#if idFWD_KWREST
12768 args = arg_append(p, splat, new_hash(p, kwrest, loc), loc);
12769#endif
12770 return arg_blk_pass(args, block);
12771}
12772#endif
12773
12774static NODE *
12775numparam_push(struct parser_params *p)
12776{
12777#ifndef RIPPER
12778 struct local_vars *local = p->lvtbl;
12779 NODE *inner = local->numparam.inner;
12780 if (!local->numparam.outer) {
12781 local->numparam.outer = local->numparam.current;
12782 }
12783 local->numparam.inner = 0;
12784 local->numparam.current = 0;
12785 return inner;
12786#else
12787 return 0;
12788#endif
12789}
12790
12791static void
12792numparam_pop(struct parser_params *p, NODE *prev_inner)
12793{
12794#ifndef RIPPER
12795 struct local_vars *local = p->lvtbl;
12796 if (prev_inner) {
12797 /* prefer first one */
12798 local->numparam.inner = prev_inner;
12799 }
12800 else if (local->numparam.current) {
12801 /* current and inner are exclusive */
12802 local->numparam.inner = local->numparam.current;
12803 }
12804 if (p->max_numparam > NO_PARAM) {
12805 /* current and outer are exclusive */
12806 local->numparam.current = local->numparam.outer;
12807 local->numparam.outer = 0;
12808 }
12809 else {
12810 /* no numbered parameter */
12811 local->numparam.current = 0;
12812 }
12813#endif
12814}
12815
12816static const struct vtable *
12817dyna_push(struct parser_params *p)
12818{
12819 p->lvtbl->args = vtable_alloc(p->lvtbl->args);
12820 p->lvtbl->vars = vtable_alloc(p->lvtbl->vars);
12821 if (p->lvtbl->used) {
12822 p->lvtbl->used = vtable_alloc(p->lvtbl->used);
12823 }
12824 return p->lvtbl->args;
12825}
12826
12827static void
12828dyna_pop_vtable(struct parser_params *p, struct vtable **vtblp)
12829{
12830 struct vtable *tmp = *vtblp;
12831 *vtblp = tmp->prev;
12832# if WARN_PAST_SCOPE
12833 if (p->past_scope_enabled) {
12834 tmp->prev = p->lvtbl->past;
12835 p->lvtbl->past = tmp;
12836 return;
12837 }
12838# endif
12839 vtable_free(tmp);
12840}
12841
12842static void
12843dyna_pop_1(struct parser_params *p)
12844{
12845 struct vtable *tmp;
12846
12847 if ((tmp = p->lvtbl->used) != 0) {
12848 warn_unused_var(p, p->lvtbl);
12849 p->lvtbl->used = p->lvtbl->used->prev;
12850 vtable_free(tmp);
12851 }
12852 dyna_pop_vtable(p, &p->lvtbl->args);
12853 dyna_pop_vtable(p, &p->lvtbl->vars);
12854}
12855
12856static void
12857dyna_pop(struct parser_params *p, const struct vtable *lvargs)
12858{
12859 while (p->lvtbl->args != lvargs) {
12860 dyna_pop_1(p);
12861 if (!p->lvtbl->args) {
12862 struct local_vars *local = p->lvtbl->prev;
12863 ruby_sized_xfree(p->lvtbl, sizeof(*p->lvtbl));
12864 p->lvtbl = local;
12865 }
12866 }
12867 dyna_pop_1(p);
12868}
12869
12870static int
12871dyna_in_block(struct parser_params *p)
12872{
12873 return !DVARS_TERMINAL_P(p->lvtbl->vars) && p->lvtbl->vars->prev != DVARS_TOPSCOPE;
12874}
12875
12876static int
12877dvar_defined_ref(struct parser_params *p, ID id, ID **vidrefp)
12878{
12879 struct vtable *vars, *args, *used;
12880 int i;
12881
12882 args = p->lvtbl->args;
12883 vars = p->lvtbl->vars;
12884 used = p->lvtbl->used;
12885
12886 while (!DVARS_TERMINAL_P(vars)) {
12887 if (vtable_included(args, id)) {
12888 return 1;
12889 }
12890 if ((i = vtable_included(vars, id)) != 0) {
12891 if (used && vidrefp) *vidrefp = &used->tbl[i-1];
12892 return 1;
12893 }
12894 args = args->prev;
12895 vars = vars->prev;
12896 if (!vidrefp) used = 0;
12897 if (used) used = used->prev;
12898 }
12899
12900 if (vars == DVARS_INHERIT && !NUMPARAM_ID_P(id)) {
12901 return rb_dvar_defined(id, p->parent_iseq);
12902 }
12903
12904 return 0;
12905}
12906
12907static int
12908dvar_defined(struct parser_params *p, ID id)
12909{
12910 return dvar_defined_ref(p, id, NULL);
12911}
12912
12913static int
12914dvar_curr(struct parser_params *p, ID id)
12915{
12916 return (vtable_included(p->lvtbl->args, id) ||
12917 vtable_included(p->lvtbl->vars, id));
12918}
12919
12920static void
12921reg_fragment_enc_error(struct parser_params* p, VALUE str, int c)
12922{
12923 compile_error(p,
12924 "regexp encoding option '%c' differs from source encoding '%s'",
12925 c, rb_enc_name(rb_enc_get(str)));
12926}
12927
12928#ifndef RIPPER
12929int
12930rb_reg_fragment_setenc(struct parser_params* p, VALUE str, int options)
12931{
12932 int c = RE_OPTION_ENCODING_IDX(options);
12933
12934 if (c) {
12935 int opt, idx;
12936 rb_char_to_option_kcode(c, &opt, &idx);
12937 if (idx != ENCODING_GET(str) &&
12938 rb_enc_str_coderange(str) != ENC_CODERANGE_7BIT) {
12939 goto error;
12940 }
12941 ENCODING_SET(str, idx);
12942 }
12943 else if (RE_OPTION_ENCODING_NONE(options)) {
12944 if (!ENCODING_IS_ASCII8BIT(str) &&
12945 rb_enc_str_coderange(str) != ENC_CODERANGE_7BIT) {
12946 c = 'n';
12947 goto error;
12948 }
12949 rb_enc_associate(str, rb_ascii8bit_encoding());
12950 }
12951 else if (p->enc == rb_usascii_encoding()) {
12952 if (rb_enc_str_coderange(str) != ENC_CODERANGE_7BIT) {
12953 /* raise in re.c */
12954 rb_enc_associate(str, rb_usascii_encoding());
12955 }
12956 else {
12957 rb_enc_associate(str, rb_ascii8bit_encoding());
12958 }
12959 }
12960 return 0;
12961
12962 error:
12963 return c;
12964}
12965
12966static void
12967reg_fragment_setenc(struct parser_params* p, VALUE str, int options)
12968{
12969 int c = rb_reg_fragment_setenc(p, str, options);
12970 if (c) reg_fragment_enc_error(p, str, c);
12971}
12972
12973static int
12974reg_fragment_check(struct parser_params* p, VALUE str, int options)
12975{
12976 VALUE err;
12977 reg_fragment_setenc(p, str, options);
12978 err = rb_reg_check_preprocess(str);
12979 if (err != Qnil) {
12980 err = rb_obj_as_string(err);
12981 compile_error(p, "%"PRIsVALUE, err);
12982 return 0;
12983 }
12984 return 1;
12985}
12986
12987typedef struct {
12988 struct parser_params* parser;
12989 rb_encoding *enc;
12990 NODE *succ_block;
12991 const YYLTYPE *loc;
12992} reg_named_capture_assign_t;
12993
12994static int
12995reg_named_capture_assign_iter(const OnigUChar *name, const OnigUChar *name_end,
12996 int back_num, int *back_refs, OnigRegex regex, void *arg0)
12997{
12998 reg_named_capture_assign_t *arg = (reg_named_capture_assign_t*)arg0;
12999 struct parser_params* p = arg->parser;
13000 rb_encoding *enc = arg->enc;
13001 long len = name_end - name;
13002 const char *s = (const char *)name;
13003 ID var;
13004 NODE *node, *succ;
13005
13006 if (!len) return ST_CONTINUE;
13007 if (rb_enc_symname_type(s, len, enc, (1U<<ID_LOCAL)) != ID_LOCAL)
13008 return ST_CONTINUE;
13009
13010 var = intern_cstr(s, len, enc);
13011 if (len < MAX_WORD_LENGTH && rb_reserved_word(s, (int)len)) {
13012 if (!lvar_defined(p, var)) return ST_CONTINUE;
13013 }
13014 node = node_assign(p, assignable(p, var, 0, arg->loc), NEW_LIT(ID2SYM(var), arg->loc), NO_LEX_CTXT, arg->loc);
13015 succ = arg->succ_block;
13016 if (!succ) succ = NEW_BEGIN(0, arg->loc);
13017 succ = block_append(p, succ, node);
13018 arg->succ_block = succ;
13019 return ST_CONTINUE;
13020}
13021
13022static NODE *
13023reg_named_capture_assign(struct parser_params* p, VALUE regexp, const YYLTYPE *loc)
13024{
13025 reg_named_capture_assign_t arg;
13026
13027 arg.parser = p;
13028 arg.enc = rb_enc_get(regexp);
13029 arg.succ_block = 0;
13030 arg.loc = loc;
13031 onig_foreach_name(RREGEXP_PTR(regexp), reg_named_capture_assign_iter, &arg);
13032
13033 if (!arg.succ_block) return 0;
13034 return arg.succ_block->nd_next;
13035}
13036
13037static VALUE
13038parser_reg_compile(struct parser_params* p, VALUE str, int options)
13039{
13040 reg_fragment_setenc(p, str, options);
13041 return rb_parser_reg_compile(p, str, options);
13042}
13043
13044VALUE
13045rb_parser_reg_compile(struct parser_params* p, VALUE str, int options)
13046{
13047 return rb_reg_compile(str, options & RE_OPTION_MASK, p->ruby_sourcefile, p->ruby_sourceline);
13048}
13049
13050static VALUE
13051reg_compile(struct parser_params* p, VALUE str, int options)
13052{
13053 VALUE re;
13054 VALUE err;
13055
13056 err = rb_errinfo();
13057 re = parser_reg_compile(p, str, options);
13058 if (NIL_P(re)) {
13059 VALUE m = rb_attr_get(rb_errinfo(), idMesg);
13060 rb_set_errinfo(err);
13061 compile_error(p, "%"PRIsVALUE, m);
13062 return Qnil;
13063 }
13064 return re;
13065}
13066#else
13067static VALUE
13068parser_reg_compile(struct parser_params* p, VALUE str, int options, VALUE *errmsg)
13069{
13070 VALUE err = rb_errinfo();
13071 VALUE re;
13072 str = ripper_is_node_yylval(str) ? RNODE(str)->nd_cval : str;
13073 int c = rb_reg_fragment_setenc(p, str, options);
13074 if (c) reg_fragment_enc_error(p, str, c);
13075 re = rb_parser_reg_compile(p, str, options);
13076 if (NIL_P(re)) {
13077 *errmsg = rb_attr_get(rb_errinfo(), idMesg);
13078 rb_set_errinfo(err);
13079 }
13080 return re;
13081}
13082#endif
13083
13084#ifndef RIPPER
13085void
13086rb_parser_set_options(VALUE vparser, int print, int loop, int chomp, int split)
13087{
13088 struct parser_params *p;
13089 TypedData_Get_Struct(vparser, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
13090 p->do_print = print;
13091 p->do_loop = loop;
13092 p->do_chomp = chomp;
13093 p->do_split = split;
13094}
13095
13096static NODE *
13097parser_append_options(struct parser_params *p, NODE *node)
13098{
13099 static const YYLTYPE default_location = {{1, 0}, {1, 0}};
13100 const YYLTYPE *const LOC = &default_location;
13101
13102 if (p->do_print) {
13103 NODE *print = NEW_FCALL(rb_intern("print"),
13104 NEW_LIST(NEW_GVAR(idLASTLINE, LOC), LOC),
13105 LOC);
13106 node = block_append(p, node, print);
13107 }
13108
13109 if (p->do_loop) {
13110 NODE *irs = NEW_LIST(NEW_GVAR(rb_intern("$/"), LOC), LOC);
13111
13112 if (p->do_split) {
13113 ID ifs = rb_intern("$;");
13114 ID fields = rb_intern("$F");
13115 NODE *args = NEW_LIST(NEW_GVAR(ifs, LOC), LOC);
13116 NODE *split = NEW_GASGN(fields,
13117 NEW_CALL(NEW_GVAR(idLASTLINE, LOC),
13118 rb_intern("split"), args, LOC),
13119 LOC);
13120 node = block_append(p, split, node);
13121 }
13122 if (p->do_chomp) {
13123 NODE *chomp = NEW_LIT(ID2SYM(rb_intern("chomp")), LOC);
13124 chomp = list_append(p, NEW_LIST(chomp, LOC), NEW_TRUE(LOC));
13125 irs = list_append(p, irs, NEW_HASH(chomp, LOC));
13126 }
13127
13128 node = NEW_WHILE(NEW_FCALL(idGets, irs, LOC), node, 1, LOC);
13129 }
13130
13131 return node;
13132}
13133
13134void
13135rb_init_parse(void)
13136{
13137 /* just to suppress unused-function warnings */
13138 (void)nodetype;
13139 (void)nodeline;
13140}
13141
13142static ID
13143internal_id(struct parser_params *p)
13144{
13145 return rb_make_temporary_id(vtable_size(p->lvtbl->args) + vtable_size(p->lvtbl->vars));
13146}
13147#endif /* !RIPPER */
13148
13149static void
13150parser_initialize(struct parser_params *p)
13151{
13152 /* note: we rely on TypedData_Make_Struct to set most fields to 0 */
13153 p->command_start = TRUE;
13154 p->ruby_sourcefile_string = Qnil;
13155 p->lex.lpar_beg = -1; /* make lambda_beginning_p() == FALSE at first */
13156 p->node_id = 0;
13157#ifdef RIPPER
13158 p->delayed.token = Qnil;
13159 p->result = Qnil;
13160 p->parsing_thread = Qnil;
13161#else
13162 p->error_buffer = Qfalse;
13163#endif
13164 p->debug_buffer = Qnil;
13165 p->debug_output = rb_ractor_stdout();
13166 p->enc = rb_utf8_encoding();
13167}
13168
13169#ifdef RIPPER
13170#define parser_mark ripper_parser_mark
13171#define parser_free ripper_parser_free
13172#endif
13173
13174static void
13175parser_mark(void *ptr)
13176{
13177 struct parser_params *p = (struct parser_params*)ptr;
13178
13179 rb_gc_mark(p->lex.input);
13180 rb_gc_mark(p->lex.prevline);
13181 rb_gc_mark(p->lex.lastline);
13182 rb_gc_mark(p->lex.nextline);
13183 rb_gc_mark(p->ruby_sourcefile_string);
13184 rb_gc_mark((VALUE)p->lex.strterm);
13185 rb_gc_mark((VALUE)p->ast);
13186 rb_gc_mark(p->case_labels);
13187#ifndef RIPPER
13188 rb_gc_mark(p->debug_lines);
13189 rb_gc_mark(p->compile_option);
13190 rb_gc_mark(p->error_buffer);
13191#else
13192 rb_gc_mark(p->delayed.token);
13193 rb_gc_mark(p->value);
13194 rb_gc_mark(p->result);
13195 rb_gc_mark(p->parsing_thread);
13196#endif
13197 rb_gc_mark(p->debug_buffer);
13198 rb_gc_mark(p->debug_output);
13199#ifdef YYMALLOC
13200 rb_gc_mark((VALUE)p->heap);
13201#endif
13202}
13203
13204static void
13205parser_free(void *ptr)
13206{
13207 struct parser_params *p = (struct parser_params*)ptr;
13208 struct local_vars *local, *prev;
13209
13210 if (p->tokenbuf) {
13211 ruby_sized_xfree(p->tokenbuf, p->toksiz);
13212 }
13213 for (local = p->lvtbl; local; local = prev) {
13214 if (local->vars) xfree(local->vars);
13215 prev = local->prev;
13216 xfree(local);
13217 }
13218 {
13219 token_info *ptinfo;
13220 while ((ptinfo = p->token_info) != 0) {
13221 p->token_info = ptinfo->next;
13222 xfree(ptinfo);
13223 }
13224 }
13225 xfree(ptr);
13226}
13227
13228static size_t
13229parser_memsize(const void *ptr)
13230{
13231 struct parser_params *p = (struct parser_params*)ptr;
13232 struct local_vars *local;
13233 size_t size = sizeof(*p);
13234
13235 size += p->toksiz;
13236 for (local = p->lvtbl; local; local = local->prev) {
13237 size += sizeof(*local);
13238 if (local->vars) size += local->vars->capa * sizeof(ID);
13239 }
13240 return size;
13241}
13242
13243static const rb_data_type_t parser_data_type = {
13244#ifndef RIPPER
13245 "parser",
13246#else
13247 "ripper",
13248#endif
13249 {
13250 parser_mark,
13251 parser_free,
13252 parser_memsize,
13253 },
13254 0, 0, RUBY_TYPED_FREE_IMMEDIATELY
13255};
13256
13257#ifndef RIPPER
13258#undef rb_reserved_word
13259
13260const struct kwtable *
13261rb_reserved_word(const char *str, unsigned int len)
13262{
13263 return reserved_word(str, len);
13264}
13265
13266VALUE
13267rb_parser_new(void)
13268{
13269 struct parser_params *p;
13270 VALUE parser = TypedData_Make_Struct(0, struct parser_params,
13271 &parser_data_type, p);
13272 parser_initialize(p);
13273 return parser;
13274}
13275
13276VALUE
13277rb_parser_set_context(VALUE vparser, const struct rb_iseq_struct *base, int main)
13278{
13279 struct parser_params *p;
13280
13281 TypedData_Get_Struct(vparser, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
13282 p->error_buffer = main ? Qfalse : Qnil;
13283 p->parent_iseq = base;
13284 return vparser;
13285}
13286
13287void
13288rb_parser_keep_script_lines(VALUE vparser)
13289{
13290 struct parser_params *p;
13291
13292 TypedData_Get_Struct(vparser, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
13293 p->keep_script_lines = 1;
13294}
13295#endif
13296
13297#ifdef RIPPER
13298#define rb_parser_end_seen_p ripper_parser_end_seen_p
13299#define rb_parser_encoding ripper_parser_encoding
13300#define rb_parser_get_yydebug ripper_parser_get_yydebug
13301#define rb_parser_set_yydebug ripper_parser_set_yydebug
13302#define rb_parser_get_debug_output ripper_parser_get_debug_output
13303#define rb_parser_set_debug_output ripper_parser_set_debug_output
13304static VALUE ripper_parser_end_seen_p(VALUE vparser);
13305static VALUE ripper_parser_encoding(VALUE vparser);
13306static VALUE ripper_parser_get_yydebug(VALUE self);
13307static VALUE ripper_parser_set_yydebug(VALUE self, VALUE flag);
13308static VALUE ripper_parser_get_debug_output(VALUE self);
13309static VALUE ripper_parser_set_debug_output(VALUE self, VALUE output);
13310
13311/*
13312 * call-seq:
13313 * ripper.error? -> Boolean
13314 *
13315 * Return true if parsed source has errors.
13316 */
13317static VALUE
13318ripper_error_p(VALUE vparser)
13319{
13320 struct parser_params *p;
13321
13322 TypedData_Get_Struct(vparser, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
13323 return RBOOL(p->error_p);
13324}
13325#endif
13326
13327/*
13328 * call-seq:
13329 * ripper.end_seen? -> Boolean
13330 *
13331 * Return true if parsed source ended by +\_\_END\_\_+.
13332 */
13333VALUE
13334rb_parser_end_seen_p(VALUE vparser)
13335{
13336 struct parser_params *p;
13337
13338 TypedData_Get_Struct(vparser, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
13339 return RBOOL(p->ruby__end__seen);
13340}
13341
13342/*
13343 * call-seq:
13344 * ripper.encoding -> encoding
13345 *
13346 * Return encoding of the source.
13347 */
13348VALUE
13349rb_parser_encoding(VALUE vparser)
13350{
13351 struct parser_params *p;
13352
13353 TypedData_Get_Struct(vparser, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
13354 return rb_enc_from_encoding(p->enc);
13355}
13356
13357#ifdef RIPPER
13358/*
13359 * call-seq:
13360 * ripper.yydebug -> true or false
13361 *
13362 * Get yydebug.
13363 */
13364VALUE
13365rb_parser_get_yydebug(VALUE self)
13366{
13367 struct parser_params *p;
13368
13369 TypedData_Get_Struct(self, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
13370 return RBOOL(p->debug);
13371}
13372#endif
13373
13374/*
13375 * call-seq:
13376 * ripper.yydebug = flag
13377 *
13378 * Set yydebug.
13379 */
13380VALUE
13381rb_parser_set_yydebug(VALUE self, VALUE flag)
13382{
13383 struct parser_params *p;
13384
13385 TypedData_Get_Struct(self, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
13386 p->debug = RTEST(flag);
13387 return flag;
13388}
13389
13390/*
13391 * call-seq:
13392 * ripper.debug_output -> obj
13393 *
13394 * Get debug output.
13395 */
13396VALUE
13397rb_parser_get_debug_output(VALUE self)
13398{
13399 struct parser_params *p;
13400
13401 TypedData_Get_Struct(self, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
13402 return p->debug_output;
13403}
13404
13405/*
13406 * call-seq:
13407 * ripper.debug_output = obj
13408 *
13409 * Set debug output.
13410 */
13411VALUE
13412rb_parser_set_debug_output(VALUE self, VALUE output)
13413{
13414 struct parser_params *p;
13415
13416 TypedData_Get_Struct(self, struct parser_params, &parser_data_type, p);
13417 return p->debug_output = output;
13418}
13419
13420#ifndef RIPPER
13421#ifdef YYMALLOC
13422#define HEAPCNT(n, size) ((n) * (size) / sizeof(YYSTYPE))
13423/* Keep the order; NEWHEAP then xmalloc and ADD2HEAP to get rid of
13424 * potential memory leak */
13425#define NEWHEAP() rb_imemo_tmpbuf_parser_heap(0, p->heap, 0)
13426#define ADD2HEAP(new, cnt, ptr) ((p->heap = (new))->ptr = (ptr), \
13427 (new)->cnt = (cnt), (ptr))
13428
13429void *
13430rb_parser_malloc(struct parser_params *p, size_t size)
13431{
13432 size_t cnt = HEAPCNT(1, size);
13433 rb_imemo_tmpbuf_t *n = NEWHEAP();
13434 void *ptr = xmalloc(size);
13435
13436 return ADD2HEAP(n, cnt, ptr);
13437}
13438
13439void *
13440rb_parser_calloc(struct parser_params *p, size_t nelem, size_t size)
13441{
13442 size_t cnt = HEAPCNT(nelem, size);
13443 rb_imemo_tmpbuf_t *n = NEWHEAP();
13444 void *ptr = xcalloc(nelem, size);
13445
13446 return ADD2HEAP(n, cnt, ptr);
13447}
13448
13449void *
13450rb_parser_realloc(struct parser_params *p, void *ptr, size_t size)
13451{
13452 rb_imemo_tmpbuf_t *n;
13453 size_t cnt = HEAPCNT(1, size);
13454
13455 if (ptr && (n = p->heap) != NULL) {
13456 do {
13457 if (n->ptr == ptr) {
13458 n->ptr = ptr = xrealloc(ptr, size);
13459 if (n->cnt) n->cnt = cnt;
13460 return ptr;
13461 }
13462 } while ((n = n->next) != NULL);
13463 }
13464 n = NEWHEAP();
13465 ptr = xrealloc(ptr, size);
13466 return ADD2HEAP(n, cnt, ptr);
13467}
13468
13469void
13470rb_parser_free(struct parser_params *p, void *ptr)
13471{
13472 rb_imemo_tmpbuf_t **prev = &p->heap, *n;
13473
13474 while ((n = *prev) != NULL) {
13475 if (n->ptr == ptr) {
13476 *prev = n->next;
13477 break;
13478 }
13479 prev = &n->next;
13480 }
